src_text: Ukulawulwa Kwehlekelele Ngemva Kweenkhukhula.
tgt_text: Ditiro tsa Tsamaiso ya Matlhotlhapelo tse go Samaganweng le Tsona go Latela gore go nne le Merwalela.

src_text: IKhabinethi ililele beyaduduza boke abantu ababhujelweko eenkhukhuleni zamhlapha ezisahlele iindawo ezimbadlwana zelizwe, khulukhulu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso go batho botlhe ba ba latlhegetsweng ke ba ba ba ratang mo merwaleleng ya fa gautshwane e tlisitseng ditshenyegelo tse di masisi e amileng dikarolo di le mmalwa tsa naga ya rona, bogolo segolo KwaZulu-Natala..     Dikgato tsa go Baya Dikarolo tseno mo Maemong Matlhotlhapelo Bosetšhaba mmogo le dikgato tsa go thusa baagi ka matlole a tlhokegang tse di itsisetsweng ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa fa gautshwane, maitlhomo tsona ke go netefatsa gore maphata otlhe puso tsaya dikgato tse di rulagantsweng sentle le tse di tla nnang mosola mo go samaganeng le maemo ano, mme seno se tla diriwa ka go dirisa Tikwatikwe ya Naga e Samaganang le Matlhotlhapelo..     Bilione ya diranta puso e abileng dirisediwa go tshegetsa dikgato tsa go ritibatsa maemo le tsa go busetsa maemo ditirelo tse di botlhokwa sekeng mmogo le go abelana ka ditirelo tsa botho tse di jaaka go ba rekela dijo, go ba tlela metsi le go ba batlela bodulo, dintlwanaboithusetso le diaparo..     Tirego ya go aga sešwa mafelo a amegileng setse simolotswe jaaka batho ba naga ya gaetsho ba kopane mo maikemisetsong bona go thusa ba ba latlhegetsweng ke magae le dithoto tsa bona.
Tshedimosetso ka Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

src_text: Ukumenyezelwa kobuJamo beHlekelele eliZweniloke kunye namagadango wokusiza ukwethula abantu umthwalo kezehlalakuhle nezomnotho, njengoba kumemezele uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa mhlapha, bekunqophe ukuletha ihlelo elihle lokulamulela abantu kizo zoke iingaba zikarhulumende, ngeZiko lokuLawula iHlekelele eliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Kabinete tshwentswe ke go tlhatlhoga ga fa gautshwane ga ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 mo dikarolong dingwe tsa naga mme ikuetse go batho botlhe go tsaya dikgato tsa go itshireletsa kgatlhanong le mogare o kotsi ono, bogolo segolo mo marigeng.
Mogare ono sa ntse re tsenya tsebetsebe mme go tlhabela moento sale ntse le yona tsela e botoka go gaisa re ka itshireletsang ka yona.

src_text: Imali eyibhiliyoni yamarandi ekhutjhwe ngurhulumende isetjenziselwa ukusekela imizamo yokusiza nokulungisa, ukubuyisa izenzelwa ekuphilwa ngazo, ukunikela ngesizo leendingo zesitjhaba ezinjengokugoma, amanzi, iindawo  zokuhlala, ihlelo lehlanzeko yomphakathi kunye nezembatho.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumelela gore batho ba le bantsi ba tswelela go tsaya tshweetso ya go tlhabela moento go nna ona ba itshireletsang ka ona kgatlhanong le COVID-19 mme seno se latela gore dipalopalo tsa fa gautshwane di bontshe gore mo bathong botlhe ka fa nageng re setse re fitlheletse palo e fetang halofo ya bona ya batho ba ba tlhabetseng meento mo diporofenseng tse tlhano.
Kabinete ikuela go ba ba iseng ba entiwe go ya go tlhabela moento gore ba tle ba itshireletse bona le ba ba tshelang mmogo le bona.

src_text: Selithomile ihlelo lokuvuselela iindawo ezithintekileko njengoba abantu belizwe lekhethu babumbana bancamele ukusiza labo abagirikelwe ziinkumba bebonakalelwa yipahla.
tgt_text: Gape rotlhe re tshwanetse go tswelela go obamela dikgato tsotlhe tsa thibelo ya COVID-19, go akarediwa go rwala mmaseke o tswalang nko le molomo, go tlhapa diatla ka metsi le sesepa, go tsikitletsa diatla ka sebolayamegare se 70% ya sona leng alekhoholo, le go katogana le batho ba bangwe..     Mogolo wa go Inola Batho mo Tshotlegong (SRD).

Kabinete rotloetsa baagi ba ba amogelang R350 ya madi thuso SRD go dira dikopo sešwa, go latela kitsiso ya melawana mentšhwa e laolang makwalokopo le go nna le tshiamelo ya madi thuso..     Dikopo di ka dirwa mo webosaeteng ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tshireletso ya Loago (SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Zamva Nje Ngesifo Sengogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Tsamaiso ya go dira dikopo butswe ka la bo 23 Moranang 2022 mme dirisa fela mafaratlhatlha thekenoloji go kgontsha gore go direlwe ka bonako..     Mogolo ono botlhokwa thata mo go thuseng malapa a tlhokang lehuma le botlhokatiro di ka bong di sa bolo go itelekela mo go ona.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyelele beyitshwenyekile ngokwanda kwabantu abangenwe yi-COVID-19 kezinye iingcenye zelizweli, yabe yakhwezelela boke abantu ukuthi batjheje, bazivikele kilengogwana engumabhubhisa, khulukhulu ebusika nje.
tgt_text: Puso tota ikemiseditse go thusa batho ba ba humanegileng ka megolo ya yona gore le bona ba kgone go nna le tse ba di tlhokang.
Pabalesego le Tshireletsego.

src_text: Ingogwana le solo isese yingozi ebantwini, begodu ukujova solo kusese kuphela kwesikhali esinamandla ukuzidlula zoke sokuzivikela.
tgt_text: Kabinete tswelela go kgala ka mafoko a bogale dipolao tse di setlhogo tsa basadi mme lebogile dikgato tsa ka bonako tse mapodisi ba di tsereng mo go tshwareng babelaelwa mo kgetseng ya polao ya Mme Hillary Gardee (28), wa kwa Kamagugu kwa Mpumalanga.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozile ukubona ukuthi bayanda abantu abakhetha ukuhlaba njengendlela yokuthoma nenamandla khulu yokuzivikela esifeni se-COVID-19, ngemva kobana iimbalobalo zitjengise ukuthi sesiwadlulile ama-50% wabantu abakhulu esele bahlabile eemfundeni ezihlanu.
tgt_text: Gape Kabinete kgadile ka mafoko a bogale polao ya batho ba le barataro kwa Khayelitsha, kwa Motsekapa.

Dipolao tse di setlhogo di re gakolola gore re tshwanetse go dira go feta ga jaana jaaka setšhaba go fedisa tirisodikgoka le tirisodikgoka mo bathong ba bong jo bo rileng mmogo le polao ya basadi le bana (GBVF).

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela boke labo abangakahlabi ukuthi basize bayokuhlaba kobanyana bazokuvikeleka, bavikele nabathandiweko babo.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe mo nageng go dira le puso mo ntweng kgatlhanong le bosenyi le GBVF.

src_text: Soke kufuze bona sihlale sithobela imilayelo yokukhandela ukungenwa yi-COVID-19; sembathe imaski evala umlomo nepumulo, sihlale sihlamba izandla zethu ngamanzi nesibha, namkha sihlikihle izandla zethu ngesihlanzekisi esine-alkhoholi ema-70%, sibe sihlale maqalanga kabanye abantu, ubuncani bakhona siqalangane ngemitha.
tgt_text: Mmogo re ka dira bonnete jwa gore batho botlhe, go akarediwa bagodi, basadi le bana ba bona mafelo re nnang mo go ona le mebila ya ona babalesegile..     Ikonomi.
Kabinete amogetse pulosemmuso ya feme ya tlhagiso ya ditena ya Corobrik kwa Kwastina kwa Driefontein kwa Gauteng mo tirelo eno neng tsenetswe ke Moporesidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro, 4 Motsheganong.

src_text: Isibonelelo SezeHlalakuhle sokuBonelela ebuJameni bamaTlhuwo (i-SRD) .
tgt_text: Feme eno ya maemo a kwa godimo ke karolo ya peeletso ya R800 milione e tsamaelanang le R200 milione nngwe e beetsweng go atolosa ditiro tsa konkereite tsa Corobrik kwa KwaZulu-Natala.

src_text: 1 IKhabinethi ikhuthaza izakhamuzi ezirhola isibonelelo esiyi-R350 ukuthi zifake iimbawo zazo zesibonelelo ngobutjha, njengoba sekunemibandela emitjha elawula iimbawo zokuthola lesisibonelelo nje.
tgt_text: Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo di le mmalwa tsa ka fa nageng tse di tsibogetseng boikuelo jwa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa jwa gore dikgwebo tsa Aforika Borwa le tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba di beeletse mo ikonoming.
Kabinete nopotse gore ditšhono tse dinnye tsa ikonomi mo mererong ya haeterojene di oketsegile ka ntlha ya go agiwa ga lori ya setlamo sa meepo sa Anglo American e tsamayang ka mafura haeterojene.

src_text: 2     Iimbawo zingafakwa kubunzinzolwazi be-Ejensi yeeMbonelelo zeSondlo noMhlalaphasi kaRhulumende yeSewula Afrika (i-SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Lori eno – e fetotsweng gore se tlhole dirisa mafura disele mme dirise haeterojene, mmogo le go neelwa maatla ke dibeterii tsa lithium-ion – ke ya ntlha ya mofuta oo mo lefatsheng.

src_text: Ihlelo lokufaka iimbawo livulwe ngomhla wama-23 kuSihlabantangana wee-2022, kanti-ke lisebenza budijithali ngokupheleleko kobanyana lizokukhamba msinyana.
tgt_text: Ditšhono tsa ikonomi mo mererong ya haeterojene di nopotswe jaaka tse di botlhokwa mo maanong a botlhokwa ikonomi e sa diriseng dilo tse di bolayang tlhago mo nageng ya rona, le mo go godiseng ikonomi le mo go tlhameng ditiro..     Gape kabinete amogetse peeletso nngwe mo ikonoming e tlang ka setlamo sa dijo sa Ireland, se se bidiwang Kerry Group, se se butseng polante ntšhwa e jeleng R650 milione kwa Hammarsdale, kwa KwaZulu-Natala se maikaelelo sona leng go tlhagisetsa kontinente dijo tse di tse di sa feleng.

Polante eno ga tshwane le tse dingwe gonne na le didirisiwa di le mmalwa tse di sa senyeng tikologo mmogo le tse di sa diriseng motlakase montsi, tse di dirisang motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi o tla dirang gore seelo sa go itshepele ka bontsi mo motlakaseng wa ka fa nageng se fokotsege, motlakase o tsewang mo mogoteng o tswang mo metšhining megolo mmogo le metsi a lekaneng, go selwa le go solwamosola gape le phokotso.

src_text: 3     Isibonelelwesi sezehlalakuhle esithula abantu umthwalo weendleko siligadango eliqakathekileko emakhaya anganabuyo, abekangadosa emhlweni ngomtlhago wobuchaka nangokungasebenzi.
tgt_text: Setlamo sa Kerry Group sa le se le gona mo Aforika Borwa go tloga ka 2011 mme peeletso nngwe ya bona ke sesupo sa gore Aforika Borwa sa ntse le lefelo le le ratiwang la dipeeletso.

src_text: Urhulumende uzibophelele ukusiza abantu abasengozini ekulu yokucaphazeka kobanyana bazokukghona ukutjheja iindingo zabo zokuphila.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso tseno di latela go thankgololwa ga bene e tlhagisitsweng mo lapeng ya Isuzu D-Max kwa Gqeberha kwa Kapa Botlhaba kgwedi e fetileng.
D-MAX ya mofuta montšhwa bontsha maikemisetso Isuzu mo Aforika Borwa mme ke nngwe ya dilo tse di fitlheletsweng ka Letsholo la Tlhabololo ya Tlhagiso ya Dijanaga (APDP).

src_text: Ukuphepha Nokuvikeleka.
tgt_text: APDP ke sekema se se tlhotlheletsang tlhagiso ya dijanaga mo indaseteri ya dijanaga mme maikaelelo sona ke go dira gore indaseteri e tlhalositsweng ya dijanaga oketse tlhagiso ya yona ya dijanaga, go oketsa mosola wa indaseteri ya dikarolo tsa dijanaga mme seno se tla dira gore indaseteri ya dijana tlhole ditiro.

src_text: IKhabinethi solo ikhalima ngamagama abukhali izenzo zokubulawa ngesihluku kwabantu abasikazi, nje-ke ikuthokozele nokubotjhwa msinyana kwabasolwa ngecala lokubulawa kwakaMma.
tgt_text: Go fopholediwa gore go tla tsenngwa R2,8 bilione ka ditlhagiswa tsa ka fa nageng fa APDP tswelela go dirisiwa.

src_text: u-Hillary Gardee (obekaneminyaka ema-28) obekahlala Kamagugu, eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Peeletso eno tla tlhola ditiro go tswa mo lephateng leno di feta di le 1 000 kwa polanteng eo mme tlhole gape le ditiro tse dingwe gape di le 24 000 mo ditlamong tse dingwe tse di dirisanang le lephata leno, mme seno se tla nna le mosola o bonalang mo go thuseng baagi ba kgaolo eo..     Pitsokgothakgothe ya Batlhankedi ba Meepo.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, iKhabinethi ikuhlabile nokubulawa kwabantu abasithandathu eKhayelitsha, e-Cape Town.
tgt_text: Pitsokgothakgothe ya Peeletso mo Meepong ya Aforika ya 2022 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 9 go fitlha ka la bo 12 Motsheganong ke nngwe ya dirala tse dikgolokgolo tsa dipuisano le ditirisanommogo magareng ga bannaleseabe botlhe mo indasetering ya meepo.

src_text: Lezizenzo zokubulalela butjhwileni zisikhumbuzo sokuthi kusese kunengi ekusamele sikwenze simphakathi ukuqeda inturhu eqothele bobulili obuthileko nomukghwa wokubulawa kwabantu abasikazi (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Moono wa tiragalo ne le: “Diphetogo mo Meepong ya Aforika: Go beeletsa mo Tsamaisong ya Motlakase, ESG le Diikonomi”.
Kabinete dumela gore Pitsokgothakgothe ya Meepo tla thusa go bontsha le go tsweletsa Aforika Borwa jaaka lefelo le le ratiwang la dipeeletso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthaza boke abantu elizweni lekhethweli ukuthi basebenzisane ngokusizana norhulumende ukulwisana ne-GBVF.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa leboga dipeeletso mo nageng ya rona mme ikemiseditse go dira gore go nne le maemo a tla dirang gore re nne le kgolo botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go yona ya ikonomi le go tlisa diphetogo mo ikonoming.

src_text: Ngokusebenzisana singaqinisekisa ukuthi umphakathi neentrada zekhethu ziphephile ebantwini boke, abadala nabancani, abatjha nabentwana.
tgt_text: Dikamano tsa Boditšhabatšhaba le tsa Kgaolo.

Kabinete amogetse gape ditherisano tsa fa gautshwane tsa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa le Moporesidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Moporesidente Emmanuel Macron wa Fora le Moporesidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mo diraleng tse di farologaneng.

src_text: Umnotho.
tgt_text: Ditherisano tseno di kgontshitse Moporesidente go maatlafatsa dikamano tsa sebedi le tirisanommogo magareng ga Aforika Borwa le mebuso ya balekane malebana le dintlha tsa botlhokwa tsa kgaolo le tsa boditšhabatšhaba, go akarediwa go bona tharabololo ya kagiso ya kgotlhang e kwa Ukraine     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuvulwa kwefemu epheka iintina i-Kwastina,  engaphasi kwe-Corobrik, ese-Driefontein e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Ditekanyetsokabo.

src_text: Ifemu le ivulwe nguMengameli u-Ramaphosa ngeLesithathu womhla we-04 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe go latela ditlhagiso tsa Ditekanyetsokabo tse di farologaneng tsa mafapha bosetšhaba puso le la Kantoro ya Moporesidente gore ba kgone go rwesa puso maikarabelo..     Ka nako ya ditlhagiso tsa Ditekanyetsokabo, mafapha otlhe thadisa ka botlalo dithulaganyo le ditlapele tsa ngwaga.

src_text: Ifemu le engeyezinga eliphezulu lokupheka iintina, iyingcenye yamasiso we-R800 weengidi akhambisana nenye i-R200 yeengidi enqophe ukukhulisa umsebenzi wekhonkhreyidi wakwa-Corobrik KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Maikaelelo tlhagiso ya Ditekanyetsokabo ke go netefatsa gore matlole setšhaba dirisiwa ka nonofo go fitlhelela ditlhokego tsa baagi..     Gape di neela Ditona serala se se maleba go tsharolola tiro ya puso, go akarediwa dikatlego le dikgwetlho..     Leano la go Anamisa Gase ya Peteroliamo e Fetoletsweng go nna Seedi (LPG).

src_text: I-Corobrik ingenye yamabhizinisi ambadlwana weSewula Afrikapha aphendule isibawo sikaMengameli Ramaphosa  sokukhombela amabhizinisi weSewula Afrika newamazwe ngamazwe ukuthi asisise emnothweni welizwe leSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tsenngwa tirisong ga Leano la go Anamisa LPG, le le phasaladitsweng go batla maikutlo baagi ka Mopitlwe.
Maikaelelo leano leno ke go atolosa indaseteri ya LPG mo nageng.

src_text: IKhabinethi itjheje ukuthi umnotho we-hayidrojini osakhasako unikelwe amandla ngokwethulwa kwelori ekhamba ngerhasi ye-hayidrojini yi-Anglo American.
tgt_text: LPG tla nna mosola mo go bonalang mo go direng gore re nne le metswedi e farologaneng ya motlakase..     Gareng ga ditsereganyo tse dingwe, leano leno le tla laola ditlhwatlhwa mo lephateng leno le go tshegetsa tlhagiso ya disilindara tsa LPG mo nageng.

src_text: Ilori le – etjhugululwe ekukhambeni ngedizeli yakhanjiswa nge-hydrogen, esebenzisa amabhethri we-lithium-ion, ingeyokuthoma yalomhlobo ephasini.
tgt_text: Gape le tla ruta baagi ka mesola ya go dirisa LPG jaaka mofuta mongwe wa motlakase..     Leano leno go tla iponelwa lona fa le sena go phasaladiwa ke Lefapha la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Diminerale le Motlakase mo www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Umnotho we-hayidrojini ubekiswe njengeqalontanzi lamaqhinga emnothweni welizwe lekhethu onganarhasi esilaphazako, nokuzakuphakamisa ukuhluma komnotho nokuvula imisebenzi.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso la Naga le le Buang ka Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo a Tsweletsang Temoso ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.
Kabinee amogetse Letlhomeso la Naga le le Buang ka Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo a Tsweletsang Temoso ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele nokhunye ukusisa emnothweni wekhethu yikhamphani ekhiqiza ukugoma ye-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, yona evule ifemu etja ye-R650 yeengidi e-Hammersdale, KwaZulu-Natala, enqophe ukwenzela ikhonthinenti ye-Afrika ukugoma okubambelelako.
tgt_text: Maikaelelo letlhomeso ke go kaela maphata poraefete le setšhaba go netefatsa gore ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba nang le bogole di sirelediwa jaaka go beilwe mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: Ifemu le ihlukile kezinye ngoba yona inezinto ezimbadlwana ezizakwenza bona ukugoma kuhlale kukhona; hlangana nazo kubalwa neensetjenziswa ezingasebenzisi iimbaseli ngobunengi,  nezisebenza ngomtjhiso welanga ukuphehla igezi, okuzakusi ukuphungula ukusetjenziswa kwegezi enengi kile ephehlwa ziimphehligezi njenganje, nezikghona ukubamba zilonde umtjhiso ebewungalahlwa, nokulondeka kwamanzi, nokusetjenziswa kwamanzi ngobutjha kunye nokuphunguleka kwamanzi asetjenziswako.
I-Kerry Group solo yafika lapha eSewula Afrika ngomnyaka wee-2011, kanti-ke ukungezelela kwayo amasiso wayo lapha ekhethu kusitjengiso sokuthi iSewula Afrika solo ililizwe elenyulelwa ukusisa kilo.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso leno le tla ka dithulaganyo tse di tla thusang go fedis dikgoreletsi tse go itemogelwang tsona fa go tsewa ditshwetso, bogolo segolo tse di amanang le batho ba ba nang le bogole.
Gape le lemosa batho ba ba nang le bogole gore ba itse ditshwanelo tsa bona jaaka di sirelediwa ke Molaotheo.

src_text: Lamasiso-ke alandela ukwethulwa kweveni  Isuzu D-Max efemini yeGqeberha, esePumalanga Kapa, ngenyanga ephelileko.
tgt_text: Gape letlhomeso leno le tlamela ka katiso, pegelo ya bobegakang le tsweletso ya temoso mo setšhabeng malebana le ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba nang le bogole.

src_text: Leveni yomhlobo we-D-Max izaliselela ukuzibophelela kwekampani yakwa-Isuzu eSewula Afrika begodu ingelinye ihlangothi  lepumelelo lehlelo lokukhandwa kweenkoloyi i-Automotive Production Development Programme (i-APDP).
tgt_text: Letlhomeso leno le diragatsa Lekwalo la Matlhagolatsela la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.

src_text: I-APDP ilihlelo lehlohlomezelo lokukhanda iinkoloyi elinqophe ukwandisa umthamo weenkoloyi ezikhandwa ebubulweni leenkoloyi elithileko, ngaleyindlela kukhuthazeke ubuhle namandla womsebenzi emafemini weenkoloyi, ngaleyindlela kwande nemisebenzi ezakuvuleka emafemini weenkoloyi namanye akhambisana nawo.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ke mosaeni wa Tumelano ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole le Porothokholo ya UN ya Tšhata ya Aforika ya Ditshwanelo tsa Botho le Batho mo Ditshwanelong tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (Porothokholo ya Aforika ya Ditshwanelo tsa Bogole).

src_text: Kulinganiswa ukuthi kuzakwenziwa imali engange-R. 8 yamabhiliyoni ngokukhandwa kweenkoloyi ngalelihlelo le-APDP ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Go batlilwe maikutlo bannaleseabe ba ba maleba malebana le letlhomeso, go akarediwa Lekgotla la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi le Badiri.

src_text: Ifemu le-ke izokuvula imisebenzi engaphezulu kwekulungwana eplantini yayo lapho yakhiwe khona, bese kuba nabanye abantu abazii-24 000 ezabaqatjha ngezinye iindlela ezingasibunqopha, ngaleyindlela-ke kuvuleke amathuba wokuphakamisa umphakathi walendawo.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe.
Kabinete amogetse go tshwariwa ga Samiti ya Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe ka Labotlhano, 27 le Lamatlhatso, 28 Motsheganong 2022 kwa Gauteng.

src_text: Umbuthano WezeeMayini.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Lekwalo la Ditshwetso tse go Enngweng ka Tsona la Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe le go dumelanweng ka lona mo kgweding ya Mopitlwe kaetse gore go dirwe patlomaikutlo nngwe mo baameging ba ba maleba.

src_text: UmButhano wokuCocisana ngeeNdaba zokuSisa eeMayini womNyaka wee-2022 ebewubanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre ukusukela ngomhla we-09  ukuya kumhla we-12 kuMrhayili, bewungomunye weenkundla ezikulu khulu  zokubonisana nokusizana hlangana kwabo boke ababelani ebubulweni leemayini.
tgt_text: Samiti eno tla tsenyeletsa gape le tiro e dirilweng mo ngwageng o fetileng mo go yona go batlilweng ditshwaelo go tswa kwa bannaleseabeng ba ba farologaneng     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Ummongondaba walombuthano bewuthi: “Ukutjhuguluka Kokumayina E-Afrika: Ukuzibekela Ehlelweni Lokudlulela Komunye Umhlobo Weembaseli, i-ESG kunye nemiNotho.”                .
tgt_text: Khonferense ya Botlhano ya Lefatshe ya Phediso ya go Ja Bana Ntshu.

src_text: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi Umbuthano Wezeemayini (i-Mining Indaba) uzakusiza ukutjengisa nokukhuphula igama leSewula Afrika njengelizwe elilungele ukusiswa kilo.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla amogela Khonferense ya Botlhano ya Lefatshe ya Phediso ya go Ja Bana Ntshu kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Durban ya go Tshwarela Dikhonferense kwa KwaZulu-Natal go tloga ka Latshipi, 15 go fitlha ka Labotlhano, 20 Motsheganong.

Ke la ntlha Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Badiri (ILO) tshwarela khonferense eno mo Aforika..     Go solofetswe gore khonferense tla tsenelwa ke ditlhogo tsa dipuso, ditona tse 120, dikgaolotlhopho tsa boraro tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo tsa ILO di le187, ditheo tsa UN, ditheo tsa thuto, mekgatlho ya baagi, mekgatlho e seng ya puso, bobegakgang le baagi.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyawathokozela amasiso angena elizweni lekhethu begodu izibophelele ngokwenza ubujamo bezinto bube buhle buvumele ukuhluma okuqalelela umuntu woke nokuhleleka ngobutjha komnotho.
tgt_text: Gape tiragalo tla kgontsha Aforika Borwa go tlhagisa Molaotheo wa naga jaaka sireletsa ditshwanelo tsa bana.

Naga tla golagana le dinaga tse di farologaneng tse di re eteletseng pele ka go fedisa go ja bana ntshu le go ithuta mo go tsona..     Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo  le le Ikaegileng ka Ditikologo (DDM).

src_text: Ubudlelwano Bamazwe ngamazwe Neberijini.
tgt_text: Moresidente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Imbizo ya Moporesidente e buang ka DDM kwa Mpumalanga ka Labotlhano, 20 Motsheganong 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nemikhulumiswano yamhlapha hlangana kwakaMengameli u-Ramaphosa newe-United States u-Joe Biden, we-France u-Emmanuel Macron, newe-Zambia u-Hakainde Hichilema, ngokwahlukahluka.
tgt_text: Jaaka serala sa botlhokwa se baagi ba nang le seabe mo go sona, Imbizo tla letla Moporesidente go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba farologaneng – bogolo segolo baagi ba metsemagae – le go reetsa matshwenyego le dikgwetlho tsa bona ka maikaelelo go samagana natso.
Imbizo ya Moporesidente e buang ka DDM ikaelela go sutisa dikgoreletsi tsa tlamelo ya ditirelo e tsamaisanang mmogo le go tsweletsa seabe sa baagi go lepalepana le DDM.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano le inikele uMengameli ithuba lokuqinisa ubudlelwano beSewula Afrika namazwe esebenzisana nawo ngeendaba eziqakathekileko zerijini nezamazwe ngamazwe, hlangana nazo ekubalwa nendlela yokulamula ipi ye-Ukraine ngokuthula     Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi .
tgt_text: MaAforika Borwa ka latela dipuisano mo mafaratlhatlheng loago ditlhaeletsano mmogo le go nna le seabe mo go tsona ka go tsena mo #PresidentialImbizo.

src_text: Amavowudi Ngesabelo Seemali.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibawa zoke izakhamuzi ukuthi zilandele amaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali seminyango karhulumende ngokwahlukahluka nese-Ofisi likaMengameli kobanyana zizokwazi ukulindela ukuzwa ngemisebenzi urhulumende ekufuze ayenze.
tgt_text: Mokete wa segopotso sa Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika o tshwarwang mmogo le wa go keteka Letsatsi la go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ka Laboraro, 25 Motsheganong ketekiwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ngwaga wa Kgora: Go maatlafatsa kgora le go nna teng ga dijo mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika”..     Jaaka karolo ya ponelopele ya pakatelele e tlhagisitsweng mo Lenaneo 2063 (le leng kaedi ya tlhabololo ya Aforika go fitlhelela tlhabololo ya ikonomiloago e akaretsang le e tsweletsegang mo dingwageng tse 50), moono totile bokgoni jwa batho ba Aforika, go lebeletswe thata basadi, makgarebe le bana.
Seno se botlhokwa mo tlhabololong ka ntlha ya fa se lebisa kwa matshelong a tokafetseng batho ka nosi, go nna le dipoelo tse di kwa godimo le letseno le le tokafetseng mo dinageng.

src_text: Ngesikhathi samaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali, yoke iminyango inikela imininingwana ngokunaba kwayo yamahlelo wayo namaqalontanzi womnyaka woke.
tgt_text: Ntlhakgolo e ka elwang tlhoko mo meletlong ya Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ke Beke ya Dipuisano tsa Aforika e tla tshwarelwang kwa Constitutional Hill kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka la bo 23 go fitlha ka la bo 27 Motsheganong.

src_text: AmaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali anqophe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iimali zomphakathi/zombuso zisetjenziswa ngendlela efaneleko ukugcina iindingo zomphakathi.

tgt_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ke tšhono ya go godisa tshwaragano ya Aforika le go dira gore dikgaolo tsa yona di nne le tshwaragano e tseneletseng, le go dira gore Aforika nne le maikemisetso a tshwanang.

src_text: Godu anikela naboNgqongqotjhe ithuba elihle lokuhlathulula umsebenzi karhulumende ukuya phambili, ekubalwa hlangana nawo nepumelelo esele yenziwe kunye neentjhijilo ezikhona.
tgt_text: Kabinete gakolola mongwe le mongwe gore dikgatlhegelo tsa rona tsa bosetšhaba di golagane le tsepamo, kopano le katlego ya Aforika     Melaetsa.

Matshediso     Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng le balesika ba: Mme Phindile Xaba (53), yo dirileng sebaka le ka maikemisetso mo indasetering ya bobegakgang, mo Aforika Borwa le kwa moseja dirile ka botswapele go tokafatsa naga ya rona.

src_text: IQhinga Lokusatjalaliswa kweRhasi Yepetroli Eyenziwe Itlelezi (i-LPG).
tgt_text: Moambasadara Silumko Sokupa (74), yo diretseng Setheo sa Tshireletso ya Puso mo maemong a farolgoaneng mo pakeng telele dira ka maikemisetso mo Tirelongsetšhaba.Moporofesara Francis Wilson (83), motlhankedi wa merero ya ikonomi yo tumileng le mosimolodi wa Yuniti ya Badiri le Dipatlisiso tsa Tlhabololo mo Borwa jwa Aforika     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumile ukuthi lingathoma ukusetjenziswa iqhinga le-LPG, elamenyezelwa ukuthi kubonisanwe ngalo nomphakathi ngoNtaka wee-.
tgt_text: Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Tlhabololo ya Setheo kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo (DCoG).

src_text: Ihlelweli linqophe ukukhulisa ibubulo le-LPG elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Rre Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka jaaka DDG: Tshegetso ya Pusoselegae le Tsamaiso ya Ditsereganyo kwa DCoG..     Rre Risimati Patrick Mathye jaaka DDG: Tsamaiso ya Ditirelo tsa Metsi le Kgeleloleswe kwa Lefapheng la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe (DWS)..     Rre Collin Xolani Zwane jaaka DDG: Taolo, Kobamelo le Tiragatso kwa DWS.

src_text: I-LPG izakwenza litho likhulu ekuvuleni amathuba wokutholakala kwemihlobohlobo yemithombo yeembaseli.
tgt_text: Rre Melanchton Makobe jaaka DDG: Netefaletso ya Bolaodi ya SOC le Tiragatso kwa Lefapheng la Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba     Kabinete dumelane le Ditona mo go thapiweng ga ba ba latelang:.
Rre Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa jaaka Motlhakedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Setheo sa Tlhabololo ya Matlo (HDA).

src_text: Leliqhinga lizakulawula nentengo yeembaseli libe lisekele nomsebenzi wokukhiqizwa kwamasilinda we-LPG elizweni lekhethweli, hlangana nokhunye.
tgt_text: Mme Joy Keledi Masemola jaaka Motlhankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete kwa HDA..     Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters jaaka CEO wa Lepelle Northern Water.

src_text: Imizamo Yokubuyisa Okulahlekileko Nokwakha Ngobutjha Ngemva Kweenkhukhula.
tgt_text: Go Itharabologelwa le go Itlhotlhora mo Ditshenyegelong tsa Merwalela.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke yabe yathokoza boke abantu neenhlangano ezibe nesandla nelizwi emizameni yokubuyisa okulahlekileko nokwakha ngobutjha ngemva komonakalo otjhiye kulilwa isimayemaye kezinye iindawo zelizwe lekhethweli, khulukhulu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse le go leboga batho botlhe le mekgatlho yotlhe e thusang mo dikgatong tsa go itharabologelwa le go itlhotlhora mo ditshenyegelong tsa merwalela go latela gore mafelo mangwe ka fa nageng gogolwe ke merwalela megolo, segolobogolo mafelo KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Ithokoze zoke iinhlangano ezingasizombuso, iinhlangano zekolo, umphakathi, abosomabhizinisi kunye neenhlangano zesizo kabahluphekileko zona eziphakise abantu ukudla, izambatho, ipahla yesithunzi kunye nejinifomu yesikolo emindenini etlhagileko, kobanyana izokukghona ukugcina iindingo zayo ekuphilwa ngazo.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile mekgatlho yotlhe e seng ya puso, ya dikereke, ya baagi, ya dikgwebo le eo thusang baagi ka go neela malapa a tlhokang ka ditlhokwa tse di botlhokwa ka go neela dijo, diaparo, dikobo, didirisiwa tsa sesadi tsa fa bomme ba le mo 'kgweding mmogo le diaparo tsa sekolo..     Tikwatikwe ya Ditirelo tsa Botsamaisi jwa Ditiragalo tsa Matlhotlhapelo tswelela go laola ditiro tsotlhe tsa maphata puso tse di ka ga go tswa baagi botlhe ba ba amegileng thuso.

Batho ba feta ba le 7 000 ba neelwa gape le ditirelo tsa marobalo mo mafelong a itemogetseng ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo mo dikgaolong di le nne tsa KwaZulu-Natal..     Tiro ya go agela malapa a amegileng dintlo mo dinageng tsa puso tse di nopotsweng tsa KwaZulu-Natal tse go nang le kgonagalo ya go fudusetsa baagi bano mo go tsona setse simolotse.

src_text: IZiko LezokuLawula IHlekelele EliZweniloke solo lisalungelela zoke iingaba zikarhulumende emzamweni walo wokulethela woke amakhaya athintekileko isizo lobuntu.
tgt_text: Kabinete buseleditse boitlamo jwa puso jwa go tlhokomela ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho le ka go tlhoka lehunelo madi go thusa ba ba amilweng ke merwalela.

src_text: Bangaphezulu kween-7 000 abantu abasizwa ngeendawo zokufihla ihloko eenyingini ezine ezingezonakalelwe khulu kunezinye KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Morunimogolo se tlamela ka ditirelo tse dingwe gape tsa go disa maemo ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho le go netefatsa gore madi ano logelwa maano go ya ka thulaganyo ya puso ya go rulaganyetsa tiriso ya matlole..     Tshedimosetso ya Sešweng ya Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging botlhe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa go itlhokomela gore ba se fetelwe ke COVID-19 mme seno se latela gore dipalopalo tse di rebotsweng di bontshe gore palo ya batho ba ba fetelwang ke mogare ono mmogo le ba ba fetelwang ke malwetse a tlang le mariga ka fa nageng tsweletse go tlhatloga..     Kabinete gakolotse batho botlhe go tswelela go itlhokomela le go tlhokomela batho ba bangwe ka go dira bonnete jwa gore ba tlhapa diatla kgotsa ba di tsikitletsa ka sebolayamegare gangwe le gape, ka go apara dimaseke fa ba le fa teng ga meago, go katogana le batho ba bangwe, go bula matlhabaphefo gore go tsene mowa o phepa mmogo le go tlhabela moento.

src_text: Uthomile umsebenzi wokwakhela imindeni ethintekileko izindlu zokuhlala kwesikhatjhana enarheni yombuso ekhonjwe njengendawo ekungafudukiselwa kiyo abantu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Go tlhabela moento santse le yona tsela e di gaisang ya go itlhokomela gore se gatelelwe ke bolwetse jwa COVID-19, go robala kwa bookelong ka ntlha ya yona kgotsa go ya maotwana hunyela.

src_text: IKhabinethi isifakazele isibopho sikarhulumende sokulawula imali ekhutjhelwe ukusiza abantu abonelwe ziinkhukhula ngokuyelela nemkhanyweni.
tgt_text: Ga tlhoke le go nna le aterese ya gore nna kae gore kgone go tlhabela moento.

src_text: UmHloliincwadi Zombelele weSewula Afrika ungezelela umsebenzi wokubeka ilihlo kanti-ke ukunikelwa kwamaqalontanzi amatjha wokusetjenziswa kweemali kukhambisana nehlelo likarhulumende lokwabiwa kweemali.
tgt_text: Motho mongwe le mongwe yo nang kgotsa yo senang lekwaloitshupo le ene ka kgona go tlhabela moento mo mafelong otlhe a direlang setšhaba ka fa nageng go tlhabela moento ntle le go duelela.
Re Utlwile go Lekane ka Ditiragalo tsa go Nyatsa Batho ba Merafe Mengwe!.

src_text: Zamva Nje Ngesifo Sengogwana I-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale ditiragalo tsa mefuta yotlhe tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe, re bua fano le ka ditiragalo tse di begilweng sešweng jaana kwa Good Hope Seminary High School le tsa kwa Yunibesiti ya Stellenbosch kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthaza boke abantu eSewula Afrika ukuthi batjheje bayelele bakhandele ukurhatjheka kwe-COVID-19 njengoba iimbalobalo zamva nje zitjengise ukuphakama kwenani labantu abangenwe ngiyo i-COVID-19 nabaguliswe magulo akhambisana nobusika esingaphakathi kwabobu njenganje elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tseno tsa go re tsenya matlho batho di nyatsa dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa motheo wa temokerasi ya naga ya rona tse di buang ka seriti sa batho, go se nne le ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe, go se nne le ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba bong jo bongwe, go phimola baagi keledi ka go tsosolosa seriti sa bona, go lekalekana le go tlotlana..     Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona sedirisiwa se re se dirisang go fedisa masaledi ditiragalo tsa mo malobeng tsa go re tsenya matlho batho tsa go re kgaoganya le tsa go se re tshware ka go tshwana.

Go ikuelwa mo batsading go ruta bana ba bona go gana nang ya banyana ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe mme ba tlotlomatse pharologano ya rona, seno ke karolo ya letsholo la rona le re le tshwaraganetseng la go tsholetsa go aga setšhaba le go nna ngatana le nngwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhumbuze woke umuntu ukuthi ahlale azitjhejile atjheje nabanye abantu ngokunande ahlamba namkha ahlikihle izandla ngesihlanzekisi, afake imaski nakangekhaya, aqalangane nabanye abantu ngebanga elifaneleko, kuhlale kuvulwe namafesidiri kobanyana kuzokungena ummoya begodu woke umuntu ahlabe/ajove.
tgt_text: Tla re dirisaneng mmogo go ntshetsa mo pepeneneng ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe gongwe le gongwe mo di diriwang jaaka selo se se tlwaelegileng gore go tle go bonagale gore mo nageng ya rona ya temokerasi ditiragalo tsa mothale ono ga di batlege le seng..     Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Jeremane.

Kabinete amogetse Leeto la Semmuso le le tsamaileng ka katlego la Moeteledipele wa Puso ya Federeišene ya Rephaboliki ya Jeremane, Motlotlegi Olaf Scholz, go bo jetse nala Puso ya Aforika Borwa ka la bo 24 Motsheganong..     Leeto la Semmuso la Moeteledipele Scholz le diragaditswe ka ntlha ya taletso ya Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa, yo gogang kwa pele letsholo le legolo la go dira gore mo kgaolong le mo maemong boditšhabatšhaba go nne le tirisanommogo e edileng, mmogo le go ngokela dipeeletso tse di tlhokagalang thata.

src_text: Ukuhlaba/ukujova solo kusese sikhali esinamandla ukudlula ezinye zokulwa ne-COVID-19, ngoba phela khona kukhandela ukuthi umuntu angaguli akghokghe, abe ayokulaliswa esibhedlela namkha abe agcine abhubhile.
tgt_text: Gareng ga tse dingwe, baeteledipele bano ka bobedi ba buisane ka ditsela tse ba ka dirisanang mmogo ka tsona mo mererong e jaaka ya motlakase le ya phetogo ya maemo loapi, kgwebisano le dipeeletso mmogo le ka ditsela tsa go samagana le COVID-19 le tlhokego ya tlamelo ka meento.

src_text: Akunasidingo sokuthi ube ne-adresi yalapho uhlala khona nawuyokuhlaba/nayokujova.
tgt_text: Ba buisane gape le ka se se diragalang mo kontinenteng ya Aforika le mo dinageng tsa boditšhabatšhaba, mmogo le ka ntwa e runtseng kwa Ukraine le ditlamorago tsa yona mo ikonoming ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le mo go se tlhokeng dijo le motlakase..     Jeremane ga se fela naga e leng mo maemong bobedi ka bogolo kgwebisano le naga ya Aforika Borwa, gape mo maemong boraro ka bogolo fa go tla mo dinageng tse di nang le bajanala ba bantsi ba ba ratang go re jela nala na le babeeletsi ba bantsi ba ba beeletsang ka fa nageng bile gape ke modirisanimmogo wa rona mo mererong ya tlhabologo..     Khonferense ya Botlhano e Mabapi le go Fedisa Ditiragalo tsa go Dira Bana Makgoba.

src_text: Nanyana ngubani, nanyana unomazisi nanyana akanaye, angahlaba/angajova simahla kiwo woke amaziko wokuhlaba/wokujova wombuso elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go wediwa ga tiro ya Khonferense ya Botlhano e Mabapi le go Fedisa Ditiragalo tsa go Dira Bana Makgoba e neng tshwaretswe kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 20 Motsheganong.

Bannaleseabe go ralala le lefatshe ba ne ba tsenetse khonferense eno e neng tshwerwe mmogo le Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Merero ya Badiri (ILO)..     Morago ga gore go buisanwe ka dikgato tse di siameng tse dinaga ka go farologana di di dirisang mmogo le go nopola dikarolo tse di tlhokang go tseelwa dikgato ka bonako gore go fedisiwe ditiragalo tsa go dira bana makgoba mmogo le tsa go dira batho makgoba, go ne ga diriwa boikano jwa ‘Go Tsaya Dikgato ka se Go Dumelanweng ka Sona kwa Durban’ leng se se tla samaganang le ditiragalo tseno tsa go fetola bana makgoba.

src_text: Sikhalima Ibandlululo Lobuzwe!
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tsa go dira bana makgoba di bontsha ka fao batho mo setšhabeng ba leng setlhogo ka teng go nne seno se baya bana mo kotsing.
Ditiragalo tseno di tseewa jaaka tsa go bogisa bana jaaka di dira gore bana ba se kgone go ya sekolong le gore ba iponela ditšhono tsa go tlhatlhelelwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi izisola zoke izenzo zebandlululo lobuzwe nelomhlobo elizweni lekhethweli, sekubalwa neziga ezikhe zenzeka e-Goop Hope Seminary High School neYunivesithi ye-Stellenbosch eTjingalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Ngwana mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa na le tshwanelo e totobetseng ya gore se jewe ntshu..     Tshwanelo ya thuto ya motheo tsamaisana le Molaotheo wa naga ya rona bile gape go ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa, wa 1996 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1996), “motsadi yo mongwe le yo mongwe jarile maikarabelo go netefatsa gore morutwana yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo mo godisang tsena sekolo go simolola fa le monnye na le dingwaga di le supa go fitlha ngwana yoo konosetsa dithuto tsa gagwe tsa sekolo fa na le dingwaga di le 15 kgotsa fa sena go konosetsa dithuto tsa bofelo tsa mophato wa borobongwe”..     Go ya ka Molao wa Kgodiso ya Bana wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2005), “ga go motho yo letleletsweng go ja bana ntshu, go ba reka gore ba mo direle, go ba solofetsa ditiro kgotsa go ba thapa gore nne makgoba gagwe”     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Lezizenzo ezinyenyisako ziphambana namagugu wethu womthethosisekelo asekele wona lomthethosisekelo, ekubalwa hlangana nawo nesithunzi somuntu, ukungabandlululi ngobuzwe nomhlobo, ukungabandlululi ngobulili, ubulungiswa bomphakathi, ukulinganiseka nehlonipho.
tgt_text: Kopanokgothakgothe ya go Utlwanela Tumelano ya Boditšhabatšhaba e Mabapi le Tshireletso ya Batho Botlhe Gore ba se Nyelediwe ka Lenga la Seloko ke Sepodisi (ICPPED).
Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tlisa kwa Palamenteng ICPPED gore tumelano eno sekasekiwe le go tseelwa tlhogong ke naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: UmThethosisekelo we-1996 weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika uyikomba yethu yendlela esingaruthula ngayo ukuhlukana okungamukelekiko nokutlhogeka komthethobulungiswa weenkhathi ezidlulileko.
tgt_text: Tumelano eno ke tumelano ya Dinagakopano (UN) e bofang dinaga tsa lefatshe ka bophara mme samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlola ditshwanelo tsa batho ka go nyelediwa ka lenga la seloko ke sepodisi..     Mo kopanokgothakgotheng eno go tlhalosiwa gore go nyelediwa ke sepodisi ka lenga la seloko go raya gore seno ke tiragalo e tsenyeletsang le ya go tsaya batho ka kgang, go ba tshwara, go ba golega kgotsa tiro ya mofuta mongwe le mongwe e ka dirang gore batho ba ba dirileng tiro ya mothale oo ba ikganetse seo ba se dirileng kgotsa le gona go nna ka marago kgang ya gore ba fitlhile kae batswasetlhabelo..     Fa ntlha eno sena go amogelwa gore ka nna karolo ya melao ya rona, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tshwanelwa ke gore gangwe le gape morago ga dingwaga di le pedi begele UN gore yona diragatsa jang tumelano eno.

src_text: Ababelethi bakhuthazwa ukufundisa abantwana ukuthi bakucithe ukubandlululana ngobuzwe namkha ngomhlobo, basingathe ukwahluka kwabantu ngobubona njengengcenye yehlelo lethu elinamandla lokukhwezelela ukwakheka kwesizwe nokulungelelana komphakathi.
tgt_text: Tumelano eno na le dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go tsewa go thibela gore ditiragalo tsa go tsenngwa ka lenga la seloko ke sepodisi di se diragadiwe..     Pegelo ya Bone ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Dikgato tsa go Sireletsa le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.
Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Mokgatlhong wa Dinagakopano (UN) Pegelo ya Bone ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Dikgato tsa go Sireletsa le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.

src_text: Asisebenzisane ukuveza ibandlululo lobuzwe/lomhlobo nanyana kukuphi lapho lithathwa khona njengento ejayelekileko, sithumele umlayezo ozwakala kuhle ukuthi ibandlululo alinandawo elizweni lekhethu lentando yenengi.
tgt_text: Lephata la UN le le Sekasekang Dipegelo tsa Paka nngwe le nngwe le tla sekaseka pegelo eno kwa bokhutlhong jono jwa ngwaga.

Fa sale Aforika Borwa saenela Tumelano ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ya UN, naga eno setse sekasekilwe makgetlo le mararo, mme labofelo fa sekasekiwa ne le ka kgwedi ya Lwetse mo ngwageng wa..     Mo pegelong eno go na le tshedimosetso e ka ga seo se dirilweng go latela ditshitshinyo di le 187 tse go dumelanweng ka tsona tse di dirilweng morago ga gore go sekasekiwe pegelo ya mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: Ubudlelwano Hlangana KweSewula Afrika NeJarimani .
tgt_text: Go sekegetswe tsebe tshedimosetso go fitlhetsweng gore ke ya boammaruri go tswa kwa mafapheng a maleba, go tswa kwa ditheong tsa puso tse di tshegetsang temokerasi ya molaotheo, mmogo le go tswa kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi e maleba..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tiro e setseng dirilwe mo go diragatseng tseo di tshitshintsweng mmogo le mo go seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dikgaolong tse di santseng di tlhoka go enngwa nokeng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozele ivakatjho lomBuso elibe yipumelelo leTjhansela ye-Federal Riphabhligi yeJarimani, oHloniphekileko u-Olaf Scholz, njengoba bekavakatjhele lapha eSewula Afrika nje ngeLesibili womhla wama-24 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno tla re morago ga gore tlhagisiwe kwa kopanong ya UN monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Phatwe nne gone ka phasaladiwang mo phatlhalatseng gore botlhe ba bone.
Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 e ka ga Taolo ya Metsi a Dirisiwang mo Meepong.

src_text: UTjhansela Scholtz umenywe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngalelivakatjho lakhe lomBuso, njengoba uMengameli uRamaphosa adosa phambili ijima likarhulumende lokukhwezelela ubudlelwano obuhle esiphandeni nemazweni ngamazwe nje, abe adosele namasiso adingeke khulu nganenwapha.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 e ka ga Taolo ya Metsi a Dirisiwang mo Meepong.

Mo pholising eno go na le dikgato tse di ka tsewang go tlhokomela le go seketsa metsi dira gore ditiro tsa meepo mo ikonoming di tsamaisane le maikarabelo naga go tlamela naga ka metsi a sa kgaleng..     Gare ga ditharabololo tse dingwe tse dintsi tse pholisi eno tlang ka tsona baya mo pepeneneng ntlha e buang ka maikarabelo lephata le lengwe le le lengwe la maphata otlha puso le mararo, gore maikarabelo ona ke eng fa go tla mo metsing a dirisiwang mo meepong.

src_text: Abarholi ababilaba bakhulumisene ngeendlela zokukhuphula ukusebenzisana eendabeni ezinjengezeembaseli nezokutjhuguluka kwetlayimethi, zerhwebo nezamasiso, kunye neendlela zokulwa ne-COVID-19 nezokufunakala kwemijovo yalesisifo.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse go sisintsweng gore di kwalolwe sešwa di tla rarabolola dikgwetlho tse di tleng di nne teng fa go tshwanetswe go tsewa dikgato kgatlhanong le meepo eo kgotlhelang metsi mme seno se tla dira gore go nne bonolo go duedisa meepo eo kgotlhelang metsi.

src_text: Babuye bathinta nokwenzekako elizwekazini le-Afrika kunye nemazweni ngamazwe, sekubalwa nepi ehlabene e-Ukraine njenganje namacaphazela wayo phezu komnotho nokugoma, naphezu kweembaseli nezokuphepha.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tsamaisana le Molao wa Metsi wa Naga wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 36 wa 1998).
Pegelo e Buang ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le ka ga Dithulaganyo tsa Matlole,Tekolo, Tshekatsheko le Boruni jwa Togamaano ya Tsibogelo ya Dikgwetlho tsa Bong.

src_text: IJarimani ayisilizwe lesibili elingelikhulu hlangana namazwe arhwebelana neSewula Afrika kwaphela, kodwana injalo nje ililizwe lesithathu ngobukhulu emazweni waphetjheya eza eSewula Afrika njengeemvakatjhibukeli, nomsisi omkhulu kunye nomsebenzisani wezetuthuko.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo e buang ka seo se setseng se dirilwe fa go tla mo go tsennyeng tirisong Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le ka ga Dithulaganyo tsa Matlole, Tekolo, Tshekatsheko le Boruni jwa Togamaano ya Tsibogelo ya Dikgwetlho tsa Bong..     Kabinete lebogile dikgato tse dintsi tse di setseng di weditswe ke mafapha puso le mantsinyana tse di ka ga go dira gore leano leno la go tsamaisa tiro, le mo ngwageng wa 2019 go seleng go ikanngwe gore le tla diragadiwa, kwa bofelong le feletse le le mo molaong..     Ke mafapha le mantsinyana ga jaanong setseng tsentse tirisong dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa dipholisi tse di buang ka matsholo a botlhokwa mo makaleng puso a tobaneng le go samagana le dikgwetlho tse basadi, bašwa le batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi ba tobanang natso.
Kabinete gagamaditse gore mafapha tshwanetse go gagamatsa dikgato tsa ona tsa go ela maemo tlhoko le go tlhagisa dipegelo mabapi le seno, segolobogolo mafapha a iseng tlhagise dipegelo tsa ona.

src_text: IKhonfrensi Yesihlanu Ngokuqedwa Kokusetjenziswa Kwabantwana Ephasini.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tsa go Tlhabana Botlhale tsa Bašwa go Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuragwa bekuphele kuhle kweKhonfrensi yePhasi yeHlandla lesiHlanu yokuQedwa kokuSetjenziswa kwabaNtwana ebeyibanjelwe eThekwini ukusukela ngomhla we-15 ukuya kumhla wama-20 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tshwara NMYD ngwaga mongwe le mongwe go simolola mo ngwageng ono.

src_text: Ababelani abavela emazweni ngamazwe bebakhona kilekhonfrensi ebeyibanjwe ngokubambisana neHlangano yezabaSebenzi ePhasini (i-ILO).
tgt_text: Dipuisano tseno tsa go bontsha tlotlo di tla tshwarwa go tloga ka la bo 07 go fitlha ka la bo 20 Phukwi.
Leno ke Letsholo la Kantoro ya Moporesitente go naya bašwa mo Kontinenteng tšhono ya go buisana le go rutana ka seo se amang matshelo bona.

src_text: Ngemva kokukhulumisana ngeendlela ezihle zokusebenza eziphunyeleliswe mamazwe ahlukahlukileko nangemva kokubona itlhayelo namagadango arhabekileko afunekako ukuqeda umukghwa wokusebenzisa abantwana nokukatelela abantu ukuthi basebenze, bavumelene nge-‘Durban Call to Action’ ukulwa nomukghwa wokusetjenziswa kwabantwana.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tseno – tse di tla bong di bua ka naledi ya naga ya rona ya lefatshe bong Moporesitente wa mo malobeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – go tla simololwa dipuisano tseno ka go atlhaatlha ntlha ya go nna moeteledipele yo nang le maitshwaro mo kontinenteng ya Aforika.

src_text: Woke umntwana eSewula Afrika unelungelo elingaphikisekiko lokuvikelwa emikghweni yezemisebenzi esihluku nezenzo zezabasebenzi ezidlala ngabantwana.
tgt_text: Bašwa ba tla neelwa tšhono ya gore mo dipuisanong tsa bona ba bontshane lobebe lwa dingwao le ditso tsa bona.
Letsholo leno le tla gagamatsa gape le botsalano magareng ga bašwa ka go farologana ka fa kontinenteng.

src_text: Ilungelo lefundo esisekelo livikelekile emThethwenisisekelo kanti-ke ngokomThetho we-1996 weenKolo zeSewula Afrika  (umThetho Nomboro 84 womNyaka we-1996), “Umbelethi ngamunye kufuze enze ukuthi umfundi amjameleko uthoma isikolo ngelanga lokuthoma lesikolo emnyakeni aqeda ngawo iminyaka yokubelethwa elikhomba, abe ayokufika elangeni lokugcina lesikolo lomnyaka umfundi ahlanganisa ngalo iminyaka yobudala eli-15, namkha nakaqeda uGreyidi 9, kuye ngokuthi ngikuphi okuze ntanzi.”            .
tgt_text: Lefapha la Merero ya Bomme, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi tla re mo nakong e tlang la abelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo mabapi le kopano eno.

src_text: NgokomThetho wabaNtwana wee-2005 (umThetho Nomboro 38 womNyaka wee-2005), “akunamuntu ozakuvunyelwa ukusebenzisa, ukuthola, ukunikela namkha ukuqatjha umntwana kobanyana azokwenza umsebenzi wabantwana.”      IinQunto ZeKhabinethi  .
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Ngwaga Mongwe le Mongwe ya Ngwaga wa 2021/22 e Buang ka Tiro ya go Ela Maemo Tlhoko mo go Diragatseng Tiro ya go Matlafatsa Basadi le ya go Tlisa Tekatekano Magareng ga Batho ba Bong jo bo Farologaneng, mo go Tlhatlheleleng Bašwa mmogo le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

src_text: Ukuthotjelwa Kwesivumelwano Samazwengamazwe Ngokuvikelwa Kwabo Boke Abantu Abanyamalaliswe Ngekani (i-ICPPED)          .
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Ngwaga Mongwe le Mongwe ya Ngwaga wa 2021/22 e Buang ka Tiro ya go Ela Maemo Tlhoko mo go Diragatseng Tiro ya go Matlafatsa Basadi le ya go Tlisa Tekatekano Magareng ga Batho ba Bong jo bo Farologaneng, mo go Tlhatlheleleng Bašwa mmogo le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwe-ICPPED kobanyana iyoyihlola ukuthi iSewula Afrika angeze yasamukela na lesisivumelwano.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno sala morago dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di bontshang gore go na le dikgato tse di tserweng go tlotlomatsa tekatekano mo go thapiweng le kwa tirong mmogo le mo go direng gore ditlhotshwana tseno nne tsona tse di laolang le tse di tsayang karolo mo ditirong tsa mafapha le mo ditirong tsa ditheo tsa puso.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sisivumelwano esisibopho seHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) esiqalene nokwephulwa kwamalungelo wobuntu ngokunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno kwadilwe go ya ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Loga Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole, go Ela Maemo Tlhoko, go Sekaseka Tiro le go Dira Ditiro tsa go Runa leo le sa bolong go amogelwa ke Kabinete mo ngwageng wa     Melaotlhomo.
Molaotlhomo wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo kwa Tirong (OHS) mo Meepong.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sihlathulula ukunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani okunjengokuthunjwa, ukubotjhwa, ukuvalelwa ekubotjhweni namkhka nanyana yini okhunye okungenza umephuli wamalungelo abhale ukuveza namkha abe afihle ngabomu ukuveza ukuthi ungazimbi ukuphi.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo kwa Tirong (OHS) mo Meepong gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona.
Maitlhomo molaotlhomo ono ke go tokafatsa pabalesego le boitekanelo jwa batlhankedi ba ba dirang mo meepong, mmogo le go tokafatsa mafelo meepo eno leng mo go ona.

src_text: Nasele samukelwe saba seencwadini zekhethu zomthetho, iSewula Afrika izakulindeleka ukuthi qobe ngeminyaka emibili ibikele i-UN ukuthi isiphumelelisa njani isivumelwanesi.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono kwalolola sešwa Molao wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo mo Meepong wa ngwaga wa 1996 (Molao wa bo 29 wa 1996).

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sinikela amagadango wokukhandela ekufuze athathwe mamazwe amalunga ukukhandela ukunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani emakhabo.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tsa molao ono tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa, gareng ga tse dingwe, di baya mo pepeneneng tse dingwe tsa dikakanyo tsa Molao ono, di gagamatsa Melawanataolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Pabalesego le Boitekanelo mme le dira bonnete jwa gore tsamaelana le melao ya lefatshe ka bophara ya pabalesego mo meepong..     Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo.

Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona le gore Tona ya Ditirelo tsa Phimolakeledi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa, Rre Ronald Lamola ntshe lekwalo la go itsise setšhaba ka dikarolo tsa Molaotheo tse go tshitshinngwang gore di kwalolwe sešwa..     Molaotlhomo ono kwalola sešwa Karolo ya bo 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 e reng naga ya Aforika Borwa na le dipuo tsa semmuso di le lesomelebongwe mme tsona ke puo ya Sepedi, ya Sesotho, ya Setswana, ya siSwati, ya Tshivenḓa, ya Xitsonga, ya Afrikaans, ya English, ya isiNdebele, ya isiXhosa le ya isiZulu..     Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di nopola Puo ya Diatla (SASL) gore tshwanetse go nna puo ya ka fa nageng ya semmuso ya bo lesomelebobedi mme di ema nokeng dikgato tsa go amogela puo eno le go netefatsa gore ditshwanelo tsa maAforika Borwa otlhe di amogelwa, go sa lebelelwe gore ke batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi jo bo rileng kgotsa jang.

src_text: Umbiko Wesine Welizwe LeSewula Afrika Wokuvikelwa Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Wobuntu   .
tgt_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo lona ga le bolo go tsaya Puo ya Diatla ya ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa jaaka Puo Beng ba Yona ba Buang kwa Lapeng     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa komBiko wesiNe weliZwe leSewula Afrika wokuVikelwa nokuKhuthazwa kwamaLungelo woBuntu emKhandlwini wamaLungelo woBuntu weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko.
tgt_text: Beke ya go Keteka Tshireletso ya Bana.

src_text: IsiQhema esiNande siBuyekeza imibiko ngaphasi kwe-UN sizakubuyekeza umbiko lo ngekukhambeni komnyaka lo.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya go Keteka Tshireletso ya Bana e tla ketekiwang go simolola ka la bo 29 Motsheganong go fitlha ka la bo 04 Seetebosigo 2022 ka moono yo reng “Tla re sireletseng bana mo pakeng eno ya COVID-19 le go ya go ile fa leroborobo leno le sa tlhole le le teng”..     Mo bekeng eo go tla tsepamisiwa megopolo mo matsapeng a leng teng ka fa nageng a tobaneng poo le naga go ithwala ga bašwa leng seo se gakaditsweng ke paka ya COVID-19 mo re boneng bašwa ka bontsi ba belega mo ngwageng wa..     Kabinete ikuetse gore kgetse ya tsie kgonwa ke go tshwaraganelwa ke batsadi, mekgatlho ya baagi, dikereke le baagi mo metseng go thusa go fokotsa palo e golelang kwa godimo ya go ithwala ga bašwa..     Foramo ya Ikonomi ya Lefatshe (WEF).

src_text: Solo yatlikitla isiVumelwano samaLungelo woBuntu ngaphasi kwe-UN, iSewula Afrika seyibuyekezwe amahlandla amathathu, ngebuyekezo lokugcina elenziwe ngoKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla nna le seabe mo go WEF e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 26 Motsheganong 2022 kwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland, mo moono wa teng tla bong le: “Go Dirisana Mmogo, Go Busetsa Maemo go Tshepagala Sekeng”..     Aforika Borwa itse sentle botlhokwa jwa go nna nngwe ya dinaga tse di tlang ka ditharabololo le go bolelela ba bangwe ka maitemogelo rona mo foramong eno ya lefatshe.

Gore naga ya rona tsenele WEF go tla re tswela mosola thata gore re godise seriti sa naga ya rona mo mererong ya dipeeletso gore ke nngwe ya dinaga mo lefatsheng tse go ka beelediwang mo go tsona, mme re tla itsise dinaga tse dingwe mo lefatsheng gore pono re nang le yona ya dilo tse re batlang go di dira mo isagong ke efe mmogo le go nopola ditlhabololo tse dintšhwa tse re setseng re di dirile ka fa nageng.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe zamva nje ngeemphakamiso ezili-187 ezivunyiweko zehlelo lokubuyekeza lomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Bašwa.

src_text: Imibono ekusetjenzwe ngayo lapha ngethethwe emabuthelelwenilwazi afakazelweko, nemininingwaneni evela eminyangweni efaneleko, neenHlanganweni zeSahluko seThoba kunye neenhlanganweni zomphakathi ezifaneleko.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Letsholo la go Keteka Kgwedi ya Bašwa la ngwaga wa 2022 ka moono yo reng: “Go netefatsa gore re nna le ditsela tsa go iphedisa tse di nnelang ruri mmogo le go nna matlhagatlhaga ga bašwa gore bokamoso nne jo bo botoka”.
Letsatsi la semmuso la go Keteka Mosola wa Bašwa le tla ketekiwa kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyathokoza ngendima esele yenziwe ekuphunyelelisweni leziimphakamiso kunye naleziindima ezisasetjenzwako.
tgt_text: Monongwaga ke wa bo 46 fa sale barutwana kwa Soweto ba thankgolola mogwanto wa matlho ga dibona ka la bo 16 Seetebosigo 1976 ba gwantela go gapelediwa ke puso ya tlhaolele go ithuta dirutwa tsotlhe tsa bona ka puo ya Afrikaans.

src_text: Umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa emphakathini ungethulwa ku-UN ngoRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Mo go bontsheng tlotlo mo go seo se dirilweng ka Seetebosigo 1976, Kabinete ikuela mo bašweng botlhe ka fa nageng go samagana le botlhokatiro jo bo aparetseng bašwa ka bontsi ka go nna le seabe mo matsholong go ba tlhatlhelela ka kitso le bokgoni a jaaka letsholo la go ithutela tiro le mo tirong mmogo le diphatlhatiro tsa go ithutela tiro..     Puso tlile ka matsholo a emang nokeng dikgato tsa go thapa bašwa mmogo le tsa go tlhola ditiro tsa nakwana.

Dikgwebo le tsona di rotloediwa gore di thape bašwa ba le bantsinyana ka go tlhola diphatlhatiro tse mo go tsona go thapiwang bašwa..     Lenaneo la kgwedi yotlhe ya Seetebosigo le tla bo le tletse ka meletlo e farologaneng mo go yona go tla bong go na le e ketekang bašwa ba ba dirang bontle thata mo go se ba se dirang, mekete ya go thankgolola Letsholo la go Goga kwa Pele Serodumo sa NYDA mmogo le meletlo mengwe le mentsinyana go ralala le naga e ka ga go thankgolola Setheo sa Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa..     Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente yo rwesitsweng maikarabelo Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo re itsise ka letsholo leno ka botlalo.

src_text: Umthethokambiso Wee-2022 Wokulawulwa Kwamanzi Weemayini.
tgt_text: Meletlo yotlhe ya bašwa go tla solofelwa gore tsamaelane le dikgato tsa go tila ditshwaetso tsa COVID-.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umThethokambiso wee-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi weeMayini kobanyana sewungathoma ukusebenza.
tgt_text: Samiti e Buang ka Dinaga tse di Laolwang ke Magosi.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uphethe iindlela zokuvikela nokulonda amanzi.
tgt_text: Puso, ka go dirisana le Ntlo ya Naga ya Magosi, ba tla tsenela Samiti e Buang ka Dinaga tse di Laolwang ke Magosi ka Labotlhano wa la bo 27 le Lamatlhatso wa la bo 28 Motsheganong 2022 go buisana ka dintlha tse di mabapi le gore beng ba dinaga tseo ke bo mang..     Dintlha tseno gape di tsenyeletsa le tsa thulaganyo ya go tsaya naga e laolwang ke magosi mo pusong go neela moagi yo nang le matshwanedi go nna mong wa naga eo, go nne seno se botlhokwa thata mo go matlafatseng baagi ba kwa metseselegae.

src_text: Ulinganisa imisebenzi yeemayini namandla onikelwe wona wokusebenzisa amanzi ngendlela ebambelelako elizweni leSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go dira gore baagi ba kwa metseselegae nne fela beng ba naga ka lefoko ga di kgapele fela kwa thoko ditshwanelo tsa batho tsa go nna beng ba lefatshe le ba nnang mo go lona mme gape di ba thibela gore le se ba tswele mosola mo go tokafatsheng matshelo bona ka go iponela madinyana     Melaetsa.

Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Mme Leanne Manas, motlhankedi yo gasang dikgang tsa lenaneo la thelebišene la dikgang tsa mo mesong la Morning Live mo go SABC, yo apesitsweng tlotla ya Batlhabani ba Naga ya Fora ya go Tlotla Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo Nageng ke naga ya Fora ka Labobedi, 17 Motsheganong 2022, maitlhomo le go tlotlomatsa matsapa a dirileng mo lephateng la go sala dikgang morago, la bobegakgang le mo maphateng mangwe mantsi a farologaneng go thusa baagi.

src_text: Hlangana namanye amagadango wokulungisa, umthethokambiso lo uhlathulula imisebenzi ngaphakathi kweengaba zikarhulumende ezintathu malungana neendaba zamanzi eemayini.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Rre Mpho Moerane, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 52, yo mo malobeng neng le Meyara yo Mogolo wa Teropokgolo ya Johannesburg bile gape le mafolofolo mo mererong ya dipolotiki bile direla baagi ba Johannesburg ka botswapelo.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko enziwako la azakurarulula imiraro ekhona njenganje ngokukhalima abasilaphazi, enze kube lula ukusebenzisa ikambiso yokuthi umsilaphazi akhalinywe ngokuhlawuliswa.
tgt_text: Pele ka thapiwa go nna Meyara yo Mogolo ne dira jaaka Leloko la Komiti ya Meyara e samaganang le Merero ya Ditirelo tsa Tikologo le Mafaratlhatlha.

src_text: Umthethokambiso usebenza ngokukhambisana nomthetho wezaManzi wee-1998 (umThetho Nomboro 36 womNyaka we-1998).
tgt_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56, yo neng le seopedi se se fentseng dikabo di sena palo tsa diopedi tsa mmino wa go rorisa modimo yo mo malobanyaneng Setheo sa Dithuto tsa Boeteledipele jwa Sekeresete se mo tlotlileng ka go mo abela tlotla ya Bongaka mo Mminong wa Dithuto tsa Sedumedi.Ngaka Namane Magau, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 70, yo neng le serutegi se se tlhatlheletsweng bile gape le tokololo e tlotlegang ya Batlhokomedi ba Matlole Boto ya Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Aids.Rre Mike Schüssler, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 60, yo neng le motlhankedi wa merero ya ikonomi yo tlotlegang mo intasetering eno ya naga ya Aforika Borwa bile neelane ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng e ka ga maemo ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa.Rre Jamie Bartlett, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56, yo fentseng dikabo di sena palo tsa go diragatsa mo seraleng le mo thelebišeneng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, yo neng tumile ka leina la gagwe la go diragatsa la Motshameko wa theleibšene wa Isidingo mo neng bediwa Mike O'Reilly le la David Genaro la mo Rhythm City.Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa fa romela matshediso kwa pusong le kwa baaging ba naga ya United Arab Emirates (UAE) go latela gore Motlotlegi wa Ntlobogosi Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 73, yo gape neng le Moporesitente wa naga ya UAE thule botala ka tlhogo      Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
Rre Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo mo Botong ya Tlhabololo ya Intaseteri ya go Aga.

src_text: Umbiko WomTlamo WokuHlela NgeeNdaba ZobuLili, Ukwabiwa KweeMali, UkuTjheja NokuLinganisa Kunye NokuHlolwa KweeNcwadi .
tgt_text: Rre Shabeer Hamid Khan thapilwe go nna Molaodimogolo wa Diakhaonto mo Setheong sa Naga sa Matlole.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko wendima yomsebenzi ngokuphunyeleliswa komTlamo wokuHlela ngeeNdaba zobuLili, ukwAbiwa kweeMali, ukuTjheja nokuLinganisa kunye nokuHlolwa kweeNcwadi.
tgt_text: Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana thapilwe go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Dithendara mo Setheong sa Naga sa Matlole.

Kabinete dumelane ka botlalo le tshweetso ya go thapa batho ba ba latelang ba ba batlang tiro go tswalela ka bona diphatlhatiro mo Botong ya Batlhankedibagolo ba Letlole la Setheo se se Botlhokwa sa Motlakase     Rre Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ituthuko ekarisako yamhlapha yokungenelela kwesizwe  ekuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisa ukukhula komnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tse di itumedisang tsa sešweng tse di dirilweng ka fa nageng tse di samaganeng le go tsosolosa ikonomi.

src_text: Ukuya ngokweembalobalo ezikhutjhwe mhlapha mayelana nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi liZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika (i-StatsSA), ukuphela kwemisebenzi kwehla ukusukela kumaphesende ama-.
tgt_text: Go ya ka Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) dipalopalo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro di fokotsegile go tloga mo go.

src_text: 3 ekoteni yesine yomnyaka wee-2021 ukuya kama-.
tgt_text: 3% mo dikgweding di le tharo tsa bofelo tsa ngwaga wa 2021 go fitlha mo go.

src_text: 5 ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: 5% mo dikgweding di le tharo tsa ntlha tsa ngwaga wa setse le dikgweditharo di le pedi di tlhomagane jaanong palo ya batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro wela kwa tlase.

src_text: Izinga elinabileko lokutlhayela kwemisebenzi lehlile emakoteni amabili ngokulandelana.
tgt_text: Maphata a nnileng le mosola mogolo mo go seno ke ditiro tsa mo metseng le tsa ditirelo tsa baagi ditiro tsa tlhagiso ya dikuno le kgwebisano..     Mo dikgweding tsa ntlha di le tharo tsa ngwaga wa 2022 Seelosotlhe sa Ditlhagisiwa tsa Naga mo Ngwageng (GDP) se oketsegile ka.

src_text: Inzuzo ekulu ngemisebenzi kube semikhakheni yemisebenzi yomphakathi neyezehlalakuhle, yokukhiqiza neyerhwebo.
tgt_text: 9% mme seno se busetsa bogolo ba ikonomi ya naga ya rona mo maemong e neng le mo go yona pele re ka welwa ke leru la leroborobo leno.

Mo dikgweding di le tharo tseno, lephata le le neng le tsentse seatla go gaisa mangwe mo ikonoming ke la tlhagiso ya dikuno mo re boneng go nna le koketsego mo lekaleng la tlhagiso ya dipeterole le dikhemikhale, la dijo le dino mmogo le mo go la tshipi le la metšhini.

src_text: IPahla ePheleleko yangeKhaya (i-GDP) ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-2022 ikhule nge-.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go itharabologelwa tse dinnye tseno di re bontsha gore ikonomi ya naga ya rona santse le ya bogatlhamelamasisi bile di re bolelela gape gore dikgato tsa go rarabolola maemo yona tse di jaaka lebelo la Leano la Itharabologelo le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi le setse le simolotse go kokotlela.

src_text: 9% okubuyisela umnotho welizwe lekhethu esigeni sangaphambi kokwehla kukamabhubhisa oyi-corona.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe go ema nokeng dikgwebo le diintaseteri tsa ka fa nageng ka go di rekela fa ba reka ditlhagisiwa le ditirelo..     Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke tshwetso e tserweng ke setheo sa tekolo ya dikoloto sa S&P Global ya go fetola ponelopele ya yona ka dikoloto tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa - e neng re maemo yona ke a siameng mme jaanong a re ke a itumedisang.

src_text: Kilekota, umkhakha wokukhiqiza ngiwo oqinise umnotho khulu ngokukhula ekukhiqizweni kweembaseli namakhemikhali, ukugoma neenselo, amamethali nemitjhini.
tgt_text: Setheo seno gape se totobaditse gape gore mo pakeng telele e tlang tekanyetso ya dikoloto tsa madi ka fa nageng le dinaga tsa boditšhaba di tla nna mo maemong dikoloto a tlhobaetsang a bidiwang BB minus mme fetoge nne mo maemong a itumedisang a bediwang BB ka go latelega.
Madi go iphedisa.

src_text: Lokhukuhluma okulingeneko kutjengisa ukuthi umnotho welizwe lekhethu usesenamandla nokobana amano wokufaka isandla njengeHlelo lokwAkha kabuTjha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP)  kungezeleleka amandla.
tgt_text: Leroborobo la Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19) mmogo le dintwa tse di tsweletseng mo lefatsheng ka bophara di amile ka tsela e sa itumediseng madi go iphedisa mo lefatsheng lotlhe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela woke umuntu ukusekela amabhizinisi namabubulo wangekhaya ngokuthenga imikhizo eyenziwe ekhayapha.
tgt_text: MaAforika Borwa le ona rwele boima ka ntlha ya ditlhwatlhwa tse di tsweletseng go ya kwa godimo tsa leokwane, dijo le dilo tse dingwe tse di botlhokwa..     Fa seemo se rototse matlho jaaka sele jaana, rotlhe re tlhoka go tshwara ka natla, re thusane le go boloka didirisiwa tsa rona.
Puso tshwere ka natla go thusa batho botlhe, segolo bao ba sokolang.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu isiqunto sesikhungo sokulinganisa i-S&P Global sokubuyekeza izinga lobujamo beemali zeSewula Afrika – ukusukela kobunzinzileko ukuya kobukarisako.
tgt_text: Bankakgolo ya Aforika Borwa e dirang ka tshwanelo e nang le maatla bile ikemetse samagane le go thibela gore setšhaba se se welwe ke matsadi phetogo ya ditlhwatlhwa tse di yang kwa godimo ka go dira gore di se fete seelo se se beilweng; se se leng kwa tlase thata go gaisa sa tsa dinaga tse dingwe.

src_text: Isikhungo sokulinganisa sivumelene namazinga wesikolodo semali yangaphandle neyangaphakathi ezingeni le-BB minus nele-BB ngokulandelana..     Iindleko Zokuphila   .
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tshwetso e tserweng ke Setheo sa Naga sa Matlole go letlelela gore paka e tlhomilweng ya go fokotsa Dituelelo Tsotlhe tsa Leokwane okelediwe nako.

src_text: Umabhubhisa wesiFo seNgogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19) nenturhu eragako ephasini zibe nomthelela omkhulu eendlekweni zokuphila ephasini zombelele.
tgt_text: Go tloga ka kgwedi ya Moranang go fitlha ka ya Motsheganong litara nngwe le nngwe mo dituelelong tsa GFL fokoditswe ka  50, mme seno se dumeletswe gore se ka se kgaotswe mme se tla tswelela go tloga ka la bo 01 Seetebosigo go fitlha ka la bo 06 Phukwi.

src_text: AmaSewula Afrika nawo akhulelwe yihloko ngokukhula kweentengo zeembaseli, ukugoma neensetjenziswa eziqakathekileko.

tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke tshwetso e tserweng ke Khomišene e Okameng Merero ya Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo ya gore tla lebelela ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho ditlhwatlhwa tsa dijo, segolo go ya ka molao yo reng dikgwebo di tshwanetse tsa bo di na le mabaka a utlwagalang fa di oketsa ditlhwatlhwa tsa dituelelo tsa dilo tse di rekisiwang..     Foramo ya Dikgwebo tsa Japan le Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Sidinga ukubambisana soke, sisizane songe iinsetjenziswa zethu kilesisikhathi esibudisi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke seo mo malobanyaneng se dirilweng mo Foramong ya Dikgwebo tsa Japan le Aforika Borwa, mo go dumelanweng gore go diriwe letsholo le legolo la tiro le mo go lona go tla dirisanwang mmogo mo diintaseteri tse di dirisang motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo, mo thekenolojing ya dijanaga tse di tsamayang ka motlakase mmogo le leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo..     Mo foramong eno go dumelanwe gape le gore go tsewe letsholo le le tla nopolang ditšhono tse di leng teng mo Aforika Borwa tse di tla bontshiwang dikgwebo tsa Japan, tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni e tlhokegang mo diintasetering tsa go aga dijanaga ka fa nageng, ditšhono tsa ditiro mo maphateng tlhagiso ya dikuno mmogo le go abelana ka maitemogelo a tseneletseng setegeniki.

src_text: Urhulumende wenza ngakho koke okusemandlenakhe ukwethula woke umuntu umthwalo, khulukhulu labo abanganabuyo.
tgt_text: Japan ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di botlhokwa tse di gogang kwa pele dipeeletso mo makaleng le mantsinyana ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, mme ona ke dijanaga le megala le a gatetseng kwa pele metšhini ya kwa meepong, mmogo le dikgwebo mo temothuong le mo ditirelong tsa matlole.

src_text: IBhanga yethu eKulu esebenza kuhle nenamandla isiza ukuvikela umphakathi ekurhayilweni yi-infleyitjhini ngokuthi ihlale ezingeni eliqothelweko; ngaphasi khulu kunelamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape itumedisitswe le ke dikgato tsa Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Intaseteri le Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo (dtic) ka go tlhomiwa ga Setheo sa Merero ya Ditlamo tsa Bathobantsho tsa Ditlhagisiwa tse di Rekisediwang Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle, jaaka di dira gore dikgwebo tsa bathobantsho tse di rekisang ditlhagisiwa tsa tsona tse di tswang ka fa nageng di kgone go di rekisetsa dinaga tse dingwe mo lefatsheng.

Setheo seno se tla dira gore go abelanwa ga tshedimosetso, maitemogelo le kitso nne selo se se kgonagalang bile seno se tla dira gore re kgone go godisa tseo re atlegileng mo go tsona mo Letsholong la Beng ba Diintaseteri ba Bathobantsho.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yamukele isiqunto seZiko leeMali zeliZwe ukwelula isikhathi sokwehlisa umThelo weemBaseli  (i-GFL).
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: I-GFL yehliswe nge-R. 50 ilitha eenyangeni  uSihlabantangana noMrhayili, godu isikhatheso sizokwelulwa  ukuya phambili ukusukela ngomhla wo-1  kuMgwengweni ukufikela  ngomhla we-6 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa rona tsa go nna le motlakase o sa tshabeng mo pakeng telele e tlang di tshegeditswe go utlwagala go latela gore Seteišene sa Motlakase sa Kusile kwa porofenseng ya Mpumalanga se neelwe tetla ya go ka dirisa Yuniti ya bo 04 ya go tlamela ka motlakase..     Kabinete nopotse gore go setse go konoseditswe tiro ya go aga diyuniti tsa go fetlha motlakase di le nne mo go di le thataro tse di agiwang mo porojekeng ya Seteišene sa Motlakase sa Kusile..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tseno tsa go oketsa diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka yuniti eno ntšhwa, mme seno se diragetse go nne go tserwe tshwetso ya go letlelela ditlamo tse di ikemetseng tsa tlamelo ya motlakase gore le tsona di tlamele baagi ka motlakase.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu isiqunto seKomitjhini yePhaliswano sokuqalisisa iintengo zokugoma okuphilwa ngakho, khulukhulu isiqalelelo esisekela amabhizinisi nakakhuphula iintengo.
tgt_text: Sešweng jaana puso saenile tumelano ya go reka motlakase wa dimekawate di le 150 mo setlamong sa tlhagiso ya motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dinšhwa tse di sa kgotlheleng tikologo leng setlamo sa Scatec ASA.
Lekgotla la Dikeletso la Matlafatso ya Bathobantsho ka Bophara mo Mererong ya Ikonomi (B-BBEE).

src_text: Ikundla Yezamabhizinisi Hlangana KweSewula Afrika NeJapan.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa tsa go thapa Lekgotla le lentšhwa la Dikeletso la B-BBEE.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele  umphumela weKundla yezamaBhizinisi weSewula Afrika neweJapan ebeyibanjwe mhlapha, evumelene ngehlelo lomsebenzi  oncamileko elifaka hlangana ukusebenzisana  ngokuvula amabubulo akhandela ukusilaphazeka kwebhoduluko, itheknoloji yeenkoloyi zegezi nehayidrojini ehlwengileko.
tgt_text: Lekgotla leno le diriwa ke batho ba ba farologaneng go tswa mo dikgwebong, mo mekgatlhong ya badiri, mo mekgatlho ya baagi le mo diruteging leng bona ba ba tla supetsang puso gore ka godisa ikonomi jang.

Le fa re kgonne go fetola maaka a tlhagisitsweng ke seemo sa puso ya tlhaolele mo ikonoming, tsela yona santse le motsopodia mo go ka oketseng batlhankedi ba bathobantsho mo maemong bolaodi, mo go oketseng tlhatlhelelo ya bokgoni le mo go oketseng dithendara gore di neelwe le basadi ba bašwa ba bathobantsho.

src_text: Ikundla le ivumelene godu  ‘ngomkhangiso’  wethungelelwano levidiyo ukuveza amathuba weSewula Afrika  nakabanye abosomabhizinisi be-Japan, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakghonofundwa emabubulweni weenkoloyi walapha ekhethu,  imikhakha yezemisebenzi ekukhiqizeni nokwabelana ngelemuko lezecwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Merwalela.
Dikgato tse di tsweletseng tsa go thusa diporofense tse mo malobeng di wetsweng ke leru la merwalela di na le mosola o seng kana ka sepe.

src_text: I-Japan ingomunye wabarhwebelani bethu abaqakathekileko nabasisimali abakhamba phambili emikhakheni yeSewula Afrika, ukuthoma ngeenkoloyi, imitjhinini yeemayini yezinga eliphezulu, zokulima nezeemali.
tgt_text: Puso beile kwa setlhoeng dikgato tsa go tlamela ba ba amegileng ka dijo, metsi le madulo mo go bao ba sa tlholeng ba na le magae le go baakanya mafaratlhatlha ao senyegileng.
Go samaganwe le namane tona ya tiro ya go busetsa sekeng ditirelo tse di botlhokwa di tshwana le tsa metsi, motlakase, kgeleloleswe le tsa kolelo ya ditlakala.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu  ukusungulwa kweThungelelwano labaThengiseli bangaPhandle babaNtu abaNzima (i-Black Exporters Network) elisungulwe mNyango wezeRhwebo, amaBubulo nePhaliswano (i-dtic), ukuhlanganisa amabubulo wabantu abanzima njenganje abathumela imikhiqizo yabo yangekhaya kamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: Go setse go simolotswe go ka dirisa dimilione tsa diranta di le 189 217 go tlhabolola mafelo batho ba itlhomileng mo go ona gore botshelo jwa baagi mo mafelong ano bo tokafale..     Mo godimo ga seno, mo Sekgwameng sa Setheo sa go Agela Baagi Madulo go loketswe dimilione tsa diranta di le 733 086 tseo di tla dirisediwang tiro ya go aga madulo a tla nnelang ruri a golaganeng le ditirelo tsa botlhokwa..     Kabinete itumeletse dikgato tsa go tswa baagi thuso go tswa kwa pusong ya Qatar moo kolekileng ka dijo, diaparo, dijenereitara, metšhini ya go phepafatsa metsi, didirisiwa tsa go thusa go hema, ditente le ditlhare.

src_text: Ithungelelwaneli lizokukghonakalisa ukwabelana ngelwazi, ilemuko namakghono, lakhela godu phezu kwepumelelo yeHlelo laboSomabubulo abaNzima.
tgt_text: Koleke eno tla thusa batho ba feta ba le 4 000 ba ga jaana ba beilweng nakwana mo dintlolehalahaleng tsa ditirelo tsa setšhaba.

src_text: Zamandla.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile gape le dikgato tse dingwe gape tsa go tswa baagi thuso tse di tswang kwa nageng ya United Arab Emirates (UAE) moo yona kolekileng ka dijo le metsi go thusa bao ba senyegetsweng ka ntlha ya merwalela ya mo malobeng.

src_text: Amano wethu wokufumana amandla isikhathi eside asekeleke khulu ngemva  kokudluliselwa ephikweni lezerhwebo kwe-Unit 4 yePhawa iKusile  eseMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Go Thankgololwa ga Sekgwama sa go Tswa Baagi Thuso.

src_text: Lokhukudluliswa kungelinye iliqhasilinganiso emizameni ye-Eskom yokunzinzisa ihlelo lokuphehlwa kwegezi, kanti lizokungezelela ama-800 wama-megawatt (MW) ethungelelwaneni lokuphehlwa kwegezi.
tgt_text: 1    Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa go thankgololwa ga Sekgwama sa go Tswa Baagi Thuso se se thankgolotsweng ke Koporasi ya Tlhabololo ya Diintaseteri (IDC) mmogo le Kantoro ya Moporesitente le Lefapha la Kgwebisano le Kgaisano ya Diintaseteri (dtic).

Thuso eno tla dira gore bašwa ba direlwe ditšhono di fitlha go di le 50 000 tse di tswelang baagi mosola mo metseng.. 2    Thuso eno tla akaretsa ya kalafi le ya tlhokomelo ya setšhaba, go ema nokeng mekgatlho e fepang baagi ka dijo le ka dikotla, go ruta baagi go buisa, go ema nokeng matsholo go tlhokomela tlhago le go tlhokomela phetogo ya maemo loapi mmogo le matsholo a emang bašwa nokeng.

src_text: Ikhabinethi itjheje ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwamayunithi amane aphehla igezi kasithandathu sele kuphelile kilephrojekthi yePhawa  iKusile.
tgt_text: Sekgwama seno se tla thusa ditšhaba di le 26 seng dikgwebo tse di dirang letseno.
Bosenyi le Bonweenwee.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ukungezelelwa okutjha kwamandla kilelithungelelwano lokuphehla igezi, okuphunyeleliswe siqunto sokuvumela abaphehli begezi abazijameleko ukuthi baphehle igezi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa go tshwariwa ga batho ba le bantsinyana ba ba amegang mo ditiragalong tsa bokhukhuntshwane, tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu le tsa bonweenwee.

src_text: Urhulumende usandukutlikitla isivumelwano sokuthenga ama-MW ali-150  kumphehli wegezi ozijameleko, i-Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: Mo go bano go akarediwa gape le bao mo malobeng ba neng ba okame maemo a kwa godimo mo pusong le mo dikgwebong tsa puso, mme mo go bona ba bangwe ba bona ba latofadiwa ka go tlola Molao wa Botsamaisi jwa Madi Puso (PFMA) wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 01 wa 1999).

src_text: UmKhandlu Oweluleka Ngokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abanzima Ngamandla Womnotho (i-B-BBEE).
tgt_text: Dikgetse tsa go tshwana le tsa go tshwariwa ga batlhankedi ba Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae ba kwa Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre kwa Pretoria ba ba tsereng pipamolomo ba neng ba neelwa ke moagi wa naga ya kwa ntle ke bopaki jwa gore ga go ope yo tshabiwang ke molao le gore batlhankedi ba ba senang nnete ga ba batlege mo pusong..     Kabinete gape itumedisiwa le ke dikgato tsa go busetsa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa basimane ba ga Gupta bong Rajesh le Atul.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele  ukubeka kwakaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umKhandlu omutjha oLuleka nge-B-BBEE elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: Seno se latela gore ba tshwariwe kwa teropong ya Dubai kwa nageng ya UAE morago ga gore Mokgatlho wa Sepodisi sa Lefatshe ka Bophara (Interpol) rebole taelo ya gore ba batliwa.

Bana bano ba motho ba batliwa ka makatlanamane ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa gore ba tle go ikarabela mo ditatofatsong tse ba rwesitsweng tsona mo mererong ya go goga puso ka nko, go akaretsa le tsa bokhukhuntshwane le tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu.

src_text: Umkhandlu lo wakhiwe babantu abahlukileko ngokwamabhizinisi, iinhlangano zabasebenzi, iinhlangano ezinzinze emphakathini nabosolwazi bezefundo, abazokuthwala umsebenzi wokubonisa  urhulumende ngokutjhugululwa komnotho.
