tgt_text: Ditheo tsa molao tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa le tsa naga ya UAE di tsweletse ka dipuisano tse di ka ga go ba busetsa ka fa nageng.

Go tshwariwa ga bona ke se supo sa gore puso ikemiseditse go lwantshana le bosenyi le bonweenwee ntle le go tshaba ope kgotsa go sekamela ka fa letlhakoreng la ope..     Ditiragalo tseno tsa go tshwara batho bano di bontsha sentle gore dithulaganyo tse di leng teng di kgona go dira fa go tla mo go rweseng batho melato ya ditiro tse di setlhogo tse ba di dirileng le go netefatsa gore molao se nne le bao ba tshabang kgotsa ba ratang go gaisa ba bangwe.

src_text: Nanyana ibonakala nje indima esele yenziwe ukubuyisela emva ukudungwa komnotho njengoba wadungwa mbuso webandlululo (i-apartheid) nje, kodwana usesemnengi umsebenzi ekusafanele wenziwe ukwandisa isandla sokulawula sabantu abanzima, nokuphakamisa amakghonofundwa kunye nokunabisa ihlelo lokuthengwa kwepahla kobanyana abantu abasikazi babantu abanzima nelutjha bazokuvulekelwa mathuba.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale maiteko go nyatsa ikonomi ya rona le naga ya rona go latela gore go senngwe mogala wa motlakase wa Yuniti ya 1 ya Eskom ko Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Matla kwa porofenseng ya Mpumalanga setse jaanong le lekgetlo la bone ditiragalo tseno tse go belaelwang le tsa go senyetsa seteišene sa motlakase di diriwa ka bomo mo diteišeneng tse dingwe di le tharo tsa motlakase mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng.
Dipalopalo tsa mo malobeng tsa dikgetse tsa bosenyi ke bopaki jwa gore re le baagi re tshweanetse go dira go tlala seatla go dira gore metse ya rona nne e babalesegileng.

src_text: Iinkhukhula.
tgt_text: Seno se re gakolola gore rotlhe re le baagi re tshwanetse go nna le seabe mo go fokotseng ditiragalo tsa bosenyi mme re le sepodisi, baeteledipele ba dipolotiki, baagi, balelapa, beng ba dikgwebo, mekgatlho ya badiri le ya baagi re tshwanetse go dira se re tshwanetseng go se dira go lwantshana le bosenyi..     Kabinete na le tshepo ya gore madi a okeditsweng a ntshitsweng ke Kantoro ya Tona ya Sepodisi a tshwanetseng go dirisiwa mo diteišeneng tsa sepodisi tse go begiwang dikgetse tse dintsi mo go tsona tsa polao, petelelo le dikgetse tse dingwe tse di setlhogo tla thusa go fetola maemo ano le go dira gore re nne le metse botlhe ba babalesegileng mo go yona.

src_text: Inendima ebonakalako imizamo karhulumende esaragako yokubethula umthwalo abantu abacaphazelekileko eemfundeni lapho kusandukusahlela khona iinkhukhula.
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso ya Sešweng e ka ga COVID-.

src_text: Urhulumende ukwenze kwaba liqaloqangi ukunikela ngokudla, amanzi nobusithelo kilabo abasele banganabuyo nokulungiswa komthangalasisekelo owonakeleko.
tgt_text: Kabinete gakolotse batho botlhe gore COVID-19 santse le teng le gore mo marigeng ano ditshwaetso tse dintšhwa di tla oketsega.

src_text: Sewuthomile umsebenzi omkhulu wokulungisa nokuvuselela ukutholakala kweensetjenziswa ekuphilwa ngazo, njengamanzi, igezi kunye nokukhanjiswa/nokulahlwa kweenzibi.
tgt_text: Re tshwanetse go tswelela go latela dikgato tsotlhe tsa go itlhokomela le tsa go tlhokomela batho ba bangwe.

Tsona ke tsa go tlhapa diatla kgotsa go di tsikitletsa ka sebolayamegare gangwe le gape, go apara dimaseke fa go lwe fa gare ga batho ka fa teng ga meago, go katogana, go atlhamisa matlhabaphefo gore go tsene mowa o phepa mmogo le go tlhabela moento.

src_text: Imali epheze ibe ziingidi ezi-R189, 217 isetjenziselwa iHlelo lokuVuselela iiNdawo zokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu ngazo okuzokwenziwa ngcono ipilo yabantu abahlala emikhukhwini.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).

Kabinete itumedisitswe ke maikano a tserweng kwa Samiting ya Tshoganyetso ya Mokgatlotshwaraganelo wa Aforika e ka ga Ditiragalo tsa Menolopuso le tsa go Thopa Puso ka Dikgoka Ntle le go Latela Molaotheo mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika e neng tshwarwetswe kwa teropong ya Malabo, kwa nageng ya Rephaboliki ya Equatorial Guinea, ka Lamatlhatso wa la bo 28 Motsheganong..     Baeteledipele ba dinaga tsa Aforika ba ne ba sekaseka matshosetsi ano a santseng ba lebane nao, ba sekaseka ditsela tsa ga jaana tsa go samagana le ntlha eno mme ba dira maikano gore ba tla dirisana mmogo jaaka dinaga mo mererong ya pabalesego go thusa bao ba tobaneng le ditiragalo tsa menolopuso le tsa go thopa naga ka dikgoka.

src_text: Singezelelwe ngeengidi ezima-R733, 086 isiBonelelo sokuThuthukisa ukuHlaliswa kwabantu nokusiza  ekwakhiweni kweendawo zabantu ezihlalekako.
tgt_text: Bolwetse jwa Monkeypox.

Kabinete netefaleditse maAforika Borwa gore ditheo tsa rona tsa maokelo di ntshitse matlho dinameng mo go thibeleng bolwetse jwa Monkeypox, seno se latela gore bo tlhasele dinaga di le mmalwa tse bolwetse jono bo sa tlwaelegang mo go tsona.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele isizo lemBusweni we-Qatar elikukudla, izambatho, amajenereyitha, iinhlanzekisi zamanzi, imitjhini yokuphefumula, amatende nemitjhoga.
tgt_text: Le fa ka fa nageng go ise go nne le molwetse yo go begilweng gore na le bolwetse jono ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, maokelo ka fa nageng tsweletse go tlhokomela maemo ka fa nageng ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Lomnikelo uzokusiza izakhamuzi ezingaphezu kwee-4 000 ezisaje zifihliswe ihloko eendaweni zokutjheja umphakathi.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go Batla Maikutlo Baagi Mabapi le Ditsela tse di ka Tsewang go Samagala le Dikgwebo tse di seng mo Molaong tsa go Reka Dikgerekgere tsa Ditshipi.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yamukele godu isizo lezehlalakuhle elibuya elizweni i-United Arab Emirates (UAE) ngokunikela ngokugoma namanzi ukusiza abongazimbi beenkhukhula zamhlapha.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go batla maikutlo baagi mabapi le ditsela tse di ka tsewang go samagala le dikgwebo tse di seng mo molaong tsa go reka dikgerekgere tse di utswitsweng tsa ditshipi tse di tlhatlhamolotsweng kgotsa tse di gakolositsweng.
Go utswiwa ga ditshipi le megala ya koporo mo mafaratlhatlheng setšhaba go kgoreletsa ikonomi go re tswela mosola go nne go dira gore ditlhwatlhwa tsa dilo di ye kwa godimo thata.

src_text: Ukuvulwa Kwesikhwama Sokuthuthukisa Umphakathi  .
tgt_text: Tse dingwe tsa dikgoreletsi tseno ke tsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase le tsa go dira gore re tlhoke diterene ka ntlha ya ditshipi tse di utswiwang mo diporong.

src_text: 1    IKhabinethi yamukele ukuvulwa kwesiKhwama sokuBonelela umPhakathi ongaSebenziko yiHlangano eThuthukisa amaBubulo (i-IDC) ngokutjhebisana ne-Ofisi kaMengameli kunye ne-dtic.
tgt_text: Seno se dira gore banamedi ba diterene ba dirise madi mangwe gape go duelela dipalangwa tse dingwe fa diterene di sa dire.

src_text: Lelisekelo lizokuvulela abantu abatjha abapheze babe zii-50 000 amathuba wokuvala iinkhala emsebenzini olisizo emphakathini weendawo ngeendawo.
tgt_text: Go kgakgamololwa ga megala e tshwereng motlakase le go tlogela ponaka le go leketla go baya matshelo batho mo kotsing, segolobogolo mo baneng..     Kabinete laetse gore dtic nne yona e gogang kwa pele dikgato tseno le go dira jalo ntle le go tsaya nako telele, le go bokeletsa ditshwaelo go tswa mo baaging le mo makaleng a matshwanedi mmogo le go tla ka maano a tla re tswelang mosola puso ka dirang le go tsenya tirisong go fedisa ditiragalo tseno tsa go senyetsa setšhaba mafaratlhatlha sona a botlhokwa mo ikonoming tla re morago ga fao, puso ya itsese setšhaba ka dikgato tse dumelaneng le tsona gore di ka tsenngwa tirisong     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

Kopanokgothakgothe ya Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba e ka ga go Tlhabana Botlhale mo Mererong ya Tirisanommogo ka Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji tse di Dirang gore go Rene Kagiso (PTPS) mo Dinagakopanong (UN).

src_text: 2    Lelisekelo lizokufaka hlangana ukutjhejwa kwepilo nehlalakuhle yomphakathi, ukusekela amano wokunikela ngokudla okunepilo njengeendawo eziphekela abanganabuyo isopo, ukukhuthaza isiko lokutlola nokufunda, ukutjala namahlelo wokukhandela ukusilaphazeka kwebhoduluko kunye namano wokusekela ilutjha.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tshwara PTPS ya borataro kwa Lekgotleng la Dipatlisiso tsa Saense le Intaseteri (CSIR) kwa Pretoria go tloga ka Labobedi, 21 go fitlha ka Labotlhano, 24 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Lesisikhwama sizokusekela  amabhizinisi womphakathi ama-26  angasebenzeli inzuzo.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore go tla tla baeng ba le 300 go tswa kwa dinageng di le 50 tse leng karolo ya dinagakopano.

Kopanokgothakgothe eno ya go tlhabana botlhale tla kopanya batlhankedi botlhe ba ba nang le kgatlhegelo mo sesoleng, sepodising le mo baaging mo dinageng tseo leng karolo ya dinagakopano go dirisana mmogo mo tirisong ya thekenoloji ya segompieno e tlhabologileng thata le mo go logeng maano segompieno a tlhabologileng thata go dirisiwa mo matsholong dintwa a gogwang kwa pele ke UN.

src_text: Ubulelesi Nekohlakalo.
tgt_text: Kopanokgothakgothe eno ya go tlhabana botlhale tla dirisiwa jaaka lefelo le mo go lona dinaga tse leng karolo ya sesole sa go tlisa kagiso sa dinagakopano di tla tlhabanang botlhale mo go lona mmogo le mo go tlhameng dikakanyo tse dintšhwa tse di ka ga gore thekenoloji ntšhwa ya segompieno ka solwa jang mosola go thibela dintwa le mo go direng gore go rene kagiso..     Dikgaisano tse di Tshwarwang Lekgetlo la Bone tsa Bokgoni jo bo Tswileng Diatla mo Nageng ya Aforika Borwa (WSZA) tse di Tshwarwang Gangwe le Gape Morago ga Dingwaga di le Pedi ka fa Nageng.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ukubotjhwa kwabantu abambadlwana mayelana nokukhwabanisa, ukukhukhuthiswa kweemali nekohlakalo.
tgt_text: Dikgaisano tsa Naga tse di Tshwarwang Lekgetlo la Bone tsa WSZA tse di Tshwarwang Gangwe le Gape Morago ga Dingwaga di le Pedi ka fa Nageng di tla tshwarelwa kwa Tikwatikweng ya Kopanelo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Inkosi Albert Luthuli kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal go tloga ka la bo 07 go fitlha ka la bo 10 Seetebosigo 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono yo reng: “Go Tlhatlosa Dikuno tsa mo Ngwagaketeng wa bo 21 Badiri ba Ditiro tsa Diatla”..     Dikgaisano tseno di tshwarwa ka maitlhomo go tlhatlosa serodumo sa batho ba ba nang le bokgoni jwa tiro ya diatla gore batho ba bangwe ba nne le lerato la tsona le go itlhophela tsona jaaka ditiro tse ba tla di latelang mmogo le go bulela tirisanommogo e solofetsang go nna teng le diintaseteri tse di matshwanedi.

src_text: Hlangana nezaphulamthethwezi kubalwa nabasebenzi abakhe baba ziimphathimandla zeenkhundla eziphakemeko zembusweni nezamabubulo wombuso, abanye babo baqalene nemilandu yokuphula umthetho wokuphathwa kweeMali zomBuso (umthetho Nomboro 1 wee-1999).
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga go dirisiwa jaaka dikgato tsa go tlhatlosa serodumo sa tiro ya diatla gore ratege mo baithuti go itlhophela tsona jaaka ditiro tse ba batlang go di dira, di dirisiwa gape le ka maitlhomo go tlhatlhoba maemo le bokgoni jo re nang le jona jwa tiro ya diatla mmogo le go tlhatlhoba tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni     Melaetsa.

src_text: Ukubotjhwa kwabo – abafaka hlangana umsebenzi womNyango  wezaNgekhaya e-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre ePitori, ngezwangobatjho  yokufunjathiswa liphandle – kufakazela ukuthi akunamuntu ongehla komthetho godu nokuthi asinayo indawo yabasebenzi abakhohlakeleko eminyangweni yombuso..     IKhabinethi yamukele godu iragelophambili ngemizamo yokubuyiselwa ngeSewula Afrika kwezelamani zakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa fa romela matshediso kwa balelapa le morafe wa Bogosi jwa amaMpondo go latela gore Kgosi ya bona Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau thule botala ka tlhogo     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Lokhu kuza ngemva kokubotjhwa kwabo mhlapha e-Dubai e-UAE ngemva kobana iHlangano yezamaPholisa yePhasiloke (i-Interpol) yakhupha iinyeleliso eziburhaba ngokufunwa kwabo ziimphathimandla zomthetho zeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Rre Jacob Ganny Mbele thapilwe go nna Mokaedikakaretso (DG) mo Lefapheng la Metswedi ya Dimenerale le Eneji (DMRE)..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo Lefapheng la Merero ya Dikgwa, ya Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapile le ya Tikologo (DFFE).

src_text: Izelamanezi ziyafunwa eSewula Afrika mayelana neensolo ngendima yazo ekugolweni kombuso, okufaka hlangana ukukhwabanisa nokukhukhuthiswa kweemali.
tgt_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu thapilwe go nna Mmueledimogolo wa Lefapha la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo (DoJCD)..     Mme Doris Tshepe thapilwe go nna Mokhomišenare mo Khomišeneng e Okameng Merero ya Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo..     Ngaka Alex Mahapa thapilwe go nna Motlhankedi yo Itlhophileng wa go Eletsa Tona ya Lefapha la Tirelo ya Puso le Tsamaiso wa ditiro tsa letsatsi le letsatsi..     Moatefokate Rams Ramashia thapilwe go nna Motlhankedi yo Itlhophileng wa go Eletsa Tona ya Lefapha la Tirelo ya Puso le Tsamaiso wa ditiro tsa nakwana.

src_text: Ukutjhuguluka Kwetlayimethi.
tgt_text: Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuvakatjhela eSewula Afrika kukaNom.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga leeto la Rre Alok Sharma yo leng Moporesitente wa bo 26 wa Samiti ya Dinagakopano (UN) e ka ga Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi go bo etetse ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, go tloga ka la bo 19 go fitlha ka la bo 21 Seetebosigo 2022, mmogo le go leboga mogopolo wa gagwe fa re go totobetse gore Aforika Borwa ikemiseditse go diragatsa tlhagiso ya motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo..   Ka ngwaga wa 2021, Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ne na le baeteledipele ba bangwe ba naga ya France, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika mmogo le Mokgatlho wa Dinaga tsa Yuropa fa go nwe go diriwa kitsiso e iseng tle diriwe ya go dirisanammogo mo go tshegetseng dikgato tsa boammaruri tsa tiriso ya motlakase le digase tse kgotlhelo ya tsona mo loaping leng kwa tlase thata mo go tlhagiseng didirisiwa tsa ikonomi..   Naga ya Aforika Borwa, gare ga metlakase mengwe mentsi e sa kgotlheleng tikologo, ga a bolo go samagana le namane tona ya tiro ya go dira gore re tswe mo tirisong ya motlakase o kgotlhelang tikologo mme re tsene mo tirisong ya motlakase o sa kgotlheleng go tshwana le leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, dikgong tsa go dira leokwane kgotsa motlakase, motlakase o fetlhiwang ka phefo, motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi le motlakase o fetlhiwang ka metsi.

src_text: Alok Sharma, onguMengameli wehlandla lama-26 lomHlangano weenKhulu zeHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) ngokuTjhuguluka kweTlayimethi, ukusukela ngomhla we-19 ukuyokufika kumhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, yathokozela nokulinganisa kwakhe ukuthi iSewula Afrika izibophelele ngokubonakalako  ngokweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko.
tgt_text: Tiriso ya metlakase eno ka go farologana ga yona tla re thusa gore re kgone go nna le metswedi e lekaneng ya motlakase gore re kgone go nna le motlakase o tla kgonang go emelana le ditlhokwa tsa motlakase ka fa nageng.
Go Tlhabelwa ga Moento wa Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2021, uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nabanye abarholi ekumemezeleni ukusebenzisana okwakhe umlando bokubambisana naborhulumende bamazwe naka alandelako: i-France, iJarimani, i-United Kingdom ne-United States kunye ne-European Union ukusekela ihlelo elilungileko lokweyamela emnothweni womthamo ophasi wekhabhoni kunye nomphakathi okwazi ukujamelana nokutjhuguluka kwetlayimethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke phokotsego kgolo ya dipalo tsa batho ba ba tshwerweng ke COVID-19 e rekotilweng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng bile rotloetsa botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi gore ba ye go tlhabela moento, jaaka thibela gore ba se gatelelwe ke bolwetse jono, ba se robale kwa sepetlele kgotsa go thula botala ka tlhogo..   Halofo ya palo yotlhe ya batho ba bagolo ba re nang le bona ka fa nageng setse tlhabetse bonnye jwa moento le mongwe wa COVID-.

Madi dinamane tsa ona di leng kwa tlase thata puso a adimileng mo malobeng kwa Bankeng e Thusang Dipuso tsa Dinaga mo Lefatsheng go ya ka puso tla dirisediwa go reka meento mengwe ya COVID-19 le go dirisediwa go netefatsa gore setšhaba se babalesegile mo matshosetsing kgonagalo ya go ka tshwaetsega.

src_text: ISewula Afrika seyinesikhathi isebenza ngokukhuthala, isebenzela ukulungiselela ukweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko, ilungiselela nokuthoma ukusebenzisa imithombo yamandla weembaseli ehlwengileko, enjengehayidrojini ehlwengileko, i-biomas, umtjhiso wommoya, umtjhiso welanga, kunye negezi ephehlwa ngamanzi,  hlangana nezinye zeembaseli ezivuselelekako.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape tšhotlhile le ntlha e ka ga merero e ka ga dikarolo tse di ka baakangwang mo go samaganeng le leroborobo la COVID-19, segolobogolo mabapi le kgatelopele e dirilweng mabapi le go busetsa sekeng maemo ditiro tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi.

src_text: Lokhu okuthiwa ziimbaseli ezimvango kunzinzisa imithombo yamandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kunegezi eyaneleko ezakugcina iindingo zegezi ezisolo zisanda elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Tona ya Boitekanelo, ngaka Joe Phaahla tla neelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo mo ntlheng eno..  Letsatsi la go Keteka Mosola wa Bašwa ka fa Nageng.

Kabinete lebogile maAforika Borwa otlhe go bo ba ketekeli le rona mekete ya Letsatsi la go Keteka Mosola wa Bašwa ka fa Nageng ka Labone, 16 Seetebosigo 2022 ka moono yo reng: “Go netefatsa gore re nna le ditsela tsa go iphedisa tse di nnelang ruri mmogo le go nna matlhagatlhaga ga bašwa gore bokamoso nne jo bo botoka.” Matlhagatlhaga bašwa ba nang le ona mmogo le boitshoko jwa bona ke dilo tse naga ya rona tshwanetseng go ipela ka tsona le go solofela gore kamoso tsotlhe di tla apara tshiamo.

src_text: Ikarekelo Yomjovo Wesifo Sengogwana I-Corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Jaaka Kgwedi go Ketekiwang Mosola wa Bašwa ka fa Nageng lebile go garela, tla re gagamatseng maiteko rona go netefatsa gore bašwa ba fitlhelela matsholo ka bontsi go ba ema nokeng puso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo go direng gore ba kgone go nna le seabe mo ikonoming..   Lephata la Ditirelo tsa Puso, le leng lona le thapang batho ka bontsi, le tsibogetse kgwetlho eno ka go dira gore bašwa ba bantsi ba ba alogileng ba thapiwe mo matsholong go ithutela tiro mo Lephateng la Ditirelo tsa Puso go tla go ithutela tiro teng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukwehla khulu kwenani labantu abangenwe sisifo se-COVID-19 eSewula Afrika eemvekaneni ezidlulileko, yabe yakhuthaza boke abantu abalungele ukuhlaba ukuthi baragele phambili basihlabele lesisifo, njengoba lokhu kulisizo nje ekuphephiseni abantu ukuthi bangangenwa magulo amambi, bangalaliswa esibhedlela namkha bagule bebabhubhe.
tgt_text: Puso samagane gape le go tsenya tirisong Sekgwama sa Matlole go Thapa Baagi (SEF) mmogo le go tsosolosa Setheo sa Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa (NYS) moo matsholo ano ka bobedi tla tlholang ditiro mo le lengwe le le lengwe la ona le tla tlholelang bašwa ba le 50 000 ditiro mo ikonoming.
Matsholo ano ka se tlhole fela ditiro tse di tlhokagalang ka bontsi mme gape tla tsosolosa gape le ditiro tsa go nna le baagi ba ba matlhagatlhaga.

src_text: Isiquntu sabo boke abantu abakhulu beSewula Afrika bekube nje, ubuncani bakhona sebakhe bahlaba kanye bahlabela i-COVID-.
tgt_text: SEF tla dirisana le mekgatlo e seng ya puso (di-NGO) fa NYS yona tla samagana le go kwadisa bašwa go tsenngwa mo matsholong ditirelo tse di tla unngwelang baagi naga ka bophara..  Lefapha la Dipalangwa.

src_text: Urhulumende unqophe ukusebenzisa imali asandukubolekwa yona mhlapha evunyelwe yiBhanga yePhasi, enamakonyana aphasi, ukungezelela imithamo yomjovo we-COVID-19, kuzokuqinisekiseka ukuthi isitjhaba sivikeleke ngokwaneleko engozini yokutheleleka ngalesisifo..  IKhabinethi ibuye yaqala neendaba eziphathelene nokulawulwa kwesifo esikhe sarhagalesi, i-COVID-19, khulukhulu malungana nendima esele yenziwe nokubuyela ngokupheleleko emisebenzini ejayelekileko kezomnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Leanotiro la Puso la Dikgato di le 11 tsa go samagana le botlhokotsebe jwa bakganni ba diteroko jwa go paraka mebila ya ka fa nageng mmogo le ditiragalo tsa beng ba ditlamo tsa diteroko tsa go thapa bakganni ba diteroko go tswa kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezePilo uDorh.
tgt_text: Leano leno, le le kwadilweng ke Komiti ya Ditona tsa ka fa Nageng (IMC) e Samaganang le Merero ya Dipalangwa tse di Rwalang Dithoto mmogo le bannaleseabe mo intasetering ya dipalangwa tse di rwalang dithoto, gare ga tse dingwe tsa dilo tse di tlotlomatsang ke tiragatso ya molao wa visa mmogo le kobamelo ya melao ya badiri.

src_text: Joe Phaahla usezasinikela eminye imininingwana malungana nalokhu.
tgt_text: Gore go tlhomiwe IMC eno ke ka ntlha ya ditiragalo tse di neng di setse di simolotse go gakala tsa go paraka ditsela tse di neng di diriwa ke bakganni ba diteroko ba maAforika Borwa ba ba neng ba na le dingongora.

Ka gale fa go na le ditiragalo tsa megwanto mmogo le tsa go paraka mebila seno se kgoreletsa tota metsamao, se tshosa babeeletsi ba ba tswang kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle mme se se golo le go feta ke gore, seno se ama ikonomi ka tsela e sa itumediseng mmogo le go ama ditirelo tsa dikgwebo tse di itshepetseng mo mebileng eo parakilweng.

src_text: ILanga LeLutjha LeliZweloke.
tgt_text: Tlhaelo ya Metsi kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo ya Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze woke amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlanganyela esikhumbuzweni seLanga leLutjha leliZweloke ngeLesine, ngomhla we-16 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sikhuthazela Ingomuso Elingcono Lendlela Yokuziphilisa Ebambelelako Nekhambisana Nobujamo Bezinto Elutjheni.” Ummoya wamandla wetjisakalo newokujamelana nobujamo bezinto otjengiswa lilutjha elizweni lekhethu loke umthombo wokuhlalela ethembeni nokuthokozela ingomuso elingcono.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke ka fao Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe le samaganeng le ntlha eno kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo wa NMB kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba gore porofense eo se iphitlhele sena metsi gonne fa sale ka ngwaga wa 2015 porofense eno ntse tlhaela metsi.

DWS ntse thusana le porofense go tsenya tirosong dikgato tse di tlhokagalang jaanong, tse di tla dirisiwang sebakanyana le tse di tla dirisiwang mo pakeng e tlang le go ya go ile go rarabolola le go samagana le seo mo isagong se nang le kgonagalo ya go ka feletsa se tlisitse komelelo.

src_text: Njengoba iNyanga YeLutjha seyiya ngekupheleni nje, asiqiniseni imizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abatjha bayawathola amahlelo amanengi avulwe ngurhulumende wabe wakghonakalisa nokuthi baba nelitho abalenzako emnothweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse gape le mo baaging ba NMB gore ba obamele dikgato tsa go laola metsi tse dimasepala tsa dikgaolo tseo di tsentseng mo tirisong gore di kgone go tlhokomela metsi.

Dimasepala tsotlhe fa di kopane ka gotlhegotlhe di tshwanetse go fokotsa tiriso ya metsi ka dilitara di le dimilione di le 50 mo letsatsing, go tswa mo a dirisiwang ga jaana leng dilitara di le dimilione di le 280 ka letsatsi gore jaanong go dirisiwa dilitara di le dimilione di le 230 ka letsatsi..  Bosenyi le Bonweenwee.

src_text: IKoro yemBusweni, njengoba imqatjhi omkhulu kinabo boke nje, isisikimele lesisitjhijilo ngokuvulela iimfundiswa ezineziqu kodwana ezingasebenziko ukuthi zithole ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi ngehlelo lokuFundisa iimFundiswa ezineziQu umsebenzi emBusweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke dikgato tsa sešweng tsa go tshwariwa ga motlhankedi yo direlang Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae (DHA) kwa dikantorong tse di leng kwa Benoni jaaka diretse ka bokhukhuntshwane moagi wa naga ya Bangladeshi lekwalo la mosepele la naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Urhulumende godu uphumelelisa isiKhwama sokuVulela umPhakathi imiSebenzi (i-SEF) ngehlelo leLutjha eliVuselelwe ngobuTjha (i-NYS) lokuvula imisebenzi, elizakuvulela abantu abatjha amasango wokungena emnothweni; ihlelo ngalinye kilawa lizakuvulela abantu abatjha abama-50 000 amasango wokungena emnothweni.
tgt_text: Motlhankedi yono, yo leina la gagwe leng Mme Sibongile Simelane lokolotswe ke Kgotlatshekelo ya Magiseterata ya Kgaolo ya Benoni kwa kgolegelong ka beile ya diranta di le dikete di le tlhano ka Labobedi, 21 Seetebosigo.

Moagi yono wa naga ya Bangladeshi bong Rre Fahim Kazi tshwerwe ka la bo 12 Motsheganong 2022 fa ne leka go tswa ka fa nageng mo lekwalo la gagwe la mosepele le neng le re leina la gagwe ke, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: Amagadango lawa-ke angeze agcine ngokunikela ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi elidingeke khulu, kodwana lizakuqinisa namandla wokuthi abantu abatjha babe zizakhamuzi ezinelizwi eendabeni zelizwe.
tgt_text: Sešweng jaana DHA ne ya thotathota modiragatsi wa naga ya Lithuania le dipurugwana tsa gagwe bong mme Ieva Andrejevaite, yo maitlhomo gagwe bong le go gatakaka thulaganyo ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ya go thusa bafaladi go latela gore fitlhele mo nageng fete ka go tlhama maaka re kopa go dira kopo ya go tshabela ka fa nageng ka ntlha ya "ntwa e runtseng kwa nageng ya Ukraine”.

src_text: I-SEF isebenzisana neenhlangano ezingasizombuso (ama-NGO) bese kuthi i-NYS isebenzise abantu abatjha emisebenzini ebuyisela umphakathi elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse tiro e dirilweng ke Yuniti ya go Lwantshana le Bonweenwee ya DHA akgotse le baagi mmogo le go ba rotloetsa gore ba se kgaotse go buletsa ditiragalo tsa mothale ono.

Ditiragalo tse di seng mo molaong tse di diriwang ke maAforika Borwa tsa go rekisa dintlha tsa bona tsa boitshupo di na le ditlamorago tse dikgolo tse di sa jeseng diwelang mo pabalesegong ya naga mmogo le mo maemong ikonomi le baagi.

src_text: Zokuthutha  .
tgt_text: Puso ga kitla tlhaetsa matlho kana go tsaya letlhakore mme tla tswelela go tiisa seatla mo go samaganeng le mongwe le mongwe yo amegang mo ditiragalong tsa go tlola molao tse di nyatsang melao ya ka fa nageng ya bofaladi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozele iHlelo lomSebenzi lamaPhuzu ali-11 elizakusebenza ngomraro wokuvalwa kweendlela nokuqatjhwa kwabatjhayeli bamathraga abamaphandle.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke dikgato tsa go golega le go otla morutabana wa kwa Durban, Mme Precious Gabuza, yo nang le dingwaga di le 37, yo otlilweng ka go atlholwa ke Kgotlatshekelo ya Kgaolo ya Umlazi kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal gore duelele molato wa gagwe ka go direla setšhaba sebaka sa dingwaga di le tharo mmogo le ka go tswalelwa kwa kgolegelong sebaka sa dingwaga di le nne, mme dikotlo tseno ka bobedi di tla ngotliwa ka dingwaga di le tharo mme kotlo eno ke ka ntlha ya gore tlotse Molao wa Ditlhopo tsa Baeteledipele mo Mebasepaleng ya Mebuso ya Selegae, wa ngwaga wa 2000 (Molao wa bo 27 wa 2000).

src_text: Ihlelweli, elitlanywe yiKomidi eHlanganyelwe miNyango yaboNgqongqotjhe (i-IMC) eqalene nezeeNdlela nokuThutha ngokusebenzisana nababelani bezeendlela nezokuthutha, likhuthaza ukuthotjelwa kwemithetho yeencwadi zokukhamba (ama-visa) ikhuthaze nokuthotjelwa kwemithetho yezemisebenzi nezabasebenzi, hlangana nokhunye.
tgt_text: Jaaka ditlhopho di ne di tshwaretswe mo sekolong seo neng dira mo go sona jaaka morutabana ka Diphalane 2021, Mme Gabuza ne amogela gore molato mo ditatofatsong tsa go dira ditlhopho makgetlo le 24 ka tsela e seng mo molaong, mme dirile ditlhopho makgetlo le 12 mo Ditlhophong tsa Masepala le makgetlo mangwe gape le 12 mo Ditlhophong tsa Diwate.

Go golega le go otla mme yono ke bopaki jwa go bontsha gore Khomišene ya Ditlhopho ya Aforika Borwa tota ikemiseditse go samagana le ditiragalo tse di tswileng mo tseleng le go rwesa bao ba amegang maikarabelo ntle le go senya nako.

src_text: I-IMC yasungulelwa ukulungisa ukuvalwa kweendlela okuthuweleleko nokutjhagala kwabatjhayeli bamathraga beSewula Afrika abanghonghoyilako.
tgt_text: Seno se bontsha gape le botlhokwa jwa tiriso ya thekenoloji ya go dira tlhopho, eo jaanong enngweng nokeng ke Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji tsa go Laola Ditlhopho tse di thibelang gore motho le mongwe kgone go ka dira ditlhopho makgetlo le mantsi go feta ka fao tshwanetseng.

src_text: Imitjhagalo nokuvalwa kweendlela kuliya ukukhambeka kweendlela, kwethusa abasisi bangaphandle, kanti ngaphezu kwakho koke, kuthela umnotho namarherho aqakathekileko wokukhambisa ipahla ngamacaphazela amambi, njengoba amarherho lawa asebenzisa leziindlela lapho kukhamba khona amathraga ekubangwa umsebenzi wawo nje.
tgt_text: Kabinete totobadi ntlha ya gore ditlhopho di botlhokwa thata mo temokerasing ya naga ya rona mme go tshwanetswe go diriwe sengwe le sengwe go ka di sireletsa..  Khonferense ya bo 12 ya Ditona (MC12) ya Mokgatlo wa Dikgwebo tsa Lefatshe (WTO).

Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tseo di tlhageletseng kwa MC12 ya WTO e neng tshwaretswe kwa Geneva, Switzerland go tloga ka la bo 12 go fitlha ka la bo 17 Seetebosigo 2022, segolobogolo tshwetso e tserweng ya gore dinaga tse di nang le matshwanedi di ka ikgatosa dithata tsa dikgwebo mme tsa itirela meento ya COVID-19 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Ukutlhayela Kwamanzi Kumasipaladi Wedorobha i-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB)          .
tgt_text: Tshwetso ya gore ntlha eno tsenyeletse gape le melemo ya COVID-19 mmogo le didirisiwa tsa go tlhatlhoba fa molwetse na le yona ne ya busediwa morago ka sebaka sa dikgwedi di le thataro.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozela igadango elithethwe mNyango wezaManzi nokuHlwengisa (i-DWS) kuMasipaladi we-NMB ePumalanga Kapa ukuphepha iLanga lokuPhela kweziYela (elaziwa nge-Day Zero) njengoba lesisifunda sitlhayelelwa mamanzi kangaka nje solo kwangomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ga a bolo go goga kwa pele dikgato tsa gore WTO beele kwa thoko dithata tsa dikgwebo fa go tla mo mererong ya meento ya COVID-19 e tla dirang bonnete jwa gore botlhe re nna le meento ka go lekana mmogo le go letla dinaga tse di nang le bokgoni jwa go itirela meento gore di tswelele go itirela ona.

src_text: I-DWS isebenzisana nesifunda ukuphumelelisa amagadango wesikhatjhana, newesikhathi esilingeneko kunye newesikhathi eside wokuthundubaza ubukhali besomiso kilesisiphande.
tgt_text: Mo kgonferenseng eno go dirilwe maikano gore go tla diragadiwa mo phasalatseng le ka go dira gore batho ba nne le seabe mo dithulaganyong tsotlhe tsa go fetola tiro ya yona mme go dumelanwe gore go tla samaganwa le ditumelano tsa go gwebisana tse di samaganang le dikarolo tse di jaaka ya boitekanelo, ya go tsenya tirisong dipeelo mo lephateng la go thusa ka matlole ba lephata la ditlhapi, ya go ntsha taolelo e tla laolelang lephata la dikgwebo tsa go rekisa ditirelo ka inthanete mmogo le la go netefatsa gore dijo ga di tlhokagale  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
Kgatelopele e leng Teng mo Letsholong la Phetolelokgaso go ya go ya Dijithale (BDM).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yakhwezelela izakhamuzi ze-NMB ukuthi zibabalele amanzi ngokuthobela imibandela yesilinganiso sokusetjenziswa kwamanzi esibekwe ngumasipaladi wendawo.
tgt_text: Kabinete beilwe mo dinakong ka letsholo la BDM mmogo le go nopola seo se setseng se dirilwe mo go tsenyetseng baagi mabokoswana marang kgaso jaaka tlhokega mo kgatong ya go tswa mo kgasong ya analoko fa re tsena mo kgasong ya dijithale.

src_text: Kubekwe isilinganiso esithi ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi kufanele siphungulwe ngama-50 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga, ukusuka ema-280 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga njenganje, ukuyokufika ema-230 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete gateletse botlhokwa jwa go garela ka bonako BDM jaaka seno se tla thusa gore tiriso ya marang kgaso kgone go abelana ka ditirelo tse di tlhokagalang mo megaleng ya seatla mmogo le mo didirisiweng tse dingwe gape tsa thekenoloji ya ditlhaeletsano le tshedimosetso..   Tona ya Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano le ya Dijithale Khumbudzo Ntshavheni kamoso ka Labotlhano wa la bo 24 Seetebosigo 2022 tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang go neela setšhaba tshedimosetso nngwe ka botlalo.
Pegelo ya Naga e Gololwang Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya Maemo Semmuso Ditshwanelo tsa Bana.

src_text: Ubulelesi Nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Kabinete letleletse gore Pegelo ya bobedi ya Naga e Gololwang Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya Maemo Semmuso Ditshwanelo tsa Bana ka phasaladiwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi izithokozele iindaba zokubotjhwa kwesiphathimandla somNyango wezaNgekhaya esisebenzela e-ofisini le-Benoni, esibotjhelwe ukwenzela isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh ipaspoti yomgunyathi, mhlapha.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno re baya mo dinakong ka seo se dirilweng mo Leanotirong la Naga mabapi le Bana (NPAC) mo pakeng ya go tloga mo ngwageng wa 2019 go fitlha mo go wa.

src_text: Isiphathimandleso, uMma uSibongile Simelane, uvulelwe ngebheyili yee-R5000 eKhotho kaMarhistrada we-Benoni ngeLesibili womhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-.
Isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh esenzelwe ipaspoti yomgunyathi, uNom.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno nopola dilo tseo go atlegilweng mo go tsona go tloga mo ngwageng wa 2020 go fitlha mo go wa nopola gape le dikarolo tse di santseng di tlhoka go atlhaatlhwa, mmogo le pabalesego ya bana mmogo le tshokolo e tsweletseng go nna teng magareng ga bahumi le batho ba ba humanegileng bogolosegolo mo baneng.

src_text: Fahim Kazi, ubotjhwe alinga ukubaleka ekhethwapha ngomhla we-12 kuMrhayili wee-2022, ngegama lika-‘Lebogang Ndlovu.’         .
tgt_text: Pegelo eno gape bua le ka seabe se leroborobo la COVID-19 se nnileng le sona mo baneng mo pakeng eo..   Maitlhomo dikgato tsa go tlisa tharabololo tse di tsenngwang tirisong ke puso ke go dira gore bana ba fitlhelele ditshwanelo tsa bona, fela jaaka go tlhalositswe mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: UmNyango wezaNgekhaya (i-DHA), mhlapha usandukududula umlingisi omsikazi we-Lithuania uMma u-Ieva Andrejevaite, wambuyisela ekhabo, nabekalinga ukukhwabanisela ihlelo leSewula Afrika lokubhadwa ngekhwapha kwabantu abaphalalele ekhethwapha, ngokuleya amala nakalinga ukwenza isibawo sokubhaciswa asithi batjho ubaleke “ipi elwa e-Ukraine.”                 .
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno gape di ema nokeng maikano naga ya rona a dirilweng mo Ditumelanong tsa Dinagakopano (UN) mabapi le Ditshwanelo tsa Bana (UNCRC) mmogo le mo Tumelanong ya Dinaga tsa Aforika mabapi le Ditshwanelo le Tlhokomelo ya Bana (ACRWC).

src_text: IKhabinethi iyawubuka umsebenzi owenziwa liPhiko le-DHA eliLwa nobuKhohlakali.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di saenileng UNCRC le ACRWC..   Pegelo eno kwadilwe go latela gore go batlisisiwe tshedimosetso e maleba mo mafapheng puso mmogo le mo maphateng mangwe mantsi a matshwanedi mo pusong ya naga le mo go dipusong tsa diporofense.

src_text: Ithokoza beyikhuthaza amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili ngokuhlaba umkhosi ngezenzo zobulelesi ezinjengalezi.
tgt_text: Pegelo e feletseng tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Ukwephula kwamaSewula Afrika umthetho ngokuthengisa abomazisi bawo kunemiphumela emimbi kumbi ekuphepheni nebujameni behlalakuhle yomnotho yelizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Aforika Borwa e Isiwang kwa go UNCRC e ka ga Dipaka tse di Kopanngweng go Tloga mo go ya Boraro go Fitlha mo go ya Borataro.
Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tlhagisa Pegelo ya Aforika Borwa e Isiwang kwa go UNCRC e ka ga Dipaka tse di Kopanngweng go Tloga mo go ya Boraro go Fitlha mo go ya Borataro.

src_text: Urhulumende uzakusolo abathathela amagadango abukhali nanganasirhawu, ngaphandle kwevalo, abantu abanesandla ezenzweni eziphambana nomthetho ezinyefisa imithetho elawula ukungena kwamaphandle lapha ekhethu.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno latela e tlhagisitsweng kwa go UNCRC mo ngwageng wa..   Pegelo eno kwadilwe go ya ka molao wa athikele ya bo 44 ya UNCRC, mme samagana gape le ditshitshinyo tse di neng di dirilwe mo pegelong ya bofelo e rometsweng pele ga eno.
UNCRC ne mo ngwageng wa 2016 ya romela ditshitshinyo tse naga tshwanetseng go di diragatsa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele nokulahlwa ngecala abe ethweswe nesigwebo utitjhere weThekwini uMma uNomusa Precious Gabuza (oneminyaka ema-37) – ogwetjwe iminyaka emithathu yokusebenzela umphakathi, namine yokudosa ejele, elengiswe iminyaka emithathu eKhotho yesiPhande e-Umlazi KwaZulu-Natala – ngokwephula umThetho wezeKhetho laboRhulumende beeNdawo zemaKhaya womNyaka wee-2000 (umThetho Nomboro 27 wee-2000).
tgt_text: Pegelo eno kwadilwe ka go sekegela tsebe tlhware logong nngwe le nngwe go tswa kwa mafapheng a maleba le kwa bannaleseabeng ba ba maleba mo nageng ka bophara.

src_text: UGabuza, ongutitjhere wesikolo esasisetjenziswa njengesiteyitjhi sokuvowuda ngeKhetho laboMasipala ngoSewula wee-2021, ulivumile icala lokuvowuda ngomgunyathi amahlandla ama-24 ekhethweneli; amahlandla ali-12 eKhethweni likaMasipala wabuye wavowuda amahlandla ali-12 eKhethwni lamaWadi.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno yotlhe tla re fa sena go isiwa kwa go UNCRC ya nna gona ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba iponele yona.
Pegelo ya Naga e Mabapi le go Tsenya Tirisong Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo.

src_text: Ukulahlwa kwakhe licala nokwethweswa kwakhe isigwebo kuphakamisa ukuzibophelela kweKomitjhini yezeKhetho eziJameleko yeSewula Afrika ekuthatheni amagadango wamsinyana wokukhalima izephulamthetho.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula go isiwa ga pegelo ya ntlha ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ya Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo kwa Setheong sa go Agela Baagi Madulo sa Letsholo la UN (UN-Habitat).

src_text: Lokhu godu kubuye kube nanga bufakazi bamandla wamahlelo wezekhetho, esele aqiniswa solo kwathoma ukusetjenziswa kwesiSetjenziswa sokuLawula abaVowudi (i-Voter Management Device) esikhandela ukuvowuda kabili namkha ngokubuyelela kanengi.
tgt_text: UN-Habitat tsentse tirisong Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo mo nakong ya fa go ne go tshwerwe Khonferense ya go Aga Madulo a tla Nnelang Ruri mo Metseseteropong ka Diphalane.
Dinaga tseo leng leloko go solofetswe gore di ithaope ka go neelana ka dipegelo tse di bontshang kgatelopele.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyavuma ukuthi amakhetho ayisika yehlelo lethu lentando yenengi, begodu kufuze avikelwe ngazo zoke iindlela.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa ne ya ema nokeng Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo mme morago ga foo ya tsenya tirisong ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Golagantsweng le Tlhabololo ya Metseseteropong (IUDF).

Maitlhomo IUDF ke go aga mafelo bodulo mo metseseteropong batho botlhe ba ka nnnang mo go ona a tla nnelang ruri bile go le monate go nna mo go ona..   Pegelo e ka ga kgatelopele e dirilweng kwadilwe ka go sekegela tlhare legong go tswa mo pusong ya naga, mebusong ya diporofense le mo mebusong ya selegae mmogo le go tswa mo mekgatlhong e maleba e seng ya puso (di-NGO).

src_text: IKhonfrensi YaboNgqongqotjhe Yehlandla le-12 (MC12) YeHlangano YezeRhwebo YePhasi (i-WTO) .
tgt_text: Leano le le Kopanetsweng la Tlhabololo ya Bašwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi iwuthokozele umphumela we-WTO MC12 ebeyibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland, ukusukela ngomhla we-12 ukuyokufika kumhla we-17 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, ithokozele khulukhulu isiqunto sokuthi amazwe afaneleko angawacitha amalungelo wobunikazimjovo bemijovo ye-COVID-19 bekube mnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula IYDS gore ka tsenngwa tirisong.

src_text: Siriyadiswe ngeenyanga ezintandathu isiqunto sokuthi lokhu kungadluliselwa na nemahlelweni wokulawula nokuthola ukuthi umuntu uphethwe yi-COVID-19, nemitjhogeni yokwelapha i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Leano leno le dira gore Pholisi ya Naga ya Merero ya Bašwa ya ngwaga wa 2020 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa 2030 nne le mosola tlhagisa dikgato, diporojeke mmogo le matsholotse ao tshwanetsweng go diragadiwa ke bannaleseabe ba ba farologaneng mo mekgatlhong ya bašwa thusa gape gore maphata puso a farologaneng se diragatse matsholo a tshwanang mmogo le go eletsa gore mekgatlho ya baagi le makala poraefete ke eng se ka se dirang go ema nokeng bašwa gore ba kgone go fitlhelela ditšhono.
Leano leno le kwadilwe ka go latela tshedimosetso ntsi e farologaneng go tswa mo makaleng a farologaneng mo setšhabeng.

src_text: ISewula Afrika soke isikhathesi beyidosa phambili esibaweni sokuthi i-WTO ayisuse amalungelo wobunikazingqondo akhambisana nemijovo ye-COVID-19 okuzakwenza ukuthi boke abantu bakghone ukuthola umjovo ngokufanako nangokulinganako, kube kwenze nokuthi amazwe akghona ukukhiqiza imijovo enze njalo.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe sa Masupatsela mo Mererong ya Tshomarelo le Tlhokomelo ya Lephata la Aforika Borwa la Tshomarelo le Tiriso ya Dimela le Ditshedi tse di Farologaneng go Tlhagisa Melemo.

Kabinete neseditse pula Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe sa Masupatsela mo Mererong ya Tshomarelo le Tlhokomelo ya Lephata la Aforika Borwa la Tshomarelo le Tiriso ya Dimela le Ditshedi tse di Farologaneng go Tlhagisa Melemo gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga sona.

src_text: Ikhonfrensi le ibuye yazibophelela nehlelweni elivulekileko neliqalelela umuntu woke lokuhlela ngobutjha yoke imisebenzi yayo, yabe yavumela nebuthelelo leemvumelwano zokurhwebelana emakorweni anjengezepilo, nekubekweni kweenlinganiso eemalini eziphungula iindleko ekuthiyweni kweenhlambi, ukujanyiswa kwesikhatjhana kokurhweba ngethungelelwano le-inthanethi kunye nelokutholakala kokudla   Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi   .
tgt_text: Lephata la la Aforika Borwa la Tshomarelo le Tiriso ya Dimela le Ditshedi tse di Farologaneng go Tlhagisa Melemo le tlhagisa ditšhono tse di botlhokwa mo kgolong le tlhabololong ya ikonomi bile gape le botlhokwa thata mo ditsong tsa batho ka fao ba iphedisang ka gone..   Sekwalwa seno sa Masupatsela se dira gore ditshitshinyo tse di dirilweng ke Phanele ya Baitseanape ba ba Nang le Kitso e Tseneletseng mo ngwageng wa 2019 di tsenngwe tirisong ka go sekaseka dipholisi tsa rona tsa ga jaanong, melao ya rona mmogo le ditiro tse di tsamaisanang le ditshedi tse di botlhokwa..   Pegelo eno tshitshintse gore go kwadiwe pholisi e tlhokagalang e ka ga tshomarelo le tlhokomelo ya tiriso ya lephata la naga la tshomarelo le tiriso ya dimela le ditshedi tse di farologaneng go tlhagisa melemo.

src_text: Indima Ngokudlulela Ehlelweni Lokurhatjha Budijithali (i-BDM) .
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tla tsenngwa tirisong mo maphateng otlhe puso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko ngendima esele yenziwe ngeHlelo le-BDM, yayibona indima esele yenziwe ngokufakelwa kwama-Set-Top Box njengengcenye yokufuduka ehlelweni lokurhatjha nge-analogu kuyiwe ehlelweni lokurhatjha budijithali.
tgt_text: Tshomarelo ya tlhago botlhokwa mo go maswe mo matsholong naga ya rona go potlakisa kgolo ya ikonom le tlholo ya ditiro.
Leano la Lekala la Nama ya Diphologolo tsa Naga.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelele yagandelela ukurhabeka kokuqedelelwa kwe-BDM kobanyana kuzokuvuleka ikundla yokurhatjha efunekako ebanzi, ekhambisekako nekhambisa amaza wokurhatjha ngebelo elikhulu, kunye nethekhnoloji yelwazi nezokuthintana.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasaladiwa ga sekwalwa sa ntlha se se santseng se tlhoka gore se sekasekwe sa Leano la Lekala la Nama ya Diphologolo tsa Naga gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona.
Maitlhomo leano leno ke go dira gore intaseteri ya nama ya diphologolo tsa naga amogelwe semmuso mmogo le go godisiwa.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezokuThintana nezeTheknoloji yeDijithali u-Khumbudzo Ntshavheni uzokubamba umhlangano weendaba kusasa (ngeLesihlanu, 24 kuMgwengweni) lapho azakunaba khona ngemininingwana.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo mangwe lona ke go dira gore re se tlhaele dijo.
Bogolo jwa intaseteri ya nama ya diphologolo tsa naga ke kgwebo e sa kwadisiwang semmuso mme dira ka tsela e sa tlhamalalang.

src_text: Umbiko WaQobemnyaka NgobuJamo BamaLungelo WabaNtwana EliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Leano le le tshitshintsweng leno le neelana ka leano le le ka dirisiwang go tsenya tirisong dikgato tsa go dira gore nne kgwebo ya semmuso le go matlafatsa lekala leno gore le nne le lengwe la a samaganang le merero ya go dira gore re nne le dijo tse di sa tlhaeleng mmogo le mo go godiseng ikonomi gore le kgone go tlhola ditiro   Melaotlhomo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukumenyezelwa komBiko waQobemnyaka wobuJamo bamaLungelo wabaNtwana ongowehlandla lesibili.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero Yotlhe ya Magosi Setso wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe zamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa kweHlelo lemiSebenzi eyenzelwa abaNtwana esikhathini see-2019-.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero Yotlhe ya Magosi Setso wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa.

Maitlhomo dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa ke go kwalola sešwa dikarolo tsa Molao wa Magosi Merafe ya go tloga ka ya maKhoi go fitlha ka ya maSan wa ngwaga wa, 2019 (Molao wa bo 03 wa 2019), yo tsentsweng tirisong ka la bo 01 Moranang.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphakamisa ipumelelo eyenzeke ngesikhathi see-2020-.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Temokerasi e Nang le Molaotheo mo Diatleng tsa Digongwana tsa Menolopuso le Ditiragalo tsa Mothale o Ntseng Jalo wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Ubuya godu uveza neendawo ezisafuna itjhejo, ekubalwa hlangana nazo nokuphepha kwabantwana kunye nokutjhiyana ngendima okusolo kuthuwelele kuya phambili hlangana kwabanothileko nabanganalitho.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Temokerasi e Nang le Molaotheo mo Diatleng tsa Digongwana tsa Menolopuso le Ditiragalo tsa Mothale o Ntseng Jalo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa gape ka matsetseleko.

src_text: Umbiko lo godu uveza nokuthi isifo esikhe sarhagala kokapha, i-COVID-19, sibacaphazele njani abantwana ngalesisikhathi.
tgt_text: Ka gang fa sena go letlelelwa gore nne molao, Molaotlhomo ono tla kwalola sešwa Molao yo dirisiwang ga jaanong wa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Temokerasi e Nang le Molaotheo mo Diatleng tsa Digongwana tsa Menolopuso le Ditiragalo tsa Mothale o Ntseng Jalo wa Ngwaga wa 2004, (Molao wa bo 33 wa 2004).
Molaotlhomo ono setse fetile mo dikgatong tse di matsetseleko tsa go batla maikutlo baagi go latela gore Kabinete ka Motsheganong 2021 letlelele go diragadiwa ga thulagnyo eno.

src_text: Amagadango athathwa ngurhulumende anqophe ukuphumelelisa amalungelo wabantwana, njengoba kusitjho umThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno tsa go kwalololwa sešwa maitlhomo tsona ke go lepalepanya melao ya ka fa nageng le ya lefatshe ka bophara ya go lwantshana le maiteko menolopuso jaaka go tsenngwa mo go ona dikgato tse di diragadiwang mo dinageng tsa boditšhaba.

src_text: Asekela neembopho zelizwe lekhethu eemVumelwaneni ze-UN ngamaLungelo wabaNtwana (i-UNCRC) nomTlolo we-Afrika ngamaLungelo neHlalakuhle yomNtwana (i-ACRWC).
tgt_text: Mo go ona go baakantswe gape le dikarolo tsa molao tse di neng di sa kwalega sentle go tsamaisana le Molaotheo jaaka Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo ne ya laela.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yayitlikitlela yomibili imitlolo yeemvumelwano i-UNCRC ne-ACRWC.
tgt_text: Jaaka le nngwe ya dinaga tse di saenileng melao ya Lekgotla la Pabalesego la Dinagakopano (UN), Aforika Borwa rwele maikarabelo go dira gore ka fa nageng go ikobelwa melao ya boditšhabatšhaba maitlhomo yona leng go gagamatsa dikgato tsa go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa menolopuso   Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
Samiti ya bo 14 ya Dinaga tsa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Aforika Borwa (BRICS).

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana neminyango karhulumende nabanye ababelani abafaneleko abambadlwana belizweloke neemfundeni ngeemfunda.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla etelela kwa pele mo legatong la naga ya Aforika Borwa Samiti ya bo 14 ya Baeteledipele ba Dinaga tsa BRICS e tla bong tshwerwe ka Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano tsa Dibidio e tla Tshwarwang ke Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Batho ba China e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka Labone, 23 go fitlha ka Labotlhano, 24 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Umbiko opheleleko uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi, ku-www.dsd.gov.za.

tgt_text: Go nneng tokololo ga rona mo go BRICS go tswelela go tswela naga ya rona mosola.

src_text: Umbiko WeSewula Afrika Ohlanganisiweko Wesithathu Ukuyokufika Kowesithandathu  Onande Uthunyelwa I-UNCRC              .
tgt_text: Mo ngwageng yo fetileng dilwana tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa kwa ntle tse leng karolo ya BRICS tse di tswang ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa di ne di le kwa godimonyana ga 17% bile dilwana tse di kwa godimonyana ga 29% tse re di rekang kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle di ne di tswa mo go tsona dinaga tseno.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa komBiko wesithathu ukuyokufika kowesithandathu onande wethulelwa i-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Boleng jwa dikgato tseno tsa go gwebisana bo tsweletse go gola, mo re bonang palo yotlhe ya go gwebisana ga Aforika Borwa le dinaga tsa BRICS tlhatloga go fitlha go Diranta di le Dibilione di le 702 mo ngwageng wa 2021 leng e oketsegileng go tloga mo Diranteng di le Dibilione di le 487 mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: Lombiko ulandela wesibili umBiko oNande uthunyelwa i-UNCRC, owagcina ukwethulwa ngomnyaka wee-.

tgt_text: Go dirisana mmogo le dinaga tse dingwe tsa BRICS mo maphateng tshwana le boitekanelo le go oketsa dikgato tsa go gwebisana go dirile gore diintaseteri tsa rona ka fa nageng di gole, mmogo le go unngwela dinaga tsotlhe tse leng tokololo ya BRICS.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokweNdinyana 44 ye-UNCRC, begodu umumethe nokwatjhejwako nokwaphakanyiswako embikweni wokugcina.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo dipeeletso tsa rona mo diporojekeng tsa tlhagiso ya mafaratlhatlha mmogo le maiteko rona go fedisa melao e kgoreletsang kgwebisano mo go sa tlhokagaleng ke go oketsa dilwana tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng tse di rekisediwang dinaga tse leng tokololo ya BRICS.

src_text: I-UNCRC ithumele ekutjhejileko nekuphakamisileko ngelizwe leSewula Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Sekolo sa Mariga sa Merero ya Ikonomi mo Pusong.

Go tloga ka la bo 27 Seetebosigo go fitlha ka la bo 01 Phukwi 2022 Sekolokatiso sa Puso ya Naga (NSG) se tla tshwarela kwa Johannesburg Letsholo la Sekolo sa Mariga sa Merero ya Ikonomi mo Pusong se se tla tsenelwang ke Batlhankedi ba Bagolo ba Dipolotiki.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana nayo yoke iminyango nababelani abafaneleko elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Go tla bo go na le Ditona go tswa kwa nageng ya Côte d'Ivoire; ya South Sudan le ya Aforika Borwa; mmogo le Bakaedikakaretso ba mafapha dipuso go tswa kwa Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania le Ghana tla tsenelwa gape le ke dimeyara tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa, mmogo le ditokololo tsa dikomiti tsa dimeyara le tsa maloko khuduthamaga..   Batlhankedi ba bagolo ba dipolotiki go tswa kwa dinageng tse di farologaneng go solofelwa gore ba tla neelana tshedimosetso le dikakanyo tse ba itemogetseng tsona ka ntlha ya maemo a farologaneng ba itemogelang ona letsatsi le lengwe le le lengwe mo tirong ya bona.

src_text: Umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa ungethulwa ku-UNCRC.
tgt_text: NSG tlhomile letsholo leno la ngwaga le ngwaga ka ngwaga wa 2020 gore le tsenelwe ke batlhankedi ba khuduthamaga, mme dirile seno jaaka karolo ya maikano go ema nokeng puso gore kgone go tlhoma puso e dirang ka botswapelo.

Gare ga dilo tse dingwe tse dintsi, maitlhomo letsholo leno ke tlhatlhelela batlhankedi ba bagolo mo maphateng otlhe mararo puso ka bokgoni jwa boeteledipele le jwa go ikemela mo maikarabelong bona gore ba kgone go mekamekana le dikgwetlho tsa puso tse di thibelang gore re nne le kgolo ya ikonomi e tla nnelang ruri batho botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go yona.

src_text: Umbiko Welizwe Ngokuphunyeleliswa Kwe-Ajenda Etja Yemadrobheni   .
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa eHlelweni le-UN lokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu (i-UN-Habitat) kombiko wokuthoma weSewula Afrika ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni.
tgt_text: Monongwaga Letsatsi la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela le tla ketekiwa ka Mosupologo, 18 Phukwi 2022 ka moono yo reng: “Gongwe le gongwe koo leng gone, dira sengwe le sengwe se ka se kgonang ka bonnye jo nang le bona”.

src_text: I-UN Habitat yavumelana ngokusebenzisa i-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni eKhonfrensini yokwAkhiwa kweziNdlu nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo ezimaDrobha okubambelelako ngoSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Jono ke boikuelo jo bo reng batho ba tshwanetse go ema nokeng le go nna le seabe mo letsholong leno ka go nna le seabe se se sa kgaotseng se se tla nnang le mosola wa go ya go ile nngwe ya dikao tseno tsa go nna le seabe se se sa kgaotseng ke Letsholo la ngwaga le ngwaga la Nelson Mandela le le ka ga Dipuisano tsa go Tlhabana Botlhale tsa Bašwa mo Mererong ya Boeteledipele jo bo Senang Dilabe le le samaganang le ditlhogo tse di botlhokwa thata mo bašweng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa mmogo le mo lefatsheng ka bophara.

src_text: Kwavunyelanwa ngokuthi amazwe amalunga azakuthumela imibiko yayo yendima ngokuzithandela.
tgt_text: Paka ya Lekgetho.
Paka ya Lekgetho ya mo ngwageng wa 2022 tla bula ka la bo 01 Phukwi mme ya tswalela ka la bo 24 Diphalane.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yakusekela ukwamukelwa kwe-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni, yalandelisa ngokuyiphumelelisa ngomTlamo oLungelelweko wokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaDrobheni (i-IUDF).
tgt_text: Baduelalekgetho ba rotloediwa go tsenya ditlankana tsa bona tsa lekgetho ka inthanete mo go www.sarsefiling.co.za kgotsa ba di tsenye ka mogala wa seatla mo epeng ya Setheo sa Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS)..   Monongwaga SARS tla tswelela go dirisa lenaneo le le tlhatlhobang baduelalekgetho ka go ba tlaletsa dintlha tsa bone tsotlhe tsa lekgetho gore thulaganyo ya lekgetho se ba tlhakatlhakanye tlhogo.

src_text: I-IUDF inqophe ukwakha nokuthuthukisa iindawo zemadrobheni eziqalelela umuntu woke, ezibambelelako nezihlalekako.
tgt_text: Mo ngwageng yo fetileng wa 2021 thulaganyo eno dirisitswe go tlhatlhoba baduelalekgetho ba feta dimilione di le tharo.

Go tsenngwa ka nako ditokomane tsa lekgetho ga go thuse fela baduelalekgetho gore ba kgone go obamela molao wa tuelo ya lekgetho, gape go thusa puso gore kgone go diragatsa ditirelo tse maAforika Borwa di tlhokang tota   Melaetsa.

src_text: Umbiko wendima lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana norhulumende welizwe loke, naborhulumende beemfunda kunye nabeendawo, nama-NGO afaneleko.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Moatlhodi Owen Lloyd Rogers go latela gore thapiwe go nna Moatlhodi mo Kgotlatshekelong ya Molaotheo ya Aforika Borwa.Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa mo go eletseng Moporesitente wa mo malobeng Thabo Mbeki Letsatsi la Matsalo le le tletseng ka Boitumelo fa tshwara dingwaga di le 80, le le ketikileng ka la bo 18 Seetebosigo.

Rre Mbeki ne na le ponelopele ntle e itumedisang fa go tla mo maAforika Borweng otlhe   Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.Bakaedi bao Seng ba Khuduthamaga mo Botong ya Merero ya Difofane tsa Aforika Borwa:Rre Ernest Khosa;Mme Bulelwa Koyana;Rre Surendra Sooklal; leMme Rejoice Edith Phewa..     Ditokololo tsa Kantoro ya Setheo sa Merero ya go Abelana ka Tshedimosetso ya Dikoloto tsa Madi go Reka Dintlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Monnasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Rre Errol Vincent Magerman  Moatefokate Mandla Dludlu  Rre Matsobane Gabriel Mello   Mme Palesa Mawasha   Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton   Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga   Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.

src_text: Zamvanje Ngesifo Sengogwana I-corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso ka Bolwetsi jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke boke abantu eSewula Afrika abakhethe ukuhlaba nokuthobela yoke imilayelo ye-COVID-19, okubangele ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libalekele ukukhutjhukelwa linani labantu abangenwa sisifesi nasehla kwehlandla lesihlanu.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse batho botlhe ba Aforika Borwa ba ba tlhophileng go enta le go obamela diporotokholo tsotlhe tsa COVID-19 leng se se bakileng gore naga efoge dipalo tse di tlhatlhogang tsa dikgetse tse dintšhwa ka nako ya lekhubu la botlhano la leroborobo..     Fela, ga re tshwanela go itebala gonne COVID-19 sa ntse le teng.

Le fa naga sa tswa go phimola melawana e neng saletse ya go apara dimaseke fa re le fa gare ga batho, batho ba ba nang le malwetse mangwe a sa alafegeng le ba ba lwalang ba rotloediwa go tswelela go apara dimaseke.

src_text: Nanyana kunjalo, kodwana nokho akukafaneli sizigedle ngoba i-COVID-19 isesekhona.
tgt_text: Re tshwanetse gape go tswelela go tlhapa diatla gongwe go dirisa sebolayaditwatsi, le go katogana le go dira gore mafelo re leng mo go ona tlhabiwe ke phefo..     Moento go ya ka bopaki jwa saense santse le ona o gaisang mo go re sireletseng mo bolwetseng jwa COVID-19 mme Kabinete rotloetsa batho botlhe ba ba sa entiwang gore ba se senye nako mme ba ye go enta mme ba ba entilweng bone ba ye go tlhabela moento wa go tsosolosa ba tlhabileng kwa lefelong le le gaufi nabo la go tlhabela moento ntle le go duelela tirelo eo..     Monkeypox.

src_text: Nanyana ilizwe lekhethu mhlapha libulele umlayelo okatelela abantu ukuthi bembathe imaski nabahlangana nabantu, kodwana abantu abanezinye izifo abaphila nazo nalabo abagulako bakhuthazwa ukuthi bahlale bawembethe amamaski nabahlangana nabantu.
tgt_text: Kabinete reboletswe tshedimosetso e mabapi le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox ya gore ka fa nageng go setse go fitlhetswe batho ba le babedi ba ba nang le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox mo nageng go latela gore fa gautshwane go fitlhelwe motho wa bobedi.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, kusamele bona sisolo sihlala ngokunande sihlamba izandla namkha sizihlikihle ngesihlanzekisi, sihlale siqalangene, besihlale siseendaweni ezibetha ummoya ngokwaneleko.
tgt_text: Batho bano ba itlhaotse mo setšhabeng mme ba kwa magaeng bona mme go samaganwe le dithulaganyo tsa go gata motlhala batho bao ba ka tswang ba kopane le batho bano go lekola gore ga ba tshwaetsega..     Lefapha la Boitekanelo le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Malwetse a Tshelanwang ba dirisana le Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Boitekanelo go sekaseka matshosetsi go tshelana ka bolwetse jono ka fa nageng gore tsamaisane le Melawana ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boitekanelo..     Mogare wa monkeypox ga tshelane bonolo mme gantsi tshelana fa batho ba ka tshwarana go tshwana le go sunana, go tlampurelana gongwe go kgoma dikarolo tsa mmele tse di nang le dintho tsa monkeypox.

Batho ba ba se nang matshwao monkeypox ba ka se ke ba tshela batho ba bangwe ka mogare ono..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba ba itemogelang matshwao letshoroma, matshwao a tshwanang le mokgotlhwane a latelwang ke boswata jo bo nang le metsi go ya kwa maokelong a gaufi gore ba bone thuso le kalafi ka bonako.

src_text: Ukuhlaba solo kuyindlela yesayensi ehle khulu yokuzivikela esifeni se-COVID-19, ngalokho-ke neKhabinethi nayo ikhuthaza boke abantu abangakahlabi ukuthi bahlabe khona nje, bangasariyada ukuya phambili, ikhuthaza nabantu abahlabileko ukuthi bayokuhlaba umjovo wokuqinisa amasotja womzimba eendaweni zokuhlaba eziseduze nabo, simahla.
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo thabene ya East London.
Matlhotlhapelo kwa Thabeneng ya Enyobeni kwa East London kwa Kapa Botlhaba ka Latshipi, 26 Seetebosigo 2022 a tsereng matshelo bašwa ba le 21 hutsafaditse naga yotlhe.

src_text: Ipokisi Yeemfene.
tgt_text: Ga go bonolo go akanya ka manyaapelo malapa a latlhegetsweng ke bana ka tsela e botlhoko jalo..     Kabinete rometse matshediso go malapa a latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa mme ya leboga botlhe ka tshegetso ya setho e neilweng malapa a mo khutsafalong ka nako eno e boima..     Ke selo se se re tshwenyang gore bana ba bonnye jwa dingwaga tse 13 ba ne ba letleletswe go tsena mo lefelong leo gore ba tle go nwa notagi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngezamvanje zokurhatjheka kwesifo sePokisi yeemFene elizweni lekhethweli, ngemva kobana sekuqinisekiswe ukuthi sebabili abantu ababanjwe yipokisi yeemfene ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Re ikuela mo baaging botlhe go nna le seabe ka go dira gore bana ba rona ba babalesege ka dinako tsotlhe..     Bana ba ba nang le dingwaga tse di ka fa tlase ga di le 18 ga ba letlelelwa go tsena mo dithabeneng, dišabining, dibareng le kwa marekisetsong bojalwa.

src_text: Lababantu esele kuqinisekiswe ukuthi babanjwe yipokisi yeemfene bakhethelwe ngahlanye emakhaya lapho bahlala khona, kanti-ke sekuthonyiwe ukulandelela abantu ekungenzeka ukuthi bakhe baba seduze nalaba abangenwe sisifesi, kobanyana bazokuhlolwa ukuthi abakatheleleki na.
tgt_text: Barekisi ba nnotagi ba ba fitlhelwang ba tlola melao eno ba tla latofadiwa ka bosenyi mme ba tseelwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa go rekisa notagi..
Se se Tswileng mo Samiting ya Setlhopha sa Baeteledipele ba Dinaga tse Supa (G7).

src_text: UmNyango wezePilo neZiko leziFo eziThelelanako (i-NICD) usebenzisana neHlangano yezePilo yePhasi ukuhlola ubungozi bokuthelelana ngesifesi ekhethwapha, ngokukhambisana nemiThetjhwanalawulo yezePilo yamaZwengamazwe.
tgt_text: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa nnile le seabe kwa Samiting ya Baeteledipele ba G7 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Bavaria, Jeremane ka Mosupologo, 27 Sedimonthole.

Moporesidente – yo nnileng le seabe mo dikopanong tse mo go tsona go buisanweng ka merero ya tlelaemete, motlakase, boitekanelo, go nna teng ga dijo mo lefatsheng le merero ya tekatekano ya bong – ne laleditswe ke moamogelabaeng, Motšhanselara Olaf Scholz..     G7 ke foramo ya sepolotiki ya dipuso e gogwang kwa pele ke naga ya Canada, Fora, Jeremane, Itali, Japane, Borithane le Amerika     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Ingogwana yepokisi yeemfene ayirhatjheki lula, begodu ivamise ukudlulela komunye umuntu ngemva kokutjhidelana nomunye umuntu, njengalokhuya abantu nabamanganako, nabanganako/nabagonanako nofana nabathinta izitho zomzimba ezineenlonda namkha ezinamanceba wepokisi yeemfene.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Melao ya Lephata la Molao (LSC).

src_text: Abantu abanganamatshayo wepokisi yeemfene angeze badlulisela ingogwana yesifesi kabanye abantu.
tgt_text: Kabinete letleletse gore LSC ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona.
Maikemisetso melawana eno ke go bebofatsa diphetogo mo lephateng la molao go dira gore ditheo tsa molao di nne le kemedi go ya ka sebopego sa baagi ka fa nageng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilemukise abantu abanamatshayo wefiva, womgomani ojayelekileko, nabanamathuthuva anamanzi ukuthi baye emaziko wezepilo aseduze nabo kobanyana bayokuthola isizo lokuhlolwa nokwelatjhwa kusese nesikhathi.
tgt_text: Molao ono tla netefatsa gape le gore go dirwa setheo se se tla tlhagisang batlamedi ba ditirelo tsa molao ba ba katisitsweng go utlwagala le ba ba itseng tiro ya bona ka botlalo.

Letsholo la go kwadiwa ga LSC le ne le okametswe ke Lekgotla la Tiro ya Molao, setheo sa semolao se se tlhamilweng go ya ka Karolo ya bo 4 ya Molao wa Tiro ya Molao, wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) mmogo le go kaelwa ke Molao wa Matlafatso ya Maemo Ikonomi Bathobatsho (B-BBEE), wa ngwaga wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo Eyehle Ethaveni YeMonti.
tgt_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 rwesa Tona ya Kgwebisano, Indaseteri le Kgaisano maikarabelo go kwala melao ya tiro e tswileng diatla mo go diragatseng matlafatso ya maemo ikonomi mo bathobantshong mo maphateng a rileng.

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeke Enyobeni Tavern eseMonti ePumalanga Kapa ngoSondo nakama-26 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 kwabhubhela kiyo abantu abatjha abama-21, ilethuse loke ilizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Ga jaana ditokololo tsa porofešene ya molao ga di na molao o di kaelang mo go samaganeng le go tlhoka tekatekano mo porofešeneng ya molao.

src_text: Kubudisi ukulinga ukucabanga isizi abakilo bemakhabo labantwana ababhubhe ngesihluku esingaka.
tgt_text: LSC tla phatlaladiwa mo Kaseteng ya Puso matsatsi le 60 go letla gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona..     Dipegelo tse di Rebolwang Gabedi mo Ngwageng tsa Kgatelopele ya Tiro e Dirilweng.
Kabinete neseditse pula dipegelo tse di rebolwang gabedi mo ngwageng tsa kgatelopele ya tiro e dirilweng tsa paka e akaretsang Diphalane 2021 go fitlha Mopitlwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibalilele imbiko bemakhabo labantwana abasitjhiyileko, yathokoza woke umuntu ngesekelo lakhe lobuntu ngokusekela imindeni ehluphekileko ngalesisikhathi sobudisi.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno ke karolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Pakagare (MSTF) 2019-.

MTSF 2019-2024 ke leano la go diragatsa tiro bile gape le disa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya go dira gore re diragatse Leano la Tlhabololo ya Naga leng Ponelopele ya 2030 e ka ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di tshwanetseng go fitlhelelwa mo pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro.

src_text: Kuzwisa ubuhlungu obukhulu ukuthi abantwana abancani beminyaka eli-13 kwaphela bavunyelwe ukungena endaweni yokusela bayokusela utjwala.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno di bua ka dikarolo tse di botlhokwa di le supa tsa puso leng (1) Phetogo ya ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro; (2) Thuto, bokgoni le boitekanelo; (3) Go tiisa megolo ya go thusa baagi ka ditirelo tsa motheo tse di ikanyegang le tsa boleng; (4) Kgolaganyo ya dibaka, bonno le pusoselegae; (5) Go nna seoposengwe le go babalela baagi; (6) Mmuso o nang le bokgoni o nang le maitsholo a siameng le o tlisang tlhabologo; le (7) Aforika o botoka le lefatshe le le botoka, gammogo le dikgato tsa go tlisa tharabololo tse di tshwanang le tse di tlhalositsweng tsa pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e dirilweng mo dintlheng tse di neng di beilweng tsa paka e sekasekwang.

src_text: Sikhombela woke umphakathi ukuthi ulime indimawo ngokugcina abantwabethu baphephile soke isikhathi.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape nopotse le dintlha tse go santseng go saletswe morago mo go tsona ka ntlha ya leroborobo la COVID-19 tse go tlhokwang gore go samaganwe le tsona..     Ditona di tla tshwara dikopano le bobegakgang mo dibekeng tse di tlang go tlhalosa ka botlalo se dipegelo tseno di buang ka sona mmogo le go neelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga dintlha tse di santseng di tlhoka go gagamadiwa     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
Khonferense ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle (BIEC).

src_text: Abantwana abangaphasi kweminyaka eli-18 abakavunyelwa ukungena emathaveni, esipotini, eendaweni zokuditjha ngotjwala kunye neentolo ezithengisa utjwala.
tgt_text: BIEC ya ntlha tla tshwarelwa kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Sandton kwa Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Phukwi.

src_text: Abathengisi botjwala abazakutholakala bephula imithetho le kufuze babotjhelwe ukwenza ubulelesi, bemukwe namalayisensabo wokuthengisa nokusebenza ngotjwala.

tgt_text: Khonferense eno tshwarwa morago ga gore puso ngwaga ono sa le gale thankgolole Lephata la Kemonokeng ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle, le maitlhomo lona leng go tshegetsa beng ba diintaseteri ba bathobantsho gore ba kgone go rekisetsa mebaraka mentšhwa, le go thusiwa ka ditšhelete tsa dikgwebo tse di gwebang le dinaga tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go thusiwa le ka dirala tsa go bapatsa dikgwebo tsa bona     Molaetsa.

src_text: Umphumela Womhlangano Weenkhulu Wabarholi Besiqhema Samazwe We-G.      UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ube yingcenye yomHlangano weenKhulu wabaRholi be-G7 ebewubanjelwe e-Bavaria, eJarimani ngoMvulo nakama-27 kuMgwengweni wee-.
tgt_text: DikakgoloKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: Springboks, ka phenyo e gapileng maikutlo ya motsotso wa bofelo kgatlhanong le Wales ka nako ya motshameko wa ntlha wa meraro ya teko kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Loftus Versveld kwa Tshwane ka Lamatlhatso, 2 Phukwi.

src_text: UMengameli – ohlanganyele nabanye eenqhenyaneni zokubonisana ngetlayimethi, iimbaseli, zepilo, ukutholakala nokuvikeleka kokugoma ephasini kunye neendaba zokulinganiseka kobulili – umenywe msingathi womhlangano lo, u-Chancellor Olaf Scholz.
tgt_text: Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya bona ya dino di le pedi go le nngwe mo motshamekong wa bona wa pulo ya metshameko ya Sejana sa Metshameko ya Kgwele ya Dinao ya Basadi sa Dinaga tsa Aforika kgatlhanong le Nigeria e tshwaretsweng kwa nageng ya Morocco, ka Mosupologo, 4 Phukwi     Go Thapiwa    Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang..     Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana jaaka Modulasetilo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dilothari..     Moatefokate Rory Voller jaaka Mokhomišinara wa khomišene ya Dithoto le Dithata tsa Ditlamo (CIPC).

src_text: Zegezi.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele amagadango wokungena hlangana kombuso ekurarululeni umraro omkhulukazi wokutlhayela kwegezi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke puso go samagana le mathata motlakase naga.

src_text: Amagadango angeneleleko la avula indlela yokwehlisa izinga lokucinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga, kutjhugululwe indlela yokusebenza kilomkhakha wegezi khona kuzakufikelelwa ubujamo bokufumaneka kwegezi ngendlela enzinzileko.Ukusekela isiphehligezi nokusiza ilizwe lekhethu ekufunyaneni igezi kabudisi, sidinga ukunciphisa izinga lokusetjenziswa kwegezi okuzii-6000 zamamegawathi eenyangeni ezintathu ezizako..  Izakhamuzi zingafaka isandla ekongeni igezi ngokuhlala bacima amalampa angasetjenziswako neesetjenziswa ezisebenzisa igezi enengi ngeenkhathi lapho igezi isetjenziswa khulu khona.
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno tsa botlhokwa di tlhagola tsela ya go fokotsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase, go fetola lephata la motlakase le go dira gore setlwaedi sa go tlhaela motlakase nne selo sa mo malobeng.

src_text: Amabhizinisi ayakhuthazwa ukwamukela ithekhnoloji eyonga igezi nawo azibandakanye ekuphumeleliseni amano wokwehlisa isidingo esiphezulu segezi..  I-Operation Vulindlela  .
tgt_text: Go tshegetsa mafaratlhatlha motlakase le go thusa naga ya rona gore se imelwe ke tlamelo ya motlakase, re tlhoka go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase ya setšhaba ka dimekawate di le 600 mo dikgweding di le tharo tse di tlang..   Malapa ka nna le seabe mo go somareleng motlakase ka go tima mabone a sa dirisiweng le didiriswa tsa motlakase tse di jang motlakase montsi ka dinako tse motlakase dirisiwang ka bontsi.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele iragelophambili eyenziweko ngaphasi kwejima le-Operation Vulindlela ukususa iinqabo emikhakheni yezamandla, umthangalasisekelo wezokuthintana nemikhakha yezamanzi nezevakatjhobukela ngomnqopho wokuvuselela umnotho.
tgt_text: Dikgwebo di rotloediwa go dirisa thekenoloji e sa diriseng motlakase montsi mo ditirong tsa tsona tsa tlhagiso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tsa go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase..   Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Sele kufikelelwe ngepumelelo ematjhugulukweni alithoba kama-26, kanti ali-11 wawo amatjhuguluko la akhamba kuhle.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse kgatelopele e dirilweng ka fa tlase ga Operation Vulindlela ya go tlosa dikgoreletsi mo maphateng motlakase mafaratlhatlha ditlhaeletsano, le metsi le bojanala mo go tsosolosenga ikonomi.

src_text: Ipumelelo ifaka hlangana ukukhuliswa komthamo wokunikelwa kwamalayisensi wokusatjalalaliswa kweensetjenziswa zegezi, ukwakhiwa kabutjha kweBandla le-Transnet leenTetjhi zemiKhumbi leliZweloke, ukutjhatjhululwa kwerhelo lamakgonofundwa aqakathekileko nokusetjenziswa kwehlelo le-e-Visa emazweni ali-14’ kufaka hlangana amazwe amakhulu amatjha kezevakatjhobukelo anjenge-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  INturhu Eqothele Bobulili Obuthileko Nokubulawa Kwabasikazi (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Go fitlheletswe diphetogo tsa ikonomi di le robongwe go tswa mo go di le 26, mme mo diphetogong di le 11 go na le kgatelopele e namatshang.

src_text: Ikhabinethi iveze ukusilingeka kwayo ngesehlakalo samhlapha sokugagadlhelwa kwabantu bengubo ababunane e-Krugersdorp, e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Dikatlego di akaretsa go oketsa palo ya dilaesense tsa tlhagiso e golaganeng le phatlalatso, go fetolelwa ga Bothati jwa Maemelakepe Bosetšhaba Transnet go nna setlamo se se ikemetseng, go gololwa ga lenane le le sekasekilweng la dikgono tsa botlhokwa le tsenyotirisong ya tsamaiso ya e-Visa mo dinageng di le 14, go akarediwa mebaraka megolo mentšhwa ya bajanala tshwana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..   Go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Batho ba Bomme (GBVF).

src_text: Izenzwezi zelunya nokuhlukunyezwa kwabomma ziqalela phasi ifundiso yethu yokuziphatha emphakathini.
tgt_text: Kabinete gagamaditswe tota ke ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tsa mo malobeng tsa go betelelwa ga basadi ba le robedi kwa Krugersdorp, kwa Gauteng.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibuke godu iButho lamaPholisa weSewula Afrika ngokubopha msinyana abasolwa abathinteka ezenzwezi zelunyezi..  Ikhabinethi ikhombele imiphakathi ukusebenzisana nabathobelisimthetho ngokuthi babelane ngelwazi elidingekako ukubika izenzo ezisolisako.
tgt_text: Ditiragatso tseno tse di bosula le tsa go bogisa batho ba bomme di nyatsa botho ba rona.

src_text: Ngokubambisana, singenzela abomma nabentwana imiphakathi ephephileko..  Woke amaSewula Afrika anesibopho sokuphikisana nezenzo zabaphehlinturhu ngokulandela umthetho.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse gape le Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa ka go tshwara ka bonako babelaelwa ba le mmalwa malebana le tiragalo eno e setlhogo..     Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dirisana le sepodisi ka go ba loma tsebe gongwe go ba begela ka ditiragalo tse di belaetsang.

src_text: Bika ngezehlakalo ze-GBVF esitetjhini samapholisa sangekhenu namkha udosele inomboro yokuBika ngobuLelesi yasimahla ku-0860 01 0111, iSentha eLwisana nobuLelesi be-GBVF ku-0800 428 428 namkha udosele umTato weSizo ngokuPhelisa iNturhu ku-0800 150. .
tgt_text: Fa re dira mmogo, re ka dira gore mo metseng re tswang kwa go yona basadi le bana ba rona ba nne ba babalesegile..     MoAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe na le maikarabelo go tsaya dikgato tsa molao kgatlhanong le ditlhokotsebe.

src_text: INyanga yaboMma.
tgt_text: Bega ditiragalo tsotlhe tse di amanang le GBVF kwa seteišeneng sa mapodisi sa kgaolo o nnang kwa go yona gongwe letsetse nomoro ya mahala ya Crime Stop: mo go 08600 10111, gongwe letsetse Tikwatikwe ya Bosetšhaba ya go Lwantshana le GBVF: mog go 0800 428 428 gongwe letsetse Mogala wa Thuso ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa ga Batho ba Bomme: mo go 0800 150. .

src_text: NgeNyanga yaboMma egidingwa qobe mnyaka ngoRhoboyi kuhlonitjhwa abomma abazibandakanya emzabalazweni wetjhaphuluko nabo boke abomma abenza umehluko emiphakathini yekhethu..  INyanga yaboMma yanonyaka igidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “AmaLungelo waboMma wezeHlalakuhle newezomNotho nokubaThuthukisa: Ukwakhela aboMma kabuTjha nokuQinisa Ukusimelela Kwabo” – Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..  Bangaphezu kwee-20 000 abomma abamatjhela e-Union Buildings ePitori mhlana ali-9 kuRhoboyi we-1956 bafaka isandla ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunikelwa kwaboMma amandla kezomnotho kuhlala kuliqalontangi eSewula Afrika ebuswa ngokwentando yenengi.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.

src_text: Izenzo zabo zesibindi zakhuthaza abomma ukuthatha isikhundla sabo epalamende, kurhulumende neenhlanganweni zomphakathi begodu sakhela kilepumelelo selokhu safumana itjhaphuluko ngomnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phatwe tlotla basadi ba ba nnileng le seabe mo kgaratlhong ya kgololesego le basadi botlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona..   Kgwedi ya Basadi monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ditshwanelo le Maatlafatso ya Basadi mo Ikonoming le mo Setšhabeng: Re aga Botoka go Tokafatsa go Tsosologa ga Basadi”..   Basadi ba feta 20 000 ba ba gwantetseng kwa Union Buildings kwa Pretoria ka la bo 9 Phatwe 1956 ba akgetse mo go netefatseng gore tekatekano ya bong le maatlafatso di tswelela go nna ditlapele tse botlhokwa mo Aforika Borweng wa temokerasi.

src_text: Isikhumbuzo Sebangamatlhuwo ye-Marikana.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa bona tsa bopelokgale di rotloeditse basadi ka kakaretso go tsaya manno a ba siametseng mo Palamenteng, mo pusong le mo setšhabeng, mme re tswelela go agelela mo ditswelelopeleng tseno fa sale re bona kgololesego ka.

src_text: NgeLesibili, mhlana ali-16 kuRhoboyi wee-2022, urhulumende wahlanganyela nelizwe loke ekukhumbuleni ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeka e-Marikana eseTlhagwini Tjingalanga ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Segopotso sa Marikana.

src_text: Ubuhlungu babasebenzi, imindenabo nesitjhaba soke buzakuhlala buyingcenye yomlando welizwe lekhethu..  Ihlelo lokuVuselela i-Marikana sele lihlonyiwe ukwakha kabutjha nokwenza ubujamo obamukelekako ukuthuthukisa ihlalakuhle yomphakathi we-Marikana.
tgt_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phatwe 2022, puso tshwaragane le naga yotlhe go ikgopotsa matlhotlhapelo a diragetseng kwa Marikana kwa Bokone Bophirima ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Ngomnyaka ophelileko urhulumende walilisa imindeni yabongazimbi ngemali eziingidi ezili-R176 begodu imilandu esaleleko esatjhutjhiswako kulindeleke bona iqedelelwe ekupheleni kwakaRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Kutlobotlhoko e utlwilweng ke badiri, bamalapa bona le setšhaba ka kakaretso tla nna le mo hisetoring ya rona..   Lenaneo la Ntšhwafatso ya Marikana le tsentswe tirisong go aga sešwa le go dira gore go nne le seemo se se kgontshang go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba Marikana.

Ngogola puso duetse R176 milione le tlhatswadiatla ya malapa batswasetlhabelo mme go solofetswe gore dikgetse tse di setseng ga jaana tse di mo dikgatong tsa semolao di konosediwe kwa bokhutlong jwa Phatwe.

src_text: Isibalo esithileko seenkumba ezivuselelweko namkha eziqeda ukuthengwa zinikelwe abahlolokazi be-Marikana kanti ezinye zizokuphela ukwakhiwa nonyaka.
Iphrojekthi yokwakha izindlu ebiza iingidi ezima-R700 izokwenza abasebenzi beemayini banikelwa iinkumba ezithe tjha.
tgt_text: Go neetswe batlholagadi ba Marikana matlo le mmalwa a ntšhwafaditsweng le a rekilweng mme mangwe tla konosediwa monongwaga.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo oqakathekileko wezehlalakuhle uyanikelwa ukuthuthukisa ubujamo bokuhlala kwemiphakathi eyakhele iimayini..  Imbizo kaMengameli Emayelana neHlelo lokuThuthukisa Iiyingi (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Porojeke ya matlo ya R700 milione tla dira gore badiri ba meepo ba tlamelwe ka matlo a nang le seriti.

src_text: Ngemva kokubanjwa ngepumelelo kweeMbizo zikaMengameli ezethula i-DDM amahlandla amathathu eTlhagwini Tjingalanga, eFreyistata neMpumalanga ngokulandelana, uMasipala wesiYingi se-Sedibeng ubambe Imbizo yesine NgeLesihlanu, nakali-12 kuRhoboyi wee-..  Ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ungatjhiyi Namunye Ngemva”, UMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wadosa phambili isiqhema sabajameli abaziimphathimandla zikarhulumende welizwe, beemfunda nebeendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Go tlamelwa ka mafaratlhatlha botlhokwa loago go tokafatsa seemo sa botshelo sa baagi ba kwa meepong.

src_text: AmaSewula Afrika ngokuhlukahlukana kwamakoro wawo akhuthazwa ukubambisana ekulwisaneni namazinga akhulako womtlhago nokudobha phasi ukungabi nobuyo okubangelwa bujamo bezomnotho obubudisi..  IsiYingi se-Sedibeng sesibe neragelo phambili ekusebenziseni ngokomthetho iinZinda zomNotho eziKhethekileko (ama-SEZ) zomlambo i-Vaal, ekungizo ezinekghono lokuvuselela amabubulo werijini, isifunda newelizwe.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Tshwaretsweng kwa Gauteng e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo mo Dikgaolong (DDM).

src_text: I-SEZ yomLambo i-Vaal ihlala ikukwamukela imikhakha eqakathekileko elandelako: IDrobha eHle (i-Vaal River Smart City); isiKhungo esiTjheja iKghono leBhoduluko; isikhungo semikhiqizo yebange; iinsetjenziswa zezokulima; idrobha emagega nedoyelo leemphaphamtjhini; isiqetjhana sokudoya kwaboflayi abancani; imithwalo ekhamba ngesiphaphamtjhini nomkhakha ovuselelweko wesimbi.
