tgt_text: Go latela katlego ya di-Imbizo tsa Moporesidente di le tharo tse di neng di tshwaretswe kwa Bokone Bophirima, Foreisetata le Mpumalanga, ka tatelano ya tsona, Lekgotlatoropo la Kgaolo la Sedibeng kwa Gauteng le ne la amogela legato la bone ka Labotlhano, 12 Phatwe..   Ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baemedi ba batlhankedibagolwane go tswa kwa pusong ya bosetšhaba, ya porofense le ya selegae.

MaAforika Borwa go tswa kwa maphateng a farologaneng ne rotloediwa go dira mmogo kgatlhanong le seelo se se golang sa lehuma le khumanego tse di bakwang ke maemo a gwetlhang ikonomi..   Kgaolo ya Sedibeng nnile le tswelelopele ka go dirisa Kgaolo ya Ikonomi e Kgethegileng ya Vaal River (SEZ) e nang le bokgoni jwa go fetolela kgaolo eo, porofense le naga go nna ya madirelo gape.

src_text: UmButhano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle.
tgt_text: Maikaelelo Vaal River SEZ ke go amogela maphata a latelang botlhokwa: Vaal River Smart City ntšhwa, Kutla ya Green Hydrogen Innovation; kutla ya motekwane/khanabisi; tsamaiso ya dithoto tsa temothuo (agro-logistics); eroteropolisi; boemelafofanepotlana; thomelothoto ka difofane le lephata le le tsosolositsweng la tlhagiso ya tshipi.

src_text: Umbuthano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle owabanjelwa Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng ukusuka  nakama-4 ukuya nakama-5 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ukukhuthaza ukubuyisana ngokuPhumelelisa ukuzibandakanya kwemiPhakathi ngezeHlalakuhle nezoMnotho”, wahlanganisa abalimindima beenkhungo ezihlukileko ukusebenzisana norhulumende ukutjheja iintjhijilo zezehlalakuhle nezomnotho nokufumanela imiphakathi iinsetjenziswa, hlangana neminye iminqopho..  Umhlangano lo watjheja imibiko yemikhulumiswano yeemfunda zolithoba mayelana neentjhijilo zazo, ezifaka hlangana ukufikeleleka kwesizo leemali, iindaba zokulawula, ukutjhugululwa komkhakha wezehlalakuhle ngomnqopho wokukhuthaza itjhebiswano lombuso nomphakathi ukuqalana nemiraro yomtlhago, ukungalingani nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi..  Ikhabinethi ikhombele iinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukulima indima eqinileko ekwakheni ikusasa elingcono, njengombana lokho kusehlelweni lomTlamo wokuThuthukiswa kweliZweloke: ngeNembombono yomNyaka wee-  IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
ITlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko, zobuKghwari nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukusetjenziswa kwetlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 4 go fitlha ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Go Diragatsa Dikgato tsa go Tshwaraganya Setšhaba go Dira gore Baagi ba nne le Seabe mo Ditiragalong tsa go tswa Baagi Thuso tse di Nang le Seabe mo Ikonoming” kopantse batho botlhe ba ba amegang go tswa kwa dikhutlong tsotlhe tsa naga tse di nang le seabe mo mererong ya mothale ono, gore ba tle go dirisana mmogo le puso go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi mme gareng ga maikemisetso mangwe mantsi, le go batlela mekgatlho ya go ema baagi nokeng didirisiwa tsotlhe tse di tlhokang go thusa baagi..     Samiti sekasekane le dipegelo tsa dipuisano go tswa kwa diporofenseng di le robongwe malebana le dikgwetlho tsa tsona, tse di akareditseng tlamelo ya matlole, matsapa melawanataolo, go fetola lekala la go tswa baagi thuso ka maikaelelo go dira gore go nne le tirisanommogo magareng ga puso le mekgatlo ya baagi go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di amanang le lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatiro..   Kabinete ikuetse kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi le mo baaging go nna le seabe se se tlhaga go netefatsa gore re aga isago e botoka, jaaka go elediwa mo Leanong la Tlhabololo ya Naga: Mo ponelopeleng ya   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Itlhatlheli litjheja ubukghwari obubukelwako, imisebenzi elukwako, yemigwalo neyeembikiindaba; okubukelwako nokuthintana ngeensetjenziswa; ukugwala nobukghwari; imidlalo nokugidinga, kufaka hlangana umbhino, ukugadangiswa kwemitlolo..  Lelitlhatlha lizokungenelela kilemikhakha mayelana nokwakha umkhakha wobukghwari obutjhugululiweko obuzokwamukelwa godu bube sezingeni lephasiloke ehlangothinelo.
tgt_text: Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi.

src_text: Lizokusiza ibubulo lezobugwali nezobukghwari leSewula Afrika lifikelele amamakethe wangekhaya newangaphetjheya..  UmThethomtlamo Obuyekeziweko wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali Zobujamo Oburhabako.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi gore tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele iinkhibelelo zomthethomtlamo wamva nje wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali zobuJamo obuRhabako.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tsepamisitse mogopolo mo tirong ntle ya ditshwantsho le dibidio; ya go bopa le go betla; ya dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le ya metlotlo; ya ditirelo tsa mebetlo le tsa boitlhamedi; ya go diragatsa le ya go keteka, go akarediwa le ya mmino, ya go phasalatsa le ya dikgatiso..   Leano leno le tla tswela maphata ano mosola mo go direng gore re nne le lekala le le fetogileng le le kgonang go itlhamela le go itshimololela dilo le le tla tlhomphiwang mo lefatsheng le go gaisana le mangwe mo lekaleng leno.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zinqophene khulu nengcenye yokubolekwa kweemali.
tgt_text: Le tla tswela mosola intaseteri ya boitlhamedi ya Aforika Borwa gore kgone go fitlhelela mebaraka ya ka fa nageng le ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: Hlangana neenkhibelelo ezihlongozwako ngokwethula isikhathi sokuboleka eseluliweko ukukhambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwepahla esekelwe ngeemali.
Iinkhibelelwezi godu zihlathulula indima yamaziko asiza ngeemali kezokubolekisa ngeemali kibomasipala.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.

src_text: IsiGaba sama-230 somThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika womnyaka we-1996 unikela abomasipala igunya lokuboleka iimali zokuqalana neeNdleko zabo.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.

src_text: Umtlamo wokuthoma wavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukuhlahla isiGaba sesiThandathu nese-13 somThetho wokuphathwa kweeMali zikaMasipala wee-2003 (UmThetho Nomboro 56 womNyaka wee-2003).
tgt_text: Dikarolo tseno tota di mo karolong ya madi dikadimo mo leanong leno.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ezivunyelweko zinqophe ukuthokoza ababolekisi kumakethe yabomasipala kodwana kuragwe ukulandela imigomo ekhambisana nokuboleka iimali kwabomasipala.
tgt_text: Mo dikarolong tseno, go tshitshintswe gore go atisewe paka ya go duelela madi a adimilweng gore tsamaelana le paka ya tse dingwe tsa dithoto tse di rekilweng ka tšhelete eo.
Dikarolo tseno gape di tlhalosa seabe sa ditheo tsa ditšhelete tsa tlhabololo mo go adimeng dimasepala matlole.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi  kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 naya dimasepala dithata tsa go adima tšhelete ya ditshenyegelo tsa tsona.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la ntlhantlha le amogetswe ke Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2000 go kaela Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa ke go dira gore baadimi ba bangwe ba bantsinyana mo mebasepaleng ba bone merokotso fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe di tswelela go se setise dintlha tse di botlhokwa tsa dikadimo tsa dimasepala..   Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.

src_text: Lokhu kunqotjhwe ngakho ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokukhutjhelwa kwelizwe iimbalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe mnyaka.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi okutjhukunyiswako kulethwe kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ekoteni yokuthoma kwathi kwekota yesibili kwasiwa kuSinyikhaba wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara nngwe le nngwe di ka phasaladiwa.

src_text: Iimbalobalo zobulelesi zekota yesithathu zizokukhutjhwa ngoMhlolanja wee-2023 kuthi zekota yesine ngoMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Seno ke go fetola nako gore se tshwane le ya mo ngwageng o fetileng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa naga.
Nako e tshitshintsweng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi pele ga nako ke Phatwe 2022 malebana le kotara ya ntlha le Ngwanaitseele 2022 malebana le kotara ya bobedi.

src_text: UkuPheliswa Kwesikhathi Sobujamo Behlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD).
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone di tla phasaladiwa ka Tlhakole le Motsheganong 2023, ka tatelano ya tsona..   Go Khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuqedwa kwesikhathi sobuJamo beHlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa ngemva kweenkhulula ePumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu-Natala..  I-NSoD yaphelelwa sikhathi mhla ali-18 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngemva kokwelulwa kwayo kusukela mhla ali-18 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse kgato ya go khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD) jaaka ne ya tsenngwa tirisong morago ga merwalela e sentseng thata kwa Kapa Botlhaba le KwaZulu-Natal..   NSoD khutlile ka la bo 18 Phatwe 2022 go latela gore atolosediwe nako ka la bo 18 Phukwi.

src_text: Ukwelulwa kwesikhathi sehlekelele kwenziwa kuyelelwe isidingo sokuraga nokuqinisa amagadango wanje athethwe maphiko wombuso ukuqalana nomthelela wobujamo bezulu obumbi eemfundeni ezithintekileko..  IKhabinethi ivumile ukuthi ubujamo banje abusavumelani namagadango aqinileko njengamaphiko wombuso, amakhampani wangeqadi neenhlangano zomphakathi ezizokuraga ngawo ukufumana isizo, ukuvuselelwa kwepahla nokwakha kabutjha  ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Go atolosediwa nako gono ne le ka ntlha ya fa go ne go santse go na le tlhokagalo ya gore go tswelele go tshegetsa dikgato tse di leng teng tsa go samagana le ditiragalo tse di diragaditsweng ke dikarolo tsa puso go fokotsa le go samagana le ditlamorago tsa ditiragalo tsa ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo ka ntlha ya maemo bosa kwa diporofenseng tse di amegileng..   Kabinete dumelane gore maemo ga jaana ga sa tlhole tlhoka gore go nne le dikgato tse di kgethegileng ka ntlha ya fa dikarolo tsa puso, lephata la poraefete le baagi ba tla kgona go netefatsa gore ba tsweletsa dikgato tsa go thusa, go busetsa sekeng le go aga sešwa   Melaotlhomo.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwePahla.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwepahla wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa ngwaga wa 2020 ka romelwa kwa Palamenteng gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komthethomlingwa lo ngoMgwengweni wee-..  Iinkhibelelo ezitjhukunyiswako zizokuphumelelisa ubunikazi benarha okusemthethweni kusiGaba sama-25(6) womThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka Seetebosigo 2020 ne ya letlelela gore molaotlhomo ono ka romelwa lekgetlo le lengwe gape kwa baaging gore ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela ukubuthelelwa kweembalobalo mayelana nombala, ubulili, ubakhamuzi babanikazi bamalungelo wenarha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di tla dira gore ditshwanelo tsa go nna le lefatshe nne selo sa boammaruri se se sireleditsweng semolao ke Karolo ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: Isiqalelelwesi sizokusiza  lokha nakutjhuguluwa ubunikazi benarha..  UmThethomlingwa we-Ejensi yemiThombo nomThangalasisekelo waManzi  (i-NWRIA) wee-.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono dira gore jaanong go kokoanngwa ga dipalopalo malebana le lotso, bosetšhaba le boagi jwa batshodi ba ditshwanelo tsa lefatshe mo Aforika Borwa nne selo se se kgonagalang.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa i-NWRIA womnyaka wee-2022 isikhathi esingaba malanga amatjhumi alithoba (90) ukobana kuvezwe imibono ngawo.
tgt_text: Kgaolo eno tla dira gore mo isagong go nne bonolo go kwala dipegelo tse di nepagetseng tsa boruni jwa lefatshe le tsa tshekatsheko ya lefatshe fa re lekola diphetogo mo go nneng beng ba lefatshe..   Molaotlhomo wa Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlamelo tsa Metsi (NWRIA) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukuhlonywa kwe-NWRIA ezokuqalana nokuhlela, isekelo leemali nokuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo welizwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo wa NWRIA wa 2022 ka phasaladiwa sebaka sa malatsi le 90 gore setšhaba se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga ona.

src_text: Izokuqalana godu nokutjhejwa komthangalasisekelo wamanzi.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe setheo sa NWRIA se se tla rwalang maikarabelo go rulaganya, go tlamela ka ditšhelete le go tlhabolola mafaratlhatlha metsi mo nageng.

src_text: I-ejensi izokuqinisekisa ukufumaneka okuragako nokunzinzileko kwamanzi ngokukhambisana neembopho zomthethosisekelo zokufumaneka kwamanzi nebhoduluko elinepilo.
tgt_text: Gape se tla bo se na le maikarabelo go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a leng teng metsi.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuhlonywa ibe liZiko lomBuso ngaphasi kweShejuli yesiBili yomThetho wokuPhathwa kweeMali zomBuso we-1999 (umThetho Nomboro 1 ka-1999).
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla tshwanela ke go netefatsa gore go nna le tlamelo e sa kgaotseng ya metsi e rebolang metsi ka go lekalekana le e go tsamaisana le maitlamo molaotheo gore batho ba tshwanetswe go tlamelwa ka metsi le tikologo e babalesegileng mme itekanetse.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuthatha ilawulo lemisebenzi eyenziwa njenganje yi-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  IsiKhibelelo Somthethomlingwa Wamagunya NemiSebenzi YaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla tlhomiwa go nna Setheo sa Puso ka fa tlase ga Šejule 2 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Puso, wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 1 wa 1999).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla rwala ditiro tse ga jaana di rwelweng ke Bothati jwa Trans-Caledon Tunnel..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ukhibelela umThetho wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala womNyaka wee-2007 (umThetho Nomboro 12 wee-2007).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa 2022 isiwe kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zilawula amagunya wabomasipala ekuthuthukisweni kwehlelo lokubhadelwa kweemali mayelana nokwenziwa kweembawo ezithunyelwa kibomasipala.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono baakanya Molao wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007)..     Dikarolo tseno tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di laola maatla dimasepala go lefisa ditefiso tsa tlhabololo malebana le dikopo tsa tlhabololo ya lefatshe tse di neelwang dimasepala.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zizokuqinisekisa ukuthi abomasipala bahlawulisa ngefanelo, tjhatjhalazi nangokulungileko.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tseno di tla netefatsa gore dimasepala di dirisa ditefiso tseno kwa ntle ga go tsaya letlhakore, kwa ntle ga bofitlha le ka tshwanelo.

src_text: IKhabinethi yavumela ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa lo ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2020 neile tetla ya gore Molaotlhomo ono ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..     Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa.
Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore Melao le supa kwalolwe sešwa leng (1) Molao wa Letlole la Diphenšene la Ditheo tse di Dirang Tiro ya Mothale oo, wa ngwaga wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41, wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole, wa ngwaga wa 1976 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Badiri ba Puso wa ngwaga wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Khomišene ya Ditšhelete le Taolo ya Matlole, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1996); (5) Molao wa Banka ya Lefatshe le Tlhabololo ya Temothuo, wa ngwaga wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2021, (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di akaretsa tse di leng ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole wa 1996, tse di ka ga go akarediwa mo diphenšeneng tsa masole balekane ba masole gore le bona ba natholelwe ditshiamelo tsa bona mme go tla tsewa gore seno se tla diragadiwa go tloga ka letlha la bo 27 Moranang.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukukhitjelelwa kwemiThetho elikhomba, elandelako (1) i-Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act ka-1963 (umThetho Nomboro 41 wee-1963); (2) umThetho womHlalaphasi wamaJoni (i-Military Pension Act)  womNyaka we-1976 (umthetho Nomboro 84  we-1976); (3) UmThetho wezomHlalaphasi wabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende we-1996; (4) UmThetho wezeeMali neweKomitjhini eLuleka ngeeMali (i-Financial and Fiscal Commission Act) we-1997 (umthetho Nomboro 99 we-1997); (5) UmThetho wokuThuthukiswa kweBhanga yezokuLima neNarha wee-2002 (umThetho Nomboro 15 wee-2002); (6) UmThetho wokuLawula abaHloliincwadi (i-Audit Profession Act) wee-2005 (umthetho Nomboro 26 wee-2005);  (7) nesiKhibelelo somThetho oLawula abaHloliincwadi wee-2021 (umThetho Nomboro 5 wee-2021)..  Iinkhibelelo ezihlongozwako zifaka hlangana, ngaphasi komThetho woMhlalaphasi wamaJoni womnyaka we-1996, ukufakwa kwabalingani abangakathathani babe bazuzi ukuthoma emva mhla ama-27 kuSihlabantangana womnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa melao ya diphenšene di tla dira gore ka gangwe balekane ba masole ba natholelwe merokotso ya diphenšene fa ba tswa mo kgolaganong ya lenyalo.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo zomthetho womhlalaphasi zizokusiza abalingani ukufumana inzuzo khonokho nakutjhatjalaliswa umtjhado.
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga go sedifatsa seabe sa Tona ya Ditšhelete mo boruning, ntlha nngwe e kwalolotsweng sešwa ke e mabapi le go oketsa dithata tsa komiti ya kgalemo ya baruni fa moruni amogetse molato.

src_text: Ngaphezu kokuhlathulula indima kaNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali nekuhlolweni kweencwadi, iinkhibelelwezi zihlalisa kuhle igunya lekomiti lapho umhloliincwadi avuma khona umlandu.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono phasaladitswe ka Ferikgong 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo wakhutjhelwa emphakathini ngoMhlolanja wee-2022 ukobana kuvezwe imibono.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

Molaotlhomo ono ke Molaotlhomo o kwalolang sešwa letlotlo la Melao e farologaneng leng  Molao wa Setheo sa go Lwantsha Bogodu jwa Ditšhelete, wa ngwaga wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Ditheo tse di sa Direng Letseno, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Dithoto tsa Terasete, wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1998); (iv) Molao wa Ditlamo, wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao wa Lephata la Melawana ya Ditšhelete wa ngwaga wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017).

src_text: IsiKhibelelo semiThetho eVamileko (Ukulwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela  amaVukelambuso ngeeMali) wee-.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsibogela makoa a nopotsweng ke dinaga tsa balekane mo Letsholong la Setlhopha sa Ditiro tsa go Tsaya Dikgato mo Mererong ya Ditšhelete (FATF).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wemiThetho eVamileko (UkuLwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela amaVukelambuso ngeeMali).
tgt_text: Pegelo eno dirile ditshitshinyo di le 40 tse di tla thusang go dira gore Aforika Borwa tsamaisane le dikgato tsa boditšhabatšhaba tsa go lwantshana le go tlhatswiwa ga tšhelete le go tlamela ka ditšhelete mekgatlo ya menolopuso..   Go fitlhetswe gore Aforika Borwa na le makoa mo dikarolong di le.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ungomumethe eminye imiThethomlingwa nokhibelela imithetho yanje ebizwa  umThetho weSentha yobuHloli bezeeMali wee-2001 (umThetho Nomboro 38 wee-2001); (ii) UmThetho weenHlangano eziNgasebenzeli  iNzuzo we-1997 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-1997); (iii) UmThetho oLawula iPahla eHlanganyelweko (i-Trust Property Control Act) we-1988 (umThetho Nomboro 57 we-1988) (iv) UmThetho wamaKhampani wee-2008 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-2008) no  umThetho oLawula amaZiko wezeeMali (i-Financial Sector Regulations Act) wee-2017 (umThetho Nomboro 9 wee-2017).
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono samagana le dikarolo di ka nna 14 tsa tse di nopotsweng.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ziphendula ukutlhayelelwa okutshwaywe lokha nakuhlolwa ikghono lamazwe alinganako siQhema sokuSetjenziswa kweeMali (i-FATF).
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa sa le ntse le tokololo ya FATF fa sale ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ngokuzinikela uveze iintjhukumiso ezima-40 ezizokusiza ukuthi iSewula Afrika ikhambisane namazinga wamazwe ngamazwe wokulwisana nokukhukhuthiswa kweemali nokusekela iinhlangano zamavukelambuso..  ISewula Afrika yafunyanwa itlhayelelwa khulu emikhakheni ema-.
UmThethomlingwa lo utjheja imikhakha eli-14 kekhonjiweko.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: ISewula Afrika solo yathoma ukuba lilunga le-FATF ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamente go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.. Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi, wa ngwaga wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) dira gore go tlhagisa le go tlamela ka sere sepe se se akareditsweng ka fa tlase ga Šejule 1 le Šejule 2 ya Molao ono go tsewe le tlolo ya molao..   Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di samagana le Karolo ya bo 63 go fitlhetsweng gore ga tsamaisane le molaotheo malebana le gore Tona neelwa dithata tsa go baakanya dišejule kwa ntle le go di fetisa mo matlhong batlhankedi ba setheo sa peomolao.

Ka ngwaga wa 2020, Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo rebotse katlholo ya gore Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa 1992 ga tsamaisane le molaotheo mme ne ya beela thoko go tsenngwa tirisong ga katlholo eno go fitlha ka la bo 17 Sedimonthole 2022 go naya Palamente nako gore baakanye phoso eno   Tiragalo e Tlang.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa Olwisana Nokukhukhuthiswa Kweendakamizwa wee-.
tgt_text: Kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ngePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa wee-2022 kobana uhlaliswe kuhle.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla amogela kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 kwa Motse Kapa magareng ga la bo 9 le la bo 11 Lwetse.

src_text: UmThetho olwisana neenDakamizwa nokuKhukuthiswa kwazo wee-1992 (umthetho Nomboro 140 we-1992) wenza kube kukwephula umthetho ukukhiqiza nokusabalalisa namkha ngiwuphi umkhiqizo obalwe kuTjhejuli yokuThoma nakuTjhejuli yesiBili yomThetho.
tgt_text: Ke la ntlha metshameko eno tshwarelwa mo kontinenteng ya Aforika mme go tla bo go na le ditlhopha di le 24 tsa banna le di le 16 tsa basadi go tswa lefatsheng ka bophara tse di tla bong di gaisana     Melaetsa.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi ziqalana nokungasebenzi kwesiGaba sama-63, esafunyanwa sitjhayisana nomthethosisekelo mayelana nokunikelwa kukaNgqongqotjhe amalungelo wokukhibelela amatjhejuli ngaphandle kokulandela ikambiso yokutlanywa komthetho.
tgt_text: Go Akgola          Kabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ntlha ya go dira hisetori mo Aforika Borwa le go gapa sekgele sa ntlha sa kgaisano ya Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), kwa makgaolakgannyeng WAFCON ngwaga wa 2022 a neng tshwaretswe kwa Rabat, kwa Morocco ka Lamatlhatso, la bo 23 Phukwi.

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2020, iKhotho yomThethosisekelo yamemezele ukuthi isiGaba sama-63 somThetho olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa womnyaka we-1992 utjhayisana nomthethosisekelo godu wajanyiswa ekusebenzeni ukufikela nakali-17 kuNobayeni wee-2022 ukunikela iPalamende ithuba lokulungisa ubutjhaphobo  Umnyanya Ozako.
tgt_text: Go ntse go le jalo, ba nnile le tshiamelo ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa basadi sa FIFA se se yang go amogelwa ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la bo 20 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 20 Phatwe.

src_text: Iphaliswano lePhasiloke likaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022).
tgt_text: ●  Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa (Team South Africa), ka ntlha ya go gapa dimedale di le 27 mo maphateng a farologaneng kwa Metshamekong ya Commonwealth ya 2022 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Birmingham, Engelane go tloga ka la bo 28 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 8 Phatwe.

src_text: ISewula Afrika izokusingatha iphaliswano lephasiloke likamakhakhularahwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022) eKapa mhla ali-9 namhla ali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Se feletse kwa maemong borobongwe ka dimedale tsa gauta di le supa, tsa selefera di le robongwe le tsa boronse di le.

src_text: Imbedla yemidlalo le izokubanjwa kokuthoma kukhonthinenthi ye-Afrika begodu iinqhema zabaduna ezima-24 nezabasikazi ezili-16 ezivela ephasini jikelele zizabe ziphalisana  Imilayezo.
tgt_text: ●  Basadi ba Springbok, ka phenyo ya bona kgatlhanong le Spain mo metshamekong mebedi ya ntlha ya Motseletsele wa Mariga wa Basadi kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Emirates Airline Park kwa Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), go rwesiwa korone ya Mmabontle wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa yo montšhwa wa ngwaga wa.

src_text: Siyabathokozisa Ikhabinethi ithokozise beyadlulisela neemfiselabuhle zayo kabalandelako: Isiqhema seBholo eRarhwako i-Banyana, ngokwenza umlando ngokuthumba iphaliswano le-Afrika lokuthoma labomma i-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-2022 WAFCON), ephaliswaneni egade libanjwe e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, nakama-23 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka go gapa 2022 AIG Women’s Open mme nna mosadi wa boraro wa Aforika Borwa go gapa bosimega jwa gauta.

src_text: Ngokufanako bebaphumelela ukungenela iPhaliswano leBholo yaboMma lePhasiloke (i-FIFA Women’s World Cup) ezokusingathwa ngokuhlanganyela kwe-Australia ne-New Zealand ukuthoma nakama-20 kuVelabahlinze ukuya nakama-20 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Matshediso Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng le balesika ba: ●  Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), rammino, moopedi le mokwadi wa mmino yo neng tuma fa ene mmogo le ditsala tsa gagwe di le pedi ba ne ba simolola setlhopha sa mmino wa kwaito ka ka ngwaga wa 1996, se se neng se bidiwa TKZee..  Go Thapiwa.

src_text: IsiQhema seSewula Afrika (i-Team South Africa), ngokuthumba iimendlela ezima-27 emikhakheni ehlukahlukileko emidlalweni i-2022 Commonwealth Games ebanjelwe e-Birmingham, e-England ethome mhlana ama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukufikela nakabu-8 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Baqede iphaliswaneli basebujameni bethoba bafumene iimendlela zerhawuda ezilikhomba, ezilithoba ngezesiliva kanti ezili-11 ngezethusi.Isiqhema saboMma sikaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Springbok Women), ngokubetha i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuthoma kuthungelelwano lemidlalo yokulinga emibili i-Winter Test Series, edlalelwa e-Emirates Airline Park ngeJwanisbhege.IKosazana u-Ndavi Nokeri (oneminyaka ema-23), ngokuthumba iphaliswano likaNomhlekhabo weSewula Afrika womNyaka wee-2022 (u-Miss South Afrika 2022).IKosazana Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuthumba i-2022 AIG Women’s Open nokuba mSewula Afrika wesithathu ongumma ukuthumba iphaliswano elingelikhulu likanongorwana werhawuda.
tgt_text: Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Dipatlisiso le Taolo ya Dipholisi kwa Lefapheng la Ditiro tsa Puso le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba (DPWI)..   Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jaaka DDG: Tikwatikwe ya Tsamaiso ya Matlhothapelo Setšhaba kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo..   Rre Adam Mthombeni jaaka DDG: Tirisanommogo mo Ditheong tsa Puso  kwa DPWI.

src_text: Sibalilela Imbiko Ikhabinethi idlulise amezwi wayo wokutjhiriya emndenini nebanganini baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (obekaneminyaka ema-46), umbhini, umkhaleli nomtloli wombhino owaduma lokha yena nabangani bakhe ababili batlama Isiqhema sombhino we-Kwaito ngomnyaka we-1996 esibizwa i-TKZee.

tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.

src_text: Ukuqatjha.
tgt_text: Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jaaka Motlhankedikhuduthamaga wa Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tlhabololo ya Motlakase.

src_text: Koke ukuqatjhwa kulawulwa kufakazeleka kweencwadi zefundo kunye nokuhlanjululwa kwebizo lomuntu okufaneleko.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tse di dirang nako e sa tlalang tsa Bothati jwa Motlakase wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa   Rre Thembani Bukula (Modulasetilo)   Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsamodulasetilo)   Mme Precious Sibiya   Mme Thembeka Semane; lee.

src_text: Iimbalobalo ezimenyezelwe liZiko leemBalobalo (i-StatsSA) zitjengisa ukuthi lapho imisebenzi ivuleke khona ngobunengi ukudlula kezinye iindawo kube seKorweni yemiSebenzi yomPhakathi (276 000), kezeRhwebo (169 000), kezeeMali (128 000) nemaGontrageni (104 000).
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tse di phasaladitsweng mo Dipatlisisong tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS) tse di phasaladitsweng ke ba Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) di bontsha gore ditiro tse dintsi di nnile teng mo Matsholong Ditirelo tsa Baagi (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 276 000), mo Lephateng la Matlole (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 169 000), le mo Dikonterakeng (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 104 000).

Palo ya batho botlhe ba ba nang le ditiro ne tsamaya mo go dimilione di le 15, 6 mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022, mme fa palo eno bapisiwa le mo kotareng e fetileng go bonagala gore palo ya batho ba ba senang ditiro mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022 oketsegile ka 132 000 mme batho ba ba senang ditiro ke ba le kanaka dimilione di le robedi.

src_text: Inani elipheleleko labantu abasebenzako belijame eengidini ezili-15,6 ngekota yesibili yee-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenziko lakhuphuka ngee-132 000 layokuba zii-.
tgt_text: Phokotsego e potlana eno ya botlhokatiro ke selo se segolo se se bontshang gore maiteko puso le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago go godisa ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro tse di tlhokegang simolotse go re tswela mosola.

src_text: 0 yeengidi ngekota yesibili yee-2022, nakulinganiswa nekota yaphambilini.
tgt_text: Seno ke bopaki jwa gore fa re dika tiro mmogo ka go dirisa bokgoni jwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe, re ka kgona go fedisa dikgwetlho tse ikonomi ya rona tobaneng le tsona.

Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya maAforika Borwa jaaka go le boima mo matshelong bona ka ntlha ya dilo tse di bitsang ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo mmogo le dipalo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro.

src_text: Ukukhuphuka kancazana kodwana okukarisako kwaleziimbalobalo, kutjengisa ukuthi ithoma ukuthela iinthelo imizamo karhulumende nabasebenzisani bakhe bomphakathi yokuhlumisa umnotho bekwakhiwe nemisebenzi edingeke khulu.
tgt_text: Re le mmuso o tlhokomelang baagi ba yona, re santse re eme ka le le reng re tla tshwarisana tiro le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya go tlhokomela baagi gore motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe isago ya gagwe nne botoka.
Puso santse eme ka la gore tla rekela dikgwebo tsa ka fa nageng ka go reka didirisiwa le ditirelo mo dikgwebong tsa ka fa nageng ya rona.

src_text: Lobu-ke bufakazi bokuthi nasisebenzisana ngokubambisana soke ngokuhlanganisa amandlethu wokusebenza, singazinqoba iintjhijilo esiqalene nazo emnothweni welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba.
Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale baagi ba kwa Tongaat kwa KwaZulu-Natal ka go senya mafaratlhatlha tikologo eo fa ba ne ba rebotse megwanto ya go lwela metsi.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyawuzwisisa umraro wokujanyelwa ziinhloko kwamaSewula Afrika lokhuya nakalinga ukuphila ipilwawo yangamalanga, ngenca yokudura kwezinto nokukhuphuka kwenani labantu abangasebenziko.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse gore baagi ba theose matshwafo le go nna le pelotelele jaaka ba Setheo sa Ditiro tsa go Tlhatswa Metsi sa Tongaat ba samagane le ditiro tsa go busetsa baagi metsi.

src_text: Njengorhulumende otjhejako, solo sisazibophelele ngokusebenzisana neenhlangano zomphakathi ukwakha ingomuso elingcono kiwo woke umuntu.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya baagi ba ba ntseng ba gelela metsi mo diterokong tse di ba tlisetsang metsi mo metseng fa sale merwalela e gogotseng lefelo leno kwa tshimologong ya monongwaga.

src_text: Urhulumende solo uzibophelele ngokusekela amabhizinisi welizwe lekhethu ngokuthenga ipahla nezenzelwa ezenziwe khona lapha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Le fa go le jalo, tirisodikgoka le go melelana meno ga di kitla di tlisa tharabololo bile gape go senya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba ke go itshenyetsa.
Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo Womphakathi .
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go saeniwa ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ga Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa 2022 (Molao wa bo 3 wa 2022) gore nne molao.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikusolile ukugirizwa komthangalasisekelo ogirizwe zizakhamuzi zeThongathi KwaZulu-Natala lokhuya nazitjhagalela ukuthola amanzi.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo molao ono ke go tlhabolola dithata le maemo maitshwaro dipusoselegae.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele izakhamuzi ukuthi zizincenge, zehlise ummoya, njengoba phela nakhu sewuthomile umsebenzi wokulungisa ubuTsengelo baManzi beThongathi.
tgt_text: Molao ono ke karolo ya dikgato tse di tsewang ke puso tsa go dira gore ditirelo tsa puso nne tse di manontlhotlho le go dira bonnete jwa gore batho ba tlamelwa ka ditirelo tse di sa kgaotseng, fela jaaka go tlhalositswe mo ditshwanelong tse di botlhokwa tse di umakilweng mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa..  Molao ono totobatsa dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go latelwa go thapa batlhankedi ba bagolwane mo pusong.
Jaanong molao ono ganetsa batlhankedi ba ba golwane mo pusong go ka tshwara ditiro tse dingwe tsa sepolotiki mo mekgatlhong ya dipolotiki.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyakuzwisisa ukujanyelwa ziinhloko kwezakhamuzi ezikateleleke ukuthi zisebenzise iinlori ezithutha amanzi isikhathi eside, solo kwasahlela iinkhukhula phambilini nonyaka.
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape ka molao ono ke gore re diphatlhatiro tsa batsamaisi ba dimasepala tse di iseng di thapelwe batlhankedi mo go tsona di tshwanetse go phasaladiwa naga ka bophara gore botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi ba tsenye dikopo tsa go neelwa ditiro tseo.

src_text: Nokho-ke nanyana kunjalo, inturhu nokudungeka kwezinto akusizinto ezingaba sisombululo, kanti nokugirizwa komthangalasisekelo womphakathi kunomthelela omumbi phezu kwabantu bendawo le kwaphela.
tgt_text: Kabinete na le tshepo e tletseng ya gore dikarolo tseno tse di fetotsweng di tla dira bonnete jwa gore batho bao ba thapilweng kgotsa bao ba tlhophilweng mo maemong bona ba tla kgona go dira seo ba se thapetsweng go ya ka seo ba se solofeditseng gore re kgone go dira gore botshelo bo nne botoka mo bathong botlhe.
Bosenyi.

src_text: UmThetho Wee-2022 WamaTjhuguluko Wamahlelo WaboMasipala BeeNdawo  zemaKhaya   .
tgt_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe batlhankedi ba tlhatlhobo ya dithoto kwa melelwaneng ba Setheo sa Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS) jaaka kwa Boemelafofaneng ba OR Tambo ka Latshipi wa la bo 28 Phatwe 2022 ba tshwere dithoto tse di neng di tlisiwa kwano tsa boima jwa dikilokerema di le 785 tsa diokobatsi tsa crystal meth tse boleng jwa tsona bo ka dirang R236 milione fa di rekisiwa mo mebileng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukutlikitlelwa emthethweni nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukutjhugululwa komThetho wee-2022 wamaHlelo waboMasipala (umThetho 3 wee-2022).
tgt_text: Go tshwariwa ga diokobatsi tseno go tla romela ditlhokotsebe tsa digongwana tsa diokobatsi molaetsa o totobetseng wa gore melelwane ya rona tlhokometswe ka botlalo bile batlhankedi ba naga ya rona ba dira ka natla go fedisa botlhokotsebe  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: UmThetho lo unqophe ukwenza ngcono amandla wokusebenza newokuziphatha kwaborhulumende beendawo.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Lekgotla le le Samaganang le Merero ya Setheo sa Thuto Kgolwane ka ga Dipatlisiso tsa Megolo ya Batlatsabakhanselara le ya Batlhankedi ba Bagolo mo Ditheong tsa Aforika Borwa tsa Thuto Kgolwane.

src_text: Umthetho lo uyingcenye yemizamo karhulumende yokwenza  iKoro yabaSebenzi bemBusweni irage umsebenzi wayo ngekambiso yamakghonofundwa ibe iqinisekise ukuthi abantu bahlala benzelwa izenzelwa ekufanele benzelwe zona, njengelungelo elisisekelo elimumethwe mThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tsopoletswe ka seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dipatlisisong tsa CHE tse mo ngwageng wa 2020 Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi, Ngaka Blade Nzimande laetseng gore di diriwe, gore go sekasekiwe megolo le go thapiwa ga khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti mo sebakeng se se fetileng sa dingwaga di le 15, go simolola ka ngwaga wa 2005 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa..  Maitlhomo dipatlisiso tseno ke go tlhatlhoba gore diyunibesiti kgotsa ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane tsa ka fa nageng ya rona ke eng se se di dirang gore di kgone go itshomarela, di kgone go dira tiro ya tsona le gore di kgone go itlhabolola.
Pegelo eno nopotse dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di utulotseng mmogo le go dira ditshwaelo tsa gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go okobatsa maemo.

src_text: UmThetho lo uhlathulula ikambiso ekumele ilandelwe nakuqatjhelwa iinkhundla eziphakemeko.
tgt_text: Gare ga tse dingwe tse dintsi, ditshwaelo tse di tshwaetsweng di tshitshinya gore megolo ya batlhankedi tshwanetse go tlhoka lehunelo.

src_text: Nje awusavumi ukuthi iimphathimandla zembusweni zeenkhundla eziphakemeko ziphathe neenkhundla eziphakemeko eenqhemeni zepolitiki.
tgt_text: Go tshwanetswe go tlhomiwe setheo se se ikemetseng se se sa direleng lephata leno gore nne sona se se rwalang maikarabelo go tsaya ditshweetso tse di tsamaisanang le megolo tshitshinya gape le gore dithulaganyo tsa go tlhatlhoba fa batlhankedi ba dira tiro ka botswapelo di tshwanetse go gagamadiwa mo ditheong tseno.

src_text: Okhunye, njengoba sekusebenza lomThetho nje, iinkhundla ezivulekileko zabaphathi babomasipala  kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe elizweni loke kobanyana zizokudosa abafakiimbawo abafaneleko babe banengi ngokungakghonakalako.
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tseno tse di dirilweng di lebeletse gape le bogolo jo bo farologaneng jwa ditheo tseno mmogo le go tlhoma boleng jwa maemo a tsamaisanang le ditheo tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

Go solofetswe gore Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi tla atlhaatlha pegelo eno le khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti maitlhomo le go gagamatsa ditheo tseno tsa thuto tla re morago ga foo, pegelo eno ya phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso: mo go www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi amatjhuguluko la azakuqinisekisa ukuthi labo abazakuqatjhelwa iinkhundlezi bazakukghona ukugcina iinthembiso zabo kobanyana woke umuntu azokuphila ipilo engcono.
tgt_text: Go Fetola Batsholateu mo Batlhankeding ba Lephata la Thuto le Dipatlisiso mo Lekaleng la Thuto Kgolwane.

Kabinete eme nokeng ditshitshinyo tsa dipatlisiso ka bobedi tse di dirilweng ka maitlhomo go re tlhaba botlhale ka dikgato tse re tshwanetseng go di tsaya go oketsa lebelo la go fetola batsholateu mo batlhankeding ba lephata la thuto le dipatlisiso mo lekaleng la thuto kgolwane.

src_text: Ubulelesi .
tgt_text: Pegelo ya ntlha ke e dirilweng ke Setlhophatiro sa Ditona seo se dirileng dipatlisiso mabapi le gore go gana kae gore go thapiwe, go somarelwe le gore go godisiwe batlhankedi ba thuto kgolwane ba bathobantsho ba leng maAforika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke iimphathimandla zeZiko eliButhelela umThelo leSewula Afrika (i-SARS) eziqalene nezomthelo wepahla ekuthengiselanwa ngayo namazwe wangaphandle ngokubamba isidakamizwa i-crystal meth ema-785 kg ebeyingathengiswa ngemali eziingidi ezima-R236, edoyelweni laboflayi i-OR Tambo International ngoSondo nakama-28 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya bobedi ke e dirilweng ke Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi mmogo le Setheo sa Dipatlisiso sa Naga – mo ba dirileng dipatlisiso tseno le Diyunibesiti tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng lekoko la diyunibesiti tsa puso di le 26 tsa naga.

src_text: Ukubanjwa kwalesisidakamizwa kuzakuthumela umlayezo ozwakala kuhle eenqhemeni zehlanganyela yeenlelesi ukuthi siqinile isandla sevikeleko emasangweni wokungena nokuphuma elizweni lekhethu, nokuthi iimphathimandla zelizwe lekhethu zisebenza ngokukhuthala ukucitha nanyana kungaba ngebamhlobobani ubulelesi      Iinqunto Zekhabinethi.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno ka bobedi di tshitshinya gore go nne le maano go samagana le morero wa go fetola batsholateu mo dikarolong di le tlhano tse dikgolo leng karolo e mabapi le go tlhagisa batlhankedi ba maemo thuto ya morago ga go konosetsa dithuto tsa ntlha tse dikgolwane; karolo ya bobedi ke ya go nna le seabe ga badiredi ba setheo; karolo ya boraro ke ya setlwaedi sa go dira dilo mo setheong sa thuto se se amegang le ka fao se dirang tiro ka gone; karolo ya bone ke ya mabapi le dipholisi le maano mmogo le karolo ya botlhano e leng ka ga go samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhaela ga didirisiwa.

src_text: Umbiko Wephenyo Womkhandlu Wezefundo Ephakemeko (i-CHE) Ngomrholo Wama-Vice Chancellor Kunye Neenkhulu Eziphethe Iinkhundla Eziphakemeko ESewula Afrika                                                                                                                                .
tgt_text: Tumelano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba Mabapi le Didirisiwa tsa Tshimologo ya Dijalo go Thusa mo Mererong ya Dijo le ya Temo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngomphumela wephenyo le-CHE elatlanywa nguNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula uDorh.
tgt_text: Kabinete isitse tumelano eno kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.

src_text: Blade Nzimande ngomnyaka wee-2020, kobanyana kuphenywe ngezinga lemirholo yeenkhulu eziphethe amayunivesithi esikhathini seminyaka eli-15 ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 ukuyokufika kowee-.
tgt_text: Seno se tla dira gore Aforika Borwa nne nngwe ya dinaga tse di dumelaneng ka tumelano eno e kaelang dinaga tse leng karolo ya tumelano eno go somarela le go tlhokomela didirisiwa tsa tshimologo ya dijalo go thusa mo mererong ya dijo le ya temothuo.

Ka go ikobela tumelano eno, seo se tla thusa go gagamatsa maikemisetso naga eno ago somarela le go tlhokomela ka fao didirisiwa tsa go simolola dijalo diriwang ka teng, mmogo le go ema nokeng baagi ba kwa metseselegaeng.

src_text: Umnqopho wephenyweli kuthola ukuthi amayunivesithi namkha ikoro yefundo ephakemeko elizweni lekhethu anobubambelelo obungangani, akghona kangangani ukwenza izinto ekufanele azenze nokuthi athuthuka kangangani.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.

src_text: Umbiko lo uveza amaphuzu aqakathekileko walokho okutholwe nabekuphenywa, okuphekelelwa ziimphakamiso zokuthi kungenziwani ukulungisa lapho kunetlhayelo khona.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.

Leano leno le na le ponelopele botlhe ba nang le yona e ka ga go nna le Aforika Borwa yo botlhe ba lekalekanang mo go yona gape sa kgotlheleng tikologo tlhalosa ditheo le dipholisi tseo di tla re thusang gore re kgone go diragatsa seo.

src_text: Hlangana nokhunye okuphakanyiswako, kuphakanyiswa nokuthi kuqiniswe iindlela zokurhola, nehlelo lemirholo libe yinto eyenzelwa emkhanyweni.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tla ama motho mang le mang yo leng ka fa gare ga naga ya Aforika Borwa bile tla re naya tšhono ya gore re kgone go baakanya lefa leo puso ya tlhaolele re sietseng lona leng la go dira gore batho ba se lekalekane mme re dire gore re nna le ikonomi botlhe mo go yona ba unngwelwang.

src_text: Ukusungulwa kwesijamiso sangaphandle esizijameleko esizakwengamela ihlelo lokuthathwa kweenqunto zemirholo.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Moporesitente e Samaganang le Merero ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi dirile dikgato di le dintsi tsa go batlana le maikutlo badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago mme bontsi jwa bona bo ne ba ema nokeng leano leno.

src_text: Kuphakanyiswa godu nokuqiniswa kwamahlelo wokuhlunga amazinga wokusebenza kilamaziko wezefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Kabinete totobaditse gore kgato ya go fetola maemo go dira gore re ngwaga wa 2050 goroga fitlhele re se tlhole re dirisa dilwana tse di kueletsang mesi tshwanetse go tsamaelana le dilo tse re fisegelang go di bona mo tlhabololong ya naga, mme di tsenyeletsa le tsa go tlhola ditiro tse di nang le seriti mo bathong botlhe, go thusa baagi le go fedisa tshokolo.

src_text: Iphenyweli godu liqalelele nobukhulu obuhlukahlukako bamaziko wezefundo la, godu  lalinganisa nangamazinga wamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go badirisanimmogo botlhe mo mererong ya loago go ema nokeng leano leno la go tsamaisa tiro.
Leano le le tseneletseng la go tsamaisa tiro le tla tle le kwalwa, mme le tla golaganngwa le maano puso mmogo le go golaganngwa gape le thulaganyetso ya go dirisa matlole.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kulindeleke bona abonisane nabarholi bamayunivesithi njengegadango lokuqinisa leziinjamiso zefundo.
tgt_text: Karata Ntšhwa ya Laesense ya go Kganna ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Ngalokho-ke umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeFundo nokuThwasisa: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Kganna e ntseng dirisiwa tseelwe legato ke karata eo nang le dintlha di le dintsinyana tse di ka ga go thibela tirisobotlhaswa ya yona.
Karata e dirisiwang ga jaanong simolotse go dirisiwa bogolotala go simolola ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: ITjhuguluko Elikhanjiswa Msinyana Lephenyo Nekghono Lokufundisa Ekorweni Yezefundo Ephakemeko     .
tgt_text: Diphetogo mo thekenolojing di ntse di nna teng mme jaanong re setse re dirisa madi a boitshegang gore re kgone go tlhokomela dikarata tseno.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyazisekela iimphakamiso zamaphenyo amabili la athunywe ukuphakamisa amagadango angasetjenziswa kobanyana azokukhambisa msinyana umsebenzi wokwenza amatjhuguluko werhubhululo namandla wokufundisa emaziko wefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Karata ga jaana tshitshintsweng tla dira gore dilaesense tsa go kganna tsa naga eno di tsamaisane le Dilaesense tsa go Kganna tse di Dirisiwang ke Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba ka Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso ya Dintlha tsa Boitshupo (ISO18013).
Pholisi ya Letsholo la Ditiro tsa Sešhaba mo Metseng (EPWP).

src_text: Umbiko wokuthoma uhlanganiswe siQhema somSebenzi saboNgqongqotjhe ebesiphenya ngezinto ebeziliya ukuqatjhwa, nokuhlala kunye nokuthuthuka kweemfundiswa zabantu abanzima eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi ya EPWP ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: Umbiko wesibili ¬–   olayelwe mNyango wezeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kunye nehlangano yezerhubhululo i-National Research Foundation – uhlanganiswe yiYunivesithi yeSewula Afrika (i-UNISA), eyona yengamele nejamele  amayunivesithi womphakathi ama-26 welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: EPWP ke le lengwe la matsholo a botlhokwa puso maitlhomo lona leng go fedisa tshokolo le go neela baagi megolo ya tiro ba dirileng mo metseng ka go ba naya ditiro tsa nakwana, segolobogolo ka go naya bašwa le basadi ditiro.

Sekwalwa se sentšhwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi se tla matlafatsa letsholo leno mmogo le go abelana ka tshedimosetso e tlhamaletseng e ka ga megolo, dithulaganyo tse di tla diriwang go kopa thuso ya matlole mmogo le go thusa baagi, mmogo le go dira gore EPWP tsamaisane le dithulaganyo tse di leng teng tsa matsatsi ano tsa go tlhokomela badiri.

src_text: Yomibili imibiko le iphakamisa iindlela ezingasetjenziswa ukukhambisa amatjhuguluko msinyana emakorweni amahlanu angamakhulu, weemfundo ezitholakala ngemva kweziqu zokuthoma zeyunivesithi; ukuhlanganyela kwabasebenzi bemayunivesithi; isiko nejayelo yamaziko wezefundo;  umthethokambiso namahlelo wokwenza izinto, kunye nemithombo yamandla elinganiselweko nofana eyimbijana.
tgt_text: Se tla dira gore tirisanommogo magareng ga makala puso le makala poraefete gagamale go dira gore EPWP nne le mosola mogolo thata mo go direng gore tlhole ditiro tse di seriti le mo go fediseng tshokolo.
Se sengwe gape se pholisi eno tla se dirang ke go rotloetsa gore matsholo go direla setšhaba se latele thulaganyo le nngwe e tshwanang gotlhe mo nageng mme kgone go nna le boitshimololedi.

src_text: Isivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yamandla Yeentjalo Zendabuko Ekugomeni Nakezokulima (isiVumelwano).
tgt_text: Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa kwesiVumelwano ePalamende kobanyana iyosiqinisa.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula bogolo jwa mobentlo montšhwa le dikarolo tse dintšhwa tse di tla tsenngwang mo mading tshipi ngwaga wa 2023 mabapi le Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yingcenye yeenqhema zalesisiVumelwano, sona esibonisa amazwe amalunga ngokulondwa nokuqinisekiswa kokubabalelwa kokusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zendabuko ekugomeni nakezokulima.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le gore ngwaga yo mongwe le yo mongwe dipuo tse di dirisitsweng mo mading a tla dirisiwang tshipi di tshwanetse go fetolwa gore di neelane tšhono.
Lefoko "Aforika Borwa" le tla tsenngwa fela mo letlhakoreng le le lengwe la madi ano tshipi mme le tla kwadiwa ka dipuo tsotlhe tsa naga eno.

src_text: Ukuqiniswa kwalesisiVumelwano kuzakubuye kuqinise namandla welizwe lekhethu wokuzibophelela ekulondeni nekubabaleleni ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zemvelo, kusekelwe nabantu beendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Mo mading tshipi R5 go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le tharo; mo mading tshipi R2 50c 20c le 10c go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le pedi mme mo mading tshipi R1 go tla dirisiwa puo le nngwe.
Dipuo tsotlhe tseno di tla neelana tšhono ngwaga mongwe le mongwe sebaka sa dingwaga tse di tlang di le.

src_text: Umtlamo Olungileko Wokweyamela Ematjhugulukweni ESewula Afrika    .
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe se se ka ga Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 ya go Golaganya Ditirelo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Boleng jwa Metsi (IWQM).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuphunyeleliswa komTlamo oLungileko wokweYamela emaTjhugulukweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa mo kuranteng ya puso Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya IWQM ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: Umtlamo lo uza nenembombono ekuvunyelanwa ngayo, elungileko, yeSewula Afrika elungele ukujamelana nanyana yitlayimethi enjani.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno e tshitshintsweng tla tsena mo legatong la Pholisi e feletsweng ke nako ya WQM ya ngwaga wa 1991 mmogo le mo legatong la maano yona a neng tsenngwa tirisong ka ngwaga wa..  Pholisi eno tlhagisa dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tse tla nnang tsona tse tlhokomelo ya boleng jwa metsi tla ikakatlelang ka tsona rulaganya ka tolamo melao yotlhe e tsamaisanang le merero ya metsi mmogo le maikano naga eno mo maitlhomong yona go obamela dithulaganyo tsa go somarela metsi jaaka le sedirisiwa se se tlhokagalang.

src_text: Uhlathulula ikambisolawulo nomthethokambiso wokuphumelelisa lokhu.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang.

src_text: Umtlamo wokweyamela ematjhugulukweni lo uzakuthinta woke umuntu eSewula Afrika, kanti unjalo nje godu uvula nethuba lokulungisa okwakungakalungi kusukela eminyakeni eyadlulako, ube wakhe nomnotho ozakuhlomulisa boke abantu.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.
Makhubu ano ke mangwe metswedi ya tlhago mannye re nang le ona a leng botlhokwa thata mo go godiseng ikonomi ya Aforika Borwa mo mererong ya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba setegeniki le ditlhaeletsano.

src_text: IKomitjhini yobeNgameli ngezeTlayimethi ikhe yaphuma ijima elinabileko lokubonisana nababelani, yathola isekelo elikhulu ngomtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Pholisi e tshitshinngwang eno maitlhomo yona ke go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go abelana ka dilaesense tsa go disa marang kgaso mmogo le tsa megala; tsa go gasa dikanale; tsa go gasa marang ditlhaeletsano tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa go dira dipatlisiso le tlhabologo; tsa go dirisiwa ke baagi le tsa diintaseteri tsa mothale oo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ifakazele ukuthi ukweyamela ehlelweni elizakwenza ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libe selinganammoya osilaphazekileko ngomnyaka wee-2050, kufuze kusekele iinrhuluphelo zetuthuko yelizwe loke, sekubalwa nemisebenzi ehloniphekileko kibo boke abantu, ukuqalelelwa kwabantu boke kunye nokurarhwa kobuchaka nomtlhago wabo.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo mangwe pholisi eno ke go tlhotlheletsa tekatekano le go abelana marang ano ka go lekalekana gore mo lekaleng leno go nne le  phetogo ya batsholateu le go dira gore kgokaganyo ya marang setegeniki kgonege gore tshware le ko mafelong a kgakalakgakala le mafelo a tlhabologileng ka fa nageng ya rona.
Bathankedi ba Aforika Borwa ba ba Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele boke ababelani bomphakathi ukuthi basingathe bebasekele umtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula leina la Rre Mandla Samuel Mchunu go nna mothankedi wa Aforika Borwa yo Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso (Kgaolo ya .

src_text: Kuzokuhlanganiswa ihlelo eliphelele ngemininingwana lokuphumelelisa umtlamo lo, kanti-ke lizakuthi lingatlanywa bese lihlanganiswa nehlelo likarhulumende lokulungiselela izinto nokuhlelela iimali..     Ikarada Lelayisense Yokutjhayela Elitjha ESewula Afrika   .
tgt_text: Rre Mchunu ga jaanong dira jaaka tokololo mo botong eo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukujanyiselelwa kweKarada leLayisense yokuTjhayela esetjenziswa njenganje, ijanyiselelwe ngekarda eliphephe ngcono.
tgt_text: Go tshitshinngwa gore tlhophiwe lekgetlo le lengwe gape mo Lekgotleng leno la ITU mo pakeng ya 2023 go fitlha mo pakeng ya..  Ditlhopho tseno di tla tshwarwa ka nako go tla bong go tshwerwe Khonferense ya Togomaano ya ITU e tla tshwarelwang kwa Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la bo 26 Lwetse go fitlha ka la bo 14 Diphalane.

Aforika Borwa santse eme ka maikemisetso yona go tshegetsa maitlhomo ITU go tswalela sekgala mo didirisiweng tsa setegeniki ka go dira gore lefatshe lotlhe le gokelelwe mafaratlhatlha ano  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Ihlelo ekusebenza ngalo ilayisense yekarada yanje solo lathoma ukusebenza ngomnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa.

src_text: Ikarada elitjha ekuphakanyiswa ukuthi kujanyiselelwe ngalweli lizakwenza ilayisense yokutjhayela yekhethwapha ikhambisane nechwephetjhe lethekhnoloji yamazwe ngamazwe, i-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Lwetse tla ketikiwa ka morero yo reng : "Re bontsha Lefa la Solomon Linda mmogo le Mmino wa Setso wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa Tlotlo”.
Kabinete ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go keteka Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa ka mokgwa wa go keteka ditso tsa rona tse di humileng tse di nang le maatla go dira gore re nne seoposengwe.

src_text: Umthethokambiso Wehlelo Elinabileko Lemisebenzi Yomphakathi (i-EPWP).
tgt_text: Rotlhe re tshwanetse go tsaya matsapa gore re dirisane mmogo mo go fediseng ditiragalo tsa go re dira gore re se nne bana ba thari le nngwe mmogo le tsa go se tshware batho ka go tshwana tse re tswang ka tsona kwa loe mme re rotloetse maitsholo go ipela ga go nna maAforika Borwa a motlotlo  Melaetsa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukugazedwa komtlamo womThethokambiso we-EPWP kobanyana kuyokubonisanwa ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go:Batho botlhe ba ba fentseng, ba ba ikgapetseng dimetale le bao ba neng ba gaisana le ba bangwe mo Lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades Marathon, leo le itsegeng ka la gore ke "Lebelo le le Gaisang Otlhe a Tshamekiwang ke Batho", leo le neng le tabogiwa ka Latshipi 28 Phatwe.

src_text: I-EPWP ingelinye lamahlelo karhulumende aqakathekileko anqophe ukuphungula ubuchaka asize nangengeniso yemali ebantwini abadingileko, ngokwakha amathuba wemisebenzi wesikhatjhana, khulu khulu elutjheni nebantwini abasikazi.
tgt_text: Mofenyi mo lebelong la banna ke Tete Dijana (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 5, metsotso le 30 le metsotswana le 38) yo nnang kwa Mahikeng kwa porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima mme mo lebelong la bomme mofenyi ke Alexandra Morozova (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 6, metsotso le 17 le metsotswana le 47).

Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 88), yo neng le Segatlhamelamasisis mo mererong ya kgaratlhelo ya tokologo yo gape neng le mogale mo mokgatlhong wa badiri yo gape neilweng tlotla ka go abelwa Kabo ya Tlotlo ya Luthuli mo ngwageng wa 2004 “go tlotla seabe sa gagwe sa go lwela ditshwanelo tsa badiri botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe mmogo le go lwela gore re feletse re na le Aforika Borwa yo sa tlhaoleng ba bangwe go ya ka morafe wa bona, go ya ka bong jwa bona, yo nang le tokologo le temokerasi”.Mapodisi le tlhano Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) ao neng le ka fa teng ga sefofane sa SAPS fa se ne se sugagana kwa Boemelafofaneng jwa Rand, kwa Germiston ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Phatwe.

src_text: Umtlamo womthethokambiso omutjha lo uzakuqinisa ihlelo ube ulethe nomkhanyo eendabeni ezinjengomrholo, ihlelo lokusekela ngeemali nokuvikeleka komphakathi, ube uthomanise ne-EPWP neendlela zemisebenzi zanamhlanje (zesimodeni).
tgt_text: Mapodisi batlisisa gore ke eng se se tlhodileng kotsi eno.

src_text: Uzakukhuthaza ukusebenzisana hlangana kwakarhulumende nekoro yangeqadi ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi i-EPWP iba nendima ebonakalako ekuvulweni kwemisebenzi ehloniphekako nekuphungulweni komtlhago.
tgt_text: Kabinete beile mo dithapelong tsa pholo ya ka bonako motlhankedi yo leng mo dikgobalong tse di masisi yo neng fofisa sefofane seno  Go Thapiwa.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uzakubuye godu ukhuthaze amandla wokusungula ekuphunyelelisweni kwamahlelo wemisebenzi yomphakathi elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo Lephateng la go Disa Lekala la Puso le go Tlhatlhelela Badiredi mo Lefapheng la Tiromaano,Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro  Mme Kwena Komape thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la go Godisa Ikonomi, Kgwebisano le Tlotlomatso ya Serodumo mo Lefapheng la Temothuo, Pusetso ya Dinaga le Tlhabololo ya Metsemagae  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la Tikwatikwe ya Ditirelo tsa Botsamaisi jwa Ditiragalo tsa Matlhotlhapelo mo Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo.

src_text: Zamandla.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibikelwe nguNgqongqotjhe womNyango wezamaBubulo kaRhulumende u- Pravin Gordhan ngekghono le-Eskom lokukhandela ukucinywa-cinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga begodu ifumene umbiko weKomidi eTjheja ubuJamo obuQokamileko beGezi eliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Kabinete begetswe ke Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba Pravin Gordhan malebana le bokgoni jwa Eskom go fokotsa go timiwa ga motlakase kgapetsakgapetsa mme gape ya amogela pegelo ya tiro e setseng dirilwe go tswa kwa Komiting ya Setegeniki ya Komiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Mathata Motlakase.
Go tla dirwa dikitsiso tse dingwe go latela go konosediwa ga dipuisano tse di tseneletseng malebana le dipegelo tseno.

src_text: Ezinye iimmemezelo zikokwethulwa ngemva kokubanjwa kwemikhulumiswano engeneneleko yokuqalisisa imibiko le.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhagisitse go swaba ga yona ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsego tse di bakwang ke go timiwa ga motlakase mo dikgwebong le mo matlong, bogolo segolo jaaka seno se diragala ka nako puso samaganeng le ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phukwi.

src_text: Ikhabinethi iveze ukudana kwayo ngokuphazamiseka nokugugunywa kucinywa cinywa kwegezi okuthikameza amabhizinisi namakhaya, khulukhulu ukucinywokhu nakwenzeka lokha urhulumende nakalukana namano wokungenelela amenyezelwa nguMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso.

Kabinete amogetse go tlhomiwa ga Setsha se sentšhwa sa Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing kwa Kempton Park, se leng karolo ya peeletso e solofeditsweng kwa Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeeletso ya Aforika Borwa (SAIC) e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sandton Convention Centre kwa Johannesburg ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe..  Tlamelo eno ntšhwa ya disekweremetara di le 62 000 kopanya ditiro tse di neng di dirwa kwa ditsheng tse tlhano tse di farologaneng mme na le badiri ba ka nna.

src_text: Zamasiso .
tgt_text: Ke nngwe ya ditlamelo tsa Sandvik tse dikgolokgolo le tse di tsweletseng pele go gaisa mo lefatsheng, mme na le bokgoni jwa go tlhagisa dilaisi tsa ka fa tlase ga lefatshe ka dimatheriale tse di fetang 60% tsa Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele ukuhlonywa kwesiKhungo sokuKhiqiza i-Sandvik Khomanani e-Kempton Park esingesitjha esaba yingcenye yesithembiso samasiso aziinGidi ezima-R350 esenziwa kuKhomferensi yesiNe yamaSiso yeSewula Afrika (i-SAIC) egade ibanjelwe e-Sandton Convention Centre eJwanasbhege mhla ama- 24 kuNtaka wee-..     Isikhungo esitjhesi esiziinkwere zamamitha azii-62 000 sihlanganisa imisebenzi egade ngaphambilini ebeyenziwa eendaweni ezihlanu ezihlukeneko begodu simumethe abasebenzi ababalelwa ema-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gape le leeto la Moporesidente Ramaphosa la go lekola maemo la kwa KwaZulu-Natala ka nako ya go tlhomiwa lefelo la tlhagiso ya dithoto la Hesto Harnesses kwa Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la bo 13 Lwetse.

src_text: Lesi singesinye seenkhungo zakwa-Sandvik ezikulu nezithuthuke khulu ephasini zombelele begodu sikghona ukukhiqiza imitjhini/abomakalanyana bokulayitjha emathunjini wephasi abakhandwe ngeengcenye zeensimbi ezenza ama-60% zeSewula Afrika..     IKhabinethi ilemukele nevakatjho likaMengameli u-Ramaphosa lokuyokuHlola KwaZulu-Natala nagade kuhlonywa isikhungo sokukhiqiza i-Hesto Harnessese e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ali-13 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Lefelo leno ke le lengwe la diporojeke di le tlhano tse go dirilweng dipeeletso mo go tsona tse leng karolo ya maitlamo setlamo sa Metair Investments Limited go beeletsa  4 bilione go tshegetsa go atolosiwa le go fetolelwa ga Ford Ranger ntšhwa go nna ya ka fa nageng.

src_text: Isikhungwesi sihlangana nezinye ezihlanu zamaphrojekthi ayingcenye wokusisa ayingcenye yesithembiso samaBhiliyoni ali-R. 4 esenziwe yikhampani i-Metair Investments Limited ukusekela umsebenzi wokunatjiswa nokukhuliswa komkhiqizo womhlobo omutjha we-Ford Ranger elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: Gape Moporesidente tsenetse pulo ya porojeke ya ntšhwafatso le katoloso ya setlamo sa Sappi Saiccor Mill ya boleng jwa R7,7 bilione kwa Umkomaas maikaelelo yona leng go oketsa bokgoni jwa setlamo le bokgoni jwa sona jwa go gaisana lefatshe ka bophara fa se ntse se tlhama ditšhono tsa tiro tsa pakakhutshwane le tsa pakatelele.

src_text: UMengameli ubuye wahlangela  ukuvulwa kwephrojekthi evuselelweko nenatjisiweko  i-Sappi Saiccor Mill ebize  amaBhiliyoni ali-R7,7 eMkhomazi, ekunqotjhwe ngayo ukwandisa ikghono lekhampani lokuphalisana ephasiniloke ngokunjalo kuvuleke namathuba womsebenzi wesikhatjhana newesikhathi eside..     Amasiso la ayingcenye yeenthembiso ezenziwa bosomabubulo kukhomferensi ye- SAIC.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso tseno ke karolo ya ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng ke beng ba diintaseteri kwa SAIC.

src_text: Amasiso amatjha ngelizweni lekhethu asiza ekwakhiweni kabutjha nekuvuseleleni umnotho weKhethu godu amasiso la abeka iSewula Afrika ebujameni bokukarekelwa ngamanye amazwe ayibone ililizwe lapho kungasiswa khona.
tgt_text: Peeletso nngwe le nngwe ntšhwa mo nageng ya rona thusa mo go ageng sešwa le go busetsa sekeng ikonomi ya rona, mme tswelela go dira gore Aforika Borwa nne lefelo leo leng mmamoratwa fa go tla mo go direng dipeeletso mo go lona.

src_text: Ukuthuthukiswa Komthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ukuvulwa kwengcenye etja yendlela i-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo ezokwenza kukhambeke lula ngaphakathi kwedrobha ye-Musina begodu ngokuvumela ukwanda kwerhwebo nokwabelana ngezomnotho hlangana neSewula Afrika neHlangano eThuthukisa amaZwe angeSewula ye-Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go bulwa ga karolo ntšhwa ya Tsela ya Musina Ring kwa Limpopo e tla dirang gore go nne bonolo gore batho ba tsamae kwa Musina, mme gape letla gore go nne le tiragatso ya kgwebisano le ikonomi magareng ga Aforika Borwa le Dinaga tsa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika.

src_text: Iphrojekthi le ebize iinGidi ezima-R640 ivulele abantu bekhethu imisebenzi yasafuthi engaphezulu kwama-275 yanikela nangamathuba emiphakathini yendawo le kunye namabhizinisi asakhasako (ama-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwendlela i-Musina Ring Road kuyingcenye yehlelo likarhulumende lokuthuthukisa umthangalasisekelo, ngokusebenzisa iHlelo lokwAkha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP), kunqotjhwe ukukhulisa umnotho ohlanganyelweko namathuba wemisebenzi emikhakheni yoke nemiphakathini ehlukahlukeneko.
tgt_text: Porojeke e jeleng R640 milione tlhametse batho ba kgaolo eo ditiro tsa nako e tletseng di feta 275 mme ya tlamela baagi ba kgaolo eo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME) ka ditšhono.

src_text: Ihlekelele ye-Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Kago ya Tsela ya Musina Ring ke karolo ya lenaneo la puso la dikago, leo le tseelang tlhogong maitlhomo ERRP, le maikaelelo lona leng go tlhama ditšhono tse botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go tsona le ditiro mo maphateng a farologaneng le mo metseng.

src_text: 1     Ikhabinethi ibalilela imbiko beyiyaduduza emindenini yalabo abahlongakele ngemva kokugirika kwamaboda wedamu lekhucukhucu yemikhiqizo yemayini ese-Jagersfontein eFreyistata lapha kwadaleka iinkhukhula zedaka ezadala umonakalo ngokuphuma kwelanga ngoSondo nakali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo Jagersfontein.

src_text: Ihlekelele le yone khulu umthangalasisekelo, ipahla yabantu eziinkoloyi neenkumba ezithileko.. 2     Ngesikhathi nakavakatjhele indawo yehlekelele ngoMvulo, mhla ali-12 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022, uMengameli u-Ramaphosa uthokoze imizamo eyenziweko ukuhlenga ipilo nokufunyanwa kwabongazimbi endaweni leya.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso a tswang kwa botennye jwa dipelo kwa malapeng ba ba latlhegetsweng ke matshelo morago ga go thubega ga lebota la moepo o phuagantsweng wa kgaolo eno kwa Jagersfontein, kwa Foreisetata mme ga dutla kgosomano ya seretse se se bakileng matlhotlhapelo ka mahube naka tsa kgomo ka Sontaga, 11 Lwetse.

src_text: Wathembisa ukuthi urhulumende uzokunikela abahlali abathintekileko be-Jagersfontein ngesekelo elifaneleko.
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo ano sentse gape dikago tsa motse oo, dithoto tsa tsa batho di tshwana le dikoloi le dintlo di le mmalwa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ikhuthazekile ngokuthi abanikazi bemayini bathe bajame ngomumo ekunikeleni ngesizo lecwephetjhe nokusekela lokha nakungenzeka umKhandlu wezeNjiwa weSewula Afrika ubakhombele.
tgt_text: Ka nako ya fa ne etetse koo ka Mosupologo, 12 Lwetse 2022, Moporesidente Ramaphosa lebogile maiteko go busetsa maemo sekeng a dirwang mo lefelong leo ne solofetsa gape gore puso tla ema nokeng baagi ba ba amegileng ba Jagersfontein ka tshegetso e tlhokegang.

src_text: 3    Ibubulo lezeemayini lihlala limfakisandla oqakathekileko emnothweni ngemisebenzi enqophileko nengakanqophi, inzuzo ethunyelwa ngaphandle kwemikhawulo, namasiso wamazwe wangaphandle anqophileko godu lilima indima eqakathekileko ekwenzeni ngcono ipilo yemiphakathi emagega neemayini.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogela gore beng ba moepo ba rile ba ikemiseditse go tlamela puso ka thuso ya setegeniki le tshegetso fa ka kopiwa ke Lekgotla la Diminerale la Aforika Borwa.

src_text: 4    Urhulumende neenhlangano ezingasebenzeli ukwenza inzuzo zingenelele msinyana ngokunikela iindawo zokufihla ihloko kwesikhatjhana, ukwelulekwa ngokomkhumbulo neendingoqangi eziziingubo, abomatrasi neemphuthelwana zokugoma.
tgt_text: Intaseteri ya meepo tswelela go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa mo ikonoming jaaka tlhagisa ditiro ka go thapa batho abo tsona le ka go thapa ditlamo tse tsona tla nnang tsona tse di thapang batho, ka go duelela letseno la go romela ditlhagisiwa tsa ka kwano kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle, mmogo le ka go dira gore go nne le dipeeletso go tswa kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa sa go tokafatsa matshelo batho ba ba mo tikologong ya meepo.

src_text: Ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nokusatjalaliswa kwegezi sekubuyiselwe esigeni.
tgt_text: Puso le mekgatlho mengwe e seng ya puso tlile ka thuso ya ka bonako ka go tlamela baagi ba ba amegileng ka bonno jwa tshoganyetso, ka go ba thoba maikutlo go ba ntsha mo letshogong le go ba thusa ka dithuso tse di botlhokwa di tshwana le go ba neela dikobo, dimaterase le diphuthelwana tsa dijo.
Ga jaana metsi le motlakase di buseditswe sekeng mo lefelong leo.

src_text: 5    Nasele kuhlwengiswe icabazi lehlekelele, abosonjiniyera balindeleke bona bayokuhlola umonakalo owenzekileko nokuphepha kweenkumba.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore fela fa lefelo leno le sena go phepafadiwa, basetegeniki ba tla sekaseka seemo sa dikago tsa matlo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze besizo elirhabako, iinhlangano zomphakathi namalunga womphakathi ngeminikelo nesizo labo.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso, mekgatlho ya baagi le setšhaba ka ntlha ya seabe se ba nnileng le sona mo go abelaneng ka thuso.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhulumisene ngobujamo bomnotho welizwe ngemva kweembalobalo zamhlapha ezikhutjhwe LiZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika (i-Stats SA)   ezitjengisa ukuthi iNgeniso yangeKhaya ePheleleko (i-GDP) kukota yesibili emnyakeni wee-2022 yehle nge-0,7%.
tgt_text: Kabinete buisane ka seemo sa ikonomi morago ga dipalopalo tsa fa gautshwane tsa Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (Stats SA) di sena go bontsha gore Letseno la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Dikuno (GDP) la kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 wetse tlase ka 0,7%.

src_text: Abonobangela bokwehlokhu bafaka hlangana ukucinywacinywa kwegezi kwenzelelwa ukuyonga, ipi ehlangana kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine nezinga lepilo elikhuphukileko kunye nentengotjhuguluko.
tgt_text: Dintlha tse di tlhotlheleditseng kwelotlase eno di akaretsa go timiwa ga motlakase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le dituelelo tse di kwa godimo tsa dilo tse go iphedisiwang ka tsona mmogo le infoleišene.

src_text: Amagadango athethweko ngaphasi kwe-ERRP adambise umthelela omumbi obewulethwa miraro yomnotho yamazwe wangaphetjheya, avikela godu imisebenzi neendlela zokuziphilisa zabantu.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di dirilweng ke Leano la Kagosešwa le Tsosoloso ya Ikonomi (ERRP) di thusitse gore naga se dubiwe ke ditsuatsue tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba ikonomi, mme gape di dirile gore ditiro le ditsela tsa go iphedisa di se latlhege.

src_text: Ukungenelela kukarhulumende kuthoma ukuba nemiphumela emihle njengokutjho kwemiphumela yeHlolo yezomSebenzi yaQobe Kota ekhutjhwe yi-StatsSA etjengise ukuthi kwavulwa imisebezi engaphezu kweenkulungwana ezima-648 hlangana kwekota yokuthoma neyesibili yomnyaka wee-     IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di gagametseng tsa puso tsa ikonomi di simolola go ungwa maungo, jaaka go bonagetse mo dipholong tsa fa gautshwane tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe tsa Merero ya Badiri tsa Stats SA, tse di bontshitseng gore go nnile le koketsego ya ditiro di feta 648 000 magareng ga kotara ya ntlha le kotara ya bobedi mo  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Umtlamo wokuTjheja nokuHlunga (i-M&E) umThethomgomo weLutjha weliZweloke (i-NYP).
tgt_text: Letlhomeso la Peoleitlho le Tshekatsheko (M&E) la Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya Bašwa (NYP).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umtlamo we-M&E ozokghonakalisa ukutjhejisisa nokuhlola umthelela weensika ze-NYP ka-2020-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse leano la go diragatsa tiro la M&E le le tla dirang gore tiro ya peoleitlho diragadiwe ka tshwanelo mmogo le tshekatsheko ya seabe sa dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP 2020-.

src_text: Umtlamo lo unikela ngamatshwayo amahlanu akhambisana neensika ze-NYP.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tlamela ka dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tsa maemo a kwa godimo tse di lepalepantsweng le dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP.

src_text: Amatshwayo la atlanywa nababambisani abanqophileko abanetjisakalo ekuthuthukisweni kwelutjha ngelizweni.
tgt_text: Dintlha tseno di dirilwe le baamegi ba ba maleba ba ba nang le kgatlhego mo tlhabololong le maatlafatso ya bašwa mo nageng.

src_text: Ukubuthelelwa kwemininingwana kuzokuhlukaniswa ukuya ngokweminyaka, ubulili, ukukhubazeka, ubutjhaba nobujamo bendawo ngamano la wokungenelela..     Ukuhlunga kuzokwenziwa kiyo yoke imikhakha karhulumende, amabubulo nemakhapanini wangeqadi..     ITlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko.
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso e tla kokoanngwang tla aroganngwa go ya ka dingwaga, bong, bosemorafe le go ya ka mafelo bodulo dintlha tseno di tswang kwa go ona.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele iTlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko kurhulumende, elinqophe ukuqalana neenkhala ezikhona kumthethomgomo wokuhlela ehlelweni lokuhlela lagadesi.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tseno tsa go baya maemo leitlho di tla dirwa mo maphateng otlhe puso, mo ditheong le mo lephateng la poraefete.

src_text: Amano wokungenelela ahlongozwako azokuqalana nokutlhayela kokulinganiswa kokuhlela nemikhakha yomithathu karhulumende.
tgt_text: Go tla kwala dipegelo tsa kotare nngwe le nngwe mme di phasaladiwe gabedi mo ngwageng.

src_text: Ukungenelela lokhu kuzokwethula ihlelo lokuhlunga elifakazelekako.
tgt_text: Leano la go Dira Tiro la Pholisi ya Thulaganyo e Golaganeng.

src_text: Itlhatlheli lomthethomgomo lethula godu ihlelo elibonakala lula ngokuhlela emikhakheni karhulumende isikhathi eside ukuya kesiphakathi nesifitjhani.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la go Dira Tiro la Pholisi ya Thulaganyo e Golaganeng mo pusong, le le lebeletseng go samagana le mekhino e supilweng ya dithulaganyo tsa pholisi mo tsamaisong ya ga jaana ya dithulaganyo.

src_text: Lizokusebenzela ukwethula amatjhuguluko wezomthetho ukuThuthukisa ukukhambelana nomphumela olindelekileko ekuhleleni kukarhulumende nekuhlungeni..     Ukwamukelwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwe-Ejensi yemiTjhoga ye-Afrika (i-AMA).
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di tshitshintsweng di tla samagana, gareng ga tse dingwe, le go tlhoka go lepalepanngwa ga dithulaganyo le didiriswa tsa peoleitlho.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukutlikitlwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwesiVumelwano i-AMA nokwethulwa kwaso ePalamende.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo di tla itsise sediriswa sa peoleitlho e theilweng mo bosuping.

src_text: Lokhu kuzokuphumelelisa isivumelwano esasayinwa siGungu seHlangano yobuNye bamaZwe we-Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Gape letlhomeso la pholisi le tla itsise ponelopele e bonolo mme go na le dithulaganyo tsa pakatelele go ya go tsa pakagare le tsa pakakhutshwane go ralala puso.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sethulela ikhonthinenti i-AMA ngokusemthethweni.
tgt_text: Le tla direla go itsise diphetogo tsa molao go tokafatsa tsamaelano le go bonela pele mo dithulaganyong le dipeoleitlho tsa puso.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokulawula imikhiqizo yezokwelapha godu ithuthukise ukuphepha kufikelelwe imiphumela enqotjhiweko ngemikhiqizo yokwelapha kukhonthinenti.
tgt_text: Go Amogelwa ga Tumelano ya go Tlhamiwa ga Setheo sa Melemo sa Seaforika ( (AMA).

src_text: Ukutlikitlwa nokuvunyelwa kwesivumelwanesi kuzokuthuthukisa ukuzibophelela kweSewula Afrika ephasini nakukhothinenti mayelana nokuqinisa ihlelo lokulawula imikhiqizo yezepilo..     Umbiko ngokuSebenza kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa  (i-R&D)  – yomnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go saeniwa ga Tumelano ya go Tlhamiwa ga AMA le go neelwa ga yona kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa (i-R&D) leminyaka emibili edlulileko (Umnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/21).
tgt_text: Seno se tla dira gore tumelano e amogetsweng ke Kokoanotheomolao ya Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganetseng Aforika ka ngwaga wa 2019 tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: Lokhu kukhambisana nesigaba se-11D (17) somThetho weButhelelo lomThelo we-1962 (umThetho Nomboro 58 we-1962), odinga bona imibiko le yethulwe ePalamende.
tgt_text: Tumelano tlhama AMA semmuso mo kontinenteng.

src_text: Ihlelo leKuthazomthelo linqophe ukukhuthaza amakhampani wangeqadi ukusisa ku-R&D kobana kunzinziswe ukukhula kwamasiso.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla laola ditlhagisiwa tsa kalafi, le go tokafatsa pabalesego le go dira ga ditlhagisiwa tsa kalafi mo kontinenteng.

src_text: Likghonakalisa ukuthuthukiswa kwesayensi nekghono lokusungula imikhiqizo emitjha ngehloso yokukhulisa umnotho begodu kukhuthaza nokuphalisana.
tgt_text: Go saeniwa le go amogelwa ga tumelano eno go tla tsweletsa maitlamo Aforika Borwa mo lefatsheng le mo kontinenteng malebana le go maatlafatsa thulaganyo ya taolo ya ditlhagiswa tsa yona tsa boitekanelo.
