src_text: Ikhabinethi ithabile ukuthi umbiko utjengisa ukuthi amakhampani amatjha enze isibawo sesibonelelo somthelo.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Tiragatso ya Lenaneo la Thotloetso ya Lekgetho la Dipatlisiso le Tlhabololo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.

src_text: Ukhuthaza amanye amakhampani ukufikelela iskimu lesi njengengcenye yokukhulisa amasiso wawo nokusimamisa ukukhula komnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go neelwa ga Palamente ga pegelo ya Lenaneo la Thotloetso ya Lekgetho la R&D ya dingwaga tse pedi tse di fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).

src_text: Amakhampani aphezulu amane ekungiwo afumana isibonelelo somthelo asemkhiqizweni wezokulima, zeemayini, amakhemikhali; ubunikazi beemayini; amakhemikhali, zokuziphotjhonga, imikhakha yeenhlahla yobuqharhaqharha bethekniki nelwazi lamakhompyutha evunyelwe yiKhabinethi njengemikhakha emaqaloqangi eHlelweni lokuThuthukisa amaBubulo.
tgt_text: Seno ke go tsamaelana le karolo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho la Letseno wa ngwaga wa 1962 (Molao 58 wa 1962) o laelang gore go tlhagisiwe dipegelo tseno kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: Umbiko ozeleko uyafumaneka kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeSayensi nobuKghwari ku-www.dst.gov.za..     IForamu Yokukhuliswa Komnotho namaThuba e-Afrika (i-AGOA) Yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la thotloetso ya lekgetho le ikaeletse go rotloetsa ditlamo tsa poraefete go beeletsa mo R&D go susumetsa kgolo ya dipeeletso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kweForamu i-AGOA ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Le kgontsha tsweletso ya saense le boitshimololedi gore go nne le kgolo ya ikonomi, le go tsweletsa bokgoni jwa go gaisana.

src_text: I-AGOA yenziwa yabamthetho yi-United States of America (i-USA) ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukunikela ukuzikhethela ngezerhwebo emazweni amanengi we-Afrika engeSewula nemamakethe we-USA.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse gore pegelo bontsha gore ditlamo tse dintšhwa di dirile dikopo tsa thotloetso ya lekgetho rotloetsa ditlamo tse dingwe go fitlhelela sekema seno jaaka karolo ya go godisa dipeeletso tsa tsona le go tlhosetsa kgolo ya ikonomi.

src_text: Imikhiqizo yeSewula Afrika ngaphasi kwe-AGOA ifaka hlangana iinthelo ezigonywako, amantongomani, iinkoloyi, iinsimbi zeenkoloyi, i-ayoni, isimbi nemikhiqizo yekhemikhali.
tgt_text: Ditlamo tse di kwa godimo tse nne tse di fitlheletseng thotloetso ya lekgetho di mo phetolong ya tsa temothuo; phetolo ya ditlhagiswa tsa meepo; maphata dikhemikhale, ditlolo, melemo le botegeniki jwa motlakase le Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso leng maphata Kabinete beileng gore ke ditlapele mo Thulaganyong ya Dikgato ya Pholisi ya Intaseteri.

src_text: Kusazokumenyezelwa ilanga nendawo ekuzokubanjelwa kiyo iforamu le.
tgt_text: Pegelo ka botlalo ka fitlhelelwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi: www.dst.gov.za.

src_text: UmButhano waboNgqongqotjhe wesiQhema esiThunywe ukuButhelela iLwazijikelele ngePhasi (i-GEO) womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Kgolo le Ditšhono wa Aforika (AGOA)–.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele iSewula Afrika ukubamba umButhano waboNgqongqotjhe we- GEO eKapa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke ditiragalo tsa gore go tla tshwarelwa ka fa nageng Foramo ya AGOA ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: I-GEO iyihlangano yaborhulumende eyahlonywa ngomnyaka we-2003 ngemva komButhano wePhasiloke weTuthuko eNzinzileko.
tgt_text: AGOA simolotswe ke naga ya Amerika ka ngwaga wa 2000 go dira gore kgwebisano magareng ga dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika le mmaraka wa dinaga tsa Amerika.

src_text: Umbuthano lo usebenza njengekundla emikhakhaminengi lapho amazwe azinikela ngokufaka isandla emnqopheni ofanako wokwakha amahlelo we-GEO.
tgt_text: Ditlhagisiwa tse Aforika Borwa di rekisetsang dinaga tsa kwa ntle ka fa tlase ga AGOA di akaretsa dijo tse di jewang, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolo tsa dikoloi, tshipi le dikhemikhale.

src_text: I-GEO njenganje inaborhulumende bamazwe abangaphezu kwe-113, abama-30 babo ngebe-Afrika kanti iinhlangano ezizibandakanyako ezili-140, ezili-11 zazo ngeze-Afrika.
tgt_text: Letlha le lefelo di sa ntse di tla begwa.

src_text: ISewula Afrika kade ililunga leKomidi yesiGungu esiPhezulu ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 begodu njenganje abososayeni belizwe lekhethu bayazibandakanya emahlelweni wezerhubhululo adoswa phambili yi-GEO.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Setlhopha sa Tlhokomelo ya mo Lefatsheng (GEO) –.

src_text: USewula yiNyanga yeenThuthi (i-OTM) –.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Aforika Borwa tla tshwara Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO kwa Cape Town ka.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kwejima le-OTM ngoMgqibelo nali-1 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sishov’ingolovane: sisoke sakha umthangalasisekelo weenthuthi owakha nonzinzisa iindlela zokuziphilisa”.
tgt_text: GEO ke setheo sa dipuso se se tlhomilweng ka 2003 morago ga Samiti ya Lefatshe ya 2002 ya Tlhabololo e Tsweletsegang dira jaaka polatefomo ya maphatamantsi moo dinaga di ithaopang go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tse di tshwaraganetsweng tsa tsamaiso ya GEO.

src_text: I-OTM yaqobe mnyaka iyelelisa ngeenthuthi njengenye yamatshwayo aqakathekileko ekukhuleni komnotho nokuthuthuka okusabaleleko.
tgt_text: Ga jaana mo go GEO go na le dipuso tsa bosetšhaba di feta 113, mme di le 30 mo go tsona di tswa mo kontinenteng ya Aforika mme go na le ditheo di ka nna 140 tse di nang le seabe, mme di le 11 tsa tsona di tswa mo Aforika.

src_text: Kunezinto ezizokwenziwa ukukhangisa imikhakha ehlukileko yomthangalasisekelo weenthuthi kezemmoyeni, zemanzini, iinthuthi zomphakathi neendlela.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ga a bolo go nna tokololo ya Komitikhuduthamaga e tsayang karolo go tloga ka ngwaga wa 2005 mme batlhankedi ba tsa saense ba naga ya rona ga jaana ba na le seabe mo ditiragalong di le mmalwa tsa boitshimololedi mo dipatlisisong tse di gogwang kwa pele ke GEO.

src_text: Okhunye okuzokwenziwa kuzokuba kuyelelisa mayelana nokuphepha ngaphakathi kweenthuthi nokuvikeleka emkhakheni weenthuthi.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Diphalane ya Dipalangwa (OTM) –.

src_text: Urhulumende uhlala azibophelele ekuthuthukiseni umthangalasisekelo wezeenthuthi, eendaweni zemakhaya nezedrobheni, ukuze kuphunyeleliswe ukuthuthwa kwepahla nabantu..     UmHlangano weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) weHlelo lezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu (i-UN-HABITAT).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tlhomiwa ga letsholo la OTM ka Lamatlhatso, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fa tlase ga moono: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa a agang le go tsweledisa boiphediso”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukubanjwa komhlangano wamalunga we-UN-HABITAT eJwanisbhege mhla ali- 16 ukufikela nakali-17 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Letsholo la OTM la ngwaga le ngwaga le dirisediwa go oketsa temoso ya dipalangwa jaaka nngwe ya dikarolo tsa botlhokwa tsa kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhabololo ya dibaka.
Go tla nna le ditiragatso di le mmalwa go bontsha dintlha tse di farologaneng tsa mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa diphofo, mawatle, dipalangwa tsa botlhe le ditsela.

src_text: UmNyango wezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu uzokuhlela umhlangano lo wamalanga amabili ozokukhanjelwa badosiphambili bezepolitiki, izazi ezibasebenzi kilomkhakha nabarhubhululi, kufaka hlangana amalunga aqakathekileko weKomidi yabaJameli basaFuthi be-UN-HABITAT abanzinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.
tgt_text: Gape ditiragatso di tla oketsa temoso malebana le pabalesego le tshireletsego ya dipalangwa.

src_text: Amaphuzu aqakathekileko azokufaka hlangana ukungenelela kwamatjhuguluko eendaweni zemitlhatlhana nalezo eziminyeneko..     Imiphumela yemikhulumiswano le izokufikela esitlhorini sokuhlonywa kweTlhatlha leHlelo lokuSebenza lePhasiloke, elizokwethulwa emKhandlwini we-UN-HABITAT ngomnyaka wee-     ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Go tla nna gape le dipuisano le baamegi go buisanela dikgwetlho tse di farologaneng mo lephateng la dipalangwa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke wezeNturhu eQothele bobuLili obuThileko nokuBulawa kwabaNtu abaSikazi (i-GBVF) womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Puso sa ntse itlamile go tokafatsa mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa naga, kwa metsemagaeng le metsesetoropong, go dira gore go nne bonolo go nolofatsa motsamao wa dithoto le batho.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke we-GBVF womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Ditšhabakopano la Manno Batho - Habitat (UN-HABITAT).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela itlhatlha lomthetho lokuhlonywa kwehlangano ezokusiza ngokungenelela ekuruthuleni ngomrabhu i-GBVF.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga kopano ya ditokololo tsa UN-HABITAT kwa Johannesburg ka la bo 16 le la bo 17 Diphalane..  Lefapha la Manno Batho le tla gokaganya kopano eno ya matsatsi le mabedi e tla tsenelwang ke baeteledipele ba sepolotiki, badiri le babatlisisi, go akarediwa ditokololo tsa botlhokwa tsa Komiti ya Baemedi ba Leruri ba UN-HABITAT ba ba kwa Nairobi, Kenya.

src_text: Uqalelela godu ukuhlonywa kweBhodi yomKhandlu ezokusiza nokutjheja ukwethulwa kweQhinga lokulwisana ne-GBVF leliZweloke, elavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngoSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Dintlha tsa botlhokwa tse di tla buisanelwang di tla akaretsa go batla ditsereganyo tse di lereng diphetogo mo mafelong baipei le ditakana.

src_text: Ibhodi le izokuba nobujameli beenhlangano zomphakathi obuma-51% nama-49% wembusweni.
tgt_text: Ditlamorago tsa dipuisano tseno di tla konosediwa ka go tlhomiwa ga Letlhomeso la Thulaganyo ya Ditiragatso e Akaretsang e tla tlhagisiwang kwa Kokoanonopeomolaong ya UN-HABITAT go tlhomamisiwa ka  Melao e Kwalolotsweng Sešwa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlule esigabeni sokulalelwa mphakathi bewuveze amazizo ngawo..     UmThethomlingwa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo yeGwayi  neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibuLekthroniki wee-.
tgt_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Lekgotla la Naga la go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Pogiso le Polao ya Basadi le Basetsana (GBVF) wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa wemiKhiqizo yeGwayi neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibu-Lekhthroniki wee-2018, onqophe ukwesula umThetho we-1993 (umThetho Nomboro 83 womNyaka we-1993)  wokuLawula imikhiqizo yeGwayi, njengombana ukhitjelelwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Lekgotla la Naga la go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Pogiso le Polao ya Basadi le Basetsana (GBVF) wa 2021 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng go sekasekiwa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo unqophe ukuqinisa amagadango wezamaphilo womphakathi ngomnqopho wowuwukhambelanisa nesiVumelwano seKoro yeHlangano yezePilo ePhasiniloke eQalelela ukuLawula ukuBhenywa kweGwayi.
tgt_text: Molao yo Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro le le leng mo molaong le le laelang gore go tlhamiwe setheo sa molao se se tla samaganang ka tolamo le GBVF.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa hlangana nokhunye, iindawo ezingaphakathi nezingaphandle kwemakhiwo ekungakafaneli nakancani ukukhokhelwa igwayi ngakizo; ukupheliswa kokuthengwa kwegwayi emitjhinini, uqinise nokupakwa kwegwayi netshwayo eliyelelisako.
tgt_text: Molao ono gape laela gore go tlhamiwe le Boto ya Lekgotla e tla okamang maemo taolo ya setheo seno mmogo le go okama dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Thulaganyo ya Maano Naga GBVF Kabinete ka kgwedi ya Diphalane 2020 amogetseng gore tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlulile esigabeni esingeneleleko sokukhulumisana nababelani, kufaka hlangana ibubulo legwayi, iinhlangano zomphakathi neminyango karhulumende ethintekako     Iminyanya Ezako.
tgt_text: Mo kemeding yotlhe ya boto eno 51% tla nna baagi mme 49% tla nna puso.

src_text: UmButhano wama-77 weBandla Jikelele le-UN (i-UNGA77).
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go batla maikutlo setšhaba ka molao ono di setse di garetswe.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyingcenge ye-UNGA77 ebanjwe e-Ofisi eliKhulu le-UN e-New York City e-USA ukuthoma mhlana ama-20 ukufikela nakama-27 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Isikhathi Somlando: Ukutherhula ipengu ezokuletha amatjhuguluko emirarweni ehlobanako”.
tgt_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko le Didirisiwa tsa Eleketeroniki tsa Motsoko le tsa go Goga Motsoko wa.

src_text: Emazweni angeSewula, umthelela kezomnotho nakezehlalakuhle wehlekelele yobuLwele beNgogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19) awulingani mayelana nokuvuselelwa emazweni athuthukileko ngeTlhagwini godu lokhu kubiza ukubambisana kizo zoke iintjhaba ukuqinisekisa kobana akunalizwe elisalelako..     Ukwandulela iKulumopikiswano ye-UN, uNobhala Zombelele we-UN, uNom.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko le Didirisiwa tsa Eleketeroniki tsa Motsoko le tsa go Goga Motsoko wa 2018 o batlang go phimola Molao wa ga jaana wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko wa ngwaga wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) go ya ka fao kwalolotsweng sešwa ka gone.

src_text: António Guterres, uzokubiza umhlangano omayelana “Nokuletha Amatjhuguluko kezeFundo” abambe nomhlangano wezinga eliphezulu omayelana nemiNqopho yokuThuthukisa ukuNzinza (ama-SDG).
tgt_text: Gape Molao yo Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono batla go maatlafatsa dikgato tsa naga tsa boitekanelo jwa setšhaba le go di lepalepanya le Tumelano ya Letlhomeso la Setheo sa Lefatshe sa Boitekanelo malebana le Taolo ya Motsoko.

src_text: Kulindelwe ukuthi umhlangano omayelana nama-SDG utjheje iindlela ekungavuselelwa ngazo ikuthalo begodu kurhatjiswe nokusungulwa kwama-SDG.
tgt_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono tshitshinya, gareng ga tse dingwe, gore motsoko se tlhole gogelwa fa gare ga batho mo mafelong ka fa gare ga meago le mo mafelong mangwe kwa ntle ga meago; go ilediwa go rekisiwa ga metsoko mo metšhining e rekisang, mme ema nokeng ntlha e buang ka diphuthelwana tsa metsoko le ya matshwao tsiboso.

src_text: Ilanga LamaGugu.
tgt_text: Go dirilwe dikgato tse di tseneletseng tsa go batla maikutlo setšhaba le bao ba amegang ba ba farologaneng, go akarediwa intaseteri ya motsoko, mekgatlho ya baagi le mafapha a maleba puso  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: UMengameli u-Ramaphosa uzokwethula ikulumo eqakathekileko emnyanyeni wokugidinga iLanga lamaGugu womnyaka wee-2022 e-Union Buildings ngoMgqibelo, mhla ama-24 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Kopano ya bo77 ya Kokoanokakaretso ya Ditšhabakopano (UNGA77).

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokubanjwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ukugidinga Ilifa lika-Solomon Linda noMbhino Wesintu weSewula Afrika”..     INyanga yamaGugu yanonyaka itjheja umvumo wesintu weSewula Afrika khulukhulu umbhino wengomabusuku (Isicathamiya) nendima yawo ekulu kezemidlalo, ubukghwari, ubugwali, zamasiko namagugu.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla nna le seabe mo UNGA77 e diragalang kwa ntlokgolo ya UN kwa New York City kwa USA go tloga ka la bo 20 go fitlha ka la bo 27 Lwetse 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono: “Motlha wa diphetogo: Re bulela ditharabololo tsa diphetogo tsa dikgwetlho tse di golaganeng”.

src_text: Ummongondaba lo wethulela ingwani umnyaka wama-60 wokudlula ephasini kombhini nomtlami weengoma u-Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), obekaziwa godu ngelika-Solomon Ntsele, owaziwa khulu njengomtlalmi wengoma ethi, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Mo dikarolong tse di mo Borwa mo lefatsheng, ditlamorago tsa ikonomi le tsa go itirela letseno ga baagi tse di bakilweng ke Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19) ga di lekalekane le tsa dinaga tse di ikgonang kwa Bokone fa go lebeletswe go itharabologelwa ga dinaga tseno mme seno se tlhoka gore go nne le maiteko a tlhakanetsweng ditšhaba tsotlhe go netefatsa gore ga go ope yo salelang kwa morago.

src_text: UmNyanya Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Sinye Welanga Lephasiloke Leenthuthi Zelwandle wee-2022 .
tgt_text: Pele ga Kopano ya UN ka Dingangisano tsa Merero ka go Farologana, Rre António Guterres tla bitsa samiti ya “Go fetola Thuto” mme go tla tshwarwa kopano e tsenelwang ke batho ba maemo a kwa godimo mme mogopolo mo kopanong eno tla tsepamisiwa mo Dipeelong tsa Tlhabololo tse di Nnelang Ruri (di-SDG).

src_text: ISewula Afrika izokubamba Umnyanya Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Sinye Welanga Lephasiloke Leenthuthi Zelwandle wee-2022 e-Durban ukusukela mhla ali-12 ukufikela nakali-14 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore kopano ya di-SDG tlhotlhomise ditsela tsa go busetsa motsamao le go akofisa tsenyotirisong ya tsona.

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokubanjwa ngesikhathi sinye ne-OTM, begodu uzokuba yingcenye yokuyelelisa ngomkhakha weenthuthi zelwandle.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Ngwaoboswa.

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokuletha abajameli bemazweni ahlukileko abazokubona ibubulo leenthuthi zelwandle zeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Moporesidente Ramaphosa tla neela puo ya letsatsi kwa meletlong ya Letsatsi la Bosetšhaba la Ngwaoboswa la 2022 kwa Union Buildings ka Lamatlhatso, 24 Lwetse.

src_text: ISewula Afrika ibe lilunga leHlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe yeenThuthi zeLwandle ukusukela ngomnyaka we-1995, ekumkhakha okhethekileko we-UN oqalene nokulawulwa komsebenzi wokuthutha ngeenkebhe.
tgt_text: Tiragalo eno tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga moono: “Re keteka Boswa jwa ga Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso wa Aforika Borwa”.

Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa monongwaga bua ka mmino wa setso wa Aforika Borwa, go totilwe mmino wa Isicathamiya gammogo le seabe se segolo se nnileng le sona mo metshamekong, botsweretshing, setsong le mo ngwaobosweng.

src_text: INyanga yezeVakatjhobukela.
tgt_text: Moono wa teng tlotlomatsa segopotso sa bo 60 sa go tlhokafala ga rammino le motlhami yono wa mmino, Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), yo gape itsegeng jaaka Solomon Ntsele, yo itsegeng thata jaaka motlhami wa pina ya “Mbube”.

src_text: INyanga yezeVakatjhobukela kilomnyaka igidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba weLanga lezokuVakatjha lePhasiloke (nakama-27 kuKhukhulamungu) othi “Sicabanga kabuTjha ngeVakatjhobukela”.
tgt_text: Tiragalo e Diragalang mmogo ya Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Dikepe ya.

src_text: Zevakatjhobukela ngelizweni ziqakathekile ekuvuselelweni komkhakha wezokuvakatjha, osiza khulu ku-GDP yeSewula Afrika nokuvula imisebenzi.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla bo tshwere Mokete wa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Mawatle o Diragalang mmogo le wa Kgwedi ya Diphalane ya Dipalangwa (OTP) ya 2022 kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 12 go fitlha ka la bo 14 Diphalane.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukubona umkhakha wezokuhlaliswa nokuphathwa kwabayeni ukhula ngokwesibalo sabantu abavakatjhako  ngemva kwesikhathi salokha nakwehle ingogwana i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Mokete ono tla tshwarwa ka nako le nngwe le ya go keteka OTM le yona tla bong le karolo ya go tsweletsa temoso ya lephata la rona la dikepe.

src_text: Amakhambo wangaphakathi kwelizwe abe ziingidi ezili-.
tgt_text: Mokete ono tla tsenelwa ke bannaleseabe go tswa kwa dinageng tse di farologaneng ba ba tla itemogelang intaseteri ya dikepe ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: 2 engcenyeni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-2022 anda nge-114% nakumadaniswa ngesikhathi esifanako somnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa sale le tokololo ya Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mawatle go tloga ka 1995 leng setheo se se itlhophileng sa UN se maikarabelo sona leng go laola dithulaganyo tsa go rwala dithoto tse di romelwang ka dikepe.

src_text: Lokhu kutjengise ikukhula ekubonakalako ngesikhathi esifanako somnyaka wee-2019, lapha kwaba namakhambo wangaphakathi kwelizwe aziingidi ezi-.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Bojanala.

src_text: Njengengcenye yokugidinga iNyanga yezeVakatjhobukela, iKhabinethi ikhuthaza amaSewula Afrika ukuthatha amakhambo ‘we-Shotleft’ ukuya eemfundeni zelizwe lekhethu ezihlukahlukeneko.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Bojanala monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Bojanala (27 Lwetse) wa “Re akanya sešwa ka ga Bojanala”.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ngokukhululeka isiqunto sekampani yaboflayi i-Air Belgium sokusungula umsebenzi wamakhambo waboflayi babo abeza eSewula Afrika ngeenkhathi ezithileko zonyaka, ukuthoma inyanga yona le (uKhukhulamungu), okuzokusiza khulu ikoro yezevakatjho bekuqinise nobujamo bethu bokuba lilizwe elingavakatjhelwa.
tgt_text: Bojanala jwa ka fa nageng bo botlhokwa mo go itharabologelweng ga lephata la Bojanala, le le nang le seabe se segolo mo Letsenong la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Dikuno (GDP) la ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa le go tlhamiwa ga ditiro.

src_text: Lokhu kufaka hlangana amakhambo waqobe ngeveke wokuya eKapa neJwanisbhege     Imilayezo.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse gore lephata la Bojanala le nnile le koketsego ya baeti morago ga paka ya COVID-.

src_text: SiyabathokozisaIkhabinethi ithokozise beyathumela iimfiselabuhle ku: UMengameli u-William Samoei Ruto weRiphabhliki ye-Kenya, obekwe esitulweni ngeLesibili, nakali-13 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022, ngemva kwamakhetho welizweloke agade anokuthula abanjwa mhla ali-9 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Maeto a tserweng ka fa nageng ke le.

src_text: ISekela likaMengameli u-David Mabuza wakhambela umnyanya lowo ajamele uMengameli u-Ramaphosa, norhulumende nabantu beRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: 2 milione a tserweng mo karolong ya ntlha ya 2022 mme bontshitse koketsego ya 114% fa go bapisiwa le paka eo ka.

src_text: IHlangano kaMakhakhularahwe yeSewula Afrika kunye neDrobha leKapa ngokubamba ngepumelelo iphaliswano i-Rugby World Cup Sevens phakathi kwamhlana ali-9 namhlana ali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Seno se bontshitse tokafalo e bonalang mo pakeng eo ka 2019, mo go nnileng le maeto a ka fa nageng le.

src_text: Bekungekokuthoma ukuthi umdlalo  omkhulukazi lo ubanjelwe elizweni le-Afrika kwathi iinkulungwana zabalandeli zazitika ngokubukela imidlalo kamakhakhulararhwe esezingeni eliphezulu bathabela nepatho ehle nefuthumeleko  yeSewula Afrika enikelwa abayeni.
tgt_text: 6 milione.

src_text: Amezwi Wokutjhiriya Ikhabinethi idlulise amezwi wokutjhiriya emindenini nabangani: Abentwana besikolo abali-18 nabantu abadala ababili abahlongakele engozini emasikizi ePongola, KwaZulu-Natala ngeLesihlanu mhla ali-16 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022 ngemva kokuthi itrogo itjhayisane bunqopha neveni egade ilayitjhe abafundi     Ukuqatjhwa.
tgt_text: Jaaka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Bojanala, Kabinete rotloetsa MaAforika Borwa go tsaya maeto ‘Shotleft’ go ya kwa diporofenseng tse di farologaneng.

src_text: Koke ukuqatjhwa kulawulwa kufakazeleka kweencwadi zefundo ezikhambisana nomsebenzi umuntu aqatjhelwe wona kunye nokuhlanjululwa kwebizo lomuntu okufaneleko     UNom.
tgt_text: Gape Kabinete neseditse pula tshwetso ya setlamo sa Air Belgium go bulela difofane tse di tswang kwa nageng eo go leba ka fa Aforika Borwa, go simolola ka kgwedi yona eno (ya Lwetse) leng se se tla godisang bojanala le go dira gore re tsetsepele mo maemong rona go nna mmamoratwa fa go tla mo go tsa bojanala.

src_text: Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale esikhundleni sokuba mNqophisi Zombelele (i-DG): UKomitjhinara womNyango wokuVuselelwa kwesiMilo weliZweloke     UDorh.
tgt_text: Tsona di tla akaretsa difofane tsa beke le beke go ya Cape Town le Johannesburg  Melaetsa.

src_text: Malixole Percival Mahlati esikhundleni sokuba liSekela lika-DG: ImiSebenzi yezePilo nokuThuthukisa zokuQatjha emNyangweni wezePilo     UNom.
tgt_text: Go AkgolaKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego:Moporesidente William Samoei Ruto wa Rephaboliki ya Kenya, yo tlhomilweng ka Labobedi, 13 Lwetse 2022, go latela ditlhopho tsa bosetšhaba tse di neng di rena kagiso tse di neng di tshwerwe ka 9 Phatwe.

src_text: Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki esikhundleni sokuba mTlami oyiHloko Zombelele emNyangweni wezokuLima, ukuBuyekezwa kweeNdaba zeNarha nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaKhaya     UNom.
tgt_text: Motlatsamoporesidente David Mabuza mo boemong jwa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa, le puso le batho ba Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ne tsenetse mokete ono wa go tlhomiwa mo setulong.Mokgatlho wa Rakabii wa Aforika Borwa le Motsemogolo wa Cape Town ka go tshwara ka katlego legato la borobedi la thonamente ya Rugby World Cup Sevens magareng ga la bo 9 le la bo 11 Lwetse ne le la ntlha tiragalo eno ya mabono tshwarelwa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa mme diketekete tsa balatedi ba ba neng ba tsenetse ba itemogetse lebebe la rakabii le kamogelo e tumileng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Phaswa Phineas Mamogale esikhundleni sokuba mPhathi oyiHloko kezeeMali emNyangweni wezePilo..     Ikhabinethi ivumelene nokuqatjhwa kwabalandelako     UNom.
tgt_text: MatshedisoKabinete rometse matshediso go bamalapa le ditsala tsa:Bana ba sekolo ba le 18 le bagolo ba babedi ba ba tlhokafetseng mo kotsing e setlhogo kwa Pongola, kwa KwaZulu-Natala ka Labotlhano, 16 Lwetse 2022 morago ga gore lori e nang le letoroko thulane ka dinko le bene e neng pegile barutwana  Ba ba Thapilweng.

src_text: Tshediso Matona esikhundleni sokuba nguKomitjhinara weKomitjhini yokuThuthukiswa okuBanzi kwabaNzima ngokomNotho     Amalunga womKhandlu wokuziLilela weBhodi yezamaFilimu: UNom.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang  Rre Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale thapilwe go okama maemo Mokaedikakaretso (DG): mo lephateng la Mokomišinara wa Bosetšhaba wa Lefapha la Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo  Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati thapilwe go okama maemo Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo lephateng la merero ya Dikolo tsa Kalafo tsa Thuto e kwa Godimo le ya go Tlhatlhelela Badiri mo Lefapheng la Boitekanelo  Rre Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki thapilwe go okama maemo Mosekasekikakaretso-Mogolo kwa Lefapheng la Temothuo, Ntšhwafatso ya Mafatshe le Tlhabololo ya Magae  Rre Phaswa Phineas Mamogale thapilwe go okama maemo Motlhankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete kwa Lefapheng la Boitekanelo.

src_text: Ukutholakala Kwamanzi.
tgt_text: Tshomarelo ya Metsi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlonipha kwawo imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi ekhe yabekelwa iindawo ezithileko zangeJwanisbhege, e-Tshwane kunye ne-Ekurhuleni ngomnqopho wokunzinzisa umthamo wamanzi eenlulwini zamanzi kileziindawo.
tgt_text: Kabibete lebogile Maaforika Borwa jaaka ba ikobetse dikgato tsa go somarela metsi tse di tsentsweng tirisong mo dikarolong tse di rileng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go dira bonnete jwa gore matamo metsi ga kgale.

src_text: Amadamu neenlulu zamanzi zilokhu zingaphasi kwegandelelo e-Gauteng ngenca yomtjhiso osahleleko amalanga la, kanti-ke njengoba asolo afunwa ngobunengi nje amanzi, i-Rand Water ibe yakateleleka ukuthi ibanciphisele khulu amanzi abomasipala beendawezi.
tgt_text: Metsi mo matamong le mo madutelong metsi tswelela go dirisiwa ka bontsi ka ntlha ya dithemphereitšha tse di kwa godimo go ralala Gauteng, mme tiriso eno ya metsi e kwa godimo bakile gore Rand Water fokotse thata metsi e tlamelang bommasepaleng.

src_text: Ihlangano yamanzi le iphakela umthamo wamanzi abantu abangaphezulu kweengidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, nakezinye iindawo zeMpumalanga, iFreyistata kunye neTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Setheo se sa tlamelo ya metsi se tlamela ka metsi mantsi go batho ba feta dimilione tse 11 mo Gauteng le mo dikarolong tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisetata le Bokone Bophirima..   Maikaelelo dikgato tseno tsa go somarela metsi, tse go seng tsela epe re ka di tilang ka yona, ke go dira bonnete jwa gore re nne le metsi a sa kgaleng mme re tla tswelela go ikobela tsona go fitlha maemo tokafala.
Kabinete ikuetse go baagi go tswelela go ikobela dikgato tsa go somarela metsi le go nna le seabe mo go diriseng metsi ka tshomarelo..   Go Ngala Ditiro kwa Transnet.

src_text: Lokhu kuqinteliswa kwamanzi esingeze sakubalekela kunqophe ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi, kanti-ke azokusolo aqinteliswe njalo bekube mhlazana kuba nobungcono kilobubujamo bezinto.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse tumelano ya meputso go dumelanweng ka yona ya dingwaga tse tharo magareng ga Transnet le United National Transport Union (UNTU) e tsenang tirisong go tloga ka la bo 1 Moranang 2022 go fitlha ka la bo 31 Mopitlwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele umphakathi ukuthi usolo ulandela imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi, ulime indimawo ngokubabalela amanzi njengoba ayindlala kangaka nje.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Thuanyo, Tsereganyo le Katlholelo tseregantse mo tumelanong e e tlisitseng boipelaetso ba ditokololo tsa UNTU kwa bokhutlong ka gangwe.

src_text: Ukunghalwa Komsebenzi Kwa-Transnet.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gape tshwetso ya South African Transport and Allied Workers Union ya go fedisa go ngala ditiro.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu esenziwe hlangana kwe-Transnet neyuniyoni yabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esithoma ukusebenza ngomhla wo-01 kuSihlabantangana wee-2022 ukuyokufika nakama-31 kuNtaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga boineelo jo bo dirilweng ke Transnet mabapi le go tsepamisa mogopolo mo tirong e saletseng kwa morago mo ditirelong tsa go rwala dithoto ka dikepe le diterene e bakilweng ke go ngala ditiro leng se se amileng ikonomi le makala a ikaegileng ka ditirelo tse ka tsela e sa itumediseng..   Kabinete lebogile tshegetso le tirisanommogo e neetsweng ke lekala la kgwebo mo pakeng ya go ngala ditiro.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano yalesisivumelwano beyenganyelwe yiKomitjhini yokuThobelana, ukuColela nokuLamula, lesisivumelwano-ke siqede khonokho ukunghalwa komsebenzi malunga we-UNTU.
tgt_text: Tshegetso eno rotloetsa kamano e tswelelang magareng ga boeteledipele ba Transnet le badiri leng se se tla tswelang mosola setlamo se le ikonomi ya naga..   Dikamano tsa Aforika Borwa – Saudi Arabia.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yasithokozela nesiqunto seyuniyoni i-South African Transport and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokuqeda ukunghalwa komsebenzi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Leeto la Tiro le le atlegileng kwa Pusong ya Saudi Arabia ka Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la bo 15 le la bo 16 Diphalane.

Mo leetong le, dinaga tse pedi tse di saenile Dimemorantamo tsa Tirisanommogo (di-MoU) mo makaleng a farologaneng a jaaka la temothuo, la bodirelatlhapi, la meepo, la metlakase e fetlhiwang ka ditsela tse dintšhwa, la tshireletso, la dipalangwa le la temothuo ya ditlhagisiwa tsa mo metsing.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isibopho se-Transnet sokuqalana nokuqeda ukusalela emva komsebenzi okwenzeke emadoyelweni wemikhumbi nesiporweni njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje, ngaleyindlela kwathikaziseka umnotho namakoro athembele kiwo.
tgt_text: Di-MoU tse dingwe tse di saenilweng di ka ga go tlhongwa ga Lekgotla la Kgwebo ya Motlhakanelwa, tirisano mo diintasetering tsa sesole le theko, gammogo le tirisano mo makaleng dipatlisiso tsa thutamaje.
Moporesitente dirisitse leeto le go laletsa dikgwebo tsa Saudi Arabia go tsenela khonferense ya botlhano ya peeletso ya Aforika Borwa e tla tshwarwang ka.

src_text: IKhabinethi izwakalise ukuthokoza kwayo ngesekelo nebambiswano elinikelwe mabhizinisi njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebisani le Aforika Borwa wa maemo bobedi ka bogolo mo Dinageng tsa Botlhabagare bile ke lefelo le legolo le dinaga tsa kgaolo eno di rekang mo go lona ditlhagisiwa.

src_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwano obungapheliko hlangana kwabaphathi bakwa-Transnet nebamayuniyoni kobanyana kuzokusizakala ikhampani le nomnotho welizwe.
tgt_text: Dikamano tsa boditšhaba magareng ga dinaga tsoopedi di nnile le seabe se sentle mo mererong ya kgwebisano le bobeeletsi..   Peeletso mo Mafaratlhatlheng.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go thankgololwa ga polante ya tlhagiso ya maemo a kwa godimo ka motlhagisi yo gaisang wa boditšhaba, ALPLA Group, kwa Lanseria mo Gauteng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilithokozele iVakatjho lomSebenzi elibe yipumelelo likaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokuya emBusweni we-Saudi Arabia ngomhla we-15 ukufikela ngomhla we-16 kuSewula wee-.

Evakatjhwenelo, amazwe amabili lawa atlikitle iimVumelwano zokuZwana (ama-MoU) ezili-17 emakorweni ahlukahlukileko, njengeyezokulima, yokuthiya iinhlambi, yokumayina, yegezi evuselelwako, yezokuphepha, zokuthutha kunye nokufuywa kweenyamazana zamanzi nokulinywa kweentjalo zamanzi.
tgt_text: Se se netefatsa boineelo ba ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa ba go tlhoma tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha jaaka tsela e ka tsosang ikonomi le go oketsa ditiro..   Peeletso ya bokana ka didolara tse dimilione tse 50 ke seabe sa botlhokwa mo leaning le legolong la Toropokgolo ya Ditirodintsi ya Lanseria e tla kgweetsang tswelelo le tirisogape gammogo le go tlhola le go boloka ditiro tse.

src_text: Amanye ama-MoU atlikitliweko ngamalungana nokusungulwa komKhandlu wezamaBhizinisi oHlanganyelweko, ukusebenzisana kezamabubulo weenkhali nokuthengwa kweensetjenziswa zepi kunye nezokusebenzisana ngerhubhululo lebhoduluko.
tgt_text: Mo go yona go akarediwa lenaneo la go ithutela tiro la baithutela mekhateroniki ba le 36 le borathekeniki ba tirisogape ba ditirelo tsa ALPLA go ralala borwa jwa Aforika.
Lenaneo la go ithutela tiro le tla simolola ka 2023, mme baithutela tiro ba ntlha ba le 12 ba Aforika Borwa ba tla bo ba tswa mo mafelong selegae..   Ditiragalo tsa Meepo tse di seng mo Molaong.

src_text: UMengameli usebenzise ivakatjhweli ukumema abosomabhizinisi be-Saudi Arabia ekhonferensini yamasiso yesihlanu yeSewula Afrika ezokubanjwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong di phuaganya metse mo setšhabeng sa borona mmogo le ikonomi ya rona, le go baka tatlhegelo ya lotseno go bobedi puso le lekala la meepo..   Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go amogiwa moselesele wa ditlhobolo le go tshwarwa ga babelaelwa ba le 20 ba ba golaganngwang le ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong ka nako ya letsholo le le neng la dirwa kwa šafoteng ya moepo wa Stilfontein kwa Bokone Bophirima..   Kabinete ikuela go Maaforika Borwa go tswelela go dirisana le ditheo tsa molao go dira bonnete jwa gore matsholo thibelo ya bosenyi isago le ona atlega.

src_text: I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe lesibili ngobukhulu emazweni we-Middle East arhwebelana neSewula Afrika, kanti-ke ngiyo emthombo omkhulu ukudlula yoke esiphandeni sekhabo kathengisela iSewula Afrika ipahla.
tgt_text: Se se tla romela molaetsa o bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo duele, le gore disenyi di tla tshwarwa le go sekisiswa ntle le poifo kgotsa kgethololo..   Motlakase.

src_text: Ubudlelwano bamazwe ngamazwe hlangana kwamazwe amabili la, benze ukuthi kube nokurhwebelana nokusiselana okuhle.
tgt_text: Go sale gale Eskom saenile ditumelano tsa kadimo tsa dingwaga tse 30 le babeeletsi ba bafetlhi ba ba ba ikemetseng ba motlakase ba le bane go aga mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhiwa ga motlakase o phepa kwa diteišeneng tsa motlakase tsa Majuba le Tutuka kwa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Ukusisa Kumthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Dikadimo tse tsa lefatshe di tla ngoka peeletso e lekanyediwang go diranta di le dibilione tse.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukugunyazwa kokwakhiwa kwefemu eyenza iplastiki yezinga eliphezulu e-Lanseria, e-Gauteng, ezakwakhiwa yi-ALPLA Group emkhiqizi wamazwe ngamazwe.

tgt_text: Babeeletsi ba bane ba - HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le  Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tla tsenya bonnye dimekawate di le 2 000 mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase bosetšhaba..   Mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhwa ga motlakase solofelwa go golaganngwa mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase mo dikgweding tse 24 go ya go 36 go tloga ka konosetso ya tsa matlole, go ikaegilwe ka ditetlelelo tsa tikologo, tlhaolo ya lefatshe le tse dingwe tsa taolo..   Dikgato tsa go Dira Bonnete jwa gore Naga ga Tlhaele Dijo.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuqinisa isibopho sikaMengameli Ramaphosa sokulungiselela ukuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo njengendlela yokukhuthaza ukuhluma komnotho nokwandiswa kwemisebenzi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Kopano ya Agri SA ya 2022 tshwarelwe kwa Pretoria ka la bo 13 le la bo 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Re Kotula seo re se Jetseng ka fa Nageng”.

Kopano e ne buisanela merero e jaaka go dira gore maanomagolo temothuo direle balemi ba naga; mafaratlhatlha a boikanyego tlhagiso ya dijo ya selegae go isa isagong, le go matlafatsa bokgoni ba batlhagisi ba dijo go dira ka ditlhagiswa tse di jetsweng mono..   Mo dikgatong tse dingwe gape tsa go dira bonnete jwa gore naga ga tlhaele dijo, Kabinete amogetse gape go thankgololwa ga Sefala sa Bosetšhaba sa Tshireletso ya Dimela le Diphologolo, ke Lenaneo la Semphato sa Itlhamelo mo go tsa Temothuo le Ikonomi ya Dimela le Diphologolo sa Lefapha la Saense le Boitlhamelo, ka tirisano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.

src_text: Amasiso weengidi ezima-US$50 aliliqha eliqakathekileko eplanini ye-Lanseria Smart City ezakusekela ukubambelela nokusetjenziswa kweensetjenziswa ngobutjha beyisize nokuvulwa nokulondwa kwemisebenzi ema-.
tgt_text: Sefala se se tla tshegetsa thibelo, phokotso le taolo ya malwetse dimela le diphologolo leng se se tla oketsang tlhagiso, tshireletso ya dijo le tlhabololo e tsepameng ya metsemagae   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Hlanganapho kubalwe nehlelo lokuthwasisela abantu abama-36 umsebenzi wama-mechatronic nabosocwephetjhe bokusebenzisa iinsetjenziswa ngobutjha emisebenzini ye-ALPLA Group e-Afrika engeSewula.
tgt_text: Mametlelelo ya Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng ya Mokgatlo wa Tirisano ya Aforika (AU).

src_text: Ihlelo lokufundiselwa umsebenzeli lizokuthoma ngomnyaka wee-2023, la kuzokuthonywa khona ngabantu abali-12 beSewula Afrika abavela eendaweni zakhona kilesisifunda.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tšhata ya AU ka ga Meono le Melawana ya Tsamaiso e Seng ya Bogareng, Bobusi ba Selegae le Tlhabololo ya Selegae gore mametlelelwe.

src_text: Ukumayina Ngokungasi Semthethweni.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa saenile Tšhata ka Phatwe.

src_text: Ukumayina ngokungasi semthethweni kulimaza umphakathi nomnotho welizwe lekhethu, bekubangele nokuthi urhulumende nekoro yeemayini balahlekelwe yimali.

tgt_text: Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng tlamela letlhomeso go dinaga tsotlhe tse leng ditokololo setlankana sa kaedi ka ga tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya dithata le ditiro go tswa go puso ya bosešhaba go ya go makala mangwe puso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukufunyanwa kwetjathokazi leengidi nokubotjhwa kwabasolwa abama-20 abahlotjaniswa nokumayina ngokungasi semthethweni, ababotjhwe lokhuya abathobelisimthetho nabebahlola umgodi wemayini ye-Stilfontein eTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Tšhata samagana bogolo le tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya thata le ditiro, letlhomeso la bobusi ba selegae le tlhabololo ya selegae..   Lekgotla la Boditšhaba la Ngwaga le Ngwaga la bo 32 la Pabalesego mo Diporong (IRSC).

Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga Kopano ya Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya bo 32 ya IRSC kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka 1 go fitlha ka 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Poposešwa ya diporo mo Lefatsheng le le sa tlhomamisegeng”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili asebenzisane nabathobelisimthetho ukuqinisekisa ipumelelo yamajima alwisana nobulelesi.
tgt_text: RSC ke kopano sa boditšhaba e kopanyang dirutegi mo mererong ya pabalesego ya diporo go ralala lefatshe go abelana maitemogelo bona ka maikaelelo go tokafatsa pabalesego ya diporo..   Jaaka tokololo ya IRSC, Molaodi wa Taolo ya Diporo wa Aforika Borwa nnile moamogelabaeng wa kopano la bofelo ka.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakuthumela umlayezo onamandla othi ubulelesi abunamvuzo, nothi izelelesi zizakubotjhwa bezitjhutjhiswe ngaphandle kwevalo nokurhawukelwa.
Iindaba Zegezi.
tgt_text: Seralwa sa Leano la Mafaratlhatlha Bosetšhaba la 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya bo.

src_text: Mhlapha u-Eskom utlikitle iimvumelwano zama-30 weminyaka zokuthenga sakuqatjha nabaphehli begezi abazijameleko abane abazakwakha iimphehligezi ezitja ezingasilaphazi ummoya eMajuba neThuthuka, eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go phasaladiwa ga seralwa sa NIP 2050 Kgato ya bo 2 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi.

src_text: Ukuqatjhiswa kwenarha kilelijima kuzakudosa amasiso alinganiselwa ema-R40 wamabhiliyoni.
tgt_text: Leano le le neelana ka tsela ya go matlafatsa le go tlaleletsa diporojeke tsa puso tse di golaganeng..

Le tlhagisa diporojeke tsa botlhokwa tsa mafelobonno batho; motlakase wa bommasepala; metsi; matlakala a popota; dipalangwa; mafaratlhatlha thuto le boitekanelo; mafaratlhatlha dijithale, le bosenyi le bobodu..   Popego ya leano le tlamela ka ponelopele ya karolo e tshwanetseng go lejwa tlamela ka tshekatsheko ya maemo ga jaana tlhalosa dipeelo tse di botlhokwa go netefatsa katlego le go tlhalosa tse di tshwanetseng go dirwa go fitlhelela ponelopele eo tshitshinya tsela ya tsenyotirisong e tshwanetseng go dirwa mo pakeng ya dingwaga tse tharo tsa leanotiro..   Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.

src_text: Abasisaba begezi abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ubuncani bakhona bazakungezelela igezi ezii-2000 zama-megawatt ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.
Letlhomeso le le phasaladitswe ka 2021 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi..   Letlhomeso le le tlamela ka dipilara tse tlhano tsa ditsereganyo mo go direng Bodiredipuso ba porofešenale.

src_text: Amandla amatjha wokuphehlwa kwegezi kulindeleke ukuthi athungelelwe ethungelelwaneni legezi kungakapheli iinyanga ezima-24 ukuya kezima-36 ukusukela esikhathini sokutlikitlwa kwemitlolo yesekelo leemali, kuye ngokuthi iindaba zebhoduluko, zokusikwa kwenarha nezinye ezifuna imvumo zizakusetjenzwa ziqedwe ngesikhathi esingangani.
tgt_text: Dipilara tse di akaretsa go ngoka le tlhaolo ya pele ga go tsena mo Bodiredipusong; peodinakong le tshimololo; thulaganyo le taolo ya tiragatso; thuto e tswelelang le tlhabololo ya porofešenale; le tlhatlogo ka maemo mo tirong le ditiragalo mo tirong..   Diphetogo mo Dipeelong tsa Tiro tsa Bakaedikakaretso (bo DG).
Kabinete amogetse pegelo e tshitshinyang mekgwa ya go matlafatsa nonofo le bokgoni ba bo DG mo Bodiredipusong.

src_text: Ukutholakala Kokugoma Okwaneleko.
tgt_text: Pegelo e dirile ditshitshinyo di le mmalwa, go akaretsa paka ya tiro ya bo DG le taolo ya maatlatiro ka Bothati ba Khuduthamaga go bantlhankedi ba ba rweleng maikarabelo..   Pegelo e tshitshintse gape gore DG mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente tla tsewa gape le Tlhogo ya Botsamaisi ba Puso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukusingathwa kweKhongresi yezokuLima yeSewula Afrika (i-Agri SA Congress 2022) ePitori ngomhla we-13 ukuya kumhla we-14 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Silimela Ekhaya.” Ikhongresi le ibonisene ngeendaba ezinjengokuthi amaplani wezokulima ngokuphelela kwawo awenziwe abe asebenzele abalimi bekhethu; umthangalasisekelo obambelelako wokugoma okulinywe ekhethwapha; ibhoduluko langekhethu alenziwe lihlale likulungele ukutjalela nokukhiqizela ingomuso lekhethu ukugoma, kuqiniswe namandla nekghono labalimi lokusebenza nokulungisa ukugoma okulinywe ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Mo diporofenseng, tiro e tla newa oDG ba ba mo dikantorong tsa Ditonakgolo.

Pegelo e tshitshintse gape mekgwa ya go kaela mafapha ka ga taolo ya dikonteraka tsa bo DG..   Tsamaiso ya Taolo ya Tiragatso ntšhwa ya bo DG a tlhabololwa go nyalanya le diphetogo tse di dumeletsweng..   Tona ya Nama-o-Tshwere ya Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi, Rre Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa kopano ya bobegakgang mo bekeng e tlang go tlhalosa Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale le go tlhagisa gape le diphetogo tse di letleletsweng mo dipeelong tsa tiro ya bo DG..   Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya Lekwalopuso la Mabudusatsela ka ga Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (WPRPD) ya 2020-.

src_text: Ukuqalelela iqalontanzi lokutholakala kokugoma ukuya phambili, iKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nokuvulwa kwe-National Biosecurity Hub evulwe liHlelo lokuSebenzisana i-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation lomNyango wezeSayensi naMandla wokuSungula, ngokubambisana neYunivesithi yePitori (i-TUKS).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya WPRPD e tlhagisang peodinakong ka go tsenngwa tirisong ga WPRPD.

src_text: IZikweli lizakusekela ukukhandelwa, ukuphungulwa nokulawulwa kwezifo zeentjalo nefuyo, khona-ke okuzakusiza ekuphakamiseni inani lomkhiqizo, ukutholakala nokuvikeleka kokugoma kunye nokuphakanyiswa komsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya okubambelelako   Iinqunto Zekhabinethi.
tgt_text: Pegelo e akaretsa ditshitshinyo go tswa go mafapha puso bosetšhaba le diporofense tlamela ka peodinakong ka ga tsenyotiriosong ya pholisi e akaretsang kabo ya matlole..   Pegelongwaga ya ntlha ya tswelopele phasaladitswe ka.

src_text: Ukufakazelwa Kokusatjalaliswa Komtlolo Wesivumelwano SeHlanganisela YamaZwe WoBunye Be-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Tswelopele ya botlhano letleletswe go phasaladiwa ka kuranta ya puso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komTlolo wesiVumelwano samaGugu neKambisolawulo yokuSatjalaliswa, iLawuleko likaRhulumende weeNdawo zemaKhaya kunye nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaKhaya kobanyana uyokufakazelwa.
ISewula Afrika yatlikitla umtlolo wesivumelwano lo ngoRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya Tumelano ka ga go Fedisiwa ga Mefuta yotlhe ya Kgethololo Kgatlhanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
Kabinete dumeletse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore mametlelelwe.

src_text: UmTlolo wokuSatjalaliswa lo unikela umtlamo oyikombandlela kiwo woke amazwe amalunga ngokusatjalaliswa kwamandla nemisebenzi ukusukela kurhulumende welizwe loke ukuya keminye imikhakha karhulumende.
tgt_text: Diphetogo tse di tlamela ka paka e okeditsweng ya dikopano tsa komiti e sekasekang dipegelo tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo..   Aforika Borwa saenile tumelano ka 1993 le go mametlelela ka Sedimonthole.

src_text: Umtlolo lo uqalene khulukhulu nokusatjalaliswa kwamandla nemisebenzi, umtlamo welawuleko likarhulumende kunye nokuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Go romelwa kwa Palamenteng go senka go golaganya tumelano e mametleletsweng mo malobeng le tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya tumelano .

src_text: Umhlangano Wezokuphepha Weentimela Emazweni Ngamazwe (i-IRSC) Wehlandla Lama-32 Waqobemnyaka.
tgt_text: Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto Tebang le Thuto Kgolwane.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukusingathwa koMhlangano we-IRSC wehlandla lama-32 waqobemnyaka ozakubanjelwa eJwanisbhege ukusukela mhlana li-01 ukuya nakasi-6 kuSewula wee-2023, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sivuselela Imizila Yeentimela Ebujameni Obunganatlha.”               .
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto tebang le Thuto Kgolwane gore tsenngwe molaong semmuso.

src_text: I-IRSC yikundla yamazwe ngamazwe ehlanganisa abosomakghonofundwa bezokuphepha kweentimela bephasi loke kobanyana bazokubonisana ngabakwaziko, ngomnqopho wokwenza bona imizila yeentimela iphephe ngcono.
tgt_text: Fa sena go tsenngwa molaong semmuso tla romelwa go Mokgatlo wa Thuto, Saenthifiki le Setso wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) le mono gae tla nna karolo ya Molao wa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Naga la Makwalothuto wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008)..   Tumelano eno ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe tlhoma melawana ya lefatshe ka bophara ya Kamogelo ya makwalothuto ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane le makwalothuto mangwe ka go dira gore lefatshe ka bophara go se nne le makwalothotu a sa tseeweng tsiya a nang le lehunelo, le a sa tlhaolweng.
Tumelano eno neela tetla ya gore makwalothuto dinaga disele mo dinageng tse 193 tse leng ditokololo tsa UN amogelwe ke dinaga tseno..   Kgogelomorago ya Ditokafatso mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.

src_text: Njengelunga le-IRSC, umLawuli wezokuPhepha kwemiZila yeenTimela eSewula Afrika ugcine ukusingatha lekundla ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhomamisitse pegelo e dirilweng ke Kantoro ya ga Moporesitente ka Mosupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogela morago diphetogo tse di dirilweng tsa 2022 mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga e bidiwang gape Bukana ya Ditona..   Ditokafatso tse di dirilweng ka Moranang 2022 di tlamela ka mothamo o okeditsweng mo dikantorong tse dingwe tsa Ditona tse di nang le maikarabelo makala feta bongwe.

src_text: Umtlamo Womthangalasisekelo Welizweloke Wee-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Wesigaba sesi-.
tgt_text: Di ne di tlhagisa gape gore Puso tshwanetse go rwala maikarabelo ka botlalo ditshenyegelo tse di jaaka tlamelo ya motlakase le metsi kwa mafelobonnong semmuso maloko khuduthamaga..   Kabinete etse tlhoko dingongorego tsa baagi mme sweditse go leba sešwa Kaedi ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukugazedwa komtlamo we-NIP 2050 kobanyana kuyokubonisanwa ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Tiragalo e tla dirwa ke setheo se se ikemetseng mme fa sena go konosediwa, kaedi e tla phasaladiwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi: www.dpsa.gov.za..  Semphato sa Phetogo e Lolameng sa Maatla (JETP) le Leano la JETP (JEPT-IP).

src_text: Ihlelweli likhanyisa indlela ngokuqiniswa nokungezelelwa kwamaphrojekthi karhulumende aqakathekileko nalungelelweko.
tgt_text: Morago ga go amogela tlhagisetso ya JEPT le JETP-IP, Kabinete ne ya mametlelela JETP-IP le go supa ditebogo ka tiro e botlalo e dirilweng go tlhagisa..   JETP-IP tlhalosa dipeeletso tse di tlhokegang go fitlhelela boineelo ba Puso ya Aforika Borwa ba go fedisa khabone le go tsweletsa kgolo e tswelelang, le go netefatsa phetogo e lolameng go badiri le mafelo a amegang..   Komiti ya Ditona ya Phetogo ya Tlelaemete tla tshwara kopano ya bobegakgang mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo go neela ka dintlha ka botlalo   Melaotlhomo.
Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa.

src_text: Umtlamo lo ukhomba amaphrojekthi aqakathekileko ekwakhelweni kwabantu iindawo zokuhlala; egezini kamasipala, emanzini; ekulahlweni kweenzibi; iinthuthi zomphakathi; umthangalasisekelo wezefundo newezepilo; umthangalasisekelo wehlelo ledijithali kunye nobulelesi nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa 2022 kwa Palamenteng go diragadiwa.

src_text: Isakheko sehlelweli siveza inembombono yomsebenzi ekufuze wenziwe, sicozulule ubujamo bezinto banje, sendlale ubujamo obuqakathekileko obuzakuphumelelisa izinto sibe sitjho nokuthi kufuze kwenziweni ukuphumelelisa inembombono.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o tlhabolola Molao wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe, 1957 (Molao 57 wa 1951) o setseng le dingwaga di le.

src_text: Siphakamisa ukuthi ihlelo lokuphumelelisa lokhu lenziwe ngeminyaka emithathu.

tgt_text: Fa sena go amogelwa jaaka molao, Molaotlhomo o tla tlamela ka letlhomeso la semolao go laola tsamaiso ya boleng ya dikepe.

src_text: Umtlamo Womthetho Welizwe Onqophe Ukwenza Ikoro Yezabasebenzi Bakarhulumende Isebenze Ngokukhanyiselwa Makghonofundwa.
tgt_text: Gareng ga tse dingwe tla laola popego, kwadiso, maina le go fedisiwa ga dikepe..   Diphetogo tse di tla nna le seabe mo go tsosoloseng lekala la tsamaiso ya dithoto ka dikepe gammogo le go nyalanya naga le Tumelano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhaba wa Pharakano ya Dikepe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umTlamo wokuPhumelelisa weliZweloke onqophe ukwenza iKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende isebenze ngobucwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa mametleletse tumelano     .

src_text: Umtlamo lo wamenyezelwa ngomnyaka wee-2021 kobanyana kubonisanwe ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa.
Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa 2022 gore tswelediwe.

src_text: Umtlamo lo uqalelela iingaba zeensika ezihlanu zokuphumelelisa umsebenzi wokwenza iKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende iragwe ngobucwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o tshitshinya tokafatso ya Molao wa Ditlhopho, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).

src_text: Sigaba sokufuna abantu abasese ngaphandle kwekoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende nokukhetha esele bangaphakathi; kujayezwa indawo nokulungelelwa nomsebenzi; ukulungiselela umsebenzi nokulawulwa kwendlela yokusebenza; ukufunda isiphelani nokuthuthuka ngobucwephetjhe, nokuthuthuka ngebizelo lomsebenzi nangezehlakalo zemsebenzini.
tgt_text: Diphetogo di tlamela ka tlhabololo le tsenyotirisong ya Tsamaiso ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo e tshegetsang ditshwetso tse di tshegediwang ke bopaki..   Di matlafatsa kgolagano magareng ga Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa le ditheo tse dingwe tsa puso, le go atolosa letlhomeso la taolo la Molao D.  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko Wemibandela Yomsebenzi KubaNqophisi Zombelele (ama-DG).
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente ya Dikgwebopotlana, tse Dinnye le tse di Magareng (SMME) le Dikoporasi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umbiko ophakamisa amagadango wokuqinisa amandla nekghono labo-DG eKorweni yemBusweni.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, ka tirisano le bannaleseabe ba lekala la poraefete, le tla tshwara Samiti ya SMME le Dikoporasi ya Moporesitente ya Bosetšhaba kwa Bryanston, Gauteng ka 13 go fitlha ka 15 Ngwanatsele..   Samiti e tla kopanya bannaleseabe ba botlhokwa ba lekala la poraefete le la puso mo tikologong ya dikgwebopotlana go rerisana ka go senka ditsela tsa go dirisana mmogo go matlafatsa lekala le.

src_text: Umbiko lo wenze iimphakamiso ezimbadlwana, hlangana nazo ekukhona nezikhuluma ngesikhathi ekumele sihlalwe bo-DG eenkhundleni zabo kunye nokulawulwa kwemisebenzi yokuphathiswa ziimPhathimandla eziPhetheko eemphathimandleni ezilawulako.
tgt_text: Bannaleseabe ba ba solofelwang ba akaretsa mekgatlo ya kgwebo, badiri ba diSMME, dirutegi, badiri ba dipholisi le ditheo tsa tlhabololo ya matlole..     Samiti tla rerisana gape le ka ga Leanolegolo le le Momaganeng la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, le le tlamelang ka letlhomeso le le botlhokwa go matlafatsa lekala la SMME.

Samiti e solofelwa gape go thankgolola Dikabo tsa Bosetšhaba tsa SMME tsa Moporesitente tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga..     Go Tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente ya 2022 ya Tirisodikgoka e Ikaegileng ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi (GBVF).

src_text: Umbiko lo godu uphakamise nokuthi u-DG e-Ofisini kaMengameli uzakubekwa esikhundleni sokuba yiHloko yokuLawula ukuSebenza emBusweni.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Samiti ya bobedi ya Moporesitente ya GBVF kwa Gallagher Convention Centre mo Gauteng ka 1 le 2 Ngwanatsele.

src_text: Eemfundeni, umsebenzi lo uzakunikelwa abo-DG ema-ofisini waboNdunakulu.
tgt_text: Samiti ya ntlha e neng tshwerwe ka 2018 ne ya dirisiwa go supa boineelo gape ba puso le balekane ba loago mo go fediseng ditiragalo tse di kwa godimo tsa tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le basadi mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla dirisiwa go lekola Tswelopele e dirilweng mo go tsenngweng tirisong ga Togamaano ya Bosetšhaba ka ga GBVF tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Boikarabelo; Itlhaganediso le Kgodiso JAANONG”..   Samiti e tla sekaseka gareng ga tse dingwe, go batla ditsela tsa go itlhaganedisa dikgato le maikarabelo go tswa go mafapha botlhokwa le bannaleseabe ba ba akaretsang baagi, lekala la poraefete le mekgatlo ya badiri..   Pitso ya Botlhano ya ga Moporesitente kwa Kapa Botlhaba.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, umbiko lo uphakamise namagadango wokubonisa iminyango karhulumende ngokuphathwa nokulawulwa kwamakontraga womsebenzi wabo-DG.
tgt_text: Pitso ya Botlhano ya Mokgwa wa Tlhabololo ya Sedika (DDM) ya ga Moporesitente kwa Upington, Kapa Botlhaba tla diragala ka Labotlhano, 21 Diphalane 2022 kwa Setediamong sa selegae sa Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Pitso ya Moporesitente ya DDM tla lekola tswelelo ya thebolelo ya ditirelo le dikgwetlho kwa Kapa Botlhaba le go tsereganya go di rarabolola.

DDM netefatsa gore thulaganyo, tsenyotirisong le kabelomatlole ya thebolelo ya ditirelo di momagantswe go tokafatsa thebolelo ya ditirelo go baagi..   Jaaka matlhagolatsela Pitso e, Ditona, maloko dikhuduthamaga le bommeyara ba tla tswa letsholo go ya kwa baaging ba kwa Upington le mafelo a mabapi..   Puo ya Pholisi ya Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole mo Pakeng ya Dikgwedi di le Tharo (MTBPS).

src_text: Ihlelo elibuyekeziweko lokuLawulwa kweNdlela yokuSebenza kwabo-DG lisabuyekezwa njenganje, kobanyana lizokukhambisana namatjhuguluko avunyiweko.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 e tla alwang ke Tona ya Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo e botlhokwa ya tsamaiso e bulegileng ya Aforika Borwa ya tekanyetsokabo e maikarabelo..   MTBPS tlhalosa boineelo ba puso mo teng ga maemo palogotlhe ya tiriso ya matlole naga ka kgonang tlhalosa gape le gore puso tla tswala jang mokhino fa gare ga lotseno le ditshenyegelo, le go dirisa matlotlo a leng teng ka tshwanelo.

src_text: UmJaphethe kaNgqongqotjhe weKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende nokuPhatha, uNom.
tgt_text: Ditlhatlhobo tsa Materiki.

src_text: Thulas Nxesi, ngeveke ezako le uzokubiza umhlangano weendaba lapho ayokwethula khona umtlamo wokuPhumelelisa weliZweloke ngokwenza iKoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende isebenze ngokuletha ubucwephetjhe, abuye ahlathulule namatjhuguluko avunyiweko emibandeleni yokusebenza yabo-DG.
tgt_text: Ditlhatlhobo tsa Setifikheiti se Segolwane sa Bosetšhaba di simolola ka 31 Diphalane go fitlha ka 7 Sedimonthole.

src_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Ngokuphunyeleliswa Kombikomthethokambiso Ngamalungelo Wabantu Abanokukhubazeka (i-WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: Kabinete eleletsa setlhopha sa 2022 masego jaaka ba tla bo ba samagana le legato la bofelo la leeto la bona la sekolo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umBiko weNdima weHlandla lesiHlanu ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-WPRPD, enikela ubujamo bezinto bamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-WPRPD.
tgt_text: Tshegetso e tswelelang go tswa go barutisi, batsadi le batlhokomedi tla nna botlhokwa thata mo go thuseng baithuti ba go samagana le ditlhatlhobo tse ka boitshepo..   Kabinete ikuela go batsadi le batlhokomedi go nna le seabe ka go rotloetsa le go tlhotlheletsa baithuti, gammogo le go tlhola tikologo e siametseng go ithuta kwa gae..   Khonferense ya Leanotlhabololo la Bosetšhaba (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Naga.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe imibono evela eminyangweni karhulumende welizwe loke neyeemfunda.
tgt_text: Lefapha le Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi ka semphato le Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Togamaano le Lefapha la Dithuto tsa Tlhabololo la Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal, le tla tshwara khonferense ya NDP le Bokgoni ba Naga go tloga ka 7 go fitlha ka 9 Ngwanatsele 2022 kwa Khamphaseng ya Kholeji ya Howard ya Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Khonferense e tla lekola bokgoni le tiragatso ya puso mo dingwageng tse 10 tsa ntlha tsa NDP, mme tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Tekolo ya Bokgoni ba Naga le Tiragatso ya Puso mo dingwageng tse lesome tsa ntlha tsa NDP”..   Go Neelwa Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini.

src_text: Uphethe zamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa komthethokambiso ophethe nokwabiwa kwesabelo seemali.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla neela Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Motlotlegi Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Moses Mabhida kwa Durban ka Lamatlhatso, 29 Diphalane..

Se se latela moletlo wa setso wa go tlhoma kgosi wa “Ukungena eSibayeni” wa Kgosi o neng tshwerwe ka 20 Phatwe 2022 o mo tlhatloseditseng mo setulong sa bogosi jaaka Kgosi ya Setšhaba sa amaZulu   Melaetsa.

src_text: Umbiko wokuthoma waqobemnyaka wamenyezelwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Go akgolaKabinete akgola le go eleletsa masego: Rre Sam Matekane, Rre yo tlhophilweng go nna Tonakgolo ya Puso ya Lesotho.

src_text: Umbiko wendima wehlandla lesihlanu lo uvunyelwe ukugazedwa bewumenyezelwe mNyango wezaboMma, zeLutjha nezabaNtu abanokuKhubazeka.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape inyalantse le Setlhopha sa Tshekatsheko ya Ditlhopho sa AU kwa Ditlhophong tsa Kokoanobosetšhaba kwa Pusong ya Lesotho ka la bo 7 Diphalane 2022 mo go akgoleng tsepamo ya ditlhopho le sepolotiki ya Batho ba Puso ya Lesotho go bo ba tshwere ditlhopho tse di atlegileng.

src_text: Ukutjhugululwa Kwendinyana 20(1) Yesivumelwano Sokuqedwa Kwazo Zoke Iindlela Zokubandlululwa Kwabantu Abasikazi (i-CEDAW).
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tswelela go ineela mo go matlafatseng le go tiiseng dikamano tsa sebedi gammogo le go kgontsha tirisano mo mererong ya dikgatlhegelo tse di tshwanang mo kgaolong, kontinente le go ralala lefatshe..   Matshediso Kabinete rometse melaetsa ya matshidiso go lelapa le ditsala tsa ga: Rre Albert Nolan (88), Moperisita wa Catholic ya Aforika Borwa yo boineelo yo neng gwetlha dikakanyo tsa sedumedi tse di neng di batla go mametlelela tsamaiso ya tlhaolele.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwamatjhuguluko weNdinyana 20(1) ye-CEDAW kobanyana ayokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Ka 2003, Moporesitente wa nako eo Thabo Mbeki ne mo neela Kabo ya Luthuli ya Selefera ka ntlha ya “boineelo ba gagwe ba botshelo botlhe go kgaratlhela temokerasi, ditshwanelo tsa botho le bosiamisi le go gwetlha tsamaiso ya sedumedi go akaretsa mametlelelo ya tlhaolele ka tsela ya sedumedi.”   Go Thapiwa.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko la avula ithuba lokwelulwa kwesikhathi semihlangano yekomidi esebenza imibiko yemibuso emalunga.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang   Atefokheiti James Mlawu – Mokaedikakaretso: Lefapha la Dipalangwa   Rre Shabeer Khan – Ramatlotlo-Kakaretso: Matlotlo Bosetšhaba.
Kabinete dumalane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yatlikitla isivumelwanesi ngomnyaka we-1993 yase ilandelisa ngokusiqinisa ngokusifakazela ngoNobayeni we-.
tgt_text: Maloko Boto ya Bojanala ya Aforika Borwa   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Monnasetilo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatsa Monnasetilo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Rre Odwa Mtati   Rre Ravi Nadasen thapilwe gape)   Rre Enver Duminy thapilwe gape)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Rre Mduduzi Zakwe thapilwe gape)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.

src_text: Ukudluliselwa ePalamende kunqophe ukuthomanisa isivumelwano esasifakazelwe phambilini nesikhibelelo seNdinyana 20(1) yesivumelwanesi.
tgt_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa lefapha).

src_text: Isivumelwano Sephasi Loke Ngokwamukeleka Kweencwadi Zefundo Ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Maloko Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Pharakano ya Ditsela   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe thapilwe gape)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge thapilwe gape)   Moporofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Monnasetilo)   Atefokheiti Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moporofesara Chitja Twala   Rre Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Leloko la thefosano); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Leloko la thefosano).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwesiVumelwano sePhasiloke ngokwaMukeleka kweeNcwadi zeFundo ePhakemeko kobanyana siqinisekiswe ngokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Rre Tshepo Monaheng – Motlhankedi Khuduthamaga (CEO): Setlamo sa Aforika Borwa sa Merero ya Dikgwa (Konteraka ntšhwafaditswe sebaka sa dingwaga tse tharo (3)).

src_text: Sizakuthi singafakazelwa bese sifakwa ePhikweni lezeFundo nezeSayensi nezamaSiko leHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UNESCO), bese sinikelwa amandla wokusebenza ekhethwapha ngomthetho wee-2008 weeNcwadi zeFundo zeliZwe (umThetho 67 wee-2008).
tgt_text: Rre Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ditsela sa Aforika Borwa..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Molaodi wa Nutlere wa Bosetšhaba..   Rre Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalo-Kakaretso (Ntšhwafatso ya Konteraka).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga Tirisodikgoka e Totileng Batho ba Bong jo bo Rileng le Dipolao tsa Basadi (GBVF).

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga GBVF kwa Gallagher Estate kwa Midrand, Gauteng ka la bo 1 le la bo 2 Ngwanaitseele 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Rwala Maikarabelo, Go Potlakisa Twantsho ya Ditiro Tseno mmogo le Go Dira Modumo ka Tsona, GONA JAANONG!”.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Mo samiting eno go builwe ka kgatelopele eo setseng dirilwe mo go tsenyeng tirisong maikano a dirilweng mo Samiting eno ya Moporesitente e neng tshwerwe mo ngwageng wa 2018, mo go neng ga totobadiwa maikano naga eno go nna le ditharabololo tse di mosola tse di lekaneng tsa go lwantsha GBVF re le seoposengwe..     Bao ba neng ba tsaya karolo kwa samiting eno e tsereng matsatsi le mabedi ba ne ba rwala maikarabelo ka tiro e dirilweng mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la Naga la Togamaano mo Mererong ya GBVF leng leano leo maitlhomo lona leng go dira gore go nne le pholisi le leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng ka thulaganyo le nngwe gore re kgone go matlakafatsa dikgato tsa go tsibogela bothata jono jwa GBVF re le puso bile re le naga yotlhe..     Samiti eno ne le yona e tlhokagalang gore batho ba bue puo pha ka tseo ba atlegileng mo go tsona le tseo santseng le tlhobaboroko mo go lwantshaneng le GBVF.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: Mo samiting eno go builwe gape le ka botlhokwa jwa go ipopa ngatana mmogo le ka dilo tse ditona tse di ka fitlhelelwang fa re na le tsotlhe tse di tlhokagalang go lwantshana le bothata jono le fa tsotlhe tseo di dirisiwa ka tshwanelo.

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Seo re utlwaneng ka sona kwa samiting eno se bontsha botlhokwa jwa tirisanommogo puso nang le yona le maphata mangwe mekgatlho ya baagi, dikgwebo, bao dirisanang le bona mo go fetoleng maemo, ba dikereke mmogo le maphata mangwe jaaka botlhe ba dirisana mmogo mo go lwantshaneng le GBVF..     Tse dingwe tsa ditharabololo tse di tlhagisitsweng ke go tlamela NSP ka matlole a lekaneng gore kgone go samagana le GBVF, go dira gore fa go ka fitlhelwang ba sa dira seo ba tshwanetseng go se dira ba di game ba sa di tlhapela, mmogo le go dira gore ditheo tsa naga, tsa diporofense le tsa dkgaolo tseo leng tsona tseo batho ba ikarabelang mo go tsona di neelwa matla mantsi go kgalema ditiro tseo di sa tsamayeng ka tshwanelo..     Kabinete ne ya gatelela gore ga go tiragalo epe ya tirisodikgoka kgotsa ya go bogisa batho ba bangwe go tla itshokelwang yona.

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging gore ba tobane mo matlhong le ditiragalo tsa GBVF ka go tshwarisa beng ba tsona kwa mapodising.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: Gotlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona re tshwanetse go dira gore go nne boima gore go diragale ditiragalo tsa GBVF.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: Tshireletsego le pabalesego.

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Kabinete netefaleditse baagi gore Setheo sa Naga sa Ditheo tse di Kopaneng go Lwantshana le Botlhokotsebe le go Abelana ka Tshedimosetso e ka ga Bosenyi (NATJOINTS) – seo mo go sona leng mafapha puso a farologaneng mo Setho sa Phemelo ya Puso (SSA) leng sona se se di gogang kwa pele mmogo le Setheo sa Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) le Setheo sa Masole Naga (SANDF) - jaaka ba na le batlhankedi ba tiro ya bona leng go batlisisa ditiro tsa bokhukhuntshwane tse di bayang mo kotsing tshireletso ya naga ya rona mmogo le tsona ditiro tsa menolopuso.

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: NATJOINTS sekaseka maemo pabalesego ka fa nageng gangwe le gape go bona gore ga go matshosetsi a rileng a tshosetsang pabalesego.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Jaaka le karolo ya ditumelano magareng ga ditheo tsa go lwantsha botlhokotsebe mo dinageng tse dingwe tsotlhe, Aforika Borwa le yona bona dipoelo mo ntlheng ya go abelana ka tshedimosetso e ka dirang bonnete jwa gore naga a bolokesega..     Kabinete ikuela mo baaging go nna ba ntshitse matlho dinameng mme ba begele ditheo tsa molao ka ga sengwe le sengwe se ba se belaelang le se se seng mo molaong seke wa didimala; fa bona sengwe se se belaetsang, begela ditheo tsa molao - fa rotlhe re dirisana re ka kgona go dira gore setšhaba sa rona se babalesege.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Puo ya Ngwaga wa 2022 ya Pholisi ya Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole mo Pakeng ya Dikgwedi di le Tharo (MTBPS).

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga dikgato tse di tsentsweng tirisong mo go MTBPS ya 2022 tse di ka ga go busetsa maemo matlole puso sekeng, le fa maemo ikonomi lefatshe tshosa..     Dikgato tse Tona ya Matlole Rre Enoch Godongwana buileng ka tsona kwa Palamenteng, kwa Motsekapa ka Laboraro wa la bo 26 Diphalane 2022 di ne di tsenyeletsa le go fokotsa thata tiriso ya matlole puso mo go dirisiwang matlole mantsi go feta go kgonnweng go kokoanya mo lekgetong maitlhomo le go tokafats leano la naga ya rona la go tsamaisa tiro ya matlole, go ema nokeng maemo rona mo ikonoming mmogo le go dira gore moAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe nne le tshepo e tletseng gore maemo ikonomi ya naga ya rona mo isagong tla fetoga.

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: Maano a leng teng go oketsa matlole go emela motsi wa tlala re thusa gore re kgone go samagana le mathata tshwana le a tlhodilweng ke tlhago.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: MTBPS ya 2022 re thusa gape le gore re kgone go kgarametsa dilo tse di botlhokwa mo mafaratlhatlheng rona mmogo le mo matsholong kabo ya ditirelo, mmogo le go dira gore re nne le ditharabololo tse dingwe tse di ka ga thusang baagi ba naga ya rona ba ba dikobodikhutshwane mmogo le ba ba leng mo tlalelong..     Kabinete ikuela mo makaleng otlhe a samaganang le merero ya go tswela baagi le ikonomi mosola gore dirisane le puso gore kgone go godisa ikonomi ya rona gore kgone go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba naga yotlhe ya rona.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: Tirisanommogo magareng ga naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Spain.

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Leeto la Semmuso la go jela naga ya Aforika Borwa nala ke Tonakgolo ya naga ya Spain Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón go tla go tsosolosa botsalano jo bo leng teng jwa dinaga tseno go dira gore bo gagamale le go feta.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Tonakgolo ne felegeditswe ke Tona ya bona ya Lefapha la Diintaseteri, Kgwebisano le Bojanala bong Mme Reyes Maroto, mmogo le beng ba dikgwebo ba naga eo.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Leeto leno le neile beng ba dikgwebo ba naga ya Aforika Borwa mo makaleng a farologaneng dikgwebo tšhono ya go kopana le badirikabona ba naga ya Spain gore ba kgone go dira gore tirisanommogo ya bona mo kgwebisanong le mo dipeeletsong mo maphateng saense le boitshimololedi bobetli le setso metshameko le thuto nne e tseneletseng.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Leeto leno le kgarameleditse kwa pele naga ya rona mo dipeeletsong mo kgodisong ya ikonomi.

src_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.
tgt_text: Dipuisano mo go Direng gore Ethiopia le ya Tigray di Fitlhelele Kutlwano.

src_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
tgt_text: Mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, go ya ka maikarabelo yona mo go Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika, go ne ga tshwarelwa dipuisano tsa go diga matshwafo maphata otlhe a neng sa tlhole utlwana kwa kgaolong ya Ethiopia le ya Tigray, go tloga ka la bo 25 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Diphalane.

src_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..
Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tseno di ne di etilwe pele ke Moporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Nigeria bong Olusegun Obasanjo, Moporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta mmogo le Motlatsamoporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Aforika Borwa Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.

src_text: South Africa – Spain relations.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhagisitse kemonokeng ya yona mo dipuisanong tseno tsa go tlisa kagiso e tla nnelang ruri, fela jaaka go tshwanetse go ya ka maitlhomo pholisi ya Aforika Borwa ya tirisanommogo le dinaga tsa boditšhaba ya go dira gore mo kontinenteng go se tlhole go nna le dithulano     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.
tgt_text: Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la go Tlhabolola Dikgwebopotlana tse di Golaganeng (NISED).

src_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la NISED gore le tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.
tgt_text: Leano la ntlha la Kgodiso ya Boitshimololedikgwebo ba Dikgwebopotlaka (ISPESE) le ne la simololwa go tsenngwa tirisong ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.
tgt_text: ISPESE eo mo legatong la yona go tseneng NISED dira gore Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa ngwaga wa 1995 se se buang ka Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la go Aga le go Tlhabolola Dikgwebopotlana ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa le tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.
tgt_text: Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la NISED le tlhagisa maano a golagantsweng go gagamatsa le go ema nokeng batho ba ba itshimololelang dikgwebopotlana le tse dikgolonyana.

src_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro le le tsamaisiwang ka tshwanelo go dira gore botlhe ba ba nang le seabe mo maphateng otlhe a botlhokwa ba tsamaise tiro ka tshwanelo..     Monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Moranang Kabinete ne ya dumela gore go ka phasaladiwa sekwalwa sa ntlha se se santseng se tlhoka gore se sekasekwe sa NISED gore baagi ba dire ditshwaelo ka ga sona.

Go tswa mo ditshwaelong tse dintsi tseno leano leno le ne la tokafadiwa ka ditshwaelo go tswa mo baaging mmogo le go tswa mo Lekgotleng la Naga la Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi le Ditiro (NEDLAC), leno ke lekgotla le mo go lona go nang le bagwebi, mekgatlho ya baagi, ya badiri, batlhankedi ba diyunibesiti mmogo le ba puso mo maitlhomo leng go samagana le matsapa a leng teng mo ikonoming, mo ditirong le mo go tokafatseng maemo naga tobaneng le ona mothale ona oo.

src_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe se se Buang ka Pholisi ya Ditirelo tsa go Thusa Baagi ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe se se Buang ka Pholisi ya Ditirelo tsa go Thusa Baagi ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

src_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa seno se dira gore Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela se se buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi mmogo le Tumelano ya Mokgatlho wa Dinagakopano (UN) e buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi di tsenngwe tirisong (UNCPRD).

src_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno eletsa Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago gore le kgone go abela ka tshwanelo ditirelo tsa lona mo bathong ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi mmogo le mo ba malapa batho bano tlhagisa ka fao maemo sa letleng ka teng le ka fao tswelelang go kganela bathong ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi go ka nna le seabe mo ditirong tse di botlhokwa mo setšhabeng, mmogo le go dira gore ba se nne le seabe mo ditirong tsa go thusa baagi le tsa go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.

src_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tlhagisa dikakanyo tse di ka dirisiwang mo go tlhomeng maemo leitlho go dira bonnete jwa gore dikgato tse di tsewang go tokafatsa maemo di diragadiwa jaaka go tshwanetse mo mafapheng a matshwanedi.

src_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.
