Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo thulana le molao yo dirisiwang ga jaaka ka fa nageng go samagana le botlhokotsebe mo dikarolong tse di farologaneng ka fa nageng jaaka laola selo se le sengwe se se tshwanang le seo molao yono se laolang.

src_text: The Briefing and Outsourcing of State Legal work Policy will introduce an element of fairness and drive the transformational allocation of litigation services that cannot be performed internally.
tgt_text: Go fedisiwa ga molao yono go tla dira gore melao ya puso ya tlhaolele e santseng le teng le gompieno mo mafelo mo malobeng neng bediwa Puso ya Transkei fedisiwe mme go fetolwe ditsela tsa go samagana le melato go neng go samaganwa le yona ka molao yono.

src_text: The Initiating, Defending and Opposing of Matters Policy will provide clarity on processes to be followed by client departments and the Office of Solicitor-General.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo.

src_text: The two policies – together with the other policies that were approved by Cabinet in November 2021 and the Legal Sector Code – will support the implementation of this strategy.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: These documents will ensure meaningful transformational intervention in the legal sector and also ensure the economies of scale in litigation matters that involve the State.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa Karolo ya bo 6 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 go dira gore Puo ya Diatla ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa gore go nne mo molaong semmuso gore le yona ke nngwe ya dipuo tsa naga.

src_text: Management of State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy.
tgt_text: Mo kgweding ya Motsheganong monongwaga wa 2022 Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa le tsa go tsibosa setšhaba ka Molaotlhomo yono, mme bobedi ditiragalo tseno di ne tsa gatisiwa mo lekwalong la go gatisa Melao ya puso mo kgweding ya Phukwi gona monongwagwa wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy, which provides mechanisms to manage state litigation contingent liability.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Botlhokotsebe (wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Petelelo le Melato ya Mothale oo) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: It provides for the creation of central database and the reporting mechanism on the following-up of the cases in this database.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo yono gore setšhaba se ntshe se se mo mafatlheng sona ka ga ona.

src_text: The policy provides for the mechanism to close dormant case files that were resulting in unreliable contingent liability figures in respect of accountability  Bills.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono phimola Molao wa Ditlolo tsa Molao wa Thobalano mo pusong ya tlhaolele neng bediwa gore ke Molao wa Maitshwaro a Tswileng mo Tseleng) wa Ngwaga wa 1957 (Molao wa bo 23 wa 1957).

src_text: National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa gape le Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditiro tsa Botlhokotsebe (wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Petelelo le Melato ya Mothale oo) wa Ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 32 wa 2007) ka go dira gore fa batho ba bagolo ba rekisetsana ditiro tsa thobalano tiro eo se nne tlolo ya molao.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Ditshitshinyo tse di leng mo Molaotlhomong yono di samagana le lenaane la dintlha tse di tshitshintsweng mo Kgaolong ya boraro ya Leano la Naga la go Loga Maano mo Mererong ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Basadi (GBVF) (kgaolo eno bua ka go Sireletsa Setšhaba, go se Babalela le go se Phimolakeledi),mme di tla dira gore lephata lotlhe la go samagana le botlhokotsebe le phimolakeledi le dirisane mmogo gore le kgone go sireletsa, go babalela le go phimola keledi batho ba ba fetileng mo mathateng GBVF, mmogo le go dira gore ditlhokotsebe tse di amegang di digame di sa di tlhapela.

src_text: The Bill amends the National Sport and Recreation Act, of 1998 (Act 110 of 1998).
tgt_text: Ka gang fa molaotlhomo ono amogelwa go nna molao tla emelela batho ba ba rekisang mebele mo ditirelong tsa thobalano gore ba se tlhole ba bogisiwa le go jewa ntshu.

src_text: The Bill has already been published for public consultation.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Poso ya Aforika Borwa (SAPO).

src_text: The Bill also amends certain definitions and amongst other interventions, it proposes the establishment of the Sports Arbitration Tribunal to resolve disputes between sport or recreation bodies.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa SAPO gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: It outlines procedures to be followed for bidding for international events.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono, yo neseditsweng pula gore ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona mo ngwageng ono kwa tshimologong kwalola sešwa Molao wa SAPO wa Ngwaga wa 2011 (Molao wa bo 22 wa 2011).

src_text: The proposed amendments also empower the Minister of Sport, Arts and Culture to make regulations for vulnerable groups to participate in sport and be protected from any form of sexual abuse or exploitation.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di batla go dira gore SAPO mo ditirelong tsa yona tsa go tsamaisa merwalo simolole go dirisa dithekenoloji tse di dirisiwang mo lephateng la go tsamaisa merwalo tse di leng teng mmogo le go godisa tiro ya yona.

src_text: South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) Bill of.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsamaisana le Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga Kgolaganngo ya Thekenoloji ya Didirisiwa tsa Tshedimosetso le Ditlhaeletsano ya Ngwaga wa  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the SABC Bill of 2022 for processing.
tgt_text: Foramo ya Lefatshe ya Merero ya Saense (WSF) ya Ngwaga wa.

src_text: The Bill was published for public comment in June.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla dirisa Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi go tshwarela WSF kwa Cape Town International Convention Centre go simolola ka la bo 06 go fitlha ka la bo 09 Sedimonthole 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Re Dirisa Saense go Phimola Baagi Keledi”..  Foramo eno ke nngwe ya dirala tseo di di gogang kwa pele mo lefatsheng tseo di rotloetsang gore go nne le dipuisano mabapi le gore saense tshwanetse go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa mo setšhabeng sa rona.

src_text: Once the Bill is passed into law by Parliament, the current Broadcasting Act, 1999 (Act 4 of 1999) will be repealed.
tgt_text: Leno ke letsholo le le simolotsweng ke mekgatlho ya lefatshe ya saense mme bile gape le tsenyeletsa le Mokgatlho wa Dinagakopano (UN) wa Merero ya Thuto, Saense le Setso..  Baeteledipele ba ba itsegeng mo lefatsheng ba tla atlhaatlha ditlhogo tse di farologaneng tse di tsenyeletsang le tse di buang ka go dirisa saense go busetsa batho seriti; go dirisa saense go baakanya maemo loapi, go dirisa saense mo mererong ya botipolomate go dira gore naga nne le botsalano jo bo edileng le dinaga tse dingwe tsa boditšhaba, mmogo le go dirisa saense mo mererong ya Aforika le ya lefatshe ka bophara..  Dikopano di le dintsinyana tsa ka fa thoko le tse di tla tshwariwang ka mafaratlhatlha dikgokagano di tla tshwariwa ka go latelana, mme tse dingwe tsa tsona di tla tshwariwa ke mokgatlho wa Kopano ya Kgothakgothe ya Batho ba Aforika ya Barutegi ba Aforika mo Mererong ya Saense mme ponelopele ya mokgatlho ono ke go fetola matshelo batho mo kontinenteng ya Aforika ka go dirisa saense.

src_text: The Bill amongst others proposes reducing the size of non-executive Board members from 12 to 11 and the executive members from three to two.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya AIDS.

src_text: It revised the governance structure and funding model of the SABC.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla keteka le lefatshe mmogo le go nna le seabe mo ditiragalong tsa go bontsha tlotlo Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya AIDS ka la bo 01 Sedimonthole 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Dira Gore Maemo Batho Lekalekane le go Golagana mo Mererong ya go Fedisa AIDS”.

src_text: Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of.
tgt_text: Mokete wa tlotlo o tla tshwarelwang kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Dr Petrus Molemela kwa Bloemfontein mo porofenseng ya Foreistata mo go ona batho botlhe ba tla gakololwa gore ba tshwanetse go nna le maikarabelo ka go dira bonnete jwa gore ba itlhatlhoba gore ba itse gore ba phetse sentle kgotsa jang leng seo se tla ba thusang gore ba tsaye ditshweetso ka maikarabelo..  Mokete ono tshwariwa mo nakong eo Aforika Borwa ipaakanyetsang go thankgolola letsholo la go lekelela moento wa melemo ya thibelotshwaetso (PrEP) mo tshimologong ya ngwaga yo tlang, jaaka Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya Boitekanelo (WHO) eleditse tiriso ya molemo ono.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of 2022 for further processing.
tgt_text: Moento ono wa PrEP o tla tshwanelwang ke go tlhabiwa kgwedi nngwe le nngwe ka kgona go thibela bontsi jo bo kanaka batho ba le 52 000 go ka tshwaediwa ke HIV..  Letsatsi la Poelano.

src_text: The Bill repeals the Transkeian Penal Code, 1983 (Act 9 of 1983) which codified criminal law in the former Transkei (now Eastern Cape).
tgt_text: Ka Labotlhano, 16 Sedimonthole 2022 naga tla keteka Letsatsi la Poelano go gagamatsa maikano rona mabapi le go nna seoposenngwe le go aga setšhaba.

src_text: The proposed Bill extends the current application of common laws to the former Republic of Transkei in line with our unitary system of the country’s judicial system..
tgt_text: Ngwaga yo mongwe le yo mongwe re bona tšhono ya go kopana le go boelana le go itshwarelana mo diphosong tseo di dirilweng mo nakong e fetileng le go aga setšhaba se se ntšhwa..  Leeto la rona le re sa bolong go le thankgolola fa re ne re iponela kgololesego le temokerasi mo ngwageng wa 1994 le re bontshitse gore ga go na pelaelo epe gore fa re le ngatananngwe jaaka setšhaba re na le maatla le go feta.

src_text: The Transkeian Penal Code is in conflict with the current common criminal law that regulates the same subject matter in different parts of the country.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo rona re le maAforika Borwa tshwanetse go nna mabapi le go tsholetsa dikgato tsa go aga setšhaba le go nna ngatana le nngwe..  Rotlhe re ka kgona go dira gore isago ya rona le batho ba bangwe botlhe nne e botoka go gaisa gompieno ka go dira ka natla gore re nne le setšhaba se se itumelelang go buisana fa go na le se ba sa utlwaneng ka sona, se se ipopang ngatana le nngwe, se se tlotlomatsang dikgato tsa go aga setšhaba le go keteka go farologana ga sona.

src_text: This repeal will remove the continued existence of apartheid-era legislation in the areas that were formerly known as the Republic of Transkei and provide the transitional arrangements on matters dealt with by this code.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe go dirisana sentle mmogo re le setšhaba, mme re kopanye maatla rona gore re kgone go aga setšhaba sa Aforika Borwa se se tshwaraganeng bile se dira bontle.

src_text: Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Thuso ya Baagi le tla tshwara Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe kwa Germiston, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 7 Sedimonthole.

src_text: The Bill amends Section 6 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 to recognise South African Sign Language as one of the official languages.
tgt_text: Letsholo leno le kopanya batsofe go tswa mo diporofenseng tsotlhe di le robongwe mme maitlhomo lona ke go dira gore batsofe ba tshele botshelo jo ba ikatisang gore ba kgone go nna le seabe mo metseng ba tswang mo go yona..  Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe le tla bula ka dipuisano ka go letlelela batsofe gore ba thube seo se leng mo dipelong tsa bona ka go bua ka matsapa ao ba kopanang le ona mo matshelong bona.

src_text: In May 2022, Cabinet approved the publication and giving of notice to this Bill, which together with the notice were subsequently gazetted in July.
tgt_text: Seno se tla latelwa ke Metshameko e Monate mo batsofe ba tla ntshang bokgoni jwa bona mo metshamekong ya diatleletiki..  Molao wa Batsofe wa Ngwaga wa 2006 (Molao wa bo 13 wa 2006) gatelela botlhokwa jwa go tlhokomela le go tsholetsa ditshwanelo tsa batsofe, tlotlo ya bona, maemo bona, seriti sa bona, pabalesego ya bona, tlhokomelo ya bona le boitekanelo jwa bona.

src_text: Criminal Law (Sexual Offences and Related Matters) Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Ka mafoko ano, Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe mo setšhabeng go tlhokomela batsofe, go ba tlotla le go ba ema nokeng, segolo jang fa le gore ba boga, ba tshwarwa makgwakgwa, ga ba tlhokomelwe bile ba itemogela ditiragalo tsa GBV  MelaetsaMelaetsa ya go Akgola.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of this Bill for public comments.
tgt_text: Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: • Bafenyi ba Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC.

src_text: It repeals the Sexual Offences Act (previously Immorality Act), 1957 (Act 23 of 1957).
tgt_text: Rre Sandile Stevenson Ndlovu wa Lekwalodikgang la Sunday Times jaaka fentse maemo ntlha jaaka motsei wa ditshwantsho wa maemo a kwa godimo, Mme Zinhle Makhosazane Mugabe wa lekgotlakaso la SABC jaaka fentse maemo bobedi mo kgasong ya dithelebišene mmogo le Mme Melinda Shaw wa Makasine wa Dikgang tsa Dikgogo jaaka fentse maemo boraro mo makwalong a gatisiwang.Melaetsa ya Matshediso.

src_text: It also repeals Section 11 of the Criminal Law (Sexual Offenses and Related Matters) Amendment Act, 2007 (Act 32 of 2007) to decriminalise the sale and purchase of adult sexual services.
tgt_text: Kabinete romela matshediso yona kwa ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:• Rre John Henry Ernstzen, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 82, yo neng le segatlhamelamasisi mo mererong ya mekgatlho ya badiri le ya dipolotiki yo gape dirileng le mo pusong jaaka moeletsi wa Tona ya Tirelo le Tsamaiso ya Puso, Ngaka Zola Skweyiya ne gape direla Khomišene ya Tirelo ya Puso le Motlatsamonnasetulo mmogo le go direla Khomišene ya Ditirelo tsa Baatlhodi ba Dikgotlatshekelo.• Vho-Rashaka Frank Ratshitanga, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 89, yo neng le segatlhamelamasisi mo mererong ya go lwantshana le puso ya tlhaolele yo neng bogisiwa thata ke Mapodisi Puso ya Tlhaolele.

src_text: The proposals of this Bill respond to the list of interventions proposed in Pillar 3 (Protection, Safety and Justice) of the National Strategic Plan on GBVF, which enjoins the criminal justice system to provide protection, safety and justice for survivors of GBVF, and to effectively hold perpetrators accountable for their actions.
tgt_text: Jaaka le mokwadi yo dibuka tsa gagwe di phasaladitsweng, tse dingwe tsa dibuka tse dintsi tsa dipoko tse di phasaladitseng di ne tsa tseewa gore di dirisiwe kwa dikolong go ruta baithuti ba dikolo tse di godimo.

src_text: Once passed into law, it will amongst others protect sex workers against abuse and exploitation.
tgt_text: Morago ga ngwaga wa 1994 ne direla Ntlo ya Limpopo ya Theomolao ne neelwa Kabo ya Tlotla ya Baobab e betlilweng ka boronse mo leboga “go ikentsha setlhabelo ga gagwe ka go dira ka boineelo mo go emeng kgatlhanong le ditiro tse di busula tsa tsa tlhaolele mmogo le go nneng le seabe ga gagwe mo go ageng Aforika Borwa”  Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: South African Post Office (SAPO) Amendment Bill.
tgt_text: Mme Funani Josephine Malatsi yo thapilweng go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Matlole kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo..  Ngaka Marcia Mabel Socikwa thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo lekaleng la Thuto le Katiso kwa Diyunibesiti mo Lefapheng la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso..  Ngaka Lisolomzi Assaph Fikizolo thapilwe go nna DDG: mo lekaleng la Mawatle le Mabopo Mawatle mo Lefapheng la Merero ya Dikgwa, ya Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapi le ya Tikologo..  Mme Boipuso Mmasediba Modise thapilwe go nna DDG: mo lekaleng la Dipholisi tsa Ikonomi mo Lefapheng la Matlotlo Naga..  Ngaka Kefiloe Doris Masiteng thapilwe go nna Mokwaledi mo lekaleng la Togo ya Maano mo Lefapheng la Tiromaano, Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro..  Mme Jodi-Lynne Scholtz thapilwe go nna Mokhomišenara wa Khomišene ya Naga ya Dilotho..  Ngaka Phakamani Buthelezi thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) mo Botong ya Metsi ya Overberg (Konteraka ya gagwe ntšhwafaditswe)..  Ngaka Bongani Andy Mabaso thapilwe go nna CEO mo Setheong sa Puso sa Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the SAPO Amendment Bill to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Ngaka Gibson Mashilo Simon Boloka thapilwe go nna CEO mo Botong ya Ditshwantsho tsa Difilimi le tsa Makwalokgatiso (FPB).

src_text: The Bill, which was approved for public consultation early this year, amends the SAPO Act, 2011 (Act 22 of 2011).
tgt_text: Rre Mandisi Nkuhlu thapilwe go nna CEO mo Koporasing ya Inšorense ya Dikoloto tsa Diromelwantle.

src_text: The proposed amendments seek to enable the SAPO to adapt to the technological developments in the courier-service space and expand its mandate.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le ditshwetso tsa go thapa batho ba ba latelang:.

src_text: The changes are in line with the National Integrated Information and Communications Technology Policy White Paper of  Upcoming events.
tgt_text: Setheo sa Melao ya go Laola Dithulaganyo tsa go Agela Setšhaba Dintlo  Rre Sandile Luthuli thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo).

src_text: 2022 World Science Forum (WSF).
tgt_text: Boto ya Setlamo sa Setheo sa Ditsela tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa  Rre Themba Barrange Mhambi thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Robert Alderman Haswell thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Thamsanqa Piet Matosa thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Refilwe Buthelezi; mmogo lee.

src_text: South Africa will, through the DSI, host the WSF at the Cape Town International Convention Centre Cape from 6 to 9 December 2022 under the theme: “Science for Social Justice”.
tgt_text: Mme Noluphumzo Leonora Noxaka.

src_text: The forum is one of the leading global platforms that encourage dialogue on the role science should play in society.
tgt_text: Bakaedi bao seng ba khuduthamaga kwa Setheong sa Ditirelo tsa Taolo le Phofiso ya Difofane  Rre Zola Majavu thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Khulile Sympathy Boqwana  Mme Nomathemba Kubheka thapilwe sešwa)  Mogeneralemogolo Nhlanhla Lucky Ngema thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Christiaan Rudolph Burger thapilwe sešwa)  Ngaka Malindi Joy Neluheni  Rre Muhammed Ameen Ebrahim Amod  Rre Siyabonga Gcina Kudumela  Mme Precious Nompumelelo Sibiya; mmogo lej.

src_text: It is an initiative of global science organisations that also include the UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation.
tgt_text: Mme Princess Mngoma.

src_text: Renowned thought leaders will be debating various topics that include science for human dignity; science for climate justice, science diplomacy for multilateralism, and science for Africa and the world number of side and satellite events will take place concurrently, and some of them will be hosted by the General Assembly of the African Academy of Sciences Pan-African organisation whose vision is to transform lives on the African continent through science.
tgt_text: Boto ya Koporasi ya Motlakase wa Nyutlelia ya Aforika Borwa  Rre David Nicholls thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Leshoene Joseph Shayi thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Senamile Masango thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Elsie Monale thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Charles Leornad Mavuso  Rre Hilton Darryl Lazarus  Rre Ashley Latchu  Ngaka Mosidi Makgae  Rre Suren Maharaj; mmogo lej.

src_text: World AIDS Day.
tgt_text: Mme Bessie Makgopa thapilwe sešwa go nna tokololo e tsenang mo legatong la yo mongwe fa se teng).

src_text: South Africa will join the world in observing and participating in activities to mark the annual World AIDS Day on 1 December 2022 under the theme: “Equalise and Integrate to End AIDS”.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Matlole go Tshegetsa Maano Merero ya Leokwane  Rre Sipho Mkhize thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Mmete Petrus Fusi  Mme Nosizwe Nokwe-Macamo  Mme Mary-Jane Morifi  Mme Samela Titus-Nabe thapilwe sešwa); mmogo lef.

src_text: The national commemoration event that will be held at the Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium in Bloemfontein in the Free State will be used to remind everyone to be responsible by getting to know their health status so as to make informed life decisions.
tgt_text: Rre Sechaba Thole thapilwe sešwa).

src_text: The commemoration comes as South Africa prepares to begin piloting the injectable pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) early next year, which is recommended by the World Health Organisation.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Isimangaliso Wetland Park  Rre Israel Mabhudu Tembe thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Thulile Memory Sosibo thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Peter Christopher Small thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Gonesagren Ganesh Nair thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Maureen Sibusisiwe Ngcobo  Mme Nombuso Mlambo  Rre Boy Daniel Ngobeni; mmogo leh.

src_text: The PrEP injection, to be taken every other month, could prevent as many as 52 000 new HIV infections.
tgt_text: Rre Bongani Mzwakhe Mhlongo.

src_text: Reconciliation Day.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tsa Lekgotla la Madirelo Dikago  Mme Holovisa Amelia Mtshali thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)b. Mme Vangile Petronella Nene  Rre Anele Mahlawe  Mme Elizabeth Faith Nyaka  Mme Tinyiko Laurel Palesa Shipalana  Mme Mandisa Princess Pepeta-Daki  Ngaka Sitsabo Dlamini thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Thembinkosi Cedric Madikane  Mme Molefi Kubuzie  Rre Christopher Kobla Gavor  Rre Ngwako Edward Hutamo thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Chris Steynberg  Rre Ashley Latchu thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Ditaba Maraka thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Sinehlanhla Mthembu thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Salome Mabilane  Mme Snowy Makhudu  Ngaka Khangwelo Desmond Musetsho  Mme Modiehi Elisa Molebatsi  Rre Craig Silva  Rre Tshepo Albia Monakedi; mmogo lev.

src_text: On Friday, 16 December 2022, the nation will celebrate Reconciliation Day to reaffirm our commitment to unity and nation-building.
tgt_text: Mme Seemole Angela Mohopo.

src_text: Each year we have an opportunity to reach out to one another to deal with our past, reconcile and build new nation going forward.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Metsi sa Magalies  Ngaka Keneilwe Sebego thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Yvonne Malebo Motolong thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Stanley Ngobeni  Mme Yongama Pamla  Mme Priscilla Nomsa Mashaba  Ngaka Mosidi Makgae  Rre Muzuvukile Wiseman Mkhize  Mme Tebogo Magogodi Elizabeth Malaka thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Rudolph Martin Le Roux; mmogo lej.

src_text: Our journey since the advent of freedom and democracy in 1994 has decisively shown that we are stronger as nation when we are united.
tgt_text: Rre Itumeleng Mosala.

src_text: Our goal as South Africans should be to promote inclusive nation-building and social cohesion.
tgt_text: Bakomišenara ba Khomišene ya Taolo ya Melao ya Metsia.

src_text: Together we can build better tomorrow for all by striving to ensure nation that encourages dialogue, fosters social cohesion, embraces nation-building and celebrates its diverse culture.
tgt_text: Mme Davishinee Padayachee  Mme Mampiti Matsabu  Mme Nolubabalo Sondlo  Mme Karen van der Merwe  Rre Rolfe Eberhard  Ngaka Binganidzo Muchara  Rre John Alexander Conolly  Mme Karen Breytenbach  Rre Junior Potloane  Rre Itumeleng Brian Modiba; mmogo lek.

src_text: Cabinet calls on everyone to work together as nation, and harness our collective strengths to build united and prosperous South Africa.
tgt_text: Mme Ntombokuqala Nokulunga Mnqeta.

src_text: National Active Ageing Programme.
tgt_text: Bakaedi bao Seng ba Khuduthamaga mo Botong ya Bankatlhabololo ya Dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika  Mme Martie Jansen van Rensburg thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Dinao Lerutla  Mme Tasneem Essop  Rre Kenneth Brown; mmogo lee.

src_text: The Department of Social Development will host the National Active Ageing Programme in Germiston, Gauteng from 5 to 7 December.
tgt_text: Rre Ebrahim Rasool.

src_text: The programme brings all nine provinces together and is aimed at promoting the independent and healthy lifestyle of older persons to ensure that they actively participate in their communities.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Pabalesego ya kwa Mawatleng (SAMSA)  Rre Tau Morwe thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo).

src_text: The National Active Ageing Programme will open with national dialogue to allow older persons to engage on pertinent matters affecting them.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tsa Setheo sa Banamedi ba Diterene sa Aforika Borwa (Prasa)  Mme Sibongile Luthuli; mmogo leb.

src_text: This will be followed by the Golden Games where older persons will showcase their athletic abilities.
tgt_text: Moatefokate Johnny Motlogelwa.

src_text: The Older Persons Act, 2006 (Act 13 of 2006) emphasises the importance of the protection and promotion of the rights, dignity, status, integrity, safety, security and well-being of older persons.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Merero ya Leokwane  Rre Satish Roopa thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Carmen Mpelwane  Ngaka Salome Chiloane-Nwabueze; mmogo led.

src_text: In this regard, Cabinet calls upon all communities to care, respect and support older persons, especially against abuse, ill-treatment, neglect and GBV  MessagesCongratulations.
tgt_text: Rre Xolile Sizani.

src_text: Cabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to:Prize winners of the 2022 SADC Media Awards.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Metsi sa Trans-Caledon Tunnel  Mme Precious Nompumelelo Sibiya thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Gerald Dumas thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Gregory Nigel Joseph White  Mme Zelda Ncedekile-Tshabalala  Mme Vidhu Nardev Vedalankar  Rre Neo Mooketsi Tladinyane  Mme Mmanare Evelyn Mamabolo  Rre Patrick Roy Mnisi; mmogo lei.

src_text: Ikulumo Yobujamo Belizwe (i-SoNA).
tgt_text: Puo ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA).

src_text: IKhabinethi isifakazele isibawo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa asibeke sezwakala eKulumeni yakhe yobuJamo beliZwe yomNyaka wee-2023, sokuthi woke amaSewula Afrika akasebenzisane, kungabi nosalela ngemva lokhuya nasilwa neentjhijilo zelizwe lekhethu ezisiminyezeleko.
tgt_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo boikuelong jwa gagwe jo bo dirileng mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA) ya ngwaga wa 2023 mo ikuetseng mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go tshwarisana tiro mmogo le go dira bonnete jwa gore go se nne le ope yo ba mo tlogelang kwa morago fa go samaganwe le dikgwetlho tse di boima tse naga ya rona tobaneng natso.

Dikgato tse di sa tseweng ke phefo tsa ga moporesitente di beile kwa pele maano puso monongwaga go samagana le motlakase o tshabetseng ruri le go dira gore re se tlhole re sokodisiwa ke tlhaelo ya motlakase..  Kabinete ikuela mo maphateng otlhe setšhaba sa rona go ema nokeng matsholo otlhe go boletsweng ka ona mo puong ya SoNA ya Moporesitente, go nne botlhokwa mo go maswe mo go fokotseng botlhokatiro, tshokolo le ditlhwatlhwa tse di goletseng ruri tsa go reka dilo tse batho ba iphedisang ka tsona mmogo le go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe le bonweenwee.

src_text: Amagadango kaMengameli aqinileko abeka iindaba zemiraro yegezi phambili ehlelweni likarhulumende nonyaka, kobanyana kuzokuliwa nokuqinteliswa kwegezi bekutholakale indlela yokusabalalisa igezi ngendlela ethembekileko.
tgt_text: Puso tloga ikemiseditse go potlakisa tiro go setseng go samaganwe le yona ya go oketsa motlakase ka fa nageng mme tiro re tobaneng le yona ke go sutisa sengwe le sengwe se se kgoreletsang gore seno se diragale.

Fela jaaka Moporesitente Ramaphosa setse tlhalositse mo go SoNA ya gagwe, mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di tlang, ditlhotshwana tsa ditirelo tsa puso di tla abelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo ka ga Leano la Dikgato tse Puso tla di Tsayang (PoA) mo ngwageng yo re lebileng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhwezelela woke amakoro womphakathi ukuthi asekele amagadango ahlathululwe nguMengameli, wona angaqakathekileko azakuqinisa imizamo yethu yokuphungula ukutlhogeka komsebenzi, ubuchaka nokukhuphuka kweendleko zepilo kunye nokulwa nobulelesi nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Naga le yona ka Laboraro, 22 Tlhakole 2023 tla abelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga merero ya PoA.
Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika ya Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Urhulumende uzimisele ukuwurhabisa umsebenzi esele uthomile wokungezelela igezi ethungelelwaneni lethu legezi yelizwe loke, kanti umsebenzi wethu kususa nanyana kungaba siliyo bani esingaliya umsebenzi lo.
tgt_text: Kabinete sekegetse tsebe dintlha tse di tšhotlhilweng kwa Kopanong Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika e neng tshwaretswe kwa Cape Town International Convention Centre go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 9 Tlhakole 2023 mo molaetsamogolo neng re: “Go Bulela Dipeeletso mo Meepong ya Aforika: Go Tlisa Tsetsepelo, Polokesego le Tlamelo e sa Kgaotseng”.

Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika tsenetswe ke beng ba meepo go tswa mo kontinenteng le mo lefatsheng ka bophara bile itiretse leina ka go itsege jaaka khonferense e di gogang kwa pele mo dipeeletsong tsa meepo mo kontinenteng.

src_text: Eemvekaneni ezizakwezi imihlangano yokubika yehlanganisela yeenjamiso izakwethula eminye imininingwana yeHlelo lokuSebenza likaRhulumende (i-PoA) lomnyaka lo, njengoba lethulwe nguMengameli Ramaphosa ku-SoNA.
tgt_text: Moepo tswelela go nna le seabe se segolo mo go tliseng tlhabologo le mo go ageng diintaseteri mo kontinenteng ka bophara botlhokwa thata fa go tla mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go direng gore batho ba se latlhegelwe ke ditiro bile ke ona o dirileng gore go nne le ditiro di ka nna halofo ya milione mo meepong le ditiro tse dingwe di ka nna milione tse di ikokotletseng ka ditiro tsa meepo mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: ISabelo seeMali seliZwe ekufuze sethulwe ngeLesithathu womhla wama-22 kuMhlolanja wee-2023 sizakwethula eminye imininingwana nge-PoA karhulumende.
tgt_text: Dilo tse di tlhagisitsweng mo meepong ya Aforika Borwa mo ngwageng yo fetileng di fitlhile kwa mankalankaleng mo di dirileng bokanaka  18 trilione, tsa godisa dilo tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng, ditlhagisiwa tsa naga ya rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa boditšhaba mmogo le letseno la rona.

Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba nang le seabe mo intasetering eno go tswelela go tshwarisana tiro le puso gore re kgone go nna le intaseteri e itsegeng mo lefatsheng e kgonang go ema nokeng kgolo ya ikonomi, go tlhola ditiro le go tlisa tlhabololo e tsepameng.

src_text: IKhonferensi yezeeMayini EliZwekazini le-Afrika yomNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Merwalela.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyitjhejile imiphumela yeKhonferensi yezeeMayini EliZwekazini le-Afrika ebeyibanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre ukusukela ngomhla we-6 ukuyokufika kumhla we-9 kuMhlolanja wee-2023, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sivula Amasiso Weemayini/Wokumayina: Ubunzinzo, Ukuphepha kunye Nokusabalalisa.”                 .
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng bao ba latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa bona mo merwaleleng ya mo malobanyaneng e gogotseng mafelo le mantsinyana ka fa nageng..  Re leboga go menagane go ba ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso go ralala le naga ya rona ba ba neng ba tshwere phage ka dingana go pholosa matshelo batho.

src_text: IKhonferensi yezeeMayini EliZwekazini le-Afrika ihlanganise abosomabubulo abavela ndawozoke ekhonthinenthini yekhethu nephasini loke, yanzinzisa indawayo njengekhonferensi ephambili ngezamasiso kezokumayina ekhonthinenthini yekhethu.
tgt_text: Re le naga tla re ipopeng seoposengwe mme re tswe thuso bao ba tlhokang tlhokomelo le kemonokeng.

src_text: Iimayini solo zisenza umsebenzi oyisika ekuthenjelwe kiwo kezetuthuko nokwandiswa kwamabubulo kiyo yoke ikhonthinenthi yekhethu.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging gore ba nne ka fa dintlong fa pula tshologa le fa go na le merwalela, mmogo le go gakolola bao ba nnang mo mafelong ao metsi tamang mo go ona fa pula nele thata gore ba itlhokomele..  Baagi ba elediwa gore ba se tsamaele gaufi le mo metsi mantsi sianang ka lobelo, ba se thumele mo go ona kgotsa ba se kgabaganye mo metsing ano ka dijanaga tsa bona kgotsa gona go leka go kgabaganya ditsela, maborogo le dinoka mo metsi tletseng.

src_text: Zenza umsebenzi oqakathekileko ekuvuleni imisebenzi nekwenzeni ukuthi abantu bahlale emsebenzini, njengoba lapha eSewula Afrika ilinganiselwa esiquntwini sesigidi nje imisebenzi esetjenzwa bunqopha eemayini, bese kuthi eminye elinganiselwa esigidini kube ngephathelene nazo iimayini.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dira bonnete jwa gore ka gale bana ba bona ba bolokesegile bile ga go na kgonagalo ya gore ba ka gogolwa ke metsi fa go na le merwalela..  Tirisodikgoka ka Ditlhobolo.

Kabinete rometse matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga seopedi sa mmino wa hip-hop Rre Kiernan Forbes, yo tumileng thata ka leina la AKA, mmogo le ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga tsala ya gagwe yo neng le seapei se se tumileng bong Rre Tebello Motsoane, bao bobedi bo jelweng ka tlhobolo kwa Durban..  Kabinete batla gape le go romela matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga molwelakgaratlho ya go lwantshana le bosenyi bong Rre Ayob Mungalee, yo mo malobanyaneng jelweng ke tlhobolo kwa Eldorado Park kwa Johannesburg ne le Mokaedi wa mokgatlho o rotloetsang baagi go ema ka dinao kgatlhanong le digongwana tsa bosenyi le thekiso ya diritibatsi wa People Seeking Justice Action Group..  Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa batho bao ba jelweng ka ditlhobolo kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, KwaZulu-Natal le ya Kapa Botlhaba.

src_text: Umkhiqizo weemayini lapha eSewula Afrika ufike ku-.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tseno tsa go tlhasela batho ba bangwe, tseo ba sepodisi ba setseng ba weditse diphuruphutso tsa tsona, di re bontsha ka fao tirisodikgoka ka ditlhobolo setseng aname ka gona mmogo le dikotsi tse nang le tsona mo baaging..  Kabinete netefaletsa maAforika Borwa gore go samaganwe le dikgato tse di tla matlafatsang Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) gore kgone go lwantshana le bosenyi.

src_text: 18 thriliyoni, lapha ungazange khewufike khona phambilini, waphakamisa ipahla epheleleko yangekhaya, nepahla esiyithengisela amazwe wangaphandle, kunye nengeniso.
tgt_text: Tsona di tsenyeletsa go oketsa palo ya mapodisi mo mebileng mmogo le go tlhoma ditlhopha tse di tla lwantshanang le bosenyi jo bo rileng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela boke abanesandla emsebenzini wokumayina ukuthi baragele phambili ngokusebenzisana norhulumende kobanyana kuzokuphunyeleliswa ibubulo elingadli imali enengi ephasini loke nelisimelelisa ukuhluma komnotho, kuvuleke imisebenzi, lisekele ituthuko ebambelelako.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla dirisa gape le dikgato tsa go dirisa tshedimosetso ka mokgwa o tlhalefileng go itse gore ke mafelo fe a tumileng ka bosenyi le bosenyi bo itaolang mo go ona..  SAPS samagane le go gagamatsa matsholo go utolola ditlhobolo le dikolo le go thopa tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong tse di leng mo diatleng tsa ditlhokotsebe.

Mo dikgweding di le 12 tse di fetileng mapodisi ne thopa ditlhobolo di le 65 519 tse di neng di le mo diatleng tsa batho..  Puso ikuela mo baaging botlhe mmogo le mo mekgatlhong ya baagi go sikara mmogo tiro eno le ba sepodisi go fedisa botlhokotsebe mo metseng ya rona.

src_text: Iinkhukhula.
tgt_text: Fa go na le sengwe se se itseng se se ka romelang kwa kgolegelong batho ba mo motseng ba ba dirang dilo tse di seng mo molaong, loma mapodisi tsebe ka go letsetsa Mogala wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Bosenyi mo go 0800. .

src_text: IKhabinethi iyililele imbiko imindeni elahlekelwe ngabathandiweko bayo eenkhukhuleni zamhlapha nje ezisahlele iindawo ezimbadlwana zelizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Masepala wa Selegae wa Enoch Mgijima (EMLM).

Tona ya Pusoselegae le Merero ya Setso Mme Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma mmogo le Tona ya Matlole Rre Enoch Godongwana ba ne ba sedimosetsa ditokololo tsa Kabinete ka maeto bona go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba nang le dikarolo le seabe se se botlhokwa mo masepaleng ono wa Enoch Mgijima.

src_text: Sithokoza besizo elirhabako nabahlengi elizweni loke abasebenze ngokuzikhandla ukuhlenga ipilo yabantu.
tgt_text: Ka kgwedi ya Moranang, Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula dikgato tse di ka tsewang go rarabolola matsapa mo masepaleng ono go ya ka Karolo ya bo 139(7) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996, fa buisiwa mmogo le Karolo ya bo 150 ya Molao wa Taolo ya Matlole Dimasepala wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: Asihlangane njengesitjhaba sisize labo abadinge isizo lokutjhejwa nokusekelwa.
tgt_text: Masepala ono wa Enoch Mgijima ga a bolo go nna mo tobetobeng ya matlole le ya go retelelwa ke go tlamela setšhaba ka ditirelo pele ga ka tseelwa dikgato..  Kabinete dumelana le matsapa a utolotsweng ke bannaleseabe mme solofeditse baagi ba masepala yono gore go tla tsewa ditshwetso mabapi le gore ke dikgato dife tse di tshwanetsweng go tsewa go samagana le dikgwetlho tse masepala yono tobaneng le tsona mme tsona tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo tsa bolelelwa baagi..  Pabalesego mo Dikolong.

Pabalesego mo dikolong tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa santse le ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo pusong ya rona mme bile gape ditiragalo tsa tirisodikgoka tse di begiwang kwa dikolong magareng ga barutwana le barutabana ke selo se se re tlhobang boroko.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyelelisa abantu ukuthi bahlale ngekhaya lokhuya izulu nalilimbi belina khulu, ibe ikhumbuza nalabo abakhe eendaweni ezingenzasi ukuthi batjheje bayelele.
tgt_text: Le fa Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le tsentse tirisong dikgato tsa go samagana le bothata jono santse le maikarabelo batsadi le bagodisi ba bana go tshwarisana tiro le ditlhogo tsa dikolo mmogo le barutwana go netefatsa gore kwa dikolong go rena polokesego gore barutwana ba rona ba kgone go rutiwa mme tle nne batho mo setšhabeng.
Se sengwe se se botlhokwa thata mo go rona ke pabalesego ya barutabana ba rona kwa dikolong.

src_text: Abantu bayeleliswa ukuthi nanyana bakhamba ngeenyawo nanyana bakhamba ngeenkoloyi, bangathomi bangene amanzi agijima ngamandla namkha balinge ukweyama amanzi agijimako endleleni, emabhlorhweni nemilanjeni.
tgt_text: Pabalesego mo Mebileng.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyelelisa amalunga womphakathi ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi abantwana bahlala baphephile ekwemukeni namanzi nekukghanyweni mamanzi ngazo zoke iinkhathi nakuneenkhukhula.
tgt_text: Kabinete santse tshwenngwa ke dikotsi tse di diragalang go ralala le naga mo mebileng ya rona.

Puso tla tlhotlhomisa melao mentšhwa e tla fokotsang dikotsi tsa diteroko mongwe wa melao eno ke go dira gore dithoto di se tlhole di tsamaisiwa mo mebileng mme di tsamaisiwe ka diterene mo diporong, mme go solofelwa gore ka go dira jalo seno se tla fokotsa dirori tse di rwalang dithoto mo mebileng.

src_text: Inturhu Yeengidi.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba dirisang ditsela go obamela melao ya mo mebileng ka go ntsha matlho dinameng, ka go naganela batho ba bangwe ba le bona ba dirisang mmila oo le go se ba felele pele.

src_text: IKhabinethi iwulilele imbiko umndeni nabangani bomvumi we-hip-hop u-Kiernan Forbes, obekadume ngebizo lika-AKA, nompheki ongusaziwako u-Tebello Motsoane, abadunyuzwe babulawa e-Durban mhlapha.
tgt_text: Botlhe ba ba kgannang ba itshietse kgotsa ba gabotse diritibatsi mmogo le ba ba kgannang boatla, mmogo le ba ba kgannang ka lebelo le le kwa godimo, ke bona ba ba tlholang bontsi jwa dikotsi tseno mo mebileng  Melaotlhomo.
Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Tlhoma Lefelo le le Lengwe la go Abelana ka Ditirelo Tsotlhe tsa go Kgabaganya Melelwane (OSBP).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yezwakalisa ubuhlungu nokuzwelana kwayo nomndeni nabangani bomtjhotjhozeli obekalwisa ubulelesi uNom.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Molaotlhomo wa OSBP gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

src_text: Ayob Mungalee, odunyuzwe wabulawa mhlapha e-Eldorado Park, eJwanisbhege.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono latela gore go nesediwe pula pholisi ya OSBP mmogo le maano go tsenya tirisong ka Mopitlwe.

src_text: Bekamnqophisi wesiqhema esilwela ubulungiswa, i-People Seeking Justice Action Group, ekuyihlangano ebeyikhwezelela umphakathi ukuthi ulwe nomukghwa wobugenge nokuthengiswa kweendakamizwa.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo ona ke go dira gore go nne bonolo go tsenya batho le dithoto mo mafelong botseno jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le kwa mafelong dinaga tsa baagisani..  Seno se tla fokotsa tshubetlhelano e tleng nne gone kwa mafelong go tsena le go tswa ka fa nageng e diriwang ke batho ba ba kgabaganyang melelwane le ba ba gwebisanang.

Dikgato tseno di botlhokwa gape le mo dikgatong tsa naga ya rona mo go diragatseng Tumelano ya Kgwebisano e Senang Dikgoreletsi mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika (AfCFTA)..  Ditumelano tse di tlhalosiwang mo Molaotlhomong ono di tla thusa gore ditiro tsa go tlhatlhoba dithoto, dijanaga le batho kwa melelwaneng di se opise tlhogo mme di diriwe ka bonako.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyililele imbiko imindeni nabangani balabo ababulewe ngokuthurhuzwa ngobunengi eTjingalanga Kapa, KwaZulu-Natala kunye nePumalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono samagana gape le didirisiwa tse di matshwanedi tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba fa go tla mo go laoleng metsamaong ya go gwebisana, mmogo le ya batho le ya dithoto..  Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Lezizenzo zelunya, ezisaphenywa bathobelisimthetho, ziveza ukuthi inturhu yeengidi idlange kangangani nokuthi umphakathi ulimala kangangani ngayo.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasaladiwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

Molaotlhomo ono neela maatla Pholisi ya Taolo ya Makwalo Boitshupo Semmuso mmogo le go tla ka leano la go tlhoma thulaganyo ya dikhomphiutha le nngwe fela ya naga ya makwalo boitshupo mo go yona batho botlhe ba ba nnang ka fa nageng kgotsa ba ba kileng ba nna ka fa nageng maina bona tla bolokwang mo go yona..  Sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa Molaotlhomo ono se tla thusa gore go tlhomiwe sefalanatshedimoso sa go kwadisa baagi le bao seng baagi ba naga eno mme ba neilwe tetla ya go nnela ruri ka fa nageng mmogo le go se tlhokomela.

src_text: IKhabinethi iqinisekisa amaSewula Afrika ukuthi iButho lamaPholisa weSewula Afrika (i-SAPS) liyaqiniswa njenganje ukuthi kuzokukhandelwa ubulelesi.
tgt_text: Se tla thusa gape le gore go tlhomiwe le sefalanatshedimoso se sengwe gape sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.

src_text: Kilokhu-ke kuzokwandiswa amapholisa eentradeni, kusungulwe iinqhema ezikhethekileko zamapholisa ezizakuqalana nomhlobo wobulelesi othileko kwaphela.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa seno se tla thusa gape le ka go tlhoma Thulaganyo ya Naga ya go Dirisa Dikarolo tsa Mmele go Tlhagisa Boitshupo jwa Motho (NIS) mme thulaganyo eno tla dira gore go nne bonolo go bona dintlha tsa motho tsa boitshupo ka tswa di le mo sefalanatshedimosong sa go kwadisa baagi kgotsa mo go sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.

src_text: ISewula Afrika seyizokusebenzisa neendlela ezisekelwe libuthelelo lemininingwana elinabe khulu ngelwazi lezinto ukuthola nokuqothela iindawo ezidlangelwe bulelesi.
tgt_text: NIS tla kgona gape le go dirisana le dithulaganyo tse dingwe tsa boitshupo tsa maphata mangwe puso le poraefete..  Melaotlhomo ya naga ka bobedi leng wa OSBP le wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa ya ngwaga wa 2022 tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae mo go: www.dha.gov.za.
Baagi ba rotloediwa go romela ditshwaelo tsa bona tse ba di kwadileng mo atereseng e latelang: The Director-General of Home Affairs, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.

src_text: I-SAPS iqinisa ijima layo lokubamba nokwemuka iinlelesi iingidi ezingekho emthethweni neenhlavu zakhona.
tgt_text: Mogala: 012 406  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Eenyangeni ezili-12 ezidlulileko amapholisa abambe iingidi ezizii-65 519 azisusela unomphela ezandleni zabantu.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).

Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa tla tsenela Kopano ya bo 36 ya Pulo ya Palamente ya Dinaga tsa Aforika e tla tsenelwang ke Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso eno e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 18 go fitlha ka la bo 19 Tlhakole kwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

src_text: Urhulumende ukhombela zoke izakhamuzi neenjamiso zomphakathi ukuthi zisebenzisane namapholisa wangemakhabo ukucitha ubulelesi emphakathini/eendaweni zangemakhabo.
tgt_text: Pulo ya Palamente ya AU e tla bulwang ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go Potlakisiwa go Tsenngwa Tirisong AfCFTA” tla bulelwa ke Kopano e Edileng ya bo 42 ya Lekgotlakhuduthamaga e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 16 Tlhakole.

src_text: Nayibe unelwazi elingasiza ukuveza abantu abenza izinto eziphambene nomthetho, fowunela enomborweni yamapholisa yokuqeda ubelelesi – i-Crime Stop ku-0800.
tgt_text: Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso ya AU di tla dirisa molaetsamogolo yono go totobatsa maikano bona go tsenya tirisong ka botlalo AfCFTA..  Leeto la Semmuso la ga Moporesitente wa Naga ya Uganda.
Motlotlegi Moporesitente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa kwa Uganda tla etela naga ya Aforika Borwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole 2023, go latela gore Moporesitente ka ene Rre Ramaphosa mo laletse.

src_text: Umasipala Wendawo We-Enock Mgijima (i-EMLM).
tgt_text: Maitlhomo leeto leno ke go gagamatsa botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezomNyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezeNdabuko uNkosazana Dlamini-Zuma noNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali u-Enoch Godongwana mhlapha bakhe babikela iKhabinethi ngemikhulumiswano yokubonisana ebeyibanjwe nabalimindima abaqakathekileko ku-EMLM.
tgt_text: Leeto leno le tla garelwa ka go tshwarwa ga dikopano tsa beng ba dikgwebo ba ba batlang go gwebisana le go beeletsa mo dinageng ka bobedi..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa Dinaga tsa Mokgatlho wa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC).

Kabinete gakolola badiredi botlhe ba bobegakgang gore Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa SADC di butswe gore mmegadikgang mongwe le mongwe go tswa mo nageng nngwe le nngwe ya SADC yo batlang go di tsenela ka dira jalo mme di tla tswalelwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC di keteka tiro e tswileng diatla mo bobegakganyeng jwa makwalodikgang, jwa ditshwantsho, jwa go gasa tshedimosetso mo thelebišeneng le mo seyalemoweng mo dinageng tsa SADC ka maitlhomo go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go dirisana mmogo ga dinaga tsa kgaolo le go tshwaragana ga tsona  Melaetsa ya go Akgola.

src_text: NgoSihlabantangana wee-2022, iKhabinethi ivumele igadango lokulamulela i-EMLM ngokwesiGaba 139(7) somThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika womNyaka we-1996, ngokufundwa ndawonye nesiGaba 150  somThetho wee-2003 wokuLawulwa kweeMali zakwaMasipala (umThetho 56 wee-2003).
tgt_text: Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Nomcebo Zikode, Zakes Bantwini mmog le Wouter Kellerman jaaka kwa Dikabong tsa bo 65 tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga tsa Grammy ba kgonne go fenya maemo go diragatsa pina ka botswerere mo lefatsheng ka bophara fa ba ne ba diragatsa pina ya bona e bidiwang Bayethe  Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: batho botlhe ba ba thutseng botala ka tlhogo fa bese ba neng ba nametse ne sugagana le sejanaga se se rwalang tšhelete kwa tselafefong ya N1 kwa porofenseng ya Limpopo.

src_text: I-EMLM seyinesikhathi eside idosa emhlweni ngeemali, ibhalelwa nanga kukwenzela umphakathi izenzelwa, ngaphambi kobanyana kuthathwe leligadango lokuyilamulela.
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletsa botlhe ba ba nnileng le dikgobalo mo kotsing eno pholo ya ka bonako.Rre John Moeti (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56), yo kileng tshamekela setlhopha sa kgwele ya dinao sa Bafana Bafana le sa Orlando Pirates, yo gape nnileng le seabe se se botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore ka ngwaga wa 1996 re kgone go fenya Sejana sa Baganka ba Kgwele ya Dinao mo Dinageng tsa Aforika.

Kabinete rometse gape le matshediso kwa pusong ya Türkiye le ya Syria mmogo le kwa baagi ba dipuso ka bobedi jaaka ba latlhegetswe ke matshelo batho ba bo bona ba bantsi mmogo le go senyegelwa ke mafaratlhatlha bona a leng botlhokwa mo baaging le mo ikonomng ya bona leng seo se tlhodilweng ke thoromo kgolo ya lefatshe ka la bo 6 Tlhakole 2023 bogolo jwa yona bo balelwang go.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithi iyayizwa imiraro emaphorodlha ekhonjwe babelani, nje-ke iqinisekise izakhamuzi ze-EMLM ukuthi khona duze nje zizakutjelwa ngesiqunto sokuthi kuzakusetjenzwa njani ngemiraro ekhona kamasipala wendawo le.
tgt_text: 8 mo Sekaleng sa go Meta Dithoromo tsa Lefatshe.
Re utlwela botlhoko malapa ao latlhegetsweng ke ba bo bona le bao ba santseng ba batlana le ba bo bona.

src_text: Ukuphepha Eenkolweni .
tgt_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe mekgatlho ya naga ya Aforika Borwa e samaganang le ditiro tsa go tswa baagi thuso le yona ileng koo go tswa baagi ba koo thuso.

src_text: Ukuphepha eenkolweni zeSewula Afrika solo kuliqalontanzi likarhulumende, nje-ke urhulumende uphatheke kumbi khulu ngemibiko enande ivela yokulwa hlangana kwabafundi nabafundisi.
tgt_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe yo mongwe wa mapodisi Aforika Borwa setlhopha sa yuniti ya K-9 yo bogatlhamelamasisi jwa gagwe, gareng ga dilo tse dingwe tse dintsi, bo dirileng gore go feletswe go kgonnwe go ribolola mosadimogolo wa dingwaga di le 80 yo falotseng kotsi eno yo neng santse le ka fa gare ga dithothobolo tsa moago o ba wetseng kwa Türkiye yo ntseng ka fa teng ga mpa ya dithothobolo tseno sebaka sa go feta matsatsi le robedi  Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

Mme Azola Mayekiso thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Koporasi ya Tlamelo ka Matlole Ditheo tsa go Agela Setšhaba Dintlo..  Rre Lucas Thabiso Thiti thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG) wa Lephata la Tlhabololo le Kemonokeng ya Setheo ka fa Lefapheng la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo..  Mme Boitumelo Mosako thapilwe go nna CEO kwa Bankatlhabololong ya Dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika (DBSA)..  Rre Kabelo Rikhotso thapilwe go nna Mokaedi yo Mogolo mo Botong ya Koporasi ya Dipeeletso tsa Puso (PIC)..  Rre Matsemela Moloi thapilwe go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Setheo sa Ditlolo tsa Molao mo Mebileng.

src_text: Nanyana umNyango wezeFundo esiSekelo ubeke iindlela zokulwa nalomraro nje, kumsebenzi wababelethi nabakhulisi babantwana ukusebenzisana neemphathimandla zesikolo nabafundi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iinkolo zihlala ziziindawo eziphephileko lapho abafundi bethu bazakukhula khona kuhle bebabe zizakhamuzi ezilisizo.
tgt_text: Moatefokate Sonwabile Mancotywa thapilwe go nna Mokaedi yo seng wa Khuduthamaga mmogo le go nna gape Monnasetulo mo Botong ya Setheo sa Dijanaga tse di Putlang Mebila go Kgabaganya Melelwane ya Dinaga.

src_text: Issues In The Environment.
tgt_text: Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya.

src_text: 2023 Budget Speech.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya 2023 e letlelelang gore dikgato tse di botlhokwa tseo di itsisitsweng ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba di ka tlamelwa ka matlole gore di phetagadiwe.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2023 National Budget giving effect to critical interventions outlined by President Cyril Ramaphosa’s State of the Nation Address.
tgt_text: Mo puong eo go builwe ka maano a tseneletseng go samagana le dikgwetlo tsa motlakase go fokotsa botlhokatiro, tshokolo le dikgwetlho tsa ditlhwatlhwa tse di goletseng ruri tsa dilo tse di botlhokwa, mmogo le go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe le bonweenwee.

src_text: The Speech detailed plans to tackle the energy challenge, reduce unemployment, poverty and the rising cost of living, including combating crime and corruption.
tgt_text: Fa re tswelela go ema nokeng maikano rona go sonaga matlole, kgolo ya ikonomi le peeletso mmogo le megolo ya go thusa baagi ke tsona bontsi tse matlole puso diragadiwang mo go ona mo re boneng R66 bilione abelwa lephata la Thuso ya Baagi mmogo le R36 bilione e abilweng gore tlamele Megolo ya go Thusa Baagi ba ba sa Direng ba ba Wetsweng ke Mathata Ditšhelete ka Ntlha ya COVID-19 go fitlha ka la bo 31 Mopitlwe..  Mo godimo ga seno, matlole a okeditsweng mphata puso ka boraro jwa ona tla thusa go fokotsa boima jo matlole ano bo bo rweleng, segolobogolo mo go mo mererong ya boitekanelo, ya thuto, mmogo le ya ditirelo tse di botlhokwa tse di abelwang setšhaba ntle le gore se di duelele.

src_text: While balancing our commitments to fiscal discipline, the economic growth and investment and the social wage continues to receive the bulk of public resources, with R66 billion allocated to Social Development and R36 billion to fund the extension of the COVID-19 social relief of distress grant until 31 March..
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Dipatlisiso tsa Palo ya Badiri mo Kotareng.

src_text: Furthermore, the increased allocations for all three spheres of government will help alleviate some of the financial pressures, particularly in health, education, and free basic services where the costs of providing services are rising.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga Pegelo ya ngwaga wa 2022 ya kotara ya bone ya Dipatlisiso tsa Palo ya Badiri mo Kotareng, mme yona le fa go se gokalo bontsha phokotsego ya dipalo tsa batho ba ba sa direng ka fa nageng.

src_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey.
tgt_text: Palo eno fokotsegile ka diphesente di le.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the Stats SA Quarterly Labour Force survey for fourth quarter of 2022, which showed slight but significant decrease in the rate of unemployment in the country.
tgt_text: 2 go tloga mo diphesenteng di le.

src_text: The official rate decreased by.
tgt_text: 9 go fitlha mo go di le.

src_text: 2 per cent from.
9% to.
tgt_text: Makala otlhe mo setšhabeng go ikuelwa mo go ona go nna le seabe mo go tlholeng ditiro gore re kgone go tswelela go fokotsa dipalo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro tse di rekotileng mo tsamaong ya nako ya dikotara di le tharo tse di fetileng.

src_text: 7 per cent..  All sectors of society are called to drive job creation opportunities so that we can continue the downward trend in the unemployment rate as recorded over the last three quarters.
tgt_text: Ka go emana nokeng re ka kgona go phutlhamisa bongangabele jwa botlhokatiro ka fa nageng ya rona.

src_text: Through our collective effort, we can break the stubborn cycle of unemployment in our nation..  Government remains committed to the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP), which includes our mass public employment programme and efforts to support economic growth that bolsters employment after the devastation of COVID-.
tgt_text: Puso santse eme ka boikano jwa yona jwa Leano la Tsosoloso le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP), leo le tsenyeletsang letsholo la rona le legolo la go thapa batho ba bantsi mo ditirelong tsa setšhaba mmogo le dikgato tsa go ema nokeng kgolo ya ikonomi e oketsang ditiro go latela gore re sutlhe mo dinaleng tsa phage ya COVID-.

src_text: Deputy President.
tgt_text: Dikgang tse di ka ga Motlatsamoporesitente.

src_text: Cabinet confirms that Deputy President David Mabuza has resigned as Member of Parliament, ending his term as Deputy President of the country.
tgt_text: Kabinete totobatsang kgang ya gore ke boammaruri gore Motlatsamoporesitente Rre David Mabuza rotse tiro jaaka Tokololo ya Palamente, mme paka ya gagwe ya go nna Motlatsamoporesitente wa naga fitlhile kwa bokhutlhong.

src_text: Cabinet joined President Cyril Ramaphosa in thanking him for his exceptional service to the country over the last five years.
tgt_text: Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka go leboga go menagane Motlatsamoporesitente ka tiro e tswileng diatla a diretseng naga mo sebakeng sa go feta dingwaga di le tlhano.

src_text: Deputy President Mabuza served with distinction and his contribution in building the country we want will forever be remembered by the people of South Africa.
tgt_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Mabuza diretse naga ka botswapelo mme tiro a diretseng setšhaba mo go ageng naga ya rona tla nna mo megopolong ya baagi ba Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustration of citizens and businesses over the inconvenience and disruptions caused by persistent load shedding.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya baagi le dikgwebo mabapi le ditshitiso le dikgoreletsi tse di tlhodiwang ke motlakase o tshabetseng ruri.

src_text: The commitments from the State of Nation Address and the Budget allocations strengthen the capability of the state to fast track interventions outlined in the Energy Action Plan.
tgt_text: Ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba mmogo le matlole a rebotsweng ke Tekanyetsokabo di tla dira gore puso kgone go phetagatsa ka bonako ditharabololo tse di kwadilweng mo Leanong la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato.

src_text: The recently published National State of Disaster regulations by the Minister of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs allows government to respond more effectively and with the necessary pace to deal with the severe electricity supply constraints.
tgt_text: Melawanataolo e senang go phasaladiwa ke Tona ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ya Molao wa Maemo Masetlapelo Naga neela puso maatla go ka samagana ka tshwanelo le matsapa a gaketseng re tobaneng le ona tlhaelo ya motlakase mmogo le go dira jalo ka bonako jo bo tlhokagalang.

src_text: Moreover, it ensures transparency and accountability by enabling departments to guide their sectors.
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape se se botlhokwa ke gore dira gore go nne le go rwala maikarabelo le go tlhoka lehunelo ka go dira gore mafapha nne ona a disang makala ano.

src_text: Regular progress updates will be provided.
tgt_text: Gangwe le gape go tla tshwanelwa gore go rebolwe dipegelo ka sengwe le sengwe seo se dirilweng.

src_text: The debt relief of R254 billion, subject to strict conditions will relieve extreme pressure on Eskom and enable it to undertake necessary investment and maintenance.
tgt_text: Go phimolwa ga sekoloto sa bokanaka R254 bilione sa Eskom, go go tla diragadiwang fa setheo seno se dumela gore se tla ikobela dikgato tse di gagamaditsweng, se tla fokoletsa setheo seno matsapa mantsi mme sa kgona gore se simolole go tsaya dikgato tse di tlhokengang go tsewa tsa go beeletsa le go tlhokomela le go tsosolosa meago le dithoto tsa setheo seno.

src_text: Tax incentives to rollout rooftop solar panels, not only assist households and businesses in generating electricity for their own use but also supports the national grid.
tgt_text: Go se duedisiwe lekgetho gore letsholo la go tsenya dirisiwa tse di pegiwang mo marulelong tsa motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi le kgone go diragadiwa go tla thusa seng fela malapa batho le dikgwebo gore ba kgone go iphetlhela motlakase mme gape go tla thusa le gore diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka fa nageng di nne le motlakase.

src_text: Under the expanded incentives for businesses, investments in renewable energy will allow businesses to claim 125 per cent deduction in the first year for all renewable energy projects, with no thresholds on generation capacity.
tgt_text: Ka letsholo la go oketsa merokotso ya dikgwebo, fa dikgwebo di beeletsa mo motlakaseng wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa, di tla kgona go dira kopo ya gore mo diporojekeng tsotlhe tsa motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa di fokolediwa lekgetho ka diphesente di le 125 mo ngwageng wa ntlha, mme go se nne le methamo e beewang ya gore ba ba tlhagisang motlakase ba se fete.

src_text: Wage Negotiations.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tse di ka ga Megolo ya Badiredipuso.

src_text: Cabinet calls upon all parties to remain committed to the process of the Public Service Co-Ordinating Bargaining Council Collective Agreement, and to arrive at solution that serves the best interests of the country..
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba tsayang karolo mo dithulaganyong tsa Ditumelano tsa Lekgotla la Ditharabololo tsa Dipuisano tsa Merero ya Ditiro tsa Badiredipuso mo go Fitlhelele Ditumelano tse Maphata Otlhe Dumelanang ka Tsona go se iphapose dithulaganyo tseno, gore go fitlhelelwe ditharabololo tse di tla tswelang naga mosola.

src_text: It is vitally important that we all work together for the good of our nation and her people.
tgt_text: Go botlhokwa gore re dirisane sentle mmogo gore naga ya rona le setšhaba sa rona re di tswele mosola.

src_text: While the right to strike is protected, it must be done in responsible manner that upholds our democracy and rule of law.
tgt_text: Le fa le gore molao letleletse gore batho ba ka tsenela megwanto, megwanto eno tshwanetse go diragadiwa ka tsela e nang le maikarabelo e ikobelang melao ya rona ya temokerasi.

Kabinete gakolola bao ba leng mo maanong go tsenela megwanto gore ba tshwanetse go dira jalo ka tsela e senang mmodubudu, mme ga ba tshwanela go rumulana le batho ba bangwe kgotsa go tlhatlhamolola mafaratlhatlha le dithoto tsa naga le tsa batho ba bangwe.

src_text: Cabinet reminds everyone that those who are planning to strike must do so in peaceful manner, and should refrain from any form of intimidation and destruction of infrastructure and properties..  Anti-Corruption.
tgt_text: Go Lwantshana le Bonweenwee.

src_text: Cabinet joins President Cyril Ramaphosa in his call to the former Eskom CEO Andre de Ruyter to report allegations of corruption at Eskom to the police.
tgt_text: Kabinete eme ka lefoko le le lengwe le Moporesitente mo go direng boikuelo jwa gagwe mo go Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo wa Eskom Rre Andre de Ruyter gore lebe kwa mapodising go ya go tlhatlhela kgetse.

src_text: Our crime fighting institutions stand ready to arrest, and prosecute those who break the law.
tgt_text: Ditheo tsa naga ya rona tsa go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe di malalaalaotswe go tshwara le go sekisa bao ba tlolang molao.

src_text: We call on anyone with information related to crime and corruption to report what they know to the relevant law enforcement authorities.
tgt_text: Re ikuela mo go motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo go nang le sengwe se se itseng ka bogodu le bonweenwee jo batho ba bangwe ba bo dirang go loma mapodisi tsebe.

src_text: All of us are duty bound to fight corruption and to the prescripts of the Prevention and Combating of Corrupt Activities Act, which requires people in “positions of authority” in the public and private sectors to report, all corrupt activities.
tgt_text: Yo mongwe le yo mongwe wa rona na le maikarabelo go lwantshana le bonweenwee ao motlhankedi yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo leng mo maemong a kwa godimo mo ditheong tsa puso le tsa poraefete a rwesiwang ke Molao wa go Thibela le go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Bonweenwee, go bega ditiragalo tseno tsotlhe tsa bonweenwee.

src_text: Financial Action Task Force (FATF).
tgt_text: Sepodisi sa Ditirelo tsa Matlole (FATF).

src_text: Cabinet noted the decision by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) to list South Africa as jurisdiction under increased monitoring or more commonly referred to as FATF’s “grey list”.
tgt_text: Kabinete sekegela tsebe tshwetso e tserweng ke ba FATF e ka ga go baya naga ya Aforika Borwa mo maemong a kwa godimo dinaga tseo tsamaiso ya madi mo go tsona tshwanetsweng go lebelelwa ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho gore madi go tswa mo nageng eno ga romelwe digongwana tsa dimenolopuso mme seno se itsegwe ka gore ke FATF’s “grey list”.

src_text: While the FATF recognised the significant progress made by the country in addressing the shortcomings highlighted in its mutual evaluation report (MER), it assessed that there is more needed to be done.
tgt_text: Le fa FAFT dumela gore naga eno setse dirile go tlala seatla mo go samaganeng le matsapa a nopotsweng mo Pegelong ya Ditshekatsheko tsa Dikarolo tse go Dumelanweng ka Tsona (MER) tlhomamisitse gore go santse go na le dilo tse dintsi tse di santseng di tlhoka go diriwa.

src_text: Cabinet is cognisant that addressing the identified shortcomings will be in the best interest of South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete itse sentle gore go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di santseng di tlhoka go rarabololwa tseno go tla tswela naga ya Aforika Borwa mosola o seng kana ka sepe.

src_text: Government is committed to work swiftly to strengthen the effectiveness of its anti-money laundering and counter-terrorist financing regime.
tgt_text: Puso ikemiseditse go pheta ka pejana tiro eno gore kgone go tokafatsa maemo yona go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu mmogo le tsa go fetisetsana madi go neelwa digongwana tsa menolopuso.

src_text: Ugandan State Visit.
tgt_text: Leeto la Moporesitente wa Naga ya Ugandan go Etela ka fa Nageng ka Mabaka Tiro.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful State Visit by President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni of the Republic of Uganda to South Africa on 28 February..  During the visit, the two Heads of State addressed Business Forum, and explored trade and investment opportunities.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse leeto le le tsamaileng sentle la semmuso go jelwa nala ke Moporesitente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa naga ya Rephaboliki ya Uganda go jela nala naga Aforika Borwa ka la bo 28 Tlhakole..  Mo leetong leno Ditlhogo tsa Mebuso ka bobedi ga bona ba ne ba ema ka lefoko Kopano ya Beng ba Dikgwebo, mmogo le go sekaseka ka fao dinaga tseno di ka gwebisanang ka gona le go beeletsana.

src_text: They also witnessed the signing of Memorandums of Understanding (MoU) on number of areas, which included: Industrial Development Cooperation, Tourism; Transport; Communication Technologies; Correctional Services; and Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Ba ne gape ya nna dipaki tsa fa go saeniwa Memorantamo wa go Utlwanela Ditumelano (MoU) mo maphateng mantsinyana a farologaneng a akaretsang: Koporasi ya Tlhabololo ya Diintaseteri (IDC), Bojanala; Dipalangwa; Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano; Ditirelo tsa kwa Kgolegelong tsa go Thusa Batshwariwa go Nna Batho mo Setšhabeng; mmogo le le mo go Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.

src_text: The Republic of Uganda is South Africa’s 15th largest trading partner on the Continent and the second largest in East Africa.
tgt_text: Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Uganda ke naga e leng mo maemong bo 15 mo dinageng tseo di gwebisanang le naga ya Aforika Borwa mo Kontinenteng bile gape mo maemong bobedi mo dinageng tse di gwebisanang le rona tsa kwa Borwa ja Aforika.

src_text: Between 2017 and 2021, total trade between the two countries reached R3 billion.
tgt_text: Magare ga ngwaga wa 2017 le wa 2021 kgwebisano mo dinageng tseno ka bobedi ne ya oketsega go fitlha go R3 bilione.

src_text: African Union (AU) Summit.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).

src_text: President Cyril Ramaphosa led the South African delegation at the African Union Summit in Ethiopia under the theme “Acceleration of Africa Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Implementation”.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baromiwa ba naga ya Aforika Borwa kwa Samiting ya AU e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ethiopia ka molaetsamogolo o reng, “Go Potlakisa Lebelo la go Tsenya Tirisong Letsholo le le Sutisang Dikgoreletsi mo Kgwebisanong ya Dinaga tsa Aforika (AfCFTA).

src_text: South Africa provided updates on the implementation of the African Continental Free Trade Area.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa neelane ka tshedimosetso ya go baya mo dinakong maloko AU gore yona ke eng se setseng se dirile mo go tsenyeng tirisong AfCFTA.Jaaka naga ya rona le Monnasetulo mo Lekgotlheng la Merero ya Kagiso le Pabalesego la AU, naga ya rona neelane gape le ka tshedimosetso e ka ga seo setseng se dirile mo go thuseng go diragatsa Letsholo la 2030 la go Fedisa Dintwa mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika.

src_text: As Chair of the AU Peace and Security Council, the country also provided an update on progress towards Silencing the Guns in Africa by..  As AU COVID-19 Champion, President Ramaphosa presented proposals on how the Africa Centres for Disease Control (CDC) can be strengthened and measures adopted to better prepare the continent for pandemics.
tgt_text: Jaaka Moporesitente Ramaphosa le ene yo di gogang kwa pele mo Letsholong la AU la Merero ya COVID-19 ne tlhalosa gape le gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go matlafatsa Setheo sa Aforika sa Twantsho le Thibelo ya Malwetse gore kontinente kgone go ithulaganya sentle gore kgone go ema sejaro kgatlhanong le maroborobo mangwe.

src_text: Under the leadership of President Ramaphosa, the COVID-19 African Vaccine Acquisition Task Team was established in support of the Africa Vaccine Strategy.
tgt_text: Ka ntlha ya boeteledipele jwa Moporesitente Ramaphosa, Setlhopha sa Tiro ya go Rekela Kontinente ya Aforika Meento ya COVID-19 se sele sa tlhomiwa gore se eme nokeng Leano la Meento la Aforika.

src_text: South Africa also secured over 500 million COVID-19 vaccine doses for the continent.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa ne gape ya rekela kontinente mabotlolwana meento ya COVID-19 le dimilione di feta di le dimilione di le.

src_text: Further, the African Pandemic Response Fund was established, which mobilised $137 million for local production of vaccines, diagnostics, personal protective equipment, oxygen and critical medicines.
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga tseno tsotlhe, go ne gape ga tlhomiwa le Letlole la Aforika la go Lwantshana le Leroborobo leo le kgonneng go bokeletsa madi le kanaka ditolara di le dimilione di le 137 gore dirisediwe go tlhagisa meento ka fa nageng, go tlhatlhoba, go reka didirisiwa tsa go itshireletsa mo bolwetseng jwa COVID-19, metšhini ya go thusa balwetse go hema le melemo mengwe e botlhokwa.

src_text: The Africa Medical Supplies Platform was also launched, to ensure access to vital medical supplies for all African countries.
tgt_text: Setheo sa go Tlamela Aforika ka Melemo le sone se ne sa tlhomiwa gore se dire bonnete jwa gore dinaga tsotlhe tsa Aforika di tlamelwa ka melemo e botlhokwa.

src_text: Gender-Based Violence and Femicide.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tsa go Bogisa le go Bolaya Batho ba Sesadi.

src_text: Government condemns the persistent cases of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and continues to intensify its fight through several interventions.
tgt_text: Puso kgalema ka mafoko a bogale ditiragalo tse di sa khutseng tsa go bogisa le go bolaya batho ba sesadi mme tsweletse go gagamatsa dikgato tsa yona tse dintsinyana tsa go lwantshana le seno.

src_text: These include extensive legal reform, the establishment of GBVF Response Fund, and support for Thuthuzela and Khuseleka Care Centres, which provide vital services for GBV survivors..
tgt_text: Tsona di tsenyeletsa dikgato tse dintsi tsa go kwalola sešwa melao, go tlhoma Letlole la go Lwantshana le GBVF mmogo le go ema nokeng Mafelo go Gomotsa le go Thoba Maikutlo Bao ba Fetileng mo Mathateng go Bogisiwa mo Dikgolaganong tsa Lorato leng mafelo a abelang batswasetlhabelo bano thuso kgolo tota.

src_text: Furthermore, partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF, remain critical.
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga seno, tirisanommogo puso e tlhomileng magareng ga yona le mekgatlho ya baagi, badirisanimmogo ba yona mo mererong ya tlhabololo, dikereke le mo makaleng mangwe ka go sikara mmogo tiro eno go lwantshana le bothata jono jwa GBVF santse le botlhokwa mo go maswe.

src_text: Health.
tgt_text: Boitekanelo.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the deliberations of the historic International Medical Countermeasures Meeting that the country co-hosted under the theme “Building consensus for an equitable and sustainable medical countermeasures platform for the next pandemic.”.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dipuisano tse dikgolo tsa Kopano ya go Atlhaatlha Dikgato tsa Baoki mo Lefatsheng tsa go Thibela Maroborobo mme kopano eno ne eteletswe kwa pele ke naga ya rona le nngwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go dumelana ka go nna le serala se se tshwarang batho ka go lekana se se tla nnelang ruri sa dikgato tsa baoki mo lefatsheng tsa go thibela maroborobo gore ke nne mosola mo maroborobong a ka nnang teng kamoso.”.

src_text: The meeting explored options to secure equitable access to lifesaving vaccines, diagnostics and therapeutics for future pandemics based on need and not on wealth.
tgt_text: Mo kopanong eno go tšhotlhilwe kgang e ka ga ka fao mo isagong meento e pholosang matshelo batho ka abelwang dinaga ka go lekalekana, go abelana ka ditirelo tsa go tlhatlhobiwa le go neelwa melemo go ya ka gore di tlhokagala go le go kanakang seng go ya ka gore ke mang yo itsholetseng.

src_text: This began consensus building exercise ahead of the High Level Meeting on Pandemic Prevention, Preparedness and Response at the 78th United Nations General Assembly this year.
tgt_text: Seno se ne sa dira gore go nne le dilo tse go dumelanwang ka tsona pele go ka simololwa ka Kopano ya Maemo a kwa Godimo e ka ga go Thibela Leroborobo, go Ipaakanyetsa Lona le go Samagana le Lona kwa Kopanokgothakgotheng ya bo 78 ya Dinagakopano monongwaga.

src_text: In separate but related development, the recent Traditional Medicine Summit hosted by the Department of Health is part of the resolutions taken at the World Health Organisation (WHO), African Union as well as Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) to integrate traditional medicine into health systems.
tgt_text: Mo go nngwe ya ditiragalo seng tse di tsamaisanang le se re buileng ka sona mo godimo, ke tshwetso ya go dira gore melemo ya setso le yona dirisiwe mo maokelong mme tshwetso eno tserwe mo Kopanong ya mo malobeng ya Melemo ya Setso e neng tsenetswe ke Lefapha la Boitekanelo, Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya Boitekanelo (WHO), Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU) mmogo le Dinaga tse di Dirisanang Mmogo tse di kwa Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC).

src_text: Child Immunisation and Cholera.
tgt_text: Go Tlhabela Bana Moento wa Mmoko le Kholera.

src_text: The measles outbreak poses risk to children who are not immunised.
tgt_text: Mmoko yo weleng ka nna kotsi mo baneng ba ba iseng ba tlhabele moento wa mmoko.

src_text: Parents and legal guardians are urged to ensure that their children are immunised as part of the nationwide child immunisation campaign.
tgt_text: Go ikuelwa mo batsading le mo bagodising ba bana go dira bonnete jwa gore bana ba bona ba tlhabelwa moento jaaka go na le letsholo la go tlhabela bana botlhe moento ka fa nageng.

src_text: Measles symptoms include fever, red eyes, runny nose and cough, typically appearing before the characteristic rash.
tgt_text: Matshwao mmoko ke a akaretsang go fisa mo mmeleng, go hibila matlho, go elaela dinko le go gotlhola, go tšhipoga diso tse disesane.

src_text: Following the recent rise in cholera cases, Cabinet urged citizens to be vigilant of any symptoms, which include diarrhoea dehydration, vomiting and body weakness.
tgt_text: Ka ntlha ya dikgetse tse di ntseng di begiwa sešweng jaana tsa batho ba ba tshwerweng ke kholera, Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go ikelatlhoko gore ga ba na matshwao ape go tshwana le go felelwa ke metsi mo mmeleng ka ntlha ya letshololo, go tlhatsa le go tlhoka maatla mo mmeleng.

src_text: Spread mainly through polluted water or contaminated food, the public is reminded to boil water, cook food thoroughly, and practice basic hygiene of washing hands with soap and water to prevent transmission.
tgt_text: Ka ntlha ya fa bolwetse jono bo anama ka ntlha ya go dirisa metsi a kgotlhelegileng le dijo tse di tshwaetsegileng, baagi ba elediwa gore ba bedise metsi, ba buduse dijo le go itlwaetsa go tlhapa diatla ka metsi sesepa gore ba nne phepa gore ba kgone go thibela go anama ga bolwetse jono.

src_text: All people who experience cholera-like symptoms, with or without local or international travel history, must immediately visit their nearest health facility.
tgt_text: Batho botlhe ba ba ikutlwang ba na le matshwao a tshwanang le kholera ka tswa ba kile ba tswa ka fa nageng kgotsa ba ise ba tswe ka naga, ba tshwanetse go leba kwa bookelong jo bo gaufi le bona.

src_text: Water security.
tgt_text: Go se Felelwe ke Metsi.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the country’s largest reservoir, the Vlakfontein Reservoir in Gauteng, which can store up to 210 million-litres of water equivalent to 24 hours of water demand, and is expected to be completed in April.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse go thakgololwa ga bodutelo jo bogolo ka fa nageng jwa metsi jwa Vlakfontein Reservoir kwa Gauteng, jo bo kgonang go boloka dilitara di le dimilione di le 210 tsa metsi tse di kgonang go tlamela metsi bosigo le motshegare mme tiro e setseng mo bodutelong jono jwa metsi go solofetswe gore tla garela ka Moranang.

src_text: The project has created about 220 job opportunities for the local communities and 110 jobs in the Ekurhuleni Local Municipality.
tgt_text: Porojeke eno tlhodile ditiro di le 220 tseo mo go tsona go thapilweng baagi ba ba tswang mo lefelong leo mmogo le tse dingwe di le 110 mo Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Ekurhuleni.

src_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to protect our water infrastructure by reporting vandalism to the police on 0800 10111 and water leaks to your local municipality.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go maAforika Borwa gore ba tlhokomele mafaratlhatlha naga ya rona metsi ka go loma sepodisi tsebe fa go na le bao ba senyang mo go 0800 10111 mmogo le go itsise masepala wa gaeno fa go na le mafaratlhatlha a dutlang metsi.

src_text: Citizens can also play their part in using water sparingly.
tgt_text: Baagi le bona ba ka thusa ka go sonaga metsi.

src_text: Severe weather.
tgt_text: Dipula tse di Bogale.

src_text: The preparedness of Disaster Management teams, limited the impact of heavy rains, exacerbated by cyclone Freddy that affected the north-eastern parts of South Africa.
tgt_text: Ka ntlha ya go ema sejaro ga ditlhopha tsa Tlhokomelo ya Masetlapelo, naga kgonne go fokotsa bogale jwa ditshenyegelo tse di bakilweng ke dipula, tseo di galefisitsweng ke ditsuatsue tsa cyclone Freddy tseo di setlileng dikarolo tsa ka fa bokone le botlhaba jwa Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Government continues to mobilise all available resources as part of the national state of disaster to support recovery efforts in areas impacted by flooding.
tgt_text: Puso tswelela go bokeletse metswedi yotlhe e ka re tswang thuso re nang le yona go nna karolo ya letsholo la maemo masetlapelo ka fa nageng go thusa go busetsa maemo sekeng mo mafelong a gogotsweng ke merwalela e nnileng teng.
