src_text: The spirit of Ubuntu was shown by the many NGOs, community, business and relief organisations who have assisted those in need.
tgt_text: Re bone Mekgatlho e Seng ya Puso (di-NGO) mentsi dira Botho mmogo le baagi le dikgwebo le mekgatlho e thusang batho e thusitseng batho ba ba neng ba tlhoka thuso.

src_text: Our recovery is going to take massive effort, drawing on the resources and capabilities of our entire nation.
tgt_text: Go busetsa maemo sekeng go tla tlhoka gore re tsaye matsapa magolo, re tla tlhoka go sola mosola sengwe le sengwe se re nang le sona le bokgoni bongwe le bongwe jo sešhaba sa rona se nang le jona.

src_text: Residents are urged to stay indoors during stormy weather, never try to walk, swim or drive through fast-moving floodwater or rivers, and people living in low-lying areas should be aware of weather warnings and take the necessary precautions.
tgt_text: Go ikuelwa mo baaging gore ba nne ka fa dintlong fa dipula di tshologa, ba seke ba leka go kgabaganya ka maoto, go thuma kgotsa go kgabaganya ka dijanaga metsi a sianang kgotsa dinoka, mme le baagi ba ba nnang mo mafelong a tamang metsi ka bontsi ba tshwanetse go tsaya tsia melaetsa ya go lemosa baagi ka dipula tsa matlakadibe mme ba tsaye dikgato go itlhokomela.

src_text: National Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).
tgt_text: Sekema sa Bosetšhaba sa Thuso ya Ditšhelete ya Baithuti (NSFAS).

src_text: NSFAS represents progressive programme by government to systematically break the legacies of inter-generational social inequality of post school education and training.
tgt_text: NSFAS ke letsholo le le mosola la puso le maitlho lona leng go fedisa khumanego le go se lekalekane mo baaging fa ba tshnwanetse go tsweletsa dithuto kwa ditheong tse digolwane tsa thuto le katiso.

src_text: Despite the challenges, NSFAS has made significant improvements, funding more than one million students with projected budget of R47 billion.
tgt_text: Le fa go na le dikgwetlho, NSFAS kgonne go tokafatsa maemo tota, ya tlamela baithuti ba feta ba le milione ka madi a kanaka R47 bilione a beetsweng tiro eno.

src_text: Students, with declined applications for funding, can lodge appeals online with the Independent Appeals Tribunal via the myNSFAS Portal (https://my.nsfas.org.za/).
tgt_text: Baithuti botlhe ba dikopo tsa bona di sa atlegang ba ka dira boikuelo mo inthaneteng gore di sekasekiwe sešwa ke Bothati jwa go Dira Boikuelo jo bo seng ka fa Tlase ga Setheo Seno ka go dirisa Serala sa Webesaete sa myNSFAS mo go https://my.nsfas.org.za/.

src_text: Online Voter Registration.
tgt_text: Ikwadiso mo Inthaneteng ya go Tsenela Ditlhopho.

src_text: Cabinet called on all eligible voters to register online at https://registertovote.elections.org.za for the 2024 National and Provincial Elections.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo batlhophing botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho tsa ngwaga wa 2024 tsa go tlhopha lekoko le le tla busang mmuso wa Naga le wa Porofense mo go https://registertovote.elections.org.za.

src_text: The Electoral Commission launched an online voter registration campaign on 20 February 2023, and appealed to the youth who are eligible to vote to register so that they can exercise their democratic right to vote.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Ditlhopho thankgolotse lenaneo la go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho ka inthanete ka la bo 20 Tlhakole 2023, mme ikuetse mo bašweng ba dingwaga tsa bona di ba letlang go ka dira ditlhopho gore ba ikwadisetse gore ba kgone go sola mosola tshwanelo ya bona ya temokerasi ya go itlhophela moeteledipele.

src_text: Citizens already registered to vote are also encouraged to check their voters’ roll address, and update their address if they have moved since the last general elections.
tgt_text: Baagi ba leng gore ba setse bona ba ikwadisitse bona ba rotloediwa gore ba lekole maina bona mo lenaneong la badiradikopo, mme ba baye dintlha tsa bona mo dinakong fa le gore go sengwe se se fetogileng mo dintlheng tsa bona tse di leng mo lenaneong leno.

src_text: Voters must register where they reside, and vote where they are registered.
tgt_text: Badiraditlhopho ba tshwanetse go ikwadisa mo mafelong mo metseng ba nnang mo go yona mmogo le go dira ditlhopho tsa bona mo mafelong ao ba ikwadisitseng mo go ona.

src_text: You are eligible to register to vote if you are South African citizen;At least 16 years and older (you can only vote from age 18); andIn possession of green bar-coded ID book, smart ID card or valid temporary identity certificate.
tgt_text: Motho letleletswe go dira ditlhopho fa le gore:Ke moAforika Borwa na le dingwaga di le 16 kgotsa tse di kwa godimo ga tseo (mme tla letlelelwa go ka dira ditlhopho fa sena go nna le dingwaga di le 18) bile gapeO na le bukana tala ya lekwaloitshupo kgotsa karata ya lekwaloitshupo kgotsa setlankana se se leng mo molaong sa go dirisiwa nakwana sa lekwaloitshupo.

src_text: United States (US) Alert.
tgt_text: Molaetsa wa Puso ya Amerika go Baagi ba Naga ya Bona ba ba Leng ka fa Nageng.

src_text: Cabinet noted the alert issued by the US Embassy as part of the US government’s standard communication to its citizens travelling and living in the country.
tgt_text: Kabinete sekegetse tsebe molaetsa wa puso ya Amerika go tswa kwa embasing ya yona go tsibosa baagi ba naga ya bona ba ba leng ka fa nageng le ba ba tla etelang naga eno ka seemo sa naga eno jaaka le tsela eo puso eno tlwaetseng go dira dilo ka gone le baagi ba yona tsibositse baagi ba yona gore lebile maemo a diragalang ka fa nageng eno ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho, mme ya ba eletsa gore ba itlhokomele jaaka go na le kgonagalo ya gore maemo botlhokotsebe le megwanto ka gakala mmogo le gore ba reke dijo, melemo le didirisiwa tsa thuso ya tshoganyetso ka bontsi tse di ka ba fepang sebaka sa matsatsi ka nna mararo fa dilo di ka tswa mo taolong ka fa nageng.

src_text: It indicated Level 2 travel advisory was in effect, advising them to exercise increased caution due to crime and civil unrest as well as to stockpile three days’ worth of supplies, medicines and first aid supplies.
tgt_text: Puso ya naga eno ka motsotso yo mongwe le yo mongwe ke yona e rweleng maikarabelo go tlhokomela dikarolo tsotlhe ka fa nageng gore go rene pabalesego, fa go na le matshosetsi tseelwa dikgato ka bonako gore motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng bolokesege.

src_text: Government continuously monitors all areas that impact on our nation, any concern is acted upon swiftly to ensure the safety of everyone in the country.
tgt_text: Fa go ka diragala gore go nne le matshosetsi ape fela, puso e busang jaanong eno ke yona ya ntlha e tla itsiseng baagi botlhe ka seno.

src_text: Should there be any risks detected, the government will be the first to inform the public.
tgt_text: Tirelo ya Sepedodi sa Aforika Borwa.

src_text: SAPS.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgang tsa gore Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) gaufi le go garela tiro e neng saletse morago ya go dira diteko tsa DNA mo dilaboratoring tsa bona tsa go tlhatlhoba bopaki ka ditsela tsa sesaense.

src_text: Cabinet is pleased that the South African police service has nearly cleared the DNA testing backlog at its forensic service laboratories.
tgt_text: Seno se tla dira gore dikgetse tse di amanang le go bogisiwa le go betelelwa ga basadi di rarabololwe ka bonako.

src_text: This breakthrough will ensure that gender-based violence-related cases are speedily resolved..
tgt_text: SAPS okeditse gape le mafelo go dira diteko tsa DNA ka go garela go agiwa ga moago wa go tlhatlhoba bopaki ka ditsela tsa sesaense kwa Gqeberha mo porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba, seno se tla rola boima jo lefelo leno la porofense ya Kapa Bophirima le neng le borwele  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: The SAPS has also added additional DNA testing capacity with the completion of forensic laboratory in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape, which will ease pressure on the existing laboratory in the Western Cape  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro (NSP) ya go Lwantshana le Bolwetse jwa Lebolelamading (HIV), Bolwetse jwa lehuba (TB) le Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano (di-STI) go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2023 go Fitlha ka wa.

src_text: National Strategic Plan (NSP) for HIV, TB and STIs 2023-..
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore go ka phasaladiwa Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro (NSP) ya go Lwantshana le Bolwetse jwa Lebolelamading (HIV), Bolwetse jwa lehuba (TB) le Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano (di-STI) go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2023 go Fitlha ka wa 2028 (NSP 2023-2028).

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) for Human Immunodeficiency Virus, Tuberculosis and Sexually Transmitted Infections 2023-..
tgt_text: NSP 2023-2028 ka botlalo tla ribololwa gore baagi ba itseele yona ka tsebe ka Letsatsi la go Keteka Dikgato tsa Lefatshe tsa go Lwantshana le TB ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe 2023 kwa Rustenburg mo porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima.

src_text: The full version of the NSP 2023-2028 will be released to the public on World TB Day on the 24 March 2023 in Rustenburg in the North West.
tgt_text: NSP tshitshinya dikgato tse di ka diragadiwang go samagana ka gangwe le malwetse otlhe HIV, di-STD le TB ka go dirisa matsholo go thibela le go alafa.

src_text: The NSP proposes to deal with HIV, sexually transmitted infections and tuberculosis through holistic approach that includes preventative and therapeutic measures.
tgt_text: NSP eno ke leno ke leano la botlhano la go samagana le HIV, di-STD le TB mme le tlhagisa kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa mo go samaganeng le malwetse mararo ano.

src_text: This is the 5th NSP for HIV, TB and STIs and it outlines the progress South Africa has made to deal with the three diseases thus far.
tgt_text: Leano leno la dingwaga di le tlhano le tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng a ka ga go thusa batho gore re ka ngwaga wa 2030 go bo go fedisitswe malwetse setšhaba HIV, di-STD le TB.

src_text: The five-year plan provides strategic framework for multi-sectoral approach that is people-centred to eliminate HIV, TB and STIs as public health threats by..
tgt_text: NSP eno kwadilwe ke Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la AIDS (SANAC) mme lona le dira gore puso, mekgatlho ya baagi mmogo le ba bangwe ba baagi ba dumelane ka tsela ya go samagana le maroborobo ano mararo mo sebakeng sa dingwaga di le tlhano.

src_text: The drafting of the NSP was coordinated by the South African National AIDS Council (SANAC) which brings together government, civil society, and other social partners to build consensus and drive well-coordinated, unified response to three epidemics over five-year period.
tgt_text: Thulaganyo ya go kwala leano leno la rona la botlhano ne le telele jaaka go ne go bokelediwa maikutlo baagi mo setšhabeng gore re kgone go utlwa maikutlo mantsi a farologaneng mmogo le go agelela mo go seo re ithutileng sona go tswa mo maanong mo malobeng.

src_text: The process to develop this 5th iteration of our national plan was extensively consulted across society to secure the widest range of views and ideas, and building on the lessons learnt from our previous plans.
tgt_text: NSP gatelela botlhokwa jwa go ritibatsa dilo tseo di re kgoreletsang mmogo le go oketsa phitlhelelo ya ditirelo ka go lekalekana ka go dirisa dithulaganyo tsa boitekanelo tse di sa tseweng ke phefo.

src_text: The NSP emphasises the need to break down barriers and maximise equitable and equal access to services through resilient and integrated health systems.
tgt_text: Go akarediwa ga ditirelo tsa malwetse kgatelelo ya tlhaloganyo le maikutlo le tsa go thobiwa matswalo ke ka ntlha ya gore malwetse ano tsamaelana thata le batho ba ba nang le malwetse HIV, TB, di-STD, mmogo le ba ba bogang ka ditiragalo tsa go bogisa le go bolaya batho ba sesadi, ka go gatakakiwa ga ditshwanelo tse ba nang le tsona tsa botho mmogo le ka ntlha ya go se lekane re se meno.

src_text: The inclusion of mental health services and social support is based on the strong association between HIV, TB, STIs with gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF), human rights violations and inequalities.
tgt_text: Mo leanong le lentšhwa leno go okeditswe gape le ditiro tsa go samagana le malwetse di-STI, go akaretsa le malwetse go ruruga sebete mmogo le Mogare wa Kankere ya Molongwana wa Popelo ao tshwarang gantsi batho ba ba nang le HIV.

src_text: The new plan features an expanded scope for the management of STIs, including viral hepatitis and Human Papilloma Virus, which are common coinfections in HIV infected individuals.
tgt_text: Pegelo e ka ga Tseo di Utlwanetsweng kwa Lekgotleng la Dinagakopano le le Disang Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (UNFCCC COP 27).

src_text: Report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27).
tgt_text: Kabinete rometswe pegelo ya tseo di utlwanetsweng kwa UNFCCC COP 27 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sharm El Sheik kwa nageng ya Egepeta ka Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: Cabinet received report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27) which was held in Sharm El Sheik in Egypt in November.
tgt_text: Le fa naga ya Aforika Borwa dumela gore go santse go na le dikgwetlho tse dintsi mo go samaganeng le phetogo ya maemo loapi nopotse gore dilo tse di setseng di dirilwe go samagana le bothata jono di re tiisa mooko.

src_text: While South Africa acknowledges the challenges remaining in fighting climate change, the gains various parties are making to address the issue are welcomed.
tgt_text: Dipuisano mo kopanong ya COP 27 di dirile gore go tsewe ditshwetso tse dikgolo tse di iseng di tle di tsewe fa go tla mo mererong ya phetogo ya maemo loapi mo go tserweng tshwetso ya go tlhoma Letlole leo le tla thusang dinaga tse di santseng di iketetsa go duelela ditshenyegelo tse di bakilweng ke maemo phetogo ya maemo loapi mo dinageng tseno.

src_text: COP 27 negotiations contributed to the historic decision to establish Fund to assist developing countries to respond to Loss and Damage caused by climate change.
tgt_text: Go tlhomilwe gape le Komiti ya Dithulaganyo go rulaganyetsa letlole leno mme maitlhomo ke gore go tla tsewa ditshwetso ka lona mo kopanong ya COP28 e tla tshwarwang ka ngwaga wa..  COP27 gateletse gape le botlhokwa jwa go oketsa lebelo la go tlhabolola Dibanka tsa go Thusa Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le Ditheo tsa Boditšhabatšhaba tsa Matlole mmogo le go ikuela mo go batsholadišere ba ditheo tseno go tsaya ditshwetso tse dikgolo tsa go oketsa tlamelo ya matlole dikgato tsa go samagana le phetogo ya maemo loapi mo ngwageng wa matlole wa 2023 mmogo le go dira gore dithulaganyo tsa ditheo tsa bona di nne le mosola.

src_text: It established Transitional Committee to work on the modalities of this fund with view of taking decision at COP28 in..  COP27 also emphasised the need for increased momentum to reform the Multilateral Development Banks and International Financial Institutions and called on the shareholders of these institutions to take decisive action to scale-up climate finance in 2023 and make their institutional arrangements fit for purpose.
tgt_text: Kopano ya bofelo ya COP27 bontshitse ka fao dikgato tsa go samagana le matsapa phetogo ya maemo loapi di tshwanetsweng go tsewa ka bonako ka teng, mmogo le tlhokagalo ya go se sute mo maemong ao go ipeetsweng ona go dira gore mogote mo lefatsheng se fete ditekeriselešiase di le.

src_text: The final COP27 outcome reflects the urgency of the climate crisis, and the need to keep the.
tgt_text: 5 ao Setlhopha sa Baemedi ba Maphata Puso ka fa Nageng e Buang ka Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (IPCC) se bitsang gore ke "Ngwagasome o Botlhokwa Thata" mmogo le go tlhagisa letsholo le le tlhamaletseng le le ka ga ka fao go tla okediwang dikgato tsa go samagana le matsapa ano morago ga ngwaga wa.

src_text: 5-degree temperature target alive during what the International Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) calls the “Critical Decade”, including by providing clear programme to advance the mitigation agenda from now to.
tgt_text: Go Tshwara Kopano ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2024 ya Merero ya Ditlakala.

src_text: Hosting of the World Waste Congress.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula kgang ya gore Aforika Borwa tshware Kopano ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2024 ya Merero ya Ditlakala kwa Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 18 Lwetse.

src_text: Cabinet approved for South Africa to host the World Waste Congress in Cape Town from 15 to 18 September.
tgt_text: Moletlo ono rulaganngwa ke ba Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya go Olela Ditlakala, ono ke mokgatlho wa lefatshe o nang le badiredi le baitseanape ba ditiro tsa go olela ditlakala go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara.

src_text: The event is being organised by the International Solid Waste Association, an international network of waste professionals and expert from across the world.
tgt_text: Moletlo ono tla tswela naga ya Aforika Borwa mosola gonne baromiwa bano ba tla abelana ka ditsela tsa ga jaanong tsa go dira tiro ya go olela ditlakala ka manontlhotlho.

src_text: The congress will benefit South Africa, as delegates will share current trends and best practices in waste management.
tgt_text: Moletlo ono tla dira gore baitseanape go tswa kwa mafatsheng boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le baabi ba ditirelo tsa thekenoloji mo lephateng leno ba tshologele ka kwano mme seno se tla tswela mosola lekala la naga ya rona ya Aforika Borwa le iseng le thanye sentle la kolelo ya ditlakala mme dikgwebo tse di dirang ka ditlakala di tla iponela botlhale mo moletlong ono.

src_text: The congress will attract international experts and technology providers and South Africa’s informal waste sector and small business will benefit.
tgt_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2011 Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula Leano la Naga la go Sela Ditlakala (NWMS) gore le tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: In 2011, Cabinet approved the National Waste Management Strategy (NWMS) for implementation.
tgt_text: NWMS na le dilo di le robedi tse ipeetseng tsona tse di botlhokwa mme mo go tsona ke go dira gore go fokotsa ditlakala nne selo se se botlhokwa, go dirisa dilo makgetlho mantsinyana, go fetola tiro ya selo se se latlhilweng mmogo le go tsosolosa selo se se latlhilweng.

src_text: The NWMS has eight key goals including promoting waste minimisation, re-use, recycling and recovery of waste.
tgt_text: Seno se tla thusa naga gape gore kgone go diragatsa tlamelo ya ditirelo tsa go sela ditlakala e tswileng diatla mmogo le go dira gore lekala la tshelo ya ditlakala le nne le seabe mo ikonoming ya tshomarelo ya tlhago.

src_text: It also helps the country deliver effective and efficient waste services and grows the contribution of the waste sector to the green economy.
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape ka naga ya Aforika Borwa ke gore na le seabe mo ditumelanong tsa boditšhabatšhaba tseo di amanang le matsapa go sela ditlakala.

src_text: South Africa is also party to international agreements that relate to waste management issues.
tgt_text: Go Tlhophiwa ga Teropokgolo go tla Tshwarelwang kwa go yona Samiti ya bo 15 ya Dinaga tsa BRICS.

src_text: Selection of the Host City for the 15th BRICS Summit.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane gore Gauteng tla nna lona lefwlo le go tla tshwarelwang kwa go lona Samiti ya bo 15 ya Dinaga tsa BRICS go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 24 Phatwe..  Naga ya Aforika Borwa tsere maemo a sa nneleng ruri go nna Komangkanna mo Kopanong ya BRICS monongwaga ka la bo 1 Ferikgong 2023 e neng tshwerwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “BRICS le Tirisanommogo le Dinaga tsa Aforika go Dira Gore Lebelo la Kgolo le Okediwe Nne Kgolo e tla Nnelang Ruri bile Ditšhaba tsotlhe di Nathelane Tlhogwana ya Tsie”.

src_text: Cabinet approved that Gauteng would host the 15th BRICS Summit to be held in South Africa from 22 to 24 August.
tgt_text: Go tloga ka motsi yo naga eno neng nna karolo ya setlhopha seno sa dinaga tse ikonomi ya tsona ntseng gola mo dingwageng di le 12 tse di fetileng palo ya maloko BRICS mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa oketsegile thata.

Ka ngwaga wa 2021, diphesente di feta di le 17 tsa ditlhagisiwa tsa naga ya rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa boditšhaba tse di neng di rekisediwa dinaga tse dingwe tsa BRICS fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe diphesente di feta di le 29 tsa dilo tse re di rekang kwa dinageng tsa boditšhaba di rekiwa mo go tsona dinaga tseno  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: South Africa assumed the rotational Chairship of the BIRICS Forum from 1 January 2023 under the theme “BRICS and Africa Partnership for Accelerated Growth, Sustainable Development and Inclusive Multilateralism”.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.

src_text: South Africa’s membership of BRICS has grown substantially since the country joined this group of emerging economies 12 years ago.
tgt_text: Naga keteka Kgwedi ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go Rokelela le go Somarela Setlwaedi sa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho gore le mo isagong se nne teng”.

src_text: In 2021, over 17 percent of South Africa’s exports were destined for other BRICS countries while over 29 percent of our total imports came from these countries/C.
tgt_text: Kabinete rotloetsa maAforika Borwa go iphantsha ka ngwaoboswa e humileng ka ditso tse re nang le tsona mmogo le go farologana ga rona go go dirileng gore re ipope seoposengwe.

src_text: Upcoming Events.
tgt_text: Tla re tlotleng bao ba ikentshitseng setlhabelo mo kgaratlhong ya gore re nne le kgololesego ka maitlhomo gore ka le lengwe la matsatsi re keteng go nna le ditshwanelo re le batho mme re tswelele go gata mo mositong wa gore batho botlhe ba nne le seabe mo ikonoming jaaka borakhukhu ba rona ba re bonetse seno kwa pele  Melaetsa.

src_text: Human Rights Month.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go:Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa sa Basadi ba Motshameko wa Kerikete, ka ntlha ya go tsholetsa folaga ya naga kwa godimo kwa Metshamekong ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Metshameko ya Kerikete ya Basadi ya T20 e neng tshamekelwa ka fa nageng.Sethopha sa Basadi sa Motshameko wa ice hokhi sa Aforika Borwa seo se tshamekileng motshameko wa sona wa ntlha kwa Sejaneng sa Motshameko wa Lefatshe wa Ice Hockey o neng tshamekelwa kwa Motsekapa.Setlhopha sa Banna sa Motshameko wa Hockey sa Aforika Borwa jaaka se atlegile mo go tshwareng Metshameko ya Sejana sa Lefatshe ya FIH ya go Tshamekela Hockey ka fa Teng ga Meago kwa Pretoria go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 11 Tlhakole.

src_text: The country commemorates Human Rights Month under the theme “Consolidating and Sustaining Human Rights culture into the future”.
tgt_text: Setlhopha sa Bagale ba Aforika sa Banyana-Banyana morago ga motshameko wa bona kwa Motshamekong wa Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Turkey, mo setlhopha seno se neilweng maemo boganka go laetla gore se fenye metshameko ya Setlhopha sa le go boa ka sejana ka fa nageng.Barulaganyi ba metshameko ya Mabelo Dijanaga ya Formula e neng tshwaretswe ka fa nageng le ka fa kontinenteng lekgetlo la ntlha mme tsamaile sentle e neng tshwaretswe kwa Motsekapa.

src_text: Cabinet encourages South Africans to celebrate our rich cultural heritage and diversity that has the power to unite our nation.
tgt_text: Teropokgolo eno ne ya keteka seno go tshwana le diteropokgolo tse dingwe tsotlhe di le 11 mo lefatsheng tshe di kileng tsa tshwara Metshameko ya Lefatshe ya Mabelo Dijanaga ya Formula , mo dijanaga tsotlhe le mafelo a neng dirisiwa go dirisitsweng fela motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa le maokwane a sa kgotlheleng tikologo.Rre Calib Cassim yo thapilweng go nna CEO wa namaotshwere kwa Eskom yo rwalang marapo go latela gore rolwe ke Rre André Marinus de Ruyter, yo puso mo eletsang tsotlhe tse dintle mo go tseo batlang go di dira mo isagong ya gagwe.Baagi ba naga ya Nigeria go latela gore Setlhopha sa Basekaseki ba Tsamaiso ya Ditlhopho ba Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika ba totobatse gore tsotlhe mo ditlhophong tsa naga yotlhe di ne di apere tshiamo.

src_text: Let us pay tribute to those who sacrificed their lives in our struggle for freedom to ensure we may enjoy human rights and continue to work towards inclusive socio-economic development as envisioned by our founding fathers  Messages.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya MatshedisoKabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:Peter Cyril Jones, molwelakgaratlho wyo gape neng le moeteledipele wa mokgatlho wa Black People’s Convention.Morwediakgosi Alice, morwedi Kgosi Solomon kaDinuzulu.Paul Herbst, Motlhankedimogolo wa setlamo sa Medi-Response, yo leng moeteledipele yo tlotliwang mo ditirelong tsa tshoganyetso tsa kalafo yo mo malobeng thusitseng go pholosa batho kwa Türkiye le kwa Seria.Rafiq Rohan yo neng le mmegadikgang yo itsegeng yo gape neng le yo mongwe wa maAforika Borwa ao neng tshwaretswe ditiro tsa sepolotiki kwa Robben Island yo kileng nna mongwe wa barulaganyi ba ba simolotseng lekwalodikgang la puso la Vuk’uzenzele, mo neng le morulaganyi wa dikgang mme mo tsamaong ya nako ya nna morulaganyi wa dikgang tsa sepolotiki mo lekwalodikganyeng la “The Sowetan”, ya nna morulaganyimogolo mo lekwalodikganyeng la “The Star”, mme mo malobanyaneng ne le morulaganyi yo mogolo wa Al Jazeera  Ba Ba ThapilwengPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well wishes to:South African Women cricket team for flying the flag high by reaching their inaugural ICC Women’s T20 World Cup final hosted in the country.The South African women’s ice hockey team who made their debut in the Women’s Ice Hockey World Championships which was being held in Cape Town.SA Hockey for successfully hosting the FIH Indoor Hockey World Cup in Pretoria from 5 to 11 February.
tgt_text: Rre Hishaam Emeran thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Setlamo sa Setheo sa Banamedi ba Diterene sa Aforika Borwa (PRASA).

src_text: African champions Banyana-Banyana following their performance at the Turkish Women’s Cup, where the team was crowned winners of Group and brought trophy back.The organisers of the country’s first successful hosting of the Formula race on the African continent, held in Cape Town.
tgt_text: Rre Themba Rikhotso thapilwe go nna CEO wa Banka e Thusang Balemi le Barui ba Dipolasa ka Mafatshe ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa mmogo le go nna Motlhankedimogolo mo Botong ya Batlhankedibagolo ba Banka eno ya Mafatshe.

src_text: The city joined 11 other global cities holding the Formula World Championship, run on 100 percent renewable energy.Mr Calib Cassim as the Eskom interim group CEO who takes over from Mr André Marinus de Ruyter, who is wished well in his future endeavours.The people of Nigeria following the declaration by the African Union Election Observation Mission on successfully held general election.
tgt_text: Rre Maesela Kekana thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo Lekaleng la Tlhokomelo ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi le Boleng jwa Mowa ka fa Lefapheng la Merero ya Dikgwa, ya Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapile le ya Tikologo.Kabinete dumelane le ditshwetso tsa go thapa batho ba ba latelang:.

src_text: Zegezi.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ukuhlonywa kwe-Resource Mobilisation Fund (RMF) nguNgqongqotjhe wezeGezi e-Ofisini kaMengameli, uDorh.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse go thankgololwa ga Letlole la Pokeletso ya Metswedi ya Motlakase (RMF) le le tlhamilweng ke Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase kwa Kantorong ya Moporesitente, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.

src_text: Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.
tgt_text: Tirisanommogo eno magareng ga puso le Mokgatlho wa go Tshwaraganya Dikgwebo tsa Aforika Borwa maitlhomo yona ke go tlamela puso ka didirisiwa le kitso e tlhokang gore kgone go diragatsa ka tshwanelo Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato le le ribolotsweng ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phukwi 2022 le gape buileng ka lona le mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA) ya 2023 mme seno ke sekao sa tirisanommogo magareng ga maphata puso le poraefete go bontsha tsholofelo e tswelelang go nna teng mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa..     RMF tla tswela mosola tiro ya Komiti ya Naga ya Merero ya Matsapa Motlakase gore kgone go fitlhelela maikemisetso yona go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Isebenziswaneli eliphakathi kwakarhulumende neHlangano yeBumbano lamaBhizinisi weSewula Afrika (i-BUSA) ngelokunikela ngeensiza nelemuko elizakwenza bona urhulumende ahlome ngepumelelo iHlelo lamaGadango wokuLungisa iGezi (i-EAP) elimenyezelwe nguMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoVelabahlinze wee-2022 kunye nangesikhathi ethula iKulumo yobuJamo beliZwe yaNonyaka (i-SoNA ka-2023) njengesibonelo sokuthinta umphakathi ngendlela ebonakalako nokuraga nokwethemba iSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go bannaleseabe botlhe gore ba tsenye letsogo mo go diragatseng Leano la Naga la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato gore re kgone go fedisa bothata jo bogolo jono jwa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri jo bo aparetseng ikonomi ya rona.

src_text: I-RMF izokusekela umsebenzi weKomiti eThunywe ukuQeda iHlekelele yeGezi (i-National Energy Crisis Committee) ukufinyelela umnqopho wayo wokuqeda ukuqinteliswa kwegezi eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete nopotse matshwenyego a tlhagisitsweng ke setheo sa tekolo ya maemo ikonomi sa S&P Global Ratings mabapi le maemo kgolo ya ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa jaaka tobane le maemo a bokete ka ntlha ya tlhaelo ya mafaratlhatlha, bogolosegolo tlhaelo kgolo e leng teng ya motlakase.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ikhombele boke ababelani ukuthi bafake isandla ekuhlonyweni kwe-EAP kobanyana kuzokusombululeka umthelela obudisi phezu komnotho olethwa kuqinteliswa kwegezi.
tgt_text: Go samagana le kgwetlho eno, puso tsere dikgato tsa go samagana le bothata jono mme tsona ke tse di mabapi le go bokeletsa matlole, go otlolola maemo ikonomi ka lebelo mmogo le go tsaya dikgato tsa ka bonako tseo maikemisetso tsona leng go fokotsa makgetlo motlakase o tshabetseng ruri ka ona mo nakong khutshwanyana e tlang mmogo le go fetola lephata leno ka go tlisa diphetogo tse di tsamaisanang le lephata leno gore re tle re kgone le go nna le motlakase o sa tshabeleng ruri.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikutjhejile ukutshwenyeka kwamhlapha nje kwe-S&P Global Ratings bona ukuhluma komnotho weSewula Afrika kuqalene negandelelo elingezelelekako ngemiraro yomthangalasisekelo, khulu khulu ukutlhayela khulu kwegezi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse gape le go thankgololwa ga dipapatso tsa letsholo la kopo ya botlhano ya dithendara tsa polokelo ya motlakase wa dibeteri ka motlakase wa dimekawate di le 513 mme seno ke karolo ya go gagamatsa dikgato tsa rona tsa go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa motlakase.

src_text: Ukutjheja iintjhijilwezi, urhulumende ungenele umlandelande wamahlelo aqinileko wokulungisa ubujamobu, ekubalwa hlangana imithethokambiso enqophe ukuphungula ukutlhayelelwa yimali kombuso nokwenziwa kweenkolodo ezitja (i-fiscal consolidation), amatjhuguluko wamsinyazana wezomnotho kunye namagadango arhabako ekuhloswe ngawo ukuphungula ukuqinteliswa kwegezi kwesikhathi esifitjhani nokuhlela ngobutjha ikoro le ngamatjhuguluko wezeemakethe enzelwa ukufinyelela ivikeleko lesikhathi eside lamandla wegezi.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la bofelo la go romela dikopo tsa go tsaya karolo mo letsholong leno ke la bo 5 Phukwi 2023 ka ura ya botlhano maitseboa mme mongwe le mongwe yo batlang go nna le seabe ka tlatsa foromo ya go ikwadisa e leng mo webesaeteng ya: www.ipp-storage.co.za.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yamukela nokuvulwa kwesikhathi sokubhidela i-513 megawatts (MW) wegezi ebulungekako njengengcenye yokuqinisa indlela esiqalana ngayo nesitjhijilo segezi.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape neseditse pula tshweetso ya ga Tona ya Merero ya Dikgwa, Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapi le Tikologo, Mme Barbara Creecy, ya go letlelela gore Eskom se tlhole tshwanelwa ke go dira dikopo tse di telele tse di sa feleng tse di mabapi le go baakanya Laesense ya yona ya Tetlelelo ya go Kgotlhela Legodimo.

src_text: Ilanga lokuvalela iimbawo zokubhida kumhlana ama-5 kuVelabahlinze 2023 ngo-17:00 kanti boke abanekareko bangazalisa iforomo eliku-inthanethi ku- www.ipp-storage.co.za.
tgt_text: Go ya ka Eskom, tetla eno tla ba kgontsha gore re ka Ngwanaitseele 2023 ba bo ba kgonne go tsenya tirisong dikgato tsa nakwana tsa go rarabolola matsapa a leng kwa Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Kusile mme seno se tla ba kgontsha gore ba kgone go busetsa tirisong motlakase o kanaka dimekawate di le 2 100 mme seno se tla fokotsa maemo a galefileng go tshabela ruri ga motlakase gore felele mo maemong bobedi..     Mogwanto wa Mokgatlho wa Badiri ba Ditiro tsa Barutabana, Baoki le Badiri ba Mokgatlho ka Tirisanano Mmogo (NEHAWU).

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele nesiqunto sikaNgqongqotjhe wezamaHlathi, zokuThiya ngeManzini nezeBhoduluko, uMma u-Barbara Creecy, sokuvumela u-Eskom bona angalandeli ihlelo elide elimleyo lokha nakalungisa ilayisensi yakhe i-Atmospheric Emission Licence.
tgt_text: Mabapi le mogwanto wa NEHAWU, Kabinete itumeletse dikgato tsa go saeniwa ga Ditumelano tsa Megolo kwa Lekgotleng la Ditharabololo tsa Dipuisano tsa Merero ya Ditiro (PSCBC) mme seno se dirile gore go garelwe dipuisano tsa megolo mmogo le go khutlisa mogwanto ono mme jaanong seno se buletse dipuisano tsa megolo kwa Lekgotleng la Ditharabololo tsa Dipuisano tsa Merero ya Ditiro tsa ngwaga wa matlole wa 2023/.

src_text: Ngokuka-Eskom, ukunikelwa kwakhe imvumo enjalo kuzokwenza bona akghone ukuhloma isisombululo sesikhatjhana somonakalo owenzeke e-Kusile Power Station ngoSinyikhaba wee-2023 bese nakunjalo kuvumele iSiphehligezi lesi ukuthi sithomise ngomsebenzi wokuphehla igezi emaMegawathi (MW) azii- 2 100  lokhu kuzakwehlisela iSewula Afrika esigabeni sesibili sokuqinteliswa kwegezi.
Ijima lokunghala umsebenzi leYuniyoni i-National Education, Health and Allied Workers’ Union (i-NEHAWU).
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile gape le mekgatlho ya badiri yotlhe e santseng le mo dipuisanong tsa megolo mo go PSCBC ne ya gatelela gore puso santse eme ka la gore batla go bona tharabololo e namatshang maphata otlhe mo dipuisanong tseno, mme dirisana le botlhe ba ba matshwanedi go dira bonnete jwa gore dipuisano tseno ga di tlontlololwe le go nyenyefadiwa..     Go botlhokwa gore batho ba itse gore, jaaka le se go dumelanweng ka sona fa go Garelwa Ditumelano tsa Mogolo, molao wa gore YO SA TLANG TIRONG KA SE DUELELWE tla diragadiwa ka ponyo ya leitlho mme bao ba duetsweng mogolo ka botlalo mme ba ne ba sa tle tirong ba tla gogelwa madi matsatsi ba sa tlang tirong ka ona mo megolong ya bona, mme mogolo tla kotsolwa ga nnyane ga nnyane sebaka sa dikgwedi di le nne go tswalela sekoloto sa matsatsi ba sa tlang tirong ka ona.

src_text: Ejimeni lokunghala umsebenzi le-NEHAWU, iKhabinethi yemukele ukutlikitlwa kwesivumelwano semirholo ku-Public Service Coordinating Bargaining Council (PSCBC) sokuqeda imikhulumiswano yemirholo yango-2022/23  kunye nokuqeda ijima lokunghalwa kwemisebenzi nokubuyisela boke ababelani etafuleni yomKhandlu wemiKhulumiswano yemiRholo yango-2023/..  IKhabinethi ibuye yabuka amaYuniyoni wabasebenzi aragileko nokuhlala ku-PSCBC ukuraga nemikhulumiswano yemirholo.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Tirelopuso le Tsamaiso le tla tlhoma leitlho dikgato tseno go dira bonnete jwa gore ditshwetso tseno di tsenngwa tirisong ka tshwanelo.

src_text: Ibuyelele nokuzibophelela kwakarhulumende ehlelweni lokukhulumisana nokusebenzisana nabo boke ababelani abafaneleko ukuqinisekisa bona ewona msebenzi omkhulu womkhandlu wezokukhulumisana uyavikeleka begodu uyahlonitjhwa.
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga seno, mapodisi ba tla tswela pele ka ditiro tsa bona tsa go gata motlhala ditiragalo tsa botlhokotsebe tse di dirilweng mo nakong ya mogwanto, mme ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe batlhankedi ba ba neng ba tsenetse mogwanto ono mme ba gogobisitse mo seretseng Melao ya Maitsholo Badiredipuso batlhankedibagolwane ba ba ikarabelang mo go bona ba tla rwala maikarabelo gore ba digame ba sa di tlhapela.

src_text: Sifuna ukuveza bona umthetho othi ONGAKASEBENZI AKARHOLI, i-NO WORK, NO PAY uzokusebenza ngokurhabako kanti imali izokudoswa ngeenyanga ezine ezilandelako, njengencenye yesivumelwano sokukhulumisana.
tgt_text: Mogwanto wa go Dira gore Ditiro tsa ka fa Nageng di Eme Tsi.

src_text: UmNyango wezabaSebenzi bomBuso nokuPhatha (i-DPSA) uzokwelusa bona zisetjenziswa ngokupheleleko na iinqunto ekuvunyelwene ngazo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhagisitse matshwenyego yona mabapi le mogwanto o tla tshwarwang ka Mosupologo wa la bo 20 Mopitlwe 2023 mme dumela gore mogwanto ono ke ditiro tsa go tlhoka maikarabelo..     Setlhopha sa Bosiamisi, Thibelobosenyi le Tshireletsego (JCPS) se samagane le tiro ya gore mo mogwantong ono ga go nne le ditiragalo tsa boitaolo jwa botlhokotsebe.

src_text: Ukungezelela lapho, amaziko wabathobelisimthetho azokulandelela izenzo zobulelesi ezenziwe ngomhla wamajima wokunghala umsebenzi, ekuzakuthi abaphathi ngokuhlukahlukana batjheje izenzo ezephule umthetho wokuziphatha kwabasebenzi bembusweni.
tgt_text: Ditatofatso tsa mogwanto ono tse di ka ga go batla gore go fedisiwe ditiragalo tsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri, ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo tsa dilo tse batho ba phelang ka tsona mmogo le botlhokatiro ke dilo tse Moporesitente Ramaphosa buileng ka tsona mo go SoNA ya la bo 9 Tlhakole.

src_text: I-National shutdown.
tgt_text: Mabapi le go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri, Moporesitente thapile Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, Ngaka Ramokgopa, mme ene le esi ka monwana tla samagana le tiro ya go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri.

src_text: Ikhabinethi izwakalise ukutshwenyeka ngezenzo zokutjhotjhozela umtjhagalo ohlelelwe uMvulo, nakama-20 kuNtaka 2023 begodu iimphakamiso ezinjalo uzithatha njengezingakafaneli nezobudlabha.
tgt_text: Go samaganwe le go tsenngwa tirisong ka ponyo ya leitlho Dintlha di le Tlhano tsa Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato mme Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase tla re mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di tlang itsise setšhaba ka dintlha tse Eskom ipeetseng tsona go di fitlhelela mo go samaganeng le go fedisa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri..     Moporesitente buile fela jalo mo go SoNA ya 2023 ka go samagana le palo e kwa godimo ya bašwa ba ba se nang ditiro.

src_text: IsiQhema saboNgqongqotjhe bezoBulungiswa, ukuKhandelwa kobuLelesi nokuQinisekisa ukuVikeleka (i-JCPS) sitjheje umsebenzi ukuqinisekisa bona ukungathotjelwa komthetho akubekezelelwa.
tgt_text: Ka jalo, ka ntlha ya fa ditletlebo tsotlhe tse go kilwe ga samaganwa natso, go tlhamaletse gore selo se le esi fela se mogwanto ono se neng se ikaeletse go se dira ke go folosa Moporesitente Ramaphosa mo setilong ntle le go latela molaotheo.

src_text: Iimfuno zokuthi batjho kuqedwe ukuqinteliswa kwegezi, iindleko eziphezulu zokuphila nesibalo esiphezulu sokutlhogeka kwemisebenzi uzikhulumile uMengameli u-Ramaphosa nakethula i-SoNA mhlana ali-9 kuMhlolanja.
tgt_text: Re batla go bolelela batho botlhe gore KA FA NAGENG YA AFORIKA BORWA GA GO MENOLOPUSO E TLA DIRAGALANG GO SA LATELWA MOLAOTHEO.

src_text: Endabeni yokuqeda ukuqinteliswa kwegezi, uMengameli uqatjhe uNgqongqotjhe wezeGezi, uDorh.
tgt_text: Motho mang le mang yo nang le ditoro tsa go ipona busa naga eno tla tshwanelwa ke go letela ditlhopho tsa setšhaba tsa ngwaga wa.

src_text: Ramokgopa, umsebenzakhe ekukutjheja bunqopha ukuqeda ukuqinteliswa kwegezi.
tgt_text: Maiteko mangwe le mangwe go tlisa mmudubudu ka fa nageng molao tla samagana le ona ka botlalo.

src_text: Ukuhlonywa kwe-Five-Point Energy Action Plan kuthome ngomfutho kanti eemvekeni ezizako uNgqongqotjhe wezeGezi uzokumemezela iminqopho ka-Eskom aqothele ukuyiphumelelisa ekuqedeni ukuqinteliswa kwegezi.
tgt_text: Re tshwanetse gape re totobatse ntlha ya gore ga go maiteko ape sepolotiki a tla dirang gore maAforika Borwa gapege maikutlo..     Kabinete nopotse gape le ditlhotshwana tse di reng di neile Kabinete taelo ya gore mo matsatsing le supa di tswalele dikolo go seng jalo go tla bonwa dinta di fuduga.

src_text: Ngokulinganako, uMengameli ekulumenakhe ye-SoNA ka-2023 ukhulume nangamagandango abekiweko wokutjheja indaba yesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abatjha abatlhoge imisebenzi kunye neendleko zokuphila.
tgt_text: Khalendara ya dikolo tsa poraefete le tsa puso tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa e gatisitsweng ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe 2022 mo lekwalong la puso le le gatisang melao ya puso tlhalosa ka tlhamalalo gore ka la bo 20 Mopitlwe 2023 ke letsatsi le le itlhophileng la boikhutso mo dikolong.

src_text: Yeke-ke, ekungikho kwaphele ebekufunwa ngomtjhagalo lihlelo lokukhupha uMengameli u-Ramaphosa e-Ofisini ngeendlela ezingakhambisani nomthethosisekelo.
tgt_text: Ga go bolo go iponagatsa gore go na le maiteko go batla gore batho ba ikakgole ka go dira kete ke bona ba ba dirileng gore dilo dingwe di kgonagale go ntse go se jalo.

src_text: Sifuna ukwazisa boke abantu bona UKUTJHUGULULA UMBUSO NGEENDLELA EZINGAKHAMBISANI NOMTHETHOSISEKELO ANGEZE KWENZEKA ESEWULA AFRIKA.
tgt_text: Go fela jalo le ka matsatsi go tswalela ga dikolo fa go na le matsatsi boikhutso..     Letsholo la Moporesitente la go Betla Bašwa go Nna Baeteledipele.

src_text: Nanyana ngubani oneemfiso zokubusa ilizwe lekhethweli kumele alinde ukungenela amakhetho wango-.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse Letsholo la Moporesitente la go Betla Bašwa go Nna Baeteledipele le le neng le gogwa kwa pele ke Moporesitente Ramaphosa ka la bo 10 Mopitlwe 2023, kwa Yunibesiting ya Walter Sisulu, kwa Mthatha, mo go neng ga tlhongwa le Letsholo la Dithuto tsa Kutlwano ya Dipolotiki tsa MaAforika..     Seno ne le karolo ya Letsholo la Kamogelo ya Dipuisano tsa go Tlhabana Botlhale tsa Bašwa la Nelson Mandela le le neng le tshwerwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Boeteledipele jo bo Senang Dilabe jwa Dikokoma tsa Baeteledipele go dira gore Aforika Tokafale”.

src_text: Imizamo yokubanga ukutjharagana nokuphazamiseka elizweneli izokutjhejwa ngesandla esiqinileko somthetho.
tgt_text: Letsholo leno le matlafatsa maano a ntseng le teng go ralala le kontinente go tshwana le ditumelano di tshwana le Leano la Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika la 2063, Tumelano ya Bašwa ba Kontinente ya Aforika mmogo le Tumelano ya Kgwebisano e Senang Dikgoreletsi mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika.

src_text: Kumele sitlhadlhule godu nokuthi ukuzibukisa ngokwepolotiki kumele kungadurhisi amaSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Tumelano ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Aga Dijanaga ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi itjheje neenkulumo ezingekho zeenqhenyana ezithi batjho zinikele iKhabinethi amalanga alikhomba wokuthi ivale iinkolo.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgang tsa gore setlamo sa dijanaga sa Stellantis se se leng teng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa se saenile Memorantamo wa Ditumelano (MoU) le Koporasi ya Tlhabololo ya Diintaseteri (IDC) mmogo le Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Intaseteri le Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo tse di ka ga go aga lefelo le lentšhwa la go agela dijanaga mo go lona ka fa nageng ya rona ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Ikhalenda yeenkolo zombuso nezizijameleko eSewula Afrika, eyagadangiswa kuGazede ngoNtaka wee-2022, beyivele ikubeka ngokukhanyako bona umhla wama-20 kuNtaka 2023 yiholideyi ekhethekileko yeenkolo.
tgt_text: Setlamo seno ke sona se se rekisang dijanaga tsa maina a tumileng tse di jaaka Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel le Peugeot ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Besolo kubonakala bona kunemizamo yabanye yokuthi kwenziwe ngibo lokho.
tgt_text: Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Tanzania.

src_text: Kufana, nokuvalwa kweenkolo emalangeni ahlangana neholideyi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke leeto la go etela naga ya Aforika Borwa ka Labone wa la bo 16 Mopitlwe 2023 jaaka Moporesitente Samia Suluhu Hassan wa naga ya United Republic of Tanzania, go latela gore lalediwe ke Moporesitente mmogo ka ene wa rona, Moporesitente Ramaphosa, gore re jele nala semmuso.

src_text: Ihlelo likaMengameli Lokufundisa Ilutjha Uburholi.
tgt_text: Leeto leno le latela gore go tshwarwe Kopano ya Dintlo tsa Barongwa ba Dinaga (BNC) tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Tanzania e neng tshwaretswe kwa Pretoria ka Laboraro, 15 Mopitlwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ukuhlonywa kweHlelo likaMengameli Lokufundisa Ilutjha Uburholi (i-Presidential Youth Leadership Programme) eyethulwe nguMengameli u-Ramaphosa nakali-10 kuNtaka 2023, e-Walter Sisulu University, eseMthatha, eyenze bona kusungulwe i-Pan-African fellowship programme.
tgt_text: Leeto leno le tla nesetsa gape pula le Kopano ya bobedi ya BNC ya dinaga ka bobedi, eo mo go yona go nang le dikomiti di le nne: ya Dipolotiki le Ditipolomate; ya Sesole le ya Sepodisi; ya Merero ya Moruo wa Naga, mmogo le ya Merero ya Baagi le ya Setso.

src_text: Lokhu kuyincenye yokuthonywa kwe-Nelson Mandela Youth Dialogue ngaphasi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ethical and intergenerational leadership for better Africa”.
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga gore nne nngwe ya dinaga tse di neng di eme ka lefoko le le lengwe le naga ya Aforika Borwa mo nakong ya kgaratlho ya go lwela kgololesego, Tanzania ke nngwe ya dinaga tse re gwebisanang le tsona tse di botlhokwa thata, mo go gwebisana ga dinaga tsoo ka bobedi tlhatlogileng go tloga mo go dibilione tsa diranta di le.

src_text: Ikundla le yoburholi obuhlanganisa iinzukulwana ngokwahlukahlukana iqinisa amahlelo akhona wenarhakazi yokana neemvumelwano ezifana ne-African Union Agenda 2063, umTlolo weluTjha leNarhakazi ye-Afrika neSivumelwano Sesizinda Sokurhwebelana Simahla Kwamazwe we-Afrika (i-AfCFTA).
tgt_text: 89 mo ngwageng wa 2021 go fitlha mo go di le.

src_text: Isakheko Sesivumelwano Sokukhanda Iinkoloyi eSewula Afrikha.
tgt_text: 71 mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yamukela neendaba zokuthi iKhampani yeenkoloyi i-Stellantis South Africa itlikitle isivumelwano sokusebenzisana neHlangano eThuthukisa amaBubulo (i-IDC) nomNyango wezeRhwebo, namaBubulo nezokuPhalisana ukusungula isikhungo esitjha sokukhiqiza iinkoloyi eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Go na le dikgwebo di feta di le 250 tse di farologaneng tsa naga ya rona tse di leng kwa nageng ya Tanzania..     Go Kopanya Setlamo sa Heineken le sa Distell go Nna se le Sengwe.

src_text: I-Stellantis ithengisa iinkoloyi zomhlobo we-Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel ne-Peugeot eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tshwetso e tserweng ke Setheo sa go Disa Maemo Dikgaisano fa go tla mo go kopanyeng setlamo sa kwa ntle sa Heineken le sa ka fa gae sa Distell Group Holdings.

src_text: Ubudlelwano beSewula Afrika ne-Tanzania.
tgt_text: Go kopanngwa ga ditlamo tseno go nna setlamo se le sengwe leng seo se tla dirang gore go nne le setlamo se segolo sa go bedisa majalwa a nang le tshukitshana, go utlwanwe gore seno se tla letlelelwa fa le gore se tla tswela setšhaba mosola mo dikarolong tse di latelang, go tla tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni batlamedi ba ditirelo tsa setlamo seo, go tla rekwa dikunngo go tswa ka fa nageng, go tla okediwa dipeeletso mo dipatlisisong le mo tlhatlhelelong mmogo le go oketsa palo ya ditlhagisiwa tsa kgwebo eno tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng..     Setlamo seno se se kopanngweng se tla oketsa gape le boipelo jwa badiri go nna le lenathwana mo setlamong seno ka go ba rekisetsa dišere le go dira gore ba nne le motho yo emetseng ditshwanelo tsa bona mo botong.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukela nevakatjho lombuso eSewula Afrika ngeLesine, nakali-16 kuNtaka 2023 likaMengameli u-Samia Suluhu Hassan we-United Republic of Tanzania, ngokwesimemo somlinganakhe ngokwesikhundla, uMengameli Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Go Disa Matsholo Ngwaga wa 2022 go Imolola bao Dithoto tsa Bona di Gogotsweng ke Merwalela.

src_text: Ivakatjhweli liza ngemva kwe-South Africa-Tanzania Ministerial Binational Commission (BNC) ebanjelwe ePitori ngelesiThathu, nakali-15 kuNtaka.
tgt_text: Jaaka naga tla bo fetsa ngwaga taa go tloga ka motsi oo neng ya itemogela merwalela ya ngwaga ya 2022, Kabinete itumeletse tiro e dirilweng ke Tona ya Lefapha la Bonno jwa Batho, Mme Mmamoloko Kubayi, mmogo le Ditona le Bakhuduthamaga ba Merero ya Bonno jwa Batho ka go ela maemo tlhoko mo dikgatong tse di tserweng tsa go bonela malapa magae ona gogotsweng ke merwalela ya ngwaga wa 2022 kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal mafelo ba ka subiwang mo go ona.

src_text: Sizokubuye sethule isigaba sesibili se-South Africa-Tanzania BNC, esinamaKomiti amane: YezePolotiki nobuZenda; YezokuVikela nokuPhepha; Yeendaba zoMnotho, kunye neendaba zomPhakathi nezamaSiko.
tgt_text: Go Buela Ditona le Batlatsatona Maaka ka Megolo ya Bona.

src_text: Ukungezelela ekubeni bazwelani nomzabalazo wekululeko weSewula Afrika, i- Tanzania ingenye yamazwe aphambili arhwebelana nelizweli, ngerhwebo seliloke lamazwe amabili la elisuka ku-R. 89 yamabhiliyoni ngomnyaka wee-2021 ukuya ku-  71 wamabhiliyoni ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tshwentswe ke dipuo tse di sa kgaotseng tsa go buela Ditona le Batlatsatona maaka ka megolo ya bona e tlhagelelang mo Bukeng ya go Kaela Tiro ya Batlhankedi ba Khuduthamaga, eo buang ka megolo ya bona, didirisiwa tseo ba di tlhokang go dira tiro ya bona mmogo le merokotso eo ba neelwang fa ba ntshitse ga tshwene mo tirong ya bona.

src_text: Kuneenkhampani zeSewula Afrika ezingaphezu kwama-250 emakorweni ngokwahlukahlukana ezinzinze e-Tanzania.
tgt_text: Malebana le Dintlo tsa Ditona seno ga se bolo go nna teng jaaka se kwadilwe mo Ditumelanong tsa ngwaga wa 1910 leng fa go ne go tlhomiwa puso ya Union of South Africa mme ka one motsi oo go ne ga tlhamiwa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa tla nna le Metsemegolo le meraro go emela maphata le mararo puso leng wa Pretoria mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Tsamaiso ya Naga, Bloemfontein mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Merero ya go Disa Melao ya Naga mmogo le Cape Town mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Baemedi ba Dipolotiki ba ba Tlhamang Melao ya Naga.

src_text: Ukuhlangana kwe-Heineken ne-Distell.
tgt_text: Dintlo tse go buiwang ka tsona tseno tse go tweng ke megobagoba ya dintlo sele di rekiwa ka ngwaga wa 1994 mme puso e eteletsweng pele ke Mokgatlho wa African National Congress fitlhetse dintlo tseno di le teng mme yona se se dirileng ke go di tlhokomela fela gore se feletse le marope mme dintlo tseno di ba tswela mosola..     Ditona le Batlatsatona ba ba nnang mo dintlong tse puso ba adimang tsona ba duelela ditirelo fela jaaka batlhankedi ba ba direlang palamente tla bo le go tlhoka botho go batla gore Ditona le Batlatsatona ba tiro ya bona sa nneleng ruri go ithekela dintlo mo metsemegolong yothe go boletsweng ka yona le go dira gore go nne botlhofo gore ba kgone go dira tiro ya bona ya go direla naga..     Dijanaga tse di dirisiwang ke Ditona le Batlatsatona di tsamaisana le Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona mme bile boleng jwa tsona bo mo diatleng tsa Tona ya Matlole mme ene elediwa ke Tona ya Mapodisi go mo eletsa ka didirisiwa tsa pabalesego tse di tlhokagalang mo dijanageng tseno.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele ukuphasiswa libandla lezamaPhaliswano kokuhlangana kwamazwe ngamazwe kweKhampani ye-Europe edidiyela utjwala i-Heineken neyeSewula Afrika i- Distell Group Holdings.
tgt_text: Didirisiwa tsa pabalesego ke tsona tse di bitsang thata tse di nang le seabe se segolo mo ditlhwatlhweng tsa dijanaga tseno, mme ditiragalo tsa go tshwana le tsa mo malobanyaneng tsa Mokhuduthamaga yo thutseng botala ka tlhogo go latela gore sejanaga sa gagwe se amege mo kotsing ke dilo tsa mothale ono tse di dirang gore go nne botlhokwa thata gore re se lebelele seno ka leitlho la sepolotiki.

src_text: Ukuhlanganiswa kweenkampanezi, okuyokwakha abakhiqizi abakhulu botjwala elizweneli, kwenziwa ngokulandela imibandela ehlukahlukeneko yekareko yomphakathi, ekubalwa hlangana nayo ukuphakanyiswa kwetuthuko kezokuthumela, ukulungisa ukutholakala komkhiqizo welizwe, ukuphakanyiswa kwamasiso kezokurhubhulula nokuthuthukisa nokwandiswa kwamandla wokukhiqiza elizweneli.
tgt_text: Batlhankedi botlhe ba ba direlang Palamente ba na le tshwanelo ya go neelwa badiredi ba ba ka ba thusang ka tiro ya bona.

src_text: Ikhampani ehlanganyelweko le izokuphakamisa nobunikazi bezabelo kubasebenzi ngokusungula ihlelo labasebenzi lobunikazi bezabelo nokunikela abasebenzi ukujameleka ebhodini.
tgt_text: Phapang fela ya palo ya badiri ba ba Thusang Ditona ke nako go ya ka gore Tona e rileng tla nna mo tirong sebaka se se kanakang gonne badiredi botlhe ba ba thusang Ditona ba dira go ya ka sebaka sa gore ene dira sebaka se le kanakang.

src_text: Ukweluswa Kwetuthuko Yesizo Ngeenkhukhula Zomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Seno ke ka ntlha ya gore Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona tsamaya kwalolwa sešwa le go fetolwa..     Moporesitente rometse Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona e dirisiwang ga jaanong kwa Khomišeneng e Ikemetseng e Dirang ka Megolo ya Batlhankedi ba Puso ba Bagolo, go kwalola le go sekaseka karolo ya megolo e dirisiwang ga jaana mo bukaneng eno     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele umsebenzi owenziwe nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu, uMma u-Mmamoloko Kubayi namalunga weMinMEC kezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu ukuqalisisa iragelo phambili ngokuhlaliswa safuthi nokufunela indawo imindeni eyathintwa ziinkhukhula zango-2022 KwaZulu-Natala, njengombana ilizwe seliyokuhlanganisa umnyaka kwasahlela iinkhukhula ezimbi ezehlela ilizweli.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Basadi mo Metshamekong.

src_text: Ukudurhiswa Okumalungana neeMbonelelo Zemirholo yaboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go gatisa mo kaseteng Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Basadi mo Metshamekong gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga yona.

src_text: Ikhabinethi izwakalise ukutshwenyeka ngokungakhulunywa kuhle kweembonelelo zemirholo yaboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe, ngokwendlela kutlolwe ngakho ku-Guide for Members of the Executive, eveza iimbonelelo zemirholo, zokurhwebelana neembonelelo zamalunga aphezulu embusweni ekwenzeni imisebenzi yawo ngefanelo.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tlhagisa dikgato tse di tla tsewang go tsholetsa le go ema nokeng basadi mo metshamekong mmogo le go tsenya tirosng matsholo a tla samaganang le go fedisa go se lekalekane ga batho ba bong jo bo farologaneng mo metshamekong le mo mekgatlhong ya metshameko..

src_text: Ukuhleleka kwe-Ministerial Housing kumphumela we-1910 Consensus mhlazana kusungulwa i- Union of South Africa eyayiveza amadorobha amathathu amakhulu weSewula Afrika, iPitori njengendawo yokuSebenzela komBuso, i-Bloemfontein njengendawo yeBandla lezomThetho, iKapa njengendawo yePalamende.
tgt_text: Se samagana gape le matsapa basadi ba itemogelang ona fa ba tshwanetse go tsenela metshameko go tshwana le go se enngwe nokeng ka matlole, ka dithuso le ka megolo e tshwanelang batho botlhe ba leng batshameki ba metshameko.

src_text: Izindlu lezo ekuthiwa batjho ziinthabathaba zikanokutjho zoke njalo zatholakala ngaphambi komnyaka we-1994 kanti urhulumende owalandelako odoswa phambili yi-African National Congress – akwenzileko kuqinisekisa bona ziyalungiswa bona zibe sebujameni obufaneleko kobanyana kuzuzwe ngazo ekukhuphukeni kwentengo yokuthengiswa kwezindlu.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo pholisi eno ke go dira gore basadi ba bantsi ba nne le seabe mo metshamekong le mo ditirong tsa go etelela kwa pele mo metshamekong go tshwana le go nna bakatisi le balaodi ba metshameko..     Pholisi eno tlhaloganya sentle gore go okediwa ga seabe sa basadi mo metshamekong le mo ditirong tsa boeteledipele mo metshamekong go tla fokotsa thata kgang ya go se lekalekane ga batho ba bong jo bo farologaneng mo dikarolong di le dintsi tsa metshameko tse di tlhaolang basadi.

src_text: AboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe abasebenzisa izindlu zombuso bayayibhadela irente njengombana kusenza namalunga wePalamende.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno batla gore go nne le tekatekano mmogo le go dira gore basadi ba neelwe tlotlo e ba tshwanetseng le go se tlhaelediwe matlho mo ditirong tsa seporofešenale, go akaretsa le gore ba neelwe megolo e lekanang fela le ya banna ba le bona leng batshameki ba metshameko.

src_text: Yeke-ke, kuzabe kuyinto engakalungi ukuthi aboNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe abanganavikeleko emsebenzinabo ukuthi bazitholele izindlu zangeqadi zokuhlala ibe basebenzela isitjhaba.
tgt_text: Go Tshwara Khonferense ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Merero ya Kalafo ya Batsetse le Masea e Leng Gona Belegwa.

src_text: Iinkoloyi ezisetjenziswa boNgqongqotjhe namaSekela waboNgqongqotjhe zikhambisana ne-Ministerial Handbook kanti isilinganiso sentengo yazo sibekwa nguNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali ngokusebenzisana noNgqongqotjhe wamaPholisa ehlangothini leemfanelo zokuvikela.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumetse gore naga ya Aforika Borwa ka tswelela pele ya tshwara Khonferense ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Merero ya Kalafo ya Batsetse le Masea e Leng Gona Belegwa kwa Motse Kapa go tloga ka la bo 8 go fitlha ka la bo 11 Motsheganong 2023 mo bannaleseabe ba feta ba le 1 000 go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara ba tla kopanang gona go tla ka ditharabololo tsa go thusa gore batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa se latswe kika, mmogo le go thibela gore basadi ba se tlhole ba belega masea a tlhokafalang ise belegwe.

src_text: Iimfanelo zokuphepha ziqakatheke khulu ekubekweni kwentengo yazo kanti izehlakalo zamhlapha nje ezingakhange zibe zihle zokubhubha kwaboSomkhandlu namkha ukuthinteka eengozini ezimbi ngeenkoloyi kugandelele ukuqakatheka kwendaba le kanti kumele kususe indabamlonyeni le ekuphikisaneni ngokwepolotiki.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa gatetse pele tota fa go tla mo Dipeelo tsa Tlhabololo e Nnelang Ruri (SDG) tsa Dinagakopano (UN) fa go tla mo kalafong ya batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa.

src_text: Woke amalunga wePalamende anefanelo yokuthi abe nabasizi ababasiza ukwenza imisebenzi yabo.
tgt_text: Naga le yona tla unngwelwa go tlala seatla go tswa mo khonferenseng eno gonne batho ba ba romilweng go tsenela ba tla tlhabana botlhale le go fatlhosana ka maano bona ba dirisang a ba tswelang mosola mo mererong ya kalafo ya batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa.

src_text: Umehluko okhona ngesibalo sabasebenzi ema-Ofisini waboNgqongqotjhe mphumela wesikhathi uNgqongqotjhe loyo akhethwe ngaso.
tgt_text: Porojeke ya Leeto la Ngwaoboswa, Tokologo le Kgaratlho (RLHR).

src_text: Lokhu kubangelwa kukuthi i-Ministerial Handbook imtlolo osebenzako onande ubuyekezwa.
tgt_text: Kabinete neetswe pegelo e tseneletseng ya dikgatelopele tsa porojeke ya RLHR.

src_text: UMengameli uthumele i-Ministerial Handbook esebenza kukunje ekomitjhinini ezijameleko i-Independent Commission for the Remuneration of Public Office Bearers, esebenza ngokubhadelwa kwabo boke abasebenzi bembusweni abaphethe iinkhundla bona ibuyekezwe  IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane gore Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba mmogo le ya Ditirelo tsa Bosiamisi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa ba ipope Komiti ya Ditona tsa Naga (IMC) e tla mekamekanang le merero ya RLHR..     RLHR ke porojeke ya segopotso sa naga mme maitlhomo yona ke go ikgopotsa le go keteka loeto lwa Aforika Borwa go leba kwa kgololesegong.

src_text: Umtlamo Womthethokambiso Wabomma Kezemidlalo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhomile IMC gore nne yona e okamang porojeke eno ka go dira gore nne le baeteledipele ba sepolotiki.

src_text: IKhabinethi iphasise ukutlolwa ngokomthetho eencwadini zombuso komTlamo womThethokambiso waboMma kezemiDlalo bona umphakathi uzwakalise imibono.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo porojeke eno ke go tlhoma dikgopotso tse di farologaneng tse di re gopotsang ka fao bakgaratlhela kgololesego ba ikentshitseng setlhabelo gore naga ya Aforika Borwa feletse gololesegile le go nna le temokerasi.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo ubeka amagadango azokuthuthukisa abe asekele abomma emkhakheni wezemidlalo nokuqinisekisa bona amahlelo asendimeni efaneleko wokutjheja imidlalo ngokwahlukahlukana nezakheko zayo.
tgt_text: Porojeke eno tla dira gore go agiwe dimusiamo tse dingwe gape, difikantswe, dilaeborari le mafelo go bolokela dilwana tsa hisetori mme gape tla tlhagisa gape le ditiro tsa go ipopa ngatana le go dirisana le dinaga tse dingwe tsa Aforika.

src_text: Ubuye utjheje iinqabo eziliya abomma  bona bangene kezemidlalo ezifana nokutlhogeka kwesizo lezeemali, isekelo kunye nokubhadelwa ngendlela enganelisiko.
tgt_text: Porojeke eno tshegofaditswe ke UN mme bile na le bokgoni jwa go gagamatsa tirisanommogo magareng ga batho ka go sola mosola setso le ngwaoboswa go ralala le kontinente..     Tse dingwe tsa dikgato tse dintsinyana tse di setseng di dirilwe ke leeto le Ditona le le tsereng mo ngwageng wa 2022 go leba kwa Botswana le kwa Zimbabwe mmogo le go rulaganya le kopano magareng ga naga ya Angola le ya Tanzania go di jela nala..     Ditiro tse di mabapi le porojeke eno maitlhomo tsona ke go golaganya dinaga tse di ka fa Karolong ya Borwa jwa Kontinente ya Aforika mmogo le go ruta bašwa ka ka kgaratlho e kileng ya nna teng ya go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa bokoloniale le tsa go nyefolana go ya ka lotso.

src_text: Umthethokambiso otjhukunyiswako lo uhlose ukukhuthaza ukungena kwabomma kezemidlalo neenkhundleni zoburholi ezifana nokubandula nokuphatha imidlalo.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tla dira gore go nne bonolo go baakanya diphoso tsa mo nakong e fetileng ka go nolofatsa dikgato tsa go kopa go busediwa gae ga masaledi balwelakgaratlho ba naga ya rona ba ba tlhokafalatseng kwa dinageng tse dingwe.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo utjheja bona ukwanda kwabomma kezemidlalo neenkhundleni zokuphatha kuzokuphungula kugcine kukuqedile ukungalingani ngokobulili kezemidlalo kunye nezinye izenzo zokubandlululwa kwabomma.
tgt_text: Go na le mabitla ka nna le 11 a itsiweng gore hupile ditopo tsa maAforika Borwa kwa nageng ya Zambia, mme le lengwe la mabitla ao ke la Rre Duma Nokwe yo neng le Molwelakgaratlho..     Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Dilo tsa Botsweretshi, Setso le Ngwaoboswa di Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha.

src_text: Ubuye uphakamise ukulingana nokuqinisekisa bona abomma bayahlonitjhwa namkha bayatjhejwa ngokwelwazi kezemidlalo, ekubalwa ukubhadelwa ngokulinganako nabalingani babo ngokomsebenzi abamadoda enza umsebenzi ofana newabo.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Botsweretshi, Setso le Ngwaoboswa di Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha.
Pholisi eno dira gore Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Ngwaoboswa Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha nne le mosola jaaka sale kwalwa ka ngwaga wa 2011 ke Lefapha la Botsweretshi le Setso.

src_text: Ukusingathwa kwe-International Maternal and Newborn Health Conference -.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno samagana le tiro ya go dira gore ditsweletswa tsotlhe tsa ngwaoboswa di somarelwe mo dikhomphiutheng gore batho ba kgone go di fitlhelela bonolo le go boloka tshedimosetso ya beng ba ditlhagisiwa tseo.

src_text: IKhabinethi inikele iSewula Afrika ilungelo lokusingatha ikhonferensi i-International Maternal and Newborn Health Conference eKapa ukusuka nakabu-8 ukuya nakali-11 kuMrhayili 2023, lapho kuzabe kuhlangene ababelani abangaphezu kweKulungwana abavela ephasini zombelele ukuzokukhambiselela iinsombululo zokwenza ngcono ukusinda kwabomma abasidisi namasana, nokuvimba ukubelethwa kwabantwana sebathulile.
tgt_text: Le fa tota tlhaloso ya mokgwa wa go boloka ditsweletswa mo khomphiutheng bua bogolosegolo ka go tsaya tshedimosetso e bolokilweng ka mokgwa wa thekenoloji ya bogolotala go fetola gore nne mo thekenolojing ya segompieno, mmogo le go gatisa ditokomane tsotlhe tse di leng mo pampiring gore di tsenngwe mo lhomphiutheng, go kopisa direkoto tse di rekotilweng ka thekenoloji ya bogolotala go di tsenya mo dikhomphiutheng, pholisi eno okeditse bokao jwa lefoko leno go bua gape le ka tsedimosetso e leng mo mokgweng wa thekenoloji ya segompieno go ka se kgonagaleng gore gatisiwe..     Go somarela tshedimosetso mo dikhomphiutheng go tla tswela naga mosola o seng kana ka sepe gonne go tla dira gore tshedimosetso eno go nne bonolo go bona, segolobogolo tshedimosetso e tlhokomelwang ke mafelo go boloka tshedimosetso, dilaeborari le dimosiamo.

src_text: ISewula Afrika ibe nepumelelo ekulu ekufikeleleni lokho okuqothelwe yiHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko i-United Nations Sustainable Development Goals wezepilo yabomma abasidisi namasana, nokuvimbela ukubelethwa kwamasana selathule.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tla tsenngwa tirisong mo maphateng otlhe puso le setšhaba     Molaotlhomo.

src_text: Ilizwe lekhethu lizokuzuza khulu nalo njengombana iinthunywa ezizabe zisekhonferensini hlangana nokhunye, zizokwabelana amaqhinga asebenzako neendlela ezihlelekileko ngeendaba zepilo yabomma abasidisi neyamasana.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditheo tsa Molao wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: IPhrojekthi i-Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route (RLHR).
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhomamisitse go tlisiwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Molao wa Merero ya Ditheo tsa Molao wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ifumene umbiko opheleleko weragelo phambili kezokuhlonywa kwephrojekthi i-RLHR.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo molaotlhomo ono ke go kwalola sešwa Melao le mentsinyana e disiwang ke Lefapha la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo ka go bakanya diphoso tsa setegeniki mmogo le dikarolo tse di kgoreletsang go diragadiwa ga Melao eno..     Molaotlhomo ono na le dikarolo di le 37 tse di tlhokang go kwalolwa sešwa gore go kgonwe go baakanngwa diphoso tse di leng teng mo melaong e farologaneng tse di sa tsamaisaneng le molaotheo     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yaphasisa nokuthi uNgqongqotjhe wezobuDlelwano bamaZwe ngamaZwe newezoBulungiswa nezokuHlengwa kweSimilo bona babe yincenye yeKomiti eHlanganyelweko yaboNgqongqotjhe (i-IMC) ku-RLHR.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.

src_text: I-RLHR iyiphrojekthi yesikhumbuzo sesitjhaba ekuhloswe ngayo ukukhumbula nokugidinga indlela eya eKululekweni yeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya gagwe ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa kwa Moketeng wa Ngwaga wa 2023 wa go Keteka Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Botho ka Labobedi wa la bo 21 Mopitlwe 2023 kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la De Aar West la porofense ya Kapa Bokone..     Molaetsamogolo wa monongwaga ke: “Go Bokeletsa le go Tlhokomela Setlwaedi sa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho go Tsena mo Isagong ka Tsona”, mme seno ke go keteka matlhotlhapelo a neng diragala kwa Sharpeville le kwa Langa mmogo le go keteka megwanto mengwe e neng ya runya ka lona letsatsi leno ka la bo 21 Mopitlwe 1960 mo nageng ka bophara..     Jaaka re le puso re rwele maikarabelo go sireletsa ditshwanelo tsa motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng tse molaotheo mo nayang tsona.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yasungula i-IMC bona ibe lilihlo lephrojekthi le begodu inikele nangoburholi bezepolotiki.
tgt_text: Tla re dirisaneng mmogo go dira bonnete jwa gore go se nne le motho yo re mo tlogelang kwa morago fa go tla mo go direng gore dikarolo tsotlhe tse Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 mmogo le Molao wa Ditshwanelo tsa Botho batho ba ikutlwisa tsona.

src_text: Iphrojekthi le ifaka hlangana iindlela ezihlukahlukeneko zokukhumbula ukuzinikela okwenziwa balwelikululeko bona iSewula Afrika ibe lilizwe elitjhaphulukileko nelilawulwa yintando yenengi.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Tshomarelo ya Metsi.

src_text: Ibuye ivumele bona kwakhiwe ama-museum, ama-monument, ama-library nama-archive, ngehloso yokutjheja umoya wokuzwelana nokusebenzisana kwabantu be-Afrika.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya go Keteka Mosola wa Metsi go tloga ka la bo 20 go fitlha ka la bo 26 Mopitlwe 2023 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Potlakisa Diphetogo”..     Beke eno ketekiwa ka nako le nngwe le Letsatsi la go Keteka Botlhokwa jwa Metsi ka la bo 22 Mopitlwe 2023, mme lona le nopola ka fao metsi a phepa leng botlhokwa ka teng.

src_text: Iphasiswe yiHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko begodu inekghono lokuqinisa isebenziswano labantu bekhontinenti ngokusebenzisa amasiko namagugu.
tgt_text: Le fa re itemogetse dipula tse dintsi mo malobanyaneng, naga ya Aforika Borwa santse le naga e tlhaelang metsi bile mo maemong bo 30 dinaga tse di nang le komelelo mo lefatsheng.

src_text: Hlangana nokwenzekileko ngomnyaka wee-2022 kubalwa amakhambo waboNgqongqotjhe wokuya e-Botswana ne-Zimbabwe kunye nemihlangano yokuhlela ebanjwe ne-Angola ne-Tanzania.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe go tlhokomela metswedi ya metsi ya naga ya rona go tshwana le mafelo nang le metswedi, go nne botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore re nne le felo gongwe mo re ka iponelang metsi fa go le thata.

src_text: Izenzo ezimalungana nephrojekthi le kuhloswe ngazo ukuhlanganisa amazwe we-Afrika engeSewula nokufundisa abantu abatjha ngomzabalazo wokuthathwa kwamanye amazwe abe ngaphasi kwamanye kunye nokubandlululana.
tgt_text: Rotlhe ke maikarabelo rona go tlhokomela metsi le go dira bonnete jwa gore metsi ga fele..     Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya Bolwetse jwa Lehuba (TB).

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uvumela nokuthi amathambo wabalwelikululeko beSewula Afrika asemazweni we-Afrika abuyiswe.
tgt_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Paul Mashatile tla fana ka puo ya gagwe ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa kwa Moketeng wa Semmuso wa go Keteka Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya Bolwetse jwa Lehuba (TB) ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe 2023 mo go tla bong go ketekiwa ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Jalo!

src_text: Kunamathuna abalelwa ku-11 ekwaziwa bona ngewamaSewula Afrika akhonjwa e-Zambia, ekubalwa hlangana nelikamakekere kezomzabalazo uNomzana Duma Nokwe.
tgt_text: Ke Nna le Wena ba Re ka Fedisang TB”..     Mo moketeng ono o tla tshwarelwang kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la kwa Tlhabane mo Porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Aids mmogo le Lefapha la Boitekanelo ba tla thankgolola Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro ya go Lwantshana le TB, HIV, Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano magareng ga ngwaga wa 2023 go fitlha ka wa.

src_text: UmThethokambiso weliZweloke wokuLondwa Budijithali kwemiSebenzi yobuGwali, yamaSiko neyeziNto eziliGugu.
tgt_text: Leano leno le agelela mo godimo ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di setseng di fitlheletswe ka go tsosolosa matsholo thibelotshwaetso kalafo go nwa melemo go etela mafelo otlhe balwetse ba nnang mo go ona le go dira gore batho ba ikobele ditaelo tsa go tsaya melemo, mmogo le go fedisa ditiragalo le dipuo tsa go nyenya balwetse bano  Melaetsa.

src_text: IKhabinethi iphasise nomThethokambiso weliZweloke wokuLondwa Budijithali kwemiSebenzi yobuGwali, yamaSiko neyeziNto eziliGugu (i-National Policy on the Digitisation of Arts, Culture and Heritage) bona ungasetjenziswa.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Setlhopha sa motshameko wa kerikhete sa the Proteas se se tla amogelang sa West Indies fa di tshameka metshameko ya multi-format tour.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo ubuye ukugunyaze ukusetjenziswa kwe-National Policy on the Digitisation of Heritage Resources ekumgomo owatlanywa mNyango wangalesosikhathi wezobuGwali namaSiko ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa go ema nokeng setlhopha sa naga ya rona jaaka se tswelela go re dira motlotlo.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo utjheja ukufakwa kudijithali kweensiza zamagugu wesitjhaba bona zilondwe, zitholakale begodu kulawuleke nobunikazi bazo.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Mokhuduthamaga wa Lefapha la Thuto wa Puso ya Porofense ya Foreistata Tate Makgoe yo neng na le dingwaga di le 60,yo nnileng le seabe se segolo mo lephateng la thuto mmogo le go atlega mo go direng gore porofense eno ntshe dipholo tse dintle thata tsa materiki ka tatelano sebaka sa dingwaga di le nne..Mme Maurencia Gillion, yo neng emetse porofense ya Kapa Bophirima kwa Lekgotleng la Bosetšhaba la Diporofense (NCOP) mmogo le go direla Komiti a Tlhophilweng mo go yona ya Ditirelo tsa Kokelo le tsa go Tswa Baagi Thuso ne le molwelakgaratlho yo neng tumile bile diretse baagi ba Kapa Bophirima sebaka se tlhoka palo, segolobogolo baagi ba kwa metseselegae ya porofense eo.Rre John Wills yo neng na le dingwaga di le 66, yo neng le ramolao yo neng tumile bile le .molwelakgaratlho yo neng emela kwa kgotlatshekelo baeteledipele ba le bantsinyana ba dipolotiki, mmogo le Moporesitente wa mo malobeng bong Rre Nelson Mandela.Rre Mark Pilgrim yo neng na le dingwaga di le 54, yo neng le mogasi wa dikgang yo neileng bagasi ba bangwe ba le bantsi mafolofolo mo intasetering ya kgaso ya dikgang.

src_text: Nanyana ikambiso yedijithali ifaka hlangana ukutjhugululwa ngendlela yokuthoma ye-analogu ukuya kudijithali kwemitlolo, ekubalwa amarikhodi wamaphepha, i-microfiche nemigadangiso yamatheyibhu ekungasi ngeyedijithali, umgomo lo ukhambiselele ihlathululolo eensizeni ezibizwa ngama-born-digital resources ezifana nelwazi elivezwe ngedijithali, ekungeze latjhugululelwa endleleni ephathekako.
tgt_text: Mme Gloria Bosman yo neng na le dingwaga di le 50, yo nang le dikabo di tlhoka palo tse di fentseng yo neng le seopedi le sekwadi sa mmino wa Aforika Borwa wa jazz     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Ukungena kudijithali kuza neembonelelo ezikulu enarheni le njengombana kuzokwenza bona ilwazi litholakale lula, khulu khulu lelo elikuma-archive, ema-library, nakuma-museum.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tsa Lekgotla la go Eletsa Botsamaisi jwa Sekema sa Makwalo Madulo     Moatefokate Boyce Mkhize (Monnasetulo)     Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Motlatsamonnasetulo)     Mme Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Rre Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Moatefokate Nomonde Nokuthula January     Rre Iqbal Mohamed Motala; le     Ngaka Vuyisani Moss..     Ditokololo tsa Khomišene ya Baatlhodi     Mme Nomzamo Zondo;(ii)    Rre Hanif Vally;(iii)    Ngaka Cornelia September;(iv)    Rre Makgabhana Mokoena thapilwe sešwa); led     Moporofesara Estelle Hurter thapilwe sešwa).
